products.title: Sports Knee Pads | Meniscus Tear Injury Recovery

Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Wash after each use to prevent bacteria. Replace when compression weakens (typically 6-9 months with regular use). Sizing Guide Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap S: 12-13.5" (30-34cm) M: 13.5-15" (34-38cm) L: 15-16.5" (38-42cm) XL: 16.5-18" (42-46cm) XXL: 18-20" (46-51cm) Snug fit recommended for meniscus support Specifications Type: Sports compression knee sleeve for injury recovery Material: Medical-grade elastic, breathable knit fabric Compression: 20-30mmHg graduated pressure Thickness: 5-7mm (protective without bulk) Support Level: Medium (recovery and sports protection) Features: Breathable, moisture-wicking, anti-slip Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. products.descriptionHtml:
Sports Knee Pads - Meniscus Tear Injury Recovery Support

Specialized sports knee pads designed for meniscus tear recovery and knee pain management during athletic activities. Medical-grade compression combined with anatomical support helps protect healing meniscus tissue while allowing gradual return to sports and exercise under medical guidance.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Meniscus Protection: Targeted compression supports healing meniscus during recovery phase
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces pain from meniscus tears, arthritis, or general knee discomfort
  • ✓ Injury Recovery: Allows progressive return to sports while protecting knee joint
  • ✓ Stability Enhancement: Provides support without restricting natural movement patterns
  • ✓ Sports Performance: Maintains athletic performance during recovery period
  • ✓ Versatile Use: Suitable for running, basketball, cycling, gym workouts, and daily activities

Perfect For

  • Meniscus tear conservative treatment
  • Post-meniscus surgery rehabilitation
  • Knee arthritis pain during sports
  • General knee pain requiring support
  • Returning to sports after knee injury
  • Preventing knee injuries during athletics
  • Basketball, running, soccer, cycling
  • Gym workouts with knee discomfort

How to Use

  1. Consult doctor before returning to sports with meniscus injury
  2. Roll knee pad up leg
  3. Position centered over kneecap
  4. Unroll to extend coverage above and below knee
  5. Adjust for snug, supportive fit
  6. Wear during sports and exercise
  7. Remove during rest periods
  8. Progress activity level gradually per medical advice

Care Instructions

Hand wash or machine wash cold. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Wash after each use to prevent bacteria. Replace when compression weakens (typically 6-9 months with regular use).

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-13.5" (30-34cm)
  • M: 13.5-15" (34-38cm)
  • L: 15-16.5" (38-42cm)
  • XL: 16.5-18" (42-46cm)
  • XXL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • Snug fit recommended for meniscus support

Specifications

  • Type: Sports compression knee sleeve for injury recovery
  • Material: Medical-grade elastic, breathable knit fabric
  • Compression: 20-30mmHg graduated pressure
  • Thickness: 5-7mm (protective without bulk)
  • Support Level: Medium (recovery and sports protection)
  • Features: Breathable, moisture-wicking, anti-slip

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee pad provides mechanical support during meniscus injury recovery. Not a substitute for medical treatment. Always follow your doctor's or physical therapist's return-to-sport protocol. If knee locks, gives way, increased swelling, or severe pain occurs, stop activity and consult healthcare provider immediately. Not for acute injuries or complete meniscus tears without medical clearance.

products.title: Knee Immobilizer Brace | Post-Surgery Orthopedic Support
products.description: Hinged Knee Immobilizer - Post-Surgery Orthosis Medical orthopedic knee immobilizer for post-surgical stabilization. Hinged design provides rigid support for ACL, MCL, PCL reconstruction recovery. Professional-grade orthosis prescribed by surgeons for immediate post-operative phase and early rehabilitation. Key Benefits ✓ Post-Surgery Specific: Design ed explicitly for immediate post-operative period - maximum protection when healing is most vulnerable ✓ Immobilization Function: Prevents harmful movement that could disrupt surgical repair or graft healing ✓ Hinged for ROM: Unlike straight immobilizers, hinges allow controlled range of motion as surgeon prescribes progressive mobility ✓ Medical-Grade Stability: Hospital-quality construction meets orthopedic surgeon standards for post-op protection ✓ Multi-Ligament Support: Effective for ACL, MCL, PCL, and multi-ligament reconstruction recoveries Perfect For Immediate post-ACL reconstruction MCL/LCL surgical repair recovery PCL reconstruction protection Multi-ligament surgery recovery Post-meniscus repair immobilization Patellar realignment surgery Fracture healing around knee Surgeon-prescribed immobilization How to Use Initial Application: Usually applied by surgeon, nurse, or PT in hospital/clinic Patient lies down for initial fitting Brace positioned with hinges at joint line Set ROM locks per surgeon's prescription (often 0° initially) Secure all straps firmly for immobilization Patient instructed on proper wear schedule ROM gradually increased per protocol Wear 24/7 initially, removed only for prescribed exercises Transition to functional brace when cleared by surgeon Post-Surgery Timeline Week 0-1: Locked at 0° extension, 24/7 wear Week 1-2: May allow 0-30° ROM, continue full-time wear Week 2-4: Progressive ROM 0-60° to 0-90° Week 4-6: Increased ROM, may remove for exercises Week 6+: Transition to functional brace for activities Timeline varies by surgery type - follow surgeon exactly Care Instructions Clean with antibacterial wipes daily (cannot remove for washing initially). Once cleared for removal, hand wash and air dry thoroughly. Check all hinges and straps daily. Specifications Type: Post-surgical knee immobilizer with hinges Support Level: Maximum immobilization Hinges: Bilateral locking hinges with ROM control Length: Extended coverage (thigh to calf) Material: Rigid frame, padded interior Straps: 6-8 secure fastening straps ROM Control: Adjustable in increments per protocol Sizing Guide Usually measured by medical professional: Small: Leg length 16-18" Medium: Leg length 18-20" Large: Leg length 20-22" X-Large: Leg length 22-24" Measure from 8" above knee to 8" below Important Post-Op Instructions Never unlock ROM without surgeon approval Wear 24/7 as prescribed (including sleep) Keep wound dry - cover during bathing Watch for complications: increased pain, fever, drainage Follow PT protocol precisely No weight-bearing until cleared Keep leg elevated when resting Attend all follow-ups - critical for proper healing Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Replacement straps available. Contact us with questions. Medical Disclaimer: This is post-surgical medical device. Use ONLY as prescribed by orthopedic surgeon. Not for use without professional medical indication. Improper use or removal against medical advice can cause surgical failure, graft rupture, or permanent damage. Follow surgeon's immobilization protocol exactly - do not advance ROM schedule without clearance. If brace loosens, causes excessive pain, or you suspect surgical complications, contact surgeon immediately. Attend all scheduled follow-ups - healing assessment cannot be done remotely. This brace is temporary - duration of use determined solely by medical team based on healing progress.
products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Immobilizer - Post-Surgery Orthosis

Medical orthopedic knee immobilizer for post-surgical stabilization. Hinged design provides rigid support for ACL, MCL, PCL reconstruction recovery. Professional-grade orthosis prescribed by surgeons for immediate post-operative phase and early rehabilitation.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Post-Surgery Specific: Design ed explicitly for immediate post-operative period - maximum protection when healing is most vulnerable
  • ✓ Immobilization Function: Prevents harmful movement that could disrupt surgical repair or graft healing
  • ✓ Hinged for ROM: Unlike straight immobilizers, hinges allow controlled range of motion as surgeon prescribes progressive mobility
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Stability: Hospital-quality construction meets orthopedic surgeon standards for post-op protection
  • ✓ Multi-Ligament Support: Effective for ACL, MCL, PCL, and multi-ligament reconstruction recoveries

Perfect For

  • Immediate post-ACL reconstruction
  • MCL/LCL surgical repair recovery
  • PCL reconstruction protection
  • Multi-ligament surgery recovery
  • Post-meniscus repair immobilization
  • Patellar realignment surgery
  • Fracture healing around knee
  • Surgeon-prescribed immobilization

How to Use

  1. Initial Application: Usually applied by surgeon, nurse, or PT in hospital/clinic
  2. Patient lies down for initial fitting
  3. Brace positioned with hinges at joint line
  4. Set ROM locks per surgeon's prescription (often 0° initially)
  5. Secure all straps firmly for immobilization
  6. Patient instructed on proper wear schedule
  7. ROM gradually increased per protocol
  8. Wear 24/7 initially, removed only for prescribed exercises
  9. Transition to functional brace when cleared by surgeon

Post-Surgery Timeline

Week 0-1: Locked at 0° extension, 24/7 wear
Week 1-2: May allow 0-30° ROM, continue full-time wear
Week 2-4: Progressive ROM 0-60° to 0-90°
Week 4-6: Increased ROM, may remove for exercises
Week 6+: Transition to functional brace for activities
Timeline varies by surgery type - follow surgeon exactly

Care Instructions

Clean with antibacterial wipes daily (cannot remove for washing initially). Once cleared for removal, hand wash and air dry thoroughly. Check all hinges and straps daily.

Specifications

  • Type: Post-surgical knee immobilizer with hinges
  • Support Level: Maximum immobilization
  • Hinges: Bilateral locking hinges with ROM control
  • Length: Extended coverage (thigh to calf)
  • Material: Rigid frame, padded interior
  • Straps: 6-8 secure fastening straps
  • ROM Control: Adjustable in increments per protocol

Sizing Guide

Usually measured by medical professional:
Small: Leg length 16-18"
Medium: Leg length 18-20"
Large: Leg length 20-22"
X-Large: Leg length 22-24"
Measure from 8" above knee to 8" below

Important Post-Op Instructions

  • Never unlock ROM without surgeon approval
  • Wear 24/7 as prescribed (including sleep)
  • Keep wound dry - cover during bathing
  • Watch for complications: increased pain, fever, drainage
  • Follow PT protocol precisely
  • No weight-bearing until cleared
  • Keep leg elevated when resting
  • Attend all follow-ups - critical for proper healing

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement straps available. Contact us with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This is post-surgical medical device. Use ONLY as prescribed by orthopedic surgeon. Not for use without professional medical indication. Improper use or removal against medical advice can cause surgical failure, graft rupture, or permanent damage. Follow surgeon's immobilization protocol exactly - do not advance ROM schedule without clearance. If brace loosens, causes excessive pain, or you suspect surgical complications, contact surgeon immediately. Attend all scheduled follow-ups - healing assessment cannot be done remotely. This brace is temporary - duration of use determined solely by medical team based on healing progress.

products.title: Tourmaline Magnetic Knee Pads | Self-Heating Support
products.description: Tourmaline Magnetic Therapy Knee Pads - Self-Heating Support Innovative knee pads combining natural tourmaline stone therapy, magnetic therapy, and self-heating technology for comprehensive pain relief. Far-infrared heat from tourmaline penetrates deep into knee joint while magnets improve circulation, providing drug-free relief for arthritis, chronic pain, and injury recovery. Key Benefits ✓ Tourmaline Therapy: Natural tourmaline stones emit far-infrared rays and negative ions for deep tissue healing ✓ Magnetic Therapy: Integrated magnets (800-1200 gauss) improve blood circulation and reduce inflammation ✓ Self-Heating: Tourmaline generates heat from body warmth - no batteries or electricity needed ✓ Arthritis Relief: Continuous gentle warmth helps reduce arthritis pain and morning stiffness ✓ Chronic Pain Management: Natural therapy provides sustained relief for ongoing knee pain ✓ Drug-Free: Alternative pain relief without medications or side effects Perfect For Knee osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis Chronic knee pain and stiffness Cold-sensitive knees needing warmth Poor circulation causing knee discomfort Post-injury pain management Morning knee stiffness Complementary therapy with medical treatment Natural pain relief preference How to Use Position knee pad with tourmaline stones/magnets contacting skin Secure straps above and below knee Allow 10-15 minutes for self-heating effect to activate from body heat Wear during daily activities or rest periods For arthritis: Wear all day for continuous relief For pain: Wear minimum 2-3 hours daily Can be worn under clothing discreetly Consistent daily use provides best results Care Instructions Remove tourmaline/magnetic inserts before washing (typically detachable). Hand wash fabric sleeve with mild soap, air dry. Wipe inserts with damp cloth - do not submerge. Replace sleeve when elastic weakens. Tourmaline stones and magnets are permanent - do not require replacement. Sizing Guide Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap S: 12-14" (30-36cm) M: 14-16" (36-41cm) L: 16-18" (41-46cm) XL: 18-20" (46-51cm) XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm) Comfortable fit important for all-day wear Specifications Technology: Tourmaline stone + magnetic therapy + self-heating Stones: Natural tourmaline (emits far-infrared + negative ions) Magnets: Neodymium magnets 800-1200 gauss (strategically placed) Heating: Self-generating from body heat (no electricity) Material: Breathable elastic, tourmaline-infused fabric Support Level: Light to medium compression Features: Drug-free, no batteries, washable sleeve Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for usage questions. Medical Disclaimer: This knee pad provides alternative therapy for pain management. Not for treating acute injuries or infections. Contraindications: pacemakers (magnets may interfere), pregnancy (without doctor approval), bleeding disorders, fever, or malignant tumors in knee area. Not a substitute for medical treatment. Consult healthcare provider for persistent knee pain. Results vary by individual.
products.descriptionHtml:
Tourmaline Magnetic Therapy Knee Pads - Self-Heating Support

Innovative knee pads combining natural tourmaline stone therapy, magnetic therapy, and self-heating technology for comprehensive pain relief. Far-infrared heat from tourmaline penetrates deep into knee joint while magnets improve circulation, providing drug-free relief for arthritis, chronic pain, and injury recovery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Tourmaline Therapy: Natural tourmaline stones emit far-infrared rays and negative ions for deep tissue healing
  • ✓ Magnetic Therapy: Integrated magnets (800-1200 gauss) improve blood circulation and reduce inflammation
  • ✓ Self-Heating: Tourmaline generates heat from body warmth - no batteries or electricity needed
  • ✓ Arthritis Relief: Continuous gentle warmth helps reduce arthritis pain and morning stiffness
  • ✓ Chronic Pain Management: Natural therapy provides sustained relief for ongoing knee pain
  • ✓ Drug-Free: Alternative pain relief without medications or side effects

Perfect For

  • Knee osteoarthritis and rheumatoid arthritis
  • Chronic knee pain and stiffness
  • Cold-sensitive knees needing warmth
  • Poor circulation causing knee discomfort
  • Post-injury pain management
  • Morning knee stiffness
  • Complementary therapy with medical treatment
  • Natural pain relief preference

How to Use

  1. Position knee pad with tourmaline stones/magnets contacting skin
  2. Secure straps above and below knee
  3. Allow 10-15 minutes for self-heating effect to activate from body heat
  4. Wear during daily activities or rest periods
  5. For arthritis: Wear all day for continuous relief
  6. For pain: Wear minimum 2-3 hours daily
  7. Can be worn under clothing discreetly
  8. Consistent daily use provides best results

Care Instructions

Remove tourmaline/magnetic inserts before washing (typically detachable). Hand wash fabric sleeve with mild soap, air dry. Wipe inserts with damp cloth - do not submerge. Replace sleeve when elastic weakens. Tourmaline stones and magnets are permanent - do not require replacement.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-14" (30-36cm)
  • M: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • L: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • XL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • Comfortable fit important for all-day wear

Specifications

  • Technology: Tourmaline stone + magnetic therapy + self-heating
  • Stones: Natural tourmaline (emits far-infrared + negative ions)
  • Magnets: Neodymium magnets 800-1200 gauss (strategically placed)
  • Heating: Self-generating from body heat (no electricity)
  • Material: Breathable elastic, tourmaline-infused fabric
  • Support Level: Light to medium compression
  • Features: Drug-free, no batteries, washable sleeve

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for usage questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee pad provides alternative therapy for pain management. Not for treating acute injuries or infections. Contraindications: pacemakers (magnets may interfere), pregnancy (without doctor approval), bleeding disorders, fever, or malignant tumors in knee area. Not a substitute for medical treatment. Consult healthcare provider for persistent knee pain. Results vary by individual.

products.title: Dynamic Knee Support with Spring | Adjustable Joint Cushion
products.description: 2PCS Dynamic Knee Support - Elevated Joint Support with Spring Cushion Innovative dynamic knee support system featuring spring-loaded joint support cushions that actively assist knee movement. Adjustable design relieves pain from strains, sprains, and arthritis while providing powered assistance during activities. Key Benefits ✓ Spring Power Assist: Built-in springs reduce strain on knee joint during movement ✓ Dynamic Support: Moves naturally with your knee, doesn't restrict motion ✓ Pain Relief: Cushions impact and reduces stress on ligaments and tendons ✓ Adjustable Fit: Multiple straps customize compression and support level ✓ Bilateral Set: 2-piece set for both knees ✓ Elevated Joint: Springs elevate and decompress joint during flexion Perfect For Knee strain and sprain recovery Arthritis pain management Meniscus injury support Ligament strain protection Sports activities (running, hiking) Weight-bearing exercises Stair climbing assistance Daily walking support for weak knees How to Use Slide support over foot up to knee Position spring mechanism on sides of knee Secure thigh strap snugly above knee Fasten calf strap below knee Adjust middle strap for optimal compression Test fit: knee should flex comfortably with spring assist Use both knee supports for balanced support Tighten straps if support slips during activity Care Instructions Hand wash straps and pads with mild soap. Wipe spring mechanisms with damp cloth (do not submerge). Air dry completely before storage. Check springs periodically for damage. Do not oil or lubricate springs. Specifications Quantity: 2-piece set (left + right) Mechanism: Dual-side spring support system Material: Aluminum alloy springs, neoprene straps, EVA padding Adjustment: 3 adjustable straps per knee Size: Universal adjustable (fits most adults) Weight Capacity: Up to 250 lbs per knee Colors: Black with silver springs Warranty & Support 90-day warranty covers spring mechanism and straps. Contact us for fitting assistance. Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and pain relief but not medical-grade stabilization. For serious knee injuries (ACL/PCL tears, fractures), use medical-prescribed braces. Not suitable for post-surgical immobilization. If pain increases or numbness occurs, discontinue use and consult healthcare provider. Spring mechanism may make clicking sounds during use - this is normal.
products.descriptionHtml:
2PCS Dynamic Knee Support - Elevated Joint Support with Spring Cushion

Innovative dynamic knee support system featuring spring-loaded joint support cushions that actively assist knee movement. Adjustable design relieves pain from strains, sprains, and arthritis while providing powered assistance during activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Spring Power Assist: Built-in springs reduce strain on knee joint during movement
  • ✓ Dynamic Support: Moves naturally with your knee, doesn't restrict motion
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Cushions impact and reduces stress on ligaments and tendons
  • ✓ Adjustable Fit: Multiple straps customize compression and support level
  • ✓ Bilateral Set: 2-piece set for both knees
  • ✓ Elevated Joint: Springs elevate and decompress joint during flexion

Perfect For

  • Knee strain and sprain recovery
  • Arthritis pain management
  • Meniscus injury support
  • Ligament strain protection
  • Sports activities (running, hiking)
  • Weight-bearing exercises
  • Stair climbing assistance
  • Daily walking support for weak knees

How to Use

  1. Slide support over foot up to knee
  2. Position spring mechanism on sides of knee
  3. Secure thigh strap snugly above knee
  4. Fasten calf strap below knee
  5. Adjust middle strap for optimal compression
  6. Test fit: knee should flex comfortably with spring assist
  7. Use both knee supports for balanced support
  8. Tighten straps if support slips during activity

Care Instructions

Hand wash straps and pads with mild soap. Wipe spring mechanisms with damp cloth (do not submerge). Air dry completely before storage. Check springs periodically for damage. Do not oil or lubricate springs.

Specifications

  • Quantity: 2-piece set (left + right)
  • Mechanism: Dual-side spring support system
  • Material: Aluminum alloy springs, neoprene straps, EVA padding
  • Adjustment: 3 adjustable straps per knee
  • Size: Universal adjustable (fits most adults)
  • Weight Capacity: Up to 250 lbs per knee
  • Colors: Black with silver springs

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers spring mechanism and straps. Contact us for fitting assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and pain relief but not medical-grade stabilization. For serious knee injuries (ACL/PCL tears, fractures), use medical-prescribed braces. Not suitable for post-surgical immobilization. If pain increases or numbness occurs, discontinue use and consult healthcare provider. Spring mechanism may make clicking sounds during use - this is normal.

products.title: Knee Power Booster | Spring-Loaded Rebound Support
products.description: Knee Power Booster - Spring-Loaded Rebound Support Pads High-performance spring-loaded knee booster pads designed for powerful rebound assistance during sports, work, and physical activities. Advanced spring mechanism provides explosive power during knee extension movements - perfect for athletes, workers, and active individuals seeking reduced fatigue and enhanced performance. Key Benefits ✓ Powerful Rebound: High-tension springs deliver explosive assistance during jumps, squats, and explosive movements ✓ Fatigue Reduction: Reduces quad and knee load by 30-40% during repetitive activities ✓ Sports Performance: Enhances vertical jump, sprint acceleration, and explosive lateral movements ✓ Work Support: Ideal for warehouse, construction, landscaping jobs requiring frequent squatting/standing ✓ Joint Protection: Springs absorb impact during landing, reducing cartilage stress ✓ Adjustable Spring Tension: 3 tension levels from moderate assistance to maximum power boost Perfect For Basketball, volleyball, and jumping sports Weight training (squats, lunges, leg exercises) Warehouse and physical labor jobs Landscaping and gardening (frequent squatting) Military and tactical training Parkour and plyometric training Construction work and manual labor How to Use Select appropriate spring tension for your activity (light: daily use, medium: sports, high: explosive training) Position knee pads with springs centered on lateral knee sides, hinges at joint line Secure thigh and calf straps tightly - movement will reduce spring efficiency Perform warm-up movements to adapt to spring assistance before intense activity Springs engage automatically during knee flexion, release power during extension For jumping sports: Land with slight knee bend to allow springs to absorb impact Remove after activity - not designed for 24/7 wear Care Instructions Wipe down after each use to remove sweat and dirt. Hand wash straps with mild detergent. Lubricate spring joints weekly with silicone spray for smooth operation. Inspect springs before each use for damage or deformation. Replace immediately if spring breaks or loses tension. Do not expose to extreme heat. Sizing Guide Measure: Thigh circumference 5" above kneecap M: 16-18" (41-46cm) L: 18-20" (46-51cm) XL: 20-22" (51-56cm) XXL: 22-24" (56-61cm) Tight fit essential for power transfer - size down if between sizes Specifications Type: High-performance spring-loaded knee booster pads Spring System: Dual high-tension coil springs with 3 adjustable settings Material: Reinforced aluminum frame, industrial-grade springs, EVA padding Weight Capacity: Up to 300 lbs (136 kg) Power Boost: 30-40% force reduction during extension movements Weight: 2-2.5 lbs per pair (durable construction) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on spring mechanism. Spring replacement parts available. Contact us for technical questions or sizing. Medical Disclaimer: This knee power booster is designed for athletic and work performance enhancement, not medical treatment. Do not use if you have knee instability, ligament injuries, or recent surgery. Springs provide mechanical assistance - do not attempt movements beyond your physical capability. Improper use may cause injury. Not suitable for those with balance issues or severe arthritis.
products.descriptionHtml:
Knee Power Booster - Spring-Loaded Rebound Support Pads

High-performance spring-loaded knee booster pads designed for powerful rebound assistance during sports, work, and physical activities. Advanced spring mechanism provides explosive power during knee extension movements - perfect for athletes, workers, and active individuals seeking reduced fatigue and enhanced performance.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Powerful Rebound: High-tension springs deliver explosive assistance during jumps, squats, and explosive movements
  • ✓ Fatigue Reduction: Reduces quad and knee load by 30-40% during repetitive activities
  • ✓ Sports Performance: Enhances vertical jump, sprint acceleration, and explosive lateral movements
  • ✓ Work Support: Ideal for warehouse, construction, landscaping jobs requiring frequent squatting/standing
  • ✓ Joint Protection: Springs absorb impact during landing, reducing cartilage stress
  • ✓ Adjustable Spring Tension: 3 tension levels from moderate assistance to maximum power boost

Perfect For

  • Basketball, volleyball, and jumping sports
  • Weight training (squats, lunges, leg exercises)
  • Warehouse and physical labor jobs
  • Landscaping and gardening (frequent squatting)
  • Military and tactical training
  • Parkour and plyometric training
  • Construction work and manual labor

How to Use

  1. Select appropriate spring tension for your activity (light: daily use, medium: sports, high: explosive training)
  2. Position knee pads with springs centered on lateral knee sides, hinges at joint line
  3. Secure thigh and calf straps tightly - movement will reduce spring efficiency
  4. Perform warm-up movements to adapt to spring assistance before intense activity
  5. Springs engage automatically during knee flexion, release power during extension
  6. For jumping sports: Land with slight knee bend to allow springs to absorb impact
  7. Remove after activity - not designed for 24/7 wear

Care Instructions

Wipe down after each use to remove sweat and dirt. Hand wash straps with mild detergent. Lubricate spring joints weekly with silicone spray for smooth operation. Inspect springs before each use for damage or deformation. Replace immediately if spring breaks or loses tension. Do not expose to extreme heat.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 5" above kneecap
  • M: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • L: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • XXL: 22-24" (56-61cm)
  • Tight fit essential for power transfer - size down if between sizes

Specifications

  • Type: High-performance spring-loaded knee booster pads
  • Spring System: Dual high-tension coil springs with 3 adjustable settings
  • Material: Reinforced aluminum frame, industrial-grade springs, EVA padding
  • Weight Capacity: Up to 300 lbs (136 kg)
  • Power Boost: 30-40% force reduction during extension movements
  • Weight: 2-2.5 lbs per pair (durable construction)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on spring mechanism. Spring replacement parts available. Contact us for technical questions or sizing.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee power booster is designed for athletic and work performance enhancement, not medical treatment. products.description: Portable Rehabilitation Robot Gloves - Stroke Hemiplegia Cerebral Palsy Advanced portable rehabilitation robot gloves designed for hand function recovery in stroke survivors, cerebral palsy patients, and those with neurological conditions causing hand impairment. Combines pneumatic assistance, intelligent programming, and repetitive motion therapy to restore hand mobility and strength. Key Benefits ✓ Stroke Recovery: Assists hand motor function recovery through repetitive assisted movement (neuroplasticity training) ✓ Pneumatic Assistance: Air chambers gently flex and extend fingers, preventing contractures and maintaining range of motion ✓ Intelligent Programming: Pre-set therapy routines mimic physical therapist-guided hand exercises ✓ Portable Design: Home-based rehabilitation between clinic visits - use daily for faster recovery ✓ Cerebral Palsy Support: Helps children and adults with CP improve hand function through assisted movement ✓ Adjustable Assistance: Variable support levels accommodate different recovery stages and severity Perfect For Stroke survivors with hand paralysis or weakness (hemiplegia/hemiparesis) Cerebral palsy patients with hand spasticity or weakness Traumatic brain injury (TBI) hand function recovery Spinal cord injury affecting hand function Hand tendon or nerve injury rehabilitation Parkinson's disease hand rigidity Multiple sclerosis (MS) hand weakness Post-surgical hand rehabilitation How to Use Insert affected hand into glove with fingers aligned in designated channels Secure wrist strap to prevent glove from shifting during therapy Connect air tubes to control unit Select program mode (typically 3-5 programs: flexion, extension, grasp, pinch, combination) Choose intensity level (1-10) based on tolerance and therapy goals Run therapy session for 15-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily After session, attempt voluntary hand movements to reinforce motor learning Consistent daily use essential for neuroplasticity and recovery (minimum 8-12 weeks) Care Instructions Remove glove liner (if detachable) and hand wash with mild soap. Wipe pneumatic chambers with disinfectant wipe - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect air tubes for kinks, cracks, or leaks weekly. Clean control unit exterior with dry cloth only. Replace gloves if tears develop or pneumatic chambers fail. Sizing Guide Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb) S: 2.5-3" (6.5-7.5cm) - Children, petite adults M: 3-3.5" (7.5-9cm) - Women's average, men's small L: 3.5-4" (9-10cm) - Men's medium/large XL: 4-4.5" (10-11.5cm) - Men's XL Available in left or right hand - order correct side for affected hand For bilateral stroke: Purchase both left and right gloves Specifications Technology: Pneumatic compression + intelligent programming + sensor feedback Therapy Modes: 3-5 programs (flexion, extension, grasp, pinch, multi-motion) Intensity Levels: 10 adjustable compression levels Power: AC adapter (110-240V) or rechargeable battery Air Chambers: Individual chambers for each finger + thumb Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off Certification: FDA-listed Class I medical device (regulations vary by region) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement gloves available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support. Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is intended for home use as part of comprehensive therapy program under medical supervision. Always follow your doctor or occupational therapist's rehabilitation protocol. Not for acute hand injuries, open wounds, severe edema, fractures, or uncontrolled hypertension. Consult healthcare provider before use. Results vary by individual, stroke severity, time since injury, and consistency of use. Does not guarantee complete recovery.
products.descriptionHtml:
Portable Rehabilitation Robot Gloves - Stroke Hemiplegia Cerebral Palsy

Advanced portable rehabilitation robot gloves designed for hand function recovery in stroke survivors, cerebral palsy patients, and those with neurological conditions causing hand impairment. Combines pneumatic assistance, intelligent programming, and repetitive motion therapy to restore hand mobility and strength.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Stroke Recovery: Assists hand motor function recovery through repetitive assisted movement (neuroplasticity training)
  • ✓ Pneumatic Assistance: Air chambers gently flex and extend fingers, preventing contractures and maintaining range of motion
  • ✓ Intelligent Programming: Pre-set therapy routines mimic physical therapist-guided hand exercises
  • ✓ Portable Design: Home-based rehabilitation between clinic visits - use daily for faster recovery
  • ✓ Cerebral Palsy Support: Helps children and adults with CP improve hand function through assisted movement
  • ✓ Adjustable Assistance: Variable support levels accommodate different recovery stages and severity

Perfect For

  • Stroke survivors with hand paralysis or weakness (hemiplegia/hemiparesis)
  • Cerebral palsy patients with hand spasticity or weakness
  • Traumatic brain injury (TBI) hand function recovery
  • Spinal cord injury affecting hand function
  • Hand tendon or nerve injury rehabilitation
  • Parkinson's disease hand rigidity
  • Multiple sclerosis (MS) hand weakness
  • Post-surgical hand rehabilitation

How to Use

  1. Insert affected hand into glove with fingers aligned in designated channels
  2. Secure wrist strap to prevent glove from shifting during therapy
  3. Connect air tubes to control unit
  4. Select program mode (typically 3-5 programs: flexion, extension, grasp, pinch, combination)
  5. Choose intensity level (1-10) based on tolerance and therapy goals
  6. Run therapy session for 15-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily
  7. After session, attempt voluntary hand movements to reinforce motor learning
  8. Consistent daily use essential for neuroplasticity and recovery (minimum 8-12 weeks)

Care Instructions

Remove glove liner (if detachable) and hand wash with mild soap. Wipe pneumatic chambers with disinfectant wipe - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect air tubes for kinks, cracks, or leaks weekly. Clean control unit exterior with dry cloth only. Replace gloves if tears develop or pneumatic chambers fail.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb)
  • S: 2.5-3" (6.5-7.5cm) - Children, petite adults
  • M: 3-3.5" (7.5-9cm) - Women's average, men's small
  • L: 3.5-4" (9-10cm) - Men's medium/large
  • XL: 4-4.5" (10-11.5cm) - Men's XL
  • Available in left or right hand - order correct side for affected hand
  • For bilateral stroke: Purchase both left and right gloves

Specifications

  • Technology: Pneumatic compression + intelligent programming + sensor feedback
  • Therapy Modes: 3-5 programs (flexion, extension, grasp, pinch, multi-motion)
  • Intensity Levels: 10 adjustable compression levels
  • Power: AC adapter (110-240V) or rechargeable battery
  • Air Chambers: Individual chambers for each finger + thumb
  • Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Certification: FDA-listed Class I medical device (regulations vary by region)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement gloves available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is intended for home use as part of comprehensive therapy program under medical supervision. Always follow your doctor or occupational therapist's rehabilitation protocol. Not for acute hand injuries, open wounds, severe edema, fractures, or uncontrolled hypertension. Consult healthcare provider before use. Results vary by individual, stroke severity, time since injury, and consistency of use. Does not guarantee complete recovery.

products.descriptionHtml:
Unisex Knee Support - Full Leg Compression Sleeve

Complete leg compression sleeve extending from thigh to calf for comprehensive support during athletics and injury recovery. Full-length design provides graduated compression to entire leg, supporting knee, calf, hamstring, and quad muscles simultaneously for enhanced performance and protection.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Full Leg Coverage: Thigh-to-calf compression supports all major leg muscle groups and joints
  • ✓ Graduated Compression: Optimized pressure distribution improves blood flow and reduces fatigue
  • ✓ Knee Protection: Integrated knee support within full-length design
  • ✓ Muscle Stabilization: Reduces muscle vibration during high-impact activities
  • ✓ Unisex Design: Suitable for men and women athletes
  • ✓ Versatile Use: Running, basketball, cycling, gym, recovery, travel

Perfect For

  • Running and marathon training
  • Basketball and court sports
  • Cycling and endurance sports
  • Post-leg injury recovery
  • Varicose veins compression therapy
  • Muscle strain prevention
  • Long-distance travel (DVT prevention)
  • Gym leg day workouts

How to Use

  1. Roll sleeve completely before putting on
  2. Step into sleeve from bottom
  3. Pull up gradually, ensuring even distribution
  4. Position with knee section centered over kneecap
  5. Adjust for snug but comfortable compression throughout leg
  6. Wear during activity or recovery
  7. Remove after use or as comfortable for extended wear

Care Instructions

Hand wash or machine wash cold gentle cycle. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Wash after each sweaty use. Do not bleach or iron. Replace when compression weakens (typically 6-12 months).

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above knee + knee circumference + calf at widest point
  • S: Thigh 16-18", Knee 12-14", Calf 11-13"
  • M: Thigh 18-20", Knee 14-16", Calf 13-15"
  • L: Thigh 20-22", Knee 16-18", Calf 15-17"
  • XL: Thigh 22-24", Knee 18-20", Calf 17-19"
  • XXL: Thigh 24-26", Knee 20-22", Calf 19-21"

Specifications

  • Type: Full-length leg compression sleeve with knee support
  • Material: High-elasticity nylon/spandex, breathable knit
  • Compression: 20-30mmHg graduated pressure
  • Length: Thigh to calf (approximately 20-24" coverage)
  • Support Level: Medium (athletic and recovery)
  • Features: Moisture-wicking, anti-slip, breathable, unisex

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This compression sleeve provides mechanical support during athletics and recovery. Not for severe injuries or deep vein thrombosis without medical clearance. If leg swelling worsens, skin changes, or circulation issues occur, discontinue and consult healthcare provider. Not for diagnosed vascular diseases without medical supervision.

products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Brace with Side Stabilizers - Patella Protection & Arthritis Relief

Professional hinged knee brace featuring side patella stabilizers and adjustable straps for comprehensive knee protection. Medical-grade support system provides pain relief for arthritis, meniscus tears, and ligament injuries while maintaining natural mobility.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Hinged Stabilizers: Bilateral metal hinges prevent unsafe lateral movement
  • ✓ Patella Protection: Open-patella design with side stabilizers supports kneecap
  • ✓ Arthritis Relief: Compression and support reduce pain and inflammation
  • ✓ Adjustable Straps: Customizable compression and fit
  • ✓ Full Mobility: Hinges allow normal flexion/extension
  • ✓ Medical-Grade: Professional rehabilitation quality

Perfect For

  • Knee arthritis (osteoarthritis, rheumatoid)
  • Meniscus tears and injuries
  • Patella tracking issues
  • ACL/MCL strain (mild to moderate)
  • Post-surgery knee protection
  • Sports injury recovery
  • Daily knee pain management
  • Instability and weakness

How to Use

  1. Slide brace up over foot to knee
  2. Center open-patella ring over kneecap
  3. Position metal hinges on sides of knee
  4. Fasten top thigh strap snugly
  5. Secure bottom calf strap
  6. Adjust middle strap for optimal compression
  7. Check: patella stabilizers should contact sides of kneecap
  8. Hinges should not dig into skin
  9. Can wear under or over clothing

Care Instructions

Hand wash in cold water with mild detergent. Air dry completely - do not use heat. Do not remove hinges. Check all straps and hinges regularly for wear. Replace if Velcro loses grip or hinges become loose.

Specifications

  • Type: Hinged knee brace with patella stabilizers
  • Hinges: Dual polycentric metal hinges (both sides)
  • Patella: Open design with side stabilizers
  • Straps: 3 adjustable hook-and-loop straps
  • Material: Neoprene, nylon, metal hinges
  • Sizes: S/M/L/XL (measure thigh circumference 6" above knee)
  • Fits: Left or right knee
  • Color: Black

Sizing Guide

  • S: Thigh 14"-16"
  • M: Thigh 16"-19"
  • L: Thigh 19"-22"
  • XL: Thigh 22"-25"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers hinges and materials. Contact us for sizing help.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and pain relief but not rigid immobilization. For severe ligament tears (complete ACL/MCL rupture) or fractures, use doctor-prescribed medical brace. If pain worsens, increased swelling, numbness, or skin irritation occurs, discontinue and consult healthcare provider. Not suitable for immediate post-surgical use - follow surgeon's brace recommendations.

products.description: Back Brace & Posture Corrector for Women & Men Adjustable posture corrector and therapeutic back brace designed for both men and women. Key Benefits ✓ Dual-Purpose Design: Functions as both medical back brace for injury support and posture trainer for habit correction ✓ Scoliosis Management: Helps stabilize spine curvature and slow progression (use under medical guidance for scoliosis) ✓ Hunchback Correction: Gently retrains shoulders and upper back to reverse rounded posture (kyphosis) ✓ Full Spine Support: Targets lumbar (lower back), thoracic (mid-back), and shoulder alignment simultaneously ✓ Unisex & Adjustable: One design fits all body types with multiple adjustment points for custom fit Perfect For Chronic poor posture from desk work Mild to moderate scoliosis support Kyphosis (hunchback) correction Upper and lower back pain Post-injury back rehabilitation Forward head and rounded shoulders Building long-term posture habits How to Use Wear over thin undershirt or directly on skin Slide arms through shoulder straps like putting on vest Center back panel along spine Fasten waist belt first (comfortable snugness) Adjust shoulder straps to gently pull shoulders back Secure chest strap for added support Start gradually: 20-30 minutes daily for first week Gradually increase to 2-3 hours daily Wear during activities that promote slouching (computer, driving) Remove periodically - muscles need unassisted time to strengthen Training Program Week 1-2: 20-30 minutes daily (adaptation phase) Week 3-4: 45-60 minutes daily (habit building) Week 5-8: 1-2 hours daily (reinforcement) Week 9+: As needed for maintenance or high-risk activities Care Instructions Hand wash with mild detergent in cold water. Air dry flat or hanging. Do not machine wash, bleach, or iron. Store flat to maintain shape. Specifications Type: Full back brace with posture correction Support Areas: Lumbar, thoracic, shoulders, clavicle Material: Breathable elastic fabric, padded straps Adjustability: Multiple Velcro straps for custom fit Gender: Unisex (men and women) Sizes: Adjustable - measure chest circumference Color: Black or beige Sizing Guide Measure chest circumference under arms at fullest point: S/M: 28-38 inches L/XL: 38-48 inches Adjustable straps provide 4-6 inches of flexibility. Warranty & Support 90-day manufacturer warranty. Contact us for fit advice or questions. Medical Disclaimer: This device supports posture correction and back pain relief. For diagnosed scoliosis or spinal conditions, use only under medical supervision. Not a replacement for prescribed bracing or medical treatment. Consult doctor, physical therapist, or chiropractor before use if you have: spinal conditions, recent surgery, chronic back problems, or osteoporosis. Discontinue if pain increases.
products.descriptionHtml:
Back Brace & Posture Corrector for Women & Men

Adjustable posture corrector and therapeutic back brace designed for both men and women. Effectively addresses scoliosis, hunchback (kyphosis), and poor posture while providing full spine support. Progressive training system helps build muscle memory for lasting posture improvement.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual-Purpose Design: Functions as both medical back brace for injury support and posture trainer for habit correction
  • ✓ Scoliosis Management: Helps stabilize spine curvature and slow progression (use under medical guidance for scoliosis)
  • ✓ Hunchback Correction: Gently retrains shoulders and upper back to reverse rounded posture (kyphosis)
  • ✓ Full Spine Support: Targets lumbar (lower back), thoracic (mid-back), and shoulder alignment simultaneously
  • ✓ Unisex & Adjustable: One design fits all body types with multiple adjustment points for custom fit

Perfect For

  • Chronic poor posture from desk work
  • Mild to moderate scoliosis support
  • Kyphosis (hunchback) correction
  • Upper and lower back pain
  • Post-injury back rehabilitation
  • Forward head and rounded shoulders
  • Building long-term posture habits

How to Use

  1. Wear over thin undershirt or directly on skin
  2. Slide arms through shoulder straps like putting on vest
  3. Center back panel along spine
  4. Fasten waist belt first (comfortable snugness)
  5. Adjust shoulder straps to gently pull shoulders back
  6. Secure chest strap for added support
  7. Start gradually: 20-30 minutes daily for first week
  8. Gradually increase to 2-3 hours daily
  9. Wear during activities that promote slouching (computer, driving)
  10. Remove periodically - muscles need unassisted time to strengthen

Training Program

Week 1-2: 20-30 minutes daily (adaptation phase)
Week 3-4: 45-60 minutes daily (habit building)
Week 5-8: 1-2 hours daily (reinforcement)
Week 9+: As needed for maintenance or high-risk activities

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent in cold water. Air dry flat or hanging. Do not machine wash, bleach, or iron. Store flat to maintain shape.

Specifications

  • Type: Full back brace with posture correction
  • Support Areas: Lumbar, thoracic, shoulders, clavicle
  • Material: Breathable elastic fabric, padded straps
  • Adjustability: Multiple Velcro straps for custom fit
  • Gender: Unisex (men and women)
  • Sizes: Adjustable - measure chest circumference
  • Color: Black or beige

Sizing Guide

Measure chest circumference under arms at fullest point:
S/M: 28-38 inches
L/XL: 38-48 inches
Adjustable straps provide 4-6 inches of flexibility.

Warranty & Support

90-day manufacturer warranty. Contact us for fit advice or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This device supports posture correction and back pain relief. For diagnosed scoliosis or spinal conditions, use only under medical supervision. Not a replacement for prescribed bracing or medical treatment. Consult doctor, physical therapist, or chiropractor before use if you have: spinal conditions, recent surgery, chronic back problems, or osteoporosis. Discontinue if pain increases.

products.descriptionHtml:
VELPEAU Wrist Splint Medical - Carpal Tunnel & Tendonitis Relief

Professional VELPEAU medical wrist splint designed for carpal tunnel syndrome, tendonitis, and wrist injury support. Rigid aluminum stays immobilize wrist in neutral position to reduce pain and inflammation while allowing healing, endorsed by healthcare professionals worldwide.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ VELPEAU Medical Grade: Trusted brand used by doctors, therapists, and hospitals
  • ✓ Carpal Tunnel Relief: Immobilizes wrist to reduce pressure on median nerve
  • ✓ Tendonitis Support: Rigid splinting allows inflamed tendons to rest and heal
  • ✓ Neutral Wrist Position: Aluminum stays prevent harmful flexion/extension
  • ✓ Day/Night Use: Comfortable enough for sleeping - critical for carpal tunnel treatment
  • ✓ Professional Design: Clinically proven design used in medical settings

Perfect For

  • Carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS)
  • Wrist tendonitis and tenosynovitis
  • De Quervain's tenosynovitis
  • Wrist sprains and strains
  • Post-surgical wrist immobilization
  • Wrist fracture healing support
  • Repetitive strain injury (RSI)
  • Preventing nighttime wrist flexion

How to Use

  1. Position splint under wrist/forearm with metal stays on palm side
  2. Ensure wrist is in neutral position (straight, not bent)
  3. Wrap around wrist and secure straps firmly
  4. Adjust tightness - should immobilize wrist without restricting circulation
  5. For carpal tunnel: Wear during sleep (essential) and during day activities
  6. For tendonitis: Wear during activities causing pain and at night
  7. Remove periodically for gentle range-of-motion exercises (as prescribed)

Care Instructions

Remove aluminum stays before washing. Hand wash splint fabric with mild soap, air dry. Wipe metal stays with damp cloth. Reassemble when fully dry. Clean weekly. Replace when velcro loses grip or fabric stretches (typically 6-12 months).

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Wrist circumference at wrist crease
  • S: 5-6" (13-15cm)
  • M: 6-7" (15-18cm)
  • L: 7-8" (18-20cm)
  • XL: 8-9" (20-23cm)
  • Available in left or right hand
  • If between sizes, size up for comfort during sleep

Specifications

  • Brand: VELPEAU - Medical orthopedic specialist
  • Type: Medical wrist splint with rigid stays
  • Material: Breathable fabric, aluminum stays (palm side)
  • Stays: Rigid aluminum maintaining neutral wrist position
  • Straps: 2-3 adjustable hook-and-loop closures
  • Support Level: Maximum immobilization
  • Features: Removable stays, breathable, suitable for sleeping

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. VELPEAU customer support available. Contact us for sizing or fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This wrist splint provides mechanical immobilization for wrist conditions. Not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment. If you have severe pain, numbness spreading beyond wrist/hand, or symptoms worsen, consult healthcare provider immediately. For carpal tunnel syndrome: This splint is part of conservative treatment - surgery may be needed if symptoms persist. Always follow your doctor's treatment plan.

products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Brace with Locking Side Stabilizers

Medical-grade hinged knee brace featuring bilateral side stabilizers with precision locking dials. Adjustable support system for knee pain, arthritis, ACL/PCL injuries, and meniscus tears. Professional orthopedic protection for active lifestyles and injury recovery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Hinges: Bilateral polycentric hinges mimic natural knee motion while preventing harmful lateral movement
  • ✓ Locking Dials: Precision adjustment allows custom ROM (Range of Motion) control - lock at specific angles or allow full movement
  • ✓ Side Stabilizers: Rigid aluminum stays on both sides prevent valgus/varus stress (inward/outward bending)
  • ✓ Adjustable Compression: Multiple straps allow customized support and fit for different activity levels
  • ✓ Multi-Injury Support: Effective for arthritis, ligament tears, meniscus damage, and general instability

Perfect For

  • Osteoarthritis or rheumatoid arthritis
  • ACL/PCL tears or strains
  • MCL/LCL ligament injuries
  • Meniscus tears (medial or lateral)
  • Post-surgical knee protection
  • Patellar instability
  • Sports injury prevention
  • Chronic knee pain from overuse

How to Use

  1. Open all straps and position brace around leg
  2. Align hinges with knee joint axis (bend your knee to find)
  3. Center patella opening over kneecap
  4. Secure upper thigh strap first
  5. Fasten lower calf strap
  6. Adjust middle straps for compression
  7. Set locking dials to desired ROM (consult doctor/therapist)
  8. Ensure snug fit without cutting circulation
  9. Wear during activities causing pain or instability

ROM Dial Settings

Locked Position: 0° extension for post-surgery immobilization
Limited ROM: 0-30°, 0-60°, 0-90° for gradual rehabilitation
Full ROM: Unlocked for maximum support during sports
Extension Block: Prevent hyperextension while allowing flexion
Always follow medical professional's ROM prescription

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent in lukewarm water. Air dry completely away from heat. Do not machine wash or dry. Check hinges and screws monthly - tighten if loose.

Specifications

  • Type: Hinged knee brace with ROM control
  • Support Level: Maximum (Level 3)
  • Hinges: Bilateral polycentric with locking dials
  • Side Stabilizers: Aluminum alloy rigid stays
  • Material: Breathable neoprene, perforated for ventilation
  • Straps: 4-6 adjustable Velcro compression straps
  • Patellar Opening: Centered for kneecap support
  • Sizes: Universal or S/M/L/XL

Sizing Guide

Measure circumference 6 inches above and below kneecap:
Small: Thigh 14-17", Calf 11-13"
Medium: Thigh 17-20", Calf 13-15"
Large: Thigh 20-23", Calf 15-17"
X-Large: Thigh 23-26", Calf 17-19"

Activity Guidelines

Daily Wear: Light compression, full ROM
Sports: Firm compression, full ROM or slight limit
Post-Surgery: Follow surgeon's ROM restrictions exactly
Arthritis: Moderate compression, warmth helps
Prevention: Wear during high-risk activities

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on frame and hinges. Contact us for fit assistance or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This hinged knee brace is medical orthopedic equipment. Use as directed by orthopedic surgeon, sports medicine doctor, or physical therapist. Not for self-diagnosis. Proper fit critical for effectiveness and safety - professional fitting recommended when possible. For ACL/PCL/meniscus tears, this brace supports recovery but does not replace surgery, physical therapy, or rest when indicated. Follow all medical guidance for ROM settings, activity restrictions, and rehabilitation timeline. If pain worsens, swelling increases, or instability persists, seek medical evaluation. Improper use or inadequate support level for injury severity can lead to re-injury or complications.

products.descriptionHtml:
Silicone Patella Tendon Knee Strap - Sports Pain Relief Support

Premium silicone patellar tendon strap designed to relieve knee pain from patellar tendonitis (jumper's knee), runner's knee, and Osgood-Schlatter disease. Medical-grade silicone pad applies targeted pressure below the kneecap to reduce strain on the patellar tendon during sports and daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Patellar Tendonitis Relief: Reduces pain from jumper's knee by offloading stress on inflamed patellar tendon
  • ✓ Silicone Cushioning: Soft medical-grade silicone pad provides comfortable pressure without irritation
  • ✓ Runner's Knee Support: Helps with patellofemoral pain syndrome during running and walking
  • ✓ Osgood-Schlatter: Relieves pain in adolescents and young adults with this growth plate condition
  • ✓ Adjustable Pressure: Customize compression level to match pain severity and activity type
  • ✓ Sports Performance: Allows continued athletic participation during tendon healing

Perfect For

  • Patellar tendonitis (jumper's knee) in athletes
  • Runner's knee (patellofemoral pain syndrome)
  • Osgood-Schlatter disease in adolescents/young adults
  • Pain below kneecap during jumping, running, stairs
  • Basketball, volleyball, soccer players
  • Trail runners and marathon trainers
  • Hiking and outdoor sports enthusiasts
  • Preventing tendon pain flare-ups during activity

How to Use

  1. Position strap 1-2 inches below bottom of kneecap
  2. Center silicone pad over patellar tendon (tender point below kneecap)
  3. Wrap strap around leg and secure hook-and-loop closure
  4. Adjust tension - should feel firm pressure without cutting off circulation
  5. Wear during activities causing pain (sports, stairs, running)
  6. Can be worn over or under clothing
  7. Remove after activity and during rest periods
  8. Combine with ice, rest, and stretching for best results

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and water. Air dry flat. Clean after each sweaty use. Silicone pad is permanently attached - do not attempt to remove. Replace when strap loses elasticity or silicone pad hardens (typically 6-12 months with regular use). Do not machine wash or tumble dry.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Circumference around leg 2" below kneecap
  • Universal (One Size): Fits 12-18" (30-46cm) circumference
  • Adjustable design accommodates most adults and teens
  • For very small children or large adults, verify measurement before purchase

Specifications

  • Type: Patellar tendon compression strap
  • Material: Medical-grade silicone pad, neoprene strap, elastic blend
  • Pad Size: Approx 2" wide for optimal tendon pressure distribution
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop velcro (adjustable)
  • Support Level: Light to medium compression
  • Features: Silicone cushioning, breathable, adjustable, discreet under clothing

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing or usage questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This patellar strap provides mechanical support for tendon pain management. Not for acute knee injuries, ligament tears, or severe swelling. If pain increases, knee locks, or gives way, discontinue and consult healthcare provider. This strap does not replace proper training modification, physical therapy, or medical treatment. Continue prescribed exercises and rest periods. Not suitable for circulation disorders. Discontinue if numbness or skin irritation occurs.

products.description: Adjustable Cervical Collar - Neck Brace Support Orthosis Medical-grade adjustable cervical collar designed for neck immobilization and support following whiplash, cervical strain, or post-surgical recovery. Provides firm stabilization to limit neck movement while supporting the head weight to reduce strain on cervical muscles and vertebrae. Key Benefits ✓ Cervical Immobilization: Restricts neck flexion, extension, and rotation to protect injured structures during healing ✓ Height Adjustable: Stackable foam inserts allow customization of collar height for proper chin and occiput support ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Suitable for whiplash, cervical strain, fractures, or post-operative stabilization ✓ Head Weight Relief: Supports head weight (10-12 lbs) to reduce load on cervical spine and muscles ✓ Breathable Design: Perforated foam allows air circulation to prevent heat buildup during extended wear ✓ Secure Fit: Adjustable velcro closure prevents collar migration during movement Perfect For Whiplash injury recovery (acute phase immobilization) Cervical muscle strain or sprain Post-operative cervical spine surgery stabilization Cervical fracture healing (stable fractures with medical clearance) Torticollis (wry neck) treatment Preventing neck movement during acute pain episodes Cervical radiculopathy pain management Temporary immobilization as prescribed by healthcare provider How to Use Adjust collar height by adding/removing foam inserts until chin rests comfortably on top Position collar with front chin support centered under jaw, back support at base of skull Wrap collar around neck and secure velcro closure at back Adjust tightness - should be snug enough to restrict movement without choking or restricting breathing Ensure collar does not press on throat (Adam's apple area should not be constricted) Wear as prescribed by healthcare provider - typically 24/7 for first days/weeks after acute injury Remove only for cleaning or as authorized by medical professional Care Instructions Remove foam liner from plastic frame. Hand wash foam with mild soap and water. Wipe plastic frame with disinfectant wipe. Air dry foam completely before reassembly (have spare liner for continuous wear). Clean daily during acute phase use. Replace foam when compressed or loses shape. Do not bleach or tumble dry. Sizing Guide Measure: Neck circumference at Adam's apple level + distance from jaw to collarbone S: Neck 12-13", Height 3-4" M: Neck 13-15", Height 3.5-4.5" L: Neck 15-17", Height 4-5" XL: Neck 17-19", Height 4.5-5.5" Professional fitting by healthcare provider strongly recommended Specifications Type: Adjustable height cervical collar (soft to medium support) Material: Medical-grade polyethylene frame, perforated foam liner Height Adjustment: 2-6" (5-15cm) via stackable inserts Closure: Hook-and-loop velcro (adjustable neck circumference) Support Level: Medium (restricts most neck movement while allowing swallowing/breathing) Features: Breathable, washable liner, x-ray compatible Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Replacement foam liners available. Contact us for sizing or fitting questions. Medical Disclaimer: This cervical collar is a medical device requiring professional evaluation and fitting. Do not self-treat suspected fractures or severe neck injuries - seek immediate medical attention. Use only as prescribed by healthcare provider. Improper use may cause injury or compromise healing. Prolonged immobilization may weaken neck muscles - follow prescribed wear schedule and physical therapy protocol. Not for long-term use without medical supervision.
products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Cervical Collar - Neck Brace Support Orthosis

Medical-grade adjustable cervical collar designed for neck immobilization and support following whiplash, cervical strain, or post-surgical recovery. Provides firm stabilization to limit neck movement while supporting the head weight to reduce strain on cervical muscles and vertebrae.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Immobilization: Restricts neck flexion, extension, and rotation to protect injured structures during healing
  • ✓ Height Adjustable: Stackable foam inserts allow customization of collar height for proper chin and occiput support
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Suitable for whiplash, cervical strain, fractures, or post-operative stabilization
  • ✓ Head Weight Relief: Supports head weight (10-12 lbs) to reduce load on cervical spine and muscles
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Perforated foam allows air circulation to prevent heat buildup during extended wear
  • ✓ Secure Fit: Adjustable velcro closure prevents collar migration during movement

Perfect For

  • Whiplash injury recovery (acute phase immobilization)
  • Cervical muscle strain or sprain
  • Post-operative cervical spine surgery stabilization
  • Cervical fracture healing (stable fractures with medical clearance)
  • Torticollis (wry neck) treatment
  • Preventing neck movement during acute pain episodes
  • Cervical radiculopathy pain management
  • Temporary immobilization as prescribed by healthcare provider

How to Use

  1. Adjust collar height by adding/removing foam inserts until chin rests comfortably on top
  2. Position collar with front chin support centered under jaw, back support at base of skull
  3. Wrap collar around neck and secure velcro closure at back
  4. Adjust tightness - should be snug enough to restrict movement without choking or restricting breathing
  5. Ensure collar does not press on throat (Adam's apple area should not be constricted)
  6. Wear as prescribed by healthcare provider - typically 24/7 for first days/weeks after acute injury
  7. Remove only for cleaning or as authorized by medical professional

Care Instructions

Remove foam liner from plastic frame. Hand wash foam with mild soap and water. Wipe plastic frame with disinfectant wipe. Air dry foam completely before reassembly (have spare liner for continuous wear). Clean daily during acute phase use. Replace foam when compressed or loses shape. Do not bleach or tumble dry.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Neck circumference at Adam's apple level + distance from jaw to collarbone
  • S: Neck 12-13", Height 3-4"
  • M: Neck 13-15", Height 3.5-4.5"
  • L: Neck 15-17", Height 4-5"
  • XL: Neck 17-19", Height 4.5-5.5"
  • Professional fitting by healthcare provider strongly recommended

Specifications

  • Type: Adjustable height cervical collar (soft to medium support)
  • Material: Medical-grade polyethylene frame, perforated foam liner
  • Height Adjustment: 2-6" (5-15cm) via stackable inserts
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop velcro (adjustable neck circumference)
  • Support Level: Medium (restricts most neck movement while allowing swallowing/breathing)
  • Features: Breathable, washable liner, x-ray compatible

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement foam liners available. Contact us for sizing or fitting questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical collar is a medical device requiring professional evaluation and fitting. Do not self-treat suspected fractures or severe neck injuries - seek immediate medical attention. Use only as prescribed by healthcare provider. Improper use may cause injury or compromise healing. Prolonged immobilization may weaken neck muscles - follow prescribed wear schedule and physical therapy protocol. Not for long-term use without medical supervision.

products.descriptionHtml:
Clavicle Spine Back Posture Corrector

Comprehensive posture correction system targeting clavicle (collarbone), spine, upper back, shoulders, and lumbar region. Adjustable unisex design provides full-torso support while training proper posture alignment. Ideal for both therapeutic support and body shaping.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Full-Body Alignment: Addresses entire posterior chain from clavicle through lumbar spine for complete postural correction
  • ✓ Clavicle Focus: Specialized support prevents forward shoulder rotation at collarbone junction
  • ✓ Upper Back & Shoulder: Pulls shoulders back to counteract rounded upper back from computer work
  • ✓ Lumbar Support: Integrated lower back panel maintains natural spinal curve and reduces strain
  • ✓ Body Shaping: Improved posture creates slimmer, more confident appearance while protecting spine

Perfect For

  • Comprehensive posture correction
  • Forward head and rounded shoulders
  • Upper back pain and tension
  • Lower back strain from poor posture
  • Clavicle fracture recovery (after healing phase)
  • Office workers with desk-related pain
  • Appearance improvement through better posture

How to Use

  1. Put on like a vest over thin clothing
  2. Position clavicle straps across front of shoulders
  3. Center back panel along spine
  4. Secure lumbar belt around lower back
  5. Fasten upper back straps pulling shoulders back gently
  6. Adjust all straps for comfortable, supportive fit
  7. Start with 20-30 minutes daily
  8. Gradually increase wear time over 4-6 weeks
  9. Use during high-risk activities (computer work, studying)

Adjustment Tips

Tightness Check: You should feel gentle backward pull on shoulders, not pain or restriction. If you feel numbness, loosen straps immediately.

Proper Fit: Should be snug enough to remind you to sit/stand straight, but not so tight you can't breathe comfortably.

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap in lukewarm water. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash, bleach, tumble dry, or iron. Check straps and fasteners regularly for wear.

Specifications

  • Type: Full-torso posture corrector with clavicle support
  • Support Areas: Clavicle, upper back, shoulders, lumbar
  • Material: Elastic mesh fabric, padded straps, breathable design
  • Closure: Multiple adjustable Velcro straps
  • Gender: Unisex (adjustable for men and women)
  • Sizes: Multiple sizes based on chest measurement
  • Color: Black, white, or beige

Sizing Guide

Measure around chest at underarm level:
Small: 28-34"
Medium: 34-40"
Large: 40-46"
X-Large: 46-52"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on materials and construction. Contact us for sizing assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector is for alignment support and pain relief. Not intended to treat medical conditions. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have: recent injuries, spinal conditions, respiratory issues, skin sensitivity, or cardiovascular problems. For clavicle fractures, use only after bone healing is complete and with doctor approval. Discontinue if discomfort occurs.

products.title: Cervical Neck Traction Device | Inflatable Home Relief
products.description: Cervical Neck Traction Device - Inflatable Relief System Medical-grade inflatable cervical traction device for home use. Provides gentle decompression therapy for chronic neck and shoulder pain caused by herniated discs, pinched nerves, and poor alignment. Adjustable air pressure allows customized traction strength. Key Benefits ✓ Cervical Decompression: Inflatable design creates vertical traction, gently separating compressed vertebrae to relieve nerve pressure ✓ Chronic Pain Relief: Addresses root causes of persistent neck and shoulder pain, not just symptoms ✓ Alignment Correction: Helps restore natural cervical curve (lordosis) reversed by forward head posture ✓ Adjustable Traction: Hand pump allows precise pressure control from gentle stretch to therapeutic traction ✓ Home Convenience: Professional-quality therapy without expensive clinic visits or equipment Perfect For Chronic neck pain lasting months or years Cervical herniated or bulging discs Pinched nerves (cervical radiculopathy) Degenerative disc disease Shoulder pain from neck issues Forward head posture (tech neck) Tension headaches originating from neck Post-whiplash chronic pain How to Use Sit in chair with good back support or lie down Place collar around neck with chin resting in front support Secure Velcro closure comfortably around neck Attach hand pump to air valve Begin pumping slowly to inflate collar Stop when you feel comfortable stretching (NOT pain) First session: Only 5-10 minutes, minimal inflation Relax and breathe normally during traction Deflate slowly after session by releasing air valve Gradually increase time and pressure over weeks Progressive Protocol Week 1: 5-10 minutes, 1x daily, gentle inflation Week 2: 10-15 minutes, 1-2x daily, moderate inflation Week 3-4: 15-20 minutes, 2x daily, therapeutic inflation Maintenance: 15-20 minutes, 2-3x weekly or as needed Safety Guidelines IMPORTANT: Never overinflate - "more" is not better. Stop immediately if you experience: increased pain, dizziness, numbness spreading down arms, or difficulty breathing. Never use while: Driving, standing, walking, or operating machinery. Care Instructions Wipe collar with damp cloth after use. Allow to air dry completely. Store deflated in cool, dry place. Check pump and valve for leaks monthly. Specifications Type: Inflatable cervical traction collar Inflation: Manual hand pump (included) Material: Medical-grade PVC, soft fabric lining Adjustability: Variable pressure levels Size: Adjustable Velcro closure fits most necks Weight: Lightweight, portable design Session Time: 5-20 minutes recommended Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Replacement pump available. Contact support with questions. Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for pain relief and alignment support. Not intended to replace professional medical treatment. Consult doctor, chiropractor, or physical therapist before use, especially if you have: acute injuries, spinal instability, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis, spinal infections, tumors, or recent neck surgery. Do not use if pregnant without medical clearance. This device does not cure conditions - it provides symptomatic relief. Follow professional medical guidance.
products.descriptionHtml:
Cervical Neck Traction Device - Inflatable Relief System

Medical-grade inflatable cervical traction device for home use. Provides gentle decompression therapy for chronic neck and shoulder pain caused by herniated discs, pinched nerves, and poor alignment. Adjustable air pressure allows customized traction strength.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Decompression: Inflatable design creates vertical traction, gently separating compressed vertebrae to relieve nerve pressure
  • ✓ Chronic Pain Relief: Addresses root causes of persistent neck and shoulder pain, not just symptoms
  • ✓ Alignment Correction: Helps restore natural cervical curve (lordosis) reversed by forward head posture
  • ✓ Adjustable Traction: Hand pump allows precise pressure control from gentle stretch to therapeutic traction
  • ✓ Home Convenience: Professional-quality therapy without expensive clinic visits or equipment

Perfect For

  • Chronic neck pain lasting months or years
  • Cervical herniated or bulging discs
  • Pinched nerves (cervical radiculopathy)
  • Degenerative disc disease
  • Shoulder pain from neck issues
  • Forward head posture (tech neck)
  • Tension headaches originating from neck
  • Post-whiplash chronic pain

How to Use

  1. Sit in chair with good back support or lie down
  2. Place collar around neck with chin resting in front support
  3. Secure Velcro closure comfortably around neck
  4. Attach hand pump to air valve
  5. Begin pumping slowly to inflate collar
  6. Stop when you feel comfortable stretching (NOT pain)
  7. First session: Only 5-10 minutes, minimal inflation
  8. Relax and breathe normally during traction
  9. Deflate slowly after session by releasing air valve
  10. Gradually increase time and pressure over weeks

Progressive Protocol

Week 1: 5-10 minutes, 1x daily, gentle inflation
Week 2: 10-15 minutes, 1-2x daily, moderate inflation
Week 3-4: 15-20 minutes, 2x daily, therapeutic inflation
Maintenance: 15-20 minutes, 2-3x weekly or as needed

Safety Guidelines

IMPORTANT: Never overinflate - "more" is not better. Stop immediately if you experience: increased pain, dizziness, numbness spreading down arms, or difficulty breathing.

Never use while: Driving, standing, walking, or operating machinery.

Care Instructions

Wipe collar with damp cloth after use. Allow to air dry completely. Store deflated in cool, dry place. Check pump and valve for leaks monthly.

Specifications

  • Type: Inflatable cervical traction collar
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump (included)
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC, soft fabric lining
  • Adjustability: Variable pressure levels
  • Size: Adjustable Velcro closure fits most necks
  • Weight: Lightweight, portable design
  • Session Time: 5-20 minutes recommended

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement pump available. Contact support with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for pain relief and alignment support. Not intended to replace professional medical treatment. Consult doctor, chiropractor, or physical therapist before use, especially if you have: acute injuries, spinal instability, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis, spinal infections, tumors, or recent neck surgery. Do not use if pregnant without medical clearance. This device does not cure conditions - it provides symptomatic relief. Follow professional medical guidance.
