products.description: Hinged Knee Brace with Precision Dial Stabilizers Advanced hinged knee brace featuring precision dial stabilizers for accurate support adjustment. Medical-grade design addresses knee pain from arthritis, ACL/PCL injuries, and meniscus tears. Bilateral hinges with micro-adjustable dials allow personalized stability control. Key Benefits ✓ Precision Dial Control: Micro-adjustable dials (not just click settings) allow exact tension and support level matching your needs ✓ Arthritis-Specific Support: Reduces bone-on-bone grinding pain, offloads pressure from damaged cartilage areas ✓ Pain Management: Immediate pain relief during wear by stabilizing unstable joint and reducing inflammation-causing motion ✓ Medical-Grade Construction: Hospital-quality materials and design used in orthopedic clinics and physical therapy ✓ Long-Term Durability: Built to withstand daily use for years, not months - investment in ongoing care Perfect For Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disease) Rheumatoid arthritis affecting knee Chronic knee pain from cartilage loss ACL/PCL partial tears or post-reconstruction Meniscus degeneration or tears Patellar tracking disorders Ligament laxity and instability Avoiding or delaying knee replacement surgery How to Use Stand and position brace around leg Align dial mechanisms with knee joint center Fasten straps from top to bottom (thigh, knee, calf) Adjust dial tension - start loose, increase gradually Dial clockwise increases support, counterclockwise decreases Walk few steps and adjust if needed Wear during weight-bearing activities Remove at night unless instructed otherwise Readjust dials as swelling changes throughout day Dial Adjustment Guide Arthritis Flare: Tighter support, limit ROM slightly Mild Pain: Moderate support, full ROM Post-Activity: Looser for recovery, maintain stability Prevention: Light support during high-risk activities Fine-tune throughout day as pain/swelling fluctuates Care Instructions Hand wash weekly with gentle soap. Air dry flat. Lubricate dial mechanisms every 3 months with silicone spray. Check all connection points monthly. Specifications Type: Hinged knee brace with dial stabilizers Support Level: Maximum (Level 3) Stabilizers: Dial-adjustable bilateral side stays Hinges: Polycentric motion with ROM capability Material: Breathable neoprene with perforations Frame: Lightweight aluminum alloy Straps: 5-6 adjustable compression straps Sizes: Multiple sizes for optimal fit Sizing Guide Measure 6" above and 6" below kneecap center: Small: 14-17" thigh, 11-13" calf Medium: 17-20" thigh, 13-15" calf Large: 20-23" thigh, 15-17" calf X-Large: 23-26" thigh, 17-19" calf Arthritis Management For osteoarthritis specifically: Wear during weight-bearing (standing, walking) Remove during non-weight-bearing rest Tighten dials during painful activities Combine with anti-inflammatory medications Use with physical therapy exercises May reduce need for pain medications Can delay surgery in some cases (discuss with doctor) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Dial mechanism guaranteed 1 year. Contact us for support. Medical Disclaimer: Medical orthopedic device for knee support. Use as recommended by orthopedic specialist, rheumatologist, or physical therapist. Not cure for arthritis or ligament injuries - provides symptom management and protection. For arthritis: brace reduces pain but does not reverse cartilage damage. Regular medical monitoring still necessary. If pain significantly worsens or knee locks/gives out, seek immediate medical attention. Proper sizing critical - too loose ineffective, too tight restricts circulation. This brace may help delay knee replacement but is not guaranteed alternative. Follow comprehensive treatment plan including appropriate exercise, weight management, and medical care.
products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Brace with Precision Dial Stabilizers

Advanced hinged knee brace featuring precision dial stabilizers for accurate support adjustment. Medical-grade design addresses knee pain from arthritis, ACL/PCL injuries, and meniscus tears. Bilateral hinges with micro-adjustable dials allow personalized stability control.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Precision Dial Control: Micro-adjustable dials (not just click settings) allow exact tension and support level matching your needs
  • ✓ Arthritis-Specific Support: Reduces bone-on-bone grinding pain, offloads pressure from damaged cartilage areas
  • ✓ Pain Management: Immediate pain relief during wear by stabilizing unstable joint and reducing inflammation-causing motion
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Construction: Hospital-quality materials and design used in orthopedic clinics and physical therapy
  • ✓ Long-Term Durability: Built to withstand daily use for years, not months - investment in ongoing care

Perfect For

  • Osteoarthritis (degenerative joint disease)
  • Rheumatoid arthritis affecting knee
  • Chronic knee pain from cartilage loss
  • ACL/PCL partial tears or post-reconstruction
  • Meniscus degeneration or tears
  • Patellar tracking disorders
  • Ligament laxity and instability
  • Avoiding or delaying knee replacement surgery

How to Use

  1. Stand and position brace around leg
  2. Align dial mechanisms with knee joint center
  3. Fasten straps from top to bottom (thigh, knee, calf)
  4. Adjust dial tension - start loose, increase gradually
  5. Dial clockwise increases support, counterclockwise decreases
  6. Walk few steps and adjust if needed
  7. Wear during weight-bearing activities
  8. Remove at night unless instructed otherwise
  9. Readjust dials as swelling changes throughout day

Dial Adjustment Guide

Arthritis Flare: Tighter support, limit ROM slightly
Mild Pain: Moderate support, full ROM
Post-Activity: Looser for recovery, maintain stability
Prevention: Light support during high-risk activities
Fine-tune throughout day as pain/swelling fluctuates

Care Instructions

Hand wash weekly with gentle soap. Air dry flat. Lubricate dial mechanisms every 3 months with silicone spray. Check all connection points monthly.

Specifications

  • Type: Hinged knee brace with dial stabilizers
  • Support Level: Maximum (Level 3)
  • Stabilizers: Dial-adjustable bilateral side stays
  • Hinges: Polycentric motion with ROM capability
  • Material: Breathable neoprene with perforations
  • Frame: Lightweight aluminum alloy
  • Straps: 5-6 adjustable compression straps
  • Sizes: Multiple sizes for optimal fit

Sizing Guide

Measure 6" above and 6" below kneecap center:
Small: 14-17" thigh, 11-13" calf
Medium: 17-20" thigh, 13-15" calf
Large: 20-23" thigh, 15-17" calf
X-Large: 23-26" thigh, 17-19" calf

Arthritis Management

For osteoarthritis specifically:

  • Wear during weight-bearing (standing, walking)
  • Remove during non-weight-bearing rest
  • Tighten dials during painful activities
  • Combine with anti-inflammatory medications
  • Use with physical therapy exercises
  • May reduce need for pain medications
  • Can delay surgery in some cases (discuss with doctor)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Dial mechanism guaranteed 1 year. Contact us for support.

Medical Disclaimer: Medical orthopedic device for knee support. Use as recommended by orthopedic specialist, rheumatologist, or physical therapist. Not cure for arthritis or ligament injuries - provides symptom management and protection. For arthritis: brace reduces pain but does not reverse cartilage damage. Regular medical monitoring still necessary. If pain significantly worsens or knee locks/gives out, seek immediate medical attention. Proper sizing critical - too loose ineffective, too tight restricts circulation. This brace may help delay knee replacement but is not guaranteed alternative. Follow comprehensive treatment plan including appropriate exercise, weight management, and medical care.

products.descriptionHtml:
JILI Pressotherapy Air Compression Leg Massager - 6 Chambers Recovery System

Professional-grade pressotherapy leg recovery boots with 6-chamber sequential air compression technology. Comprehensive lymphatic drainage system provides foot and leg massage for athletic recovery, circulation improvement, and deep relaxation physiotherapy.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 6 Chambers: Sequential compression from foot to thigh
  • ✓ Athletic Recovery: Reduces muscle soreness after intense training
  • ✓ Lymphatic Drainage: Promotes fluid movement and reduces swelling
  • ✓ Circulation Boost: Improves blood flow in legs and feet
  • ✓ Professional System: Used by athletes and physical therapists
  • ✓ Relaxation: Deeply relaxing massage experience

Perfect For

  • Post-workout muscle recovery
  • Athletic training programs
  • Marathon and endurance sports
  • Lymphedema management
  • Leg circulation improvement
  • Deep vein thrombosis prevention (travel)
  • Chronic leg fatigue
  • Physical therapy and rehabilitation

How to Use

  1. Connect leg boots to control unit
  2. Zip boots around legs from feet to thighs
  3. Sit or lie down comfortably
  4. Select pressure mode and intensity level
  5. Choose duration (15-30 minutes)
  6. Relax as sequential compression cycles through 6 chambers
  7. Use 3-5 times weekly after workouts
  8. Or use daily for circulation/lymphatic health

Compression Sequence

  • Chamber 1-2: Foot and ankle compression
  • Chamber 3-4: Lower leg (calf) compression
  • Chamber 5-6: Upper leg (thigh) compression
  • Wave Pattern: Compression moves upward, then releases completely

Care Instructions

Wipe boot interior with damp cloth. Air dry completely before storage. Clean control unit with dry cloth only. Check air hoses periodically for leaks. Store in included bag in cool, dry place.

Specifications

  • Chambers: 6 independent air compression zones

products.descriptionHtml:
Inflatable Neck Collar - Cervical Vertebra Traction Pillow

Therapeutic inflatable neck collar providing gentle cervical traction to relieve neck pain, improve posture, and decompress cervical vertebrae. Adjustable inflation allows customized traction levels for treating neck stiffness, pinched nerves, and cervical spine compression.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Traction: Gently stretches cervical spine to relieve pressure on discs and nerve roots
  • ✓ Neck Pain Relief: Reduces pain from herniated discs, pinched nerves, arthritis, or muscle tension
  • ✓ Posture Correction: Restores natural cervical curve (lordosis) compromised by forward head posture
  • ✓ Adjustable Inflation: Pump to desired traction level (3-6cm vertebral separation) for personalized therapy
  • ✓ Portable Therapy: Use at home, office, or while traveling - no bulky equipment needed
  • ✓ Safe & Comfortable: Soft velour lining prevents skin irritation during 15-30 minute traction sessions

Perfect For

  • Cervical disc herniation or bulging disc pain
  • Pinched nerve (cervical radiculopathy) symptoms
  • Forward head posture from computer/phone use (tech neck)
  • Cervical arthritis or degenerative disc disease
  • Neck muscle spasms and chronic tension
  • Post-whiplash injury recovery
  • Headaches originating from neck tension

How to Use

  1. Place deflated collar around neck with back support positioned at base of skull
  2. Secure velcro closure comfortably (not tight - collar will expand when inflated)
  3. Sit upright in chair or lie down (lying down recommended for beginners)
  4. Slowly pump hand bulb to inflate collar - stop when gentle stretching sensation is felt
  5. Maintain traction for 15-30 minutes per session, 2-3 times daily
  6. Deflate slowly using release valve when finished
  7. Start with lower inflation levels, increase gradually over 1-2 weeks

Care Instructions

Wipe vinyl surfaces with damp cloth and mild soap. Remove velour liner (if detachable) and hand wash separately. Air dry completely before storage. Deflate fully when storing. Inspect air bladder for leaks monthly. Do not over-inflate beyond recommended level.

Sizing Guide

  • One Size Fits Most: Adjustable to fit neck circumferences 12-18"
  • Height Adjustment: Inflates from 1.5" to 4" height (3-10cm traction)
  • Suitable for adults - not recommended for children under 16

Specifications

  • Type: Inflatable cervical traction collar
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC air bladder, velour/soft fabric lining
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump with pressure gauge and release valve
  • Traction Range: 3-10cm vertical separation (adjustable)
  • Weight: Lightweight (8-10 oz)
  • Features: Adjustable traction, portable, washable liner, safety release valve

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on inflation mechanism. Replacement pumps available. Contact us for usage guidance or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for home therapy and wellness purposes. Do not use if you have: acute neck injury, spinal instability, rheumatoid arthritis, osteoporosis, spinal tumors, or infection. Consult healthcare provider before use, especially if you have cervical spine conditions. Discontinue if pain increases. Not a substitute for professional medical care.

products.title: Intelligent Massage Gloves | Hand Rehabilitation Robot
products.description: Intelligent Massage Gloves - Hand Rehabilitation Robot Advanced robotic rehabilitation gloves combining intelligent massage, pneumatic compression, and heat therapy for hand function recovery. Designed for stroke patients, arthritis sufferers, and those with hand injuries requiring motor skill rehabilitation and pain relief. Key Benefits ✓ Intelligent Rehabilitation: Pre-programmed therapy routines mimic physical therapist hand manipulation techniques ✓ Pneumatic Compression: Air chambers inflate/deflate sequentially to flex and extend fingers, preventing contractures ✓ Heat Therapy: Infrared heating (95-113°F) improves circulation and reduces stiffness before exercise ✓ Stroke Recovery: Assists with hand motor function recovery through repetitive assisted movement (neuroplasticity) ✓ Arthritis Pain Relief: Gentle compression massage reduces inflammation and joint pain ✓ Home Rehabilitation: Professional therapy at home between clinic visits - use daily for best results Perfect For Stroke survivors with hand paralysis or weakness (hemiplegia) Rheumatoid or osteoarthritis hand pain and stiffness Hand/finger tendon or ligament injury recovery Carpal tunnel syndrome symptom management Post-surgical hand rehabilitation (fractures, joint replacement) Parkinson's disease hand tremor and rigidity Cerebral palsy hand function improvement Peripheral neuropathy hand numbness relief How to Use Insert hand into glove with fingers aligned in designated channels Secure wrist strap snugly to prevent glove from shifting during therapy Select program mode (1-5) and intensity level (1-10) on controller Optional: Activate heat function (preheat for 3-5 minutes recommended) Run therapy session for 15-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily After session, perform recommended hand exercises from physical therapist Consistent daily use essential for stroke recovery (typically 8-12 weeks minimum) Care Instructions Remove glove liner (if detachable) and hand wash with mild detergent. Wipe pneumatic chambers and controller with disinfectant wipe - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect air tubes for kinks or leaks weekly. Replace gloves if tears or excessive wear develops. Sizing Guide Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb) S: 2.75-3.25" (7-8.5cm) - Women's small/petite hands M: 3.25-3.75" (8.5-9.5cm) - Women's medium, men's small L: 3.75-4.25" (9.5-11cm) - Men's medium/large XL: 4.25-4.75" (11-12cm) - Men's XL Available in left or right hand - order correct side Specifications Technology: Pneumatic compression + infrared heat + intelligent programming Therapy Modes: 5 programs (rehabilitation, massage, heat, combination, custom) Intensity Levels: 10 adjustable compression levels Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C) adjustable Power: AC adapter (110-240V) or rechargeable battery option Timer: Auto shut-off after 15/30 minutes Certification: FDA-listed Class I medical device (consult regulations in your region) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement gloves available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support. Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is intended for home use as part of a comprehensive therapy program under medical supervision. Always follow your doctor or physical therapist's rehabilitation protocol. Not for acute hand injuries, open wounds, severe edema, or uncontrolled hypertension. Consult healthcare provider before use. Results vary by individual and condition severity.
products.descriptionHtml:
Intelligent Massage Gloves - Hand Rehabilitation Robot

Advanced robotic rehabilitation gloves combining intelligent massage, pneumatic compression, and heat therapy for hand function recovery. Designed for stroke patients, arthritis sufferers, and those with hand injuries requiring motor skill rehabilitation and pain relief.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Intelligent Rehabilitation: Pre-programmed therapy routines mimic physical therapist hand manipulation techniques
  • ✓ Pneumatic Compression: Air chambers inflate/deflate sequentially to flex and extend fingers, preventing contractures
  • ✓ Heat Therapy: Infrared heating (95-113°F) improves circulation and reduces stiffness before exercise
  • ✓ Stroke Recovery: Assists with hand motor function recovery through repetitive assisted movement (neuroplasticity)
  • ✓ Arthritis Pain Relief: Gentle compression massage reduces inflammation and joint pain
  • ✓ Home Rehabilitation: Professional therapy at home between clinic visits - use daily for best results

Perfect For

  • Stroke survivors with hand paralysis or weakness (hemiplegia)
  • Rheumatoid or osteoarthritis hand pain and stiffness
  • Hand/finger tendon or ligament injury recovery
  • Carpal tunnel syndrome symptom management
  • Post-surgical hand rehabilitation (fractures, joint replacement)
  • Parkinson's disease hand tremor and rigidity
  • Cerebral palsy hand function improvement
  • Peripheral neuropathy hand numbness relief

How to Use

  1. Insert hand into glove with fingers aligned in designated channels
  2. Secure wrist strap snugly to prevent glove from shifting during therapy
  3. Select program mode (1-5) and intensity level (1-10) on controller
  4. Optional: Activate heat function (preheat for 3-5 minutes recommended)
  5. Run therapy session for 15-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily
  6. After session, perform recommended hand exercises from physical therapist
  7. Consistent daily use essential for stroke recovery (typically 8-12 weeks minimum)

Care Instructions

Remove glove liner (if detachable) and hand wash with mild detergent. Wipe pneumatic chambers and controller with disinfectant wipe - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect air tubes for kinks or leaks weekly. Replace gloves if tears or excessive wear develops.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb)
  • S: 2.75-3.25" (7-8.5cm) - Women's small/petite hands
  • M: 3.25-3.75" (8.5-9.5cm) - Women's medium, men's small
  • L: 3.75-4.25" (9.5-11cm) - Men's medium/large
  • XL: 4.25-4.75" (11-12cm) - Men's XL
  • Available in left or right hand - order correct side

Specifications

  • Technology: Pneumatic compression + infrared heat + intelligent programming
  • Therapy Modes: 5 programs (rehabilitation, massage, heat, combination, custom)
  • Intensity Levels: 10 adjustable compression levels
  • Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C) adjustable
  • Power: AC adapter (110-240V) or rechargeable battery option
  • Timer: Auto shut-off after 15/30 minutes
  • Certification: FDA-listed Class I medical device (consult regulations in your region)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement gloves available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is intended for home use as part of a comprehensive therapy program under medical supervision. Always follow your doctor or physical therapist's rehabilitation protocol. Not for acute hand injuries, open wounds, severe edema, or uncontrolled hypertension. Consult healthcare provider before use. Results vary by individual and condition severity.

products.descriptionHtml:
Lower Back Brace with 6 Stays - Anti-Skid Orthopedic Lumbar Support

Heavy-duty orthopedic lumbar support belt featuring 6 reinforced stays and anti-skid design for maximum stabilization and pain relief. Provides medical-grade support for herniated discs, sciatica, chronic lower back pain, and work-related strain with superior stay-in-place performance during movement.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 6-Stay Support System: More stays than standard braces provide superior spinal stabilization and disc decompression
  • ✓ Anti-Skid Technology: Silicone wave grips prevent brace migration during bending, lifting, or prolonged wear
  • ✓ Dual Compression: Primary belt + secondary pull straps deliver adjustable compression for custom support
  • ✓ Orthopedic-Grade: Suitable for herniated discs, degenerative disc disease, spinal stenosis, sciatica
  • ✓ Posture Correction: Rigid stays maintain proper lumbar curve and prevent slouching
  • ✓ Work & Sport Support: Suitable for heavy lifting, warehouse work, construction, or athletic activities

Perfect For

  • Herniated or bulging lumbar discs (L4-L5, L5-S1)
  • Sciatica pain radiating down legs
  • Chronic lower back pain and muscle spasms
  • Degenerative disc disease and spinal arthritis
  • Heavy lifting jobs (warehouse, construction, moving)
  • Post-surgical lumbar spine stabilization
  • Spondylolisthesis (vertebral slippage)
  • Work-related back strain prevention

How to Use

  1. Position brace around lower back with center of rigid panel at L4-L5 level (waist height)
  2. Ensure anti-skid silicone strips contact skin or thin undergarment for grip
  3. Wrap primary belt around waist and secure hook-and-loop closure
  4. Pull secondary compression straps outward and downward for additional tightening
  5. Adjust to firm compression - should feel supportive without restricting breathing
  6. Wear during activities requiring back support - remove periodically to prevent muscle weakness
  7. For heavy lifting: Put on BEFORE lifting, remove after physical work completed

Care Instructions

Remove rigid stays (if detachable) before washing. Hand wash belt with cold water and mild detergent. Air dry flat - do not hang or tumble dry. Clean silicone grips with damp cloth to maintain stickiness. Inspect stays monthly for bending - replace if deformed. Replace belt when elastic loses compression.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Waist circumference at belly button level
  • S: 26-30" (66-76cm)
  • M: 30-34" (76-86cm)
  • L: 34-38" (86-97cm)
  • XL: 38-42" (97-107cm)
  • XXL: 42-46" (107-117cm)
  • 3XL: 46-50" (117-127cm)
  • For maximum support, choose snug fit without sizing up

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic lumbar support belt with 6-stay system
  • Stays: 6 rigid plastic or metal vertical stays (covers L1-S1 region)
  • Material: Breathable mesh, elastic compression fabric, anti-skid silicone
  • Width: 9-11" (covers full lumbar and sacral region)
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop primary + dual pull compression straps
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade)
  • Features: Anti-migration design, breathable, dual compression, removable stays

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on materials and workmanship. Replacement stays available. Contact us for sizing or usage questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This lumbar support brace provides mechanical stabilization and is not medical treatment. Consult healthcare provider if you have severe back pain, numbness, or bowel/bladder changes. Not for acute spinal injuries or fractures without medical clearance. Prolonged continuous use may weaken core muscles - use during activities, not 24/7. Does not replace proper lifting technique, physical therapy, or medical care.

Air dry flat or hang - do not tumble dry. Clean weekly with regular use to prevent sweat buildup and odor. Inspect stitching and straps monthly for wear. Sizing Guide Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line S: 27-32" (69-81cm) M: 32-36" (81-91cm) L: 36-41" (91-104cm) XL: 41-46" (104-117cm) XXL: 46-51" (117-130cm) For maximum effectiveness, choose size that provides firm but comfortable correction Specifications Type: Figure-8 shoulder posture corrector Material: Breathable neoprene blend, padded elastic straps Design: Figure-8 clavicle brace style with back X-cross Adjustability: Fully adjustable pull straps for customized correction Support Level: Medium (suitable for postural correction) Features: Lightweight, discreet under clothing, washable, padded straps Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or usage guidance. Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical support to retrain postural muscles. Not for severe spinal deformities, scoliosis, or recent shoulder/clavicle surgery without medical clearance. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing, circulation, or causes numbness. products.descriptionHtml:
Posture Corrector - Adjustable Shoulder Support Brace

Premium adjustable posture corrector focusing on shoulder alignment and upper back support for both women and men. Ergonomic design gently retracts shoulders while providing comfortable all-day wear to retrain postural muscles and reduce pain from forward slouch posture.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Shoulder Alignment: Figure-8 design pulls shoulders back into anatomically correct position
  • ✓ Clavicle Support: Prevents forward shoulder roll and clavicle misalignment
  • ✓ Muscle Memory Training: Retrains chest, shoulder, and upper back muscles for lasting posture improvement
  • ✓ Adjustable Fit: Fully customizable straps accommodate different body types and correction needs
  • ✓ Comfortable Design: Padded straps and breathable materials allow extended wear without discomfort
  • ✓ Versatile Use: Suitable for office work, exercise, daily activities, and sleep (advanced users)

Perfect For

  • Forward rounded shoulders from desk work
  • Upper crossed syndrome (weak upper back, tight chest)
  • Clavicle injuries or fractures during healing
  • Slouched posture and hunched shoulders
  • Neck and shoulder pain from postural issues
  • Computer/tech neck posture correction
  • Post-pregnancy posture restoration
  • Athletes wanting to improve performance posture

How to Use

  1. Slip arms through figure-8 shoulder loops like putting on a backpack
  2. Position loops comfortably on shoulders - not too close to neck
  3. Reach behind back and pull adjustment straps to desired tension
  4. Should feel gentle backward pull on shoulders without pain
  5. Begin with 15-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-4 hours over 2-3 weeks
  6. Wear during activities when you tend to slouch most
  7. Combine with chest stretches and upper back strengthening for best results
  8. Consistency is key - daily use provides best long-term posture improvement

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat or hang - do not tumble dry. Clean weekly with regular use to prevent sweat buildup and odor. Inspect stitching and straps monthly for wear. Replace when straps lose elasticity or adjustment mechanism fails (typically 8-12 months with daily use). Do not bleach or iron.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line
  • S: 27-32" (69-81cm)
  • M: 32-36" (81-91cm)
  • L: 36-41" (91-104cm)
  • XL: 41-46" (104-117cm)
  • XXL: 46-51" (117-130cm)
  • For maximum effectiveness, choose size that provides firm but comfortable correction

Specifications

  • Type: Figure-8 shoulder posture corrector
  • Material: Breathable neoprene blend, padded elastic straps
  • Design: Figure-8 clavicle brace style with back X-cross
  • Adjustability: Fully adjustable pull straps for customized correction
  • Support Level: Medium (suitable for postural correction)
  • Features: Lightweight, discreet under clothing, washable, padded straps

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical support to retrain postural muscles. Not for severe spinal deformities, scoliosis, or recent shoulder/clavicle surgery without medical clearance. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing, circulation, or causes numbness. Not a substitute for exercise and muscle strengthening. Prolonged use without strengthening exercises may cause muscle dependency. Consult healthcare provider if you have spinal or shoulder conditions. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms develop.

products.descriptionHtml:
Lumbar Support Belt - Disc Herniation, Orthopedic Strain & Pain Relief

Professional orthopedic lumbar support belt designed for disc herniation, strain pain relief, and posture correction. Medical-grade spine decompression corset provides targeted lower back support for pain management and spinal alignment during daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Disc Herniation Support: Reduces pressure on herniated lumbar discs
  • ✓ Orthopedic Grade: Medical-quality construction and materials
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Alleviates lower back strain and muscle pain
  • ✓ Spine Decompression: Lifts weight off compressed vertebrae
  • ✓ Posture Correction: Promotes proper spinal alignment
  • ✓ Adjustable Compression: Customizable support level

Perfect For

  • Lumbar disc herniation
  • Degenerative disc disease
  • Lower back strain and sprains
  • Sciatica nerve pain
  • Chronic lower back pain
  • Spinal stenosis support
  • Heavy lifting protection
  • Long-sitting back support (desk work)

How to Use

  1. Position belt around lower back at waist level
  2. Center rigid back panel over lumbar spine
  3. Wrap around abdomen and fasten front closure
  4. Adjust side straps for desired compression
  5. Check fit: should be snug but allow breathing
  6. Wear during activities that stress back
  7. Can wear over thin shirt for comfort
  8. Remove every 2-3 hours to move and stretch

When to Wear

  • During heavy lifting or physical work
  • Extended sitting at desk or driving
  • Standing for long periods
  • Household chores and activities
  • Exercise and physical therapy
  • During pain flare-ups

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent in cold water. Do not remove stays/supports. Air dry completely - do not use heat. Do not bleach or iron. Check all straps and closures regularly.

Specifications

  • Type: Lumbar support belt with spinal decompression
  • Support: 6 rigid stays for spine stability
  • Compression: Dual-pull strap system
  • Material: Breathable elastic, rigid plastic stays
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop + buckle
  • Sizes: S/M/L/XL/XXL (measure waist circumference)
  • Height: 9-10 inches (covers full lumbar region)
  • Color: Black, beige

Sizing Guide

  • S: Waist 26"-30"
  • M: Waist 30"-36"
  • L: Waist 36"-42"
  • XL: Waist 42"-48"
  • XXL: Waist 48"-54"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing help.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and pain relief but not medical treatment. For severe disc herniation, spinal fractures, or tumors, follow doctor's treatment plan. This brace is supportive only, not curative. If pain worsens, numbness in legs, loss of bowel/bladder control, or weakness occurs, seek immediate medical attention. Not for 24/7 continuous wear - remove periodically to prevent muscle dependency. Use as directed by healthcare provider.

products.description: Adjustable Children's Posture Corrector Specially designed posture corrector for kids, boys, and girls. Gentle orthopedic support corrects slouching habits early, preventing long-term spinal issues. Lightweight, adjustable design grows with your child while encouraging healthy posture during critical development years. Key Benefits ✓ Child-Specific Design: Sized and engineered for growing bodies, gentler than adult braces ✓ Habit Formation: Trains proper posture during formative years when habits are established ✓ Prevents Future Problems: Early intervention reduces risk of chronic back pain, scoliosis progression, and postural deformities in adulthood ✓ Adjustable Growth: Multiple adjustment points accommodate growth spurts, extends product lifespan ✓ Comfortable & Lightweight: Kids actually willing to wear it - breathable materials won't overheat during school day Perfect For Poor posture from heavy backpacks Slouching during homework/study time "Text neck" from tablets and phones Mild scoliosis monitoring (under doctor supervision) Upper back rounding (juvenile kyphosis) Post-injury back support during recovery Building lifelong healthy posture habits How to Use Help child put on over t-shirt (more comfortable than bare skin) Guide arms through shoulder loops Center back panel on spine between shoulder blades Secure waist strap comfortably (should not restrict breathing) Adjust shoulder straps to gently pull shoulders back Start gradually: 15-20 minutes first few days Increase to 30-60 minutes during homework/screen time Make it fun: reward consistency, explain why good posture matters Age-Appropriate Use Ages 6-10: 15-30 minutes during homework Ages 11-14: 30-60 minutes during study time Ages 15-18: Up to 2 hours if needed Never force - build positive associations with wearing device. Care Instructions Hand wash weekly with mild detergent. Air dry completely. Adjust straps as child grows every 2-3 months. Specifications Age Range: 6-18 years (consult sizing chart) Gender: Unisex - boys and girls Support Areas: Upper back, shoulders, lumbar Material: Lightweight breathable mesh, soft padding Adjustability: Multiple growing stages Weight: Ultra-lightweight design Colors: Kid-friendly options available Sizing Guide Small (ages 6-9): Chest 24-28" Medium (ages 10-13): Chest 28-34" Large (ages 14-18): Chest 34-38" Measure chest circumference under arms for best fit. Tips for Parents Lead by example - practice good posture yourself Combine with posture reminders and back-strengthening exercises Ensure proper desk/chair height for homework Monitor backpack weight (should not exceed 10-15% of child's body weight) Make wearing brace part of homework routine Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Growing children? Contact us about sizing up. Support available for parents. Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector is for mild posture improvement in healthy children. For diagnosed conditions like scoliosis or kyphosis, use only under pediatrician or orthopedic specialist supervision. Not a substitute for prescribed medical bracing. Monitor child during use - discontinue if discomfort occurs. Consult doctor before use if child has spinal conditions or chronic pain.
products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Children's Posture Corrector

Specially designed posture corrector for kids, boys, and girls. Gentle orthopedic support corrects slouching habits early, preventing long-term spinal issues. Lightweight, adjustable design grows with your child while encouraging healthy posture during critical development years.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Child-Specific Design: Sized and engineered for growing bodies, gentler than adult braces
  • ✓ Habit Formation: Trains proper posture during formative years when habits are established
  • ✓ Prevents Future Problems: Early intervention reduces risk of chronic back pain, scoliosis progression, and postural deformities in adulthood
  • ✓ Adjustable Growth: Multiple adjustment points accommodate growth spurts, extends product lifespan
  • ✓ Comfortable & Lightweight: Kids actually willing to wear it - breathable materials won't overheat during school day

Perfect For

  • Poor posture from heavy backpacks
  • Slouching during homework/study time
  • "Text neck" from tablets and phones
  • Mild scoliosis monitoring (under doctor supervision)
  • Upper back rounding (juvenile kyphosis)
  • Post-injury back support during recovery
  • Building lifelong healthy posture habits

How to Use

  1. Help child put on over t-shirt (more comfortable than bare skin)
  2. Guide arms through shoulder loops
  3. Center back panel on spine between shoulder blades
  4. Secure waist strap comfortably (should not restrict breathing)
  5. Adjust shoulder straps to gently pull shoulders back
  6. Start gradually: 15-20 minutes first few days
  7. Increase to 30-60 minutes during homework/screen time
  8. Make it fun: reward consistency, explain why good posture matters

Age-Appropriate Use

Ages 6-10: 15-30 minutes during homework
Ages 11-14: 30-60 minutes during study time
Ages 15-18: Up to 2 hours if needed

Never force - build positive associations with wearing device.

Care Instructions

Hand wash weekly with mild detergent. Air dry completely. Adjust straps as child grows every 2-3 months.

Specifications

  • Age Range: 6-18 years (consult sizing chart)
  • Gender: Unisex - boys and girls
  • Support Areas: Upper back, shoulders, lumbar
  • Material: Lightweight breathable mesh, soft padding
  • Adjustability: Multiple growing stages
  • Weight: Ultra-lightweight design
  • Colors: Kid-friendly options available

Sizing Guide

Small (ages 6-9): Chest 24-28"
Medium (ages 10-13): Chest 28-34"
Large (ages 14-18): Chest 34-38"

Measure chest circumference under arms for best fit.

Tips for Parents

  • Lead by example - practice good posture yourself
  • Combine with posture reminders and back-strengthening exercises
  • Ensure proper desk/chair height for homework
  • Monitor backpack weight (should not exceed 10-15% of child's body weight)
  • Make wearing brace part of homework routine

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Growing children? Contact us about sizing up. Support available for parents.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector is for mild posture improvement in healthy children. For diagnosed conditions like scoliosis or kyphosis, use only under pediatrician or orthopedic specialist supervision. Not a substitute for prescribed medical bracing. Monitor child during use - discontinue if discomfort occurs. Consult doctor before use if child has spinal conditions or chronic pain.

Adjustable hinges provide controlled flexion/extension during recovery from elbow surgery, fractures, dislocations, or ligament injuries. Key Benefits ✓ ROM Adjustable Hinges: Control elbow flexion/extension range (0°-135° adjustment) for progressive rehabilitation ✓ Post-Surgery Support: Medical-grade stabilization for elbow fractures, dislocations, or ligament reconstruction recovery ✓ Bilateral Hinges: Dual medial/lateral hinges provide superior alignment and prevent unwanted rotation ✓ Progressive Recovery: Gradually increase ROM as healing progresses per doctor's protocol ✓ Breathable Design: Lightweight, ventilated materials reduce heat buildup during extended wear ✓ Adjustable Straps: Secure arm and forearm independently for customized compression and stability Perfect For Post-operative elbow fracture recovery (radial head, olecranon) Elbow dislocation stabilization and rehabilitation UCL (ulnar collateral ligament) reconstruction recovery Tennis elbow or golfer's elbow post-surgical support Elbow replacement (total elbow arthroplasty) recovery Controlled ROM progression during physical therapy How to Use Set ROM hinges to prescribed degree by your surgeon (often locked initially) Slide arm through brace with hinges aligned to elbow joint crease Secure upper arm strap first, then forearm strap with snug but comfortable compression Adjust ROM settings only as directed by healthcare provider during recovery phases Wear duration as prescribed - typically full-time early recovery, reducing as healing progresses Care Instructions Hand wash with mild detergent, air dry flat. Do not submerge hinges. Clean after each use during recovery. Check hinge screws monthly - tighten if loose. Replace foam padding if compressed or worn. Sizing Guide Measure: Upper arm circumference 2" above elbow crease S: 9-11" (23-28cm) - Upper arm circumference M: 11-13" (28-33cm) - Upper arm circumference L: 13-15" (33-38cm) - Upper arm circumference XL: 15-17" (38-43cm) - Upper arm circumference Choose larger size if post-surgery swelling is present Specifications Type: Post-operative hinged elbow brace with ROM adjustment Hinges: Bilateral adjustable ROM hinges (0°-135° flexion/extension control) Material: Medical-grade breathable composite, aluminum hinges, foam padding Straps: 2-4 adjustable straps (upper arm + forearm) Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade post-op/injury support) Length: Adjustable (typically 10-14" total coverage) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on defects. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged ROM Elbow Brace - Adjustable Post-Op Stabilizer Splint

Medical-grade hinged elbow brace with adjustable ROM (Range of Motion) for post-operative recovery and elbow injury rehabilitation. Adjustable hinges provide controlled flexion/extension during recovery from elbow surgery, fractures, dislocations, or ligament injuries.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ ROM Adjustable Hinges: Control elbow flexion/extension range (0°-135° adjustment) for progressive rehabilitation
  • ✓ Post-Surgery Support: Medical-grade stabilization for elbow fractures, dislocations, or ligament reconstruction recovery
  • ✓ Bilateral Hinges: Dual medial/lateral hinges provide superior alignment and prevent unwanted rotation
  • ✓ Progressive Recovery: Gradually increase ROM as healing progresses per doctor's protocol
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Lightweight, ventilated materials reduce heat buildup during extended wear
  • ✓ Adjustable Straps: Secure arm and forearm independently for customized compression and stability

Perfect For

  • Post-operative elbow fracture recovery (radial head, olecranon)
  • Elbow dislocation stabilization and rehabilitation
  • UCL (ulnar collateral ligament) reconstruction recovery
  • Tennis elbow or golfer's elbow post-surgical support
  • Elbow replacement (total elbow arthroplasty) recovery
  • Controlled ROM progression during physical therapy

How to Use

  1. Set ROM hinges to prescribed degree by your surgeon (often locked initially)
  2. Slide arm through brace with hinges aligned to elbow joint crease
  3. Secure upper arm strap first, then forearm strap with snug but comfortable compression
  4. Adjust ROM settings only as directed by healthcare provider during recovery phases
  5. Wear duration as prescribed - typically full-time early recovery, reducing as healing progresses

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent, air dry flat. Do not submerge hinges. Clean after each use during recovery. Check hinge screws monthly - tighten if loose. Replace foam padding if compressed or worn.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Upper arm circumference 2" above elbow crease
  • S: 9-11" (23-28cm) - Upper arm circumference
  • M: 11-13" (28-33cm) - Upper arm circumference
  • L: 13-15" (33-38cm) - Upper arm circumference
  • XL: 15-17" (38-43cm) - Upper arm circumference
  • Choose larger size if post-surgery swelling is present

Specifications

  • Type: Post-operative hinged elbow brace with ROM adjustment
  • Hinges: Bilateral adjustable ROM hinges (0°-135° flexion/extension control)
  • Material: Medical-grade breathable composite, aluminum hinges, foam padding
  • Straps: 2-4 adjustable straps (upper arm + forearm)
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade post-op/injury support)
  • Length: Adjustable (typically 10-14" total coverage)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on defects. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for sizing or ROM adjustment guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This post-operative elbow brace is designed for use under medical supervision. Always follow your surgeon or therapist's ROM settings and wear schedule. Not for self-diagnosis or treatment. Consult healthcare provider before use.

products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Wrist Support Brace - Fitness, Weightlifting & Pain Relief

Versatile adjustable wrist support brace designed for both athletic performance and injury recovery. Provides customizable compression and stabilization for left or right wrist during fitness activities, weightlifting, or daily wear for pain relief.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Fully Adjustable: Hook-and-loop straps customize compression level and fit
  • ✓ Dual Purpose: Supports intense workouts AND provides pain relief during recovery
  • ✓ Universal Design: Fits left or right wrist, men or women
  • ✓ Breathable Construction: Perforated neoprene allows airflow during long wear
  • ✓ Flexible Stability: Supports wrist without completely immobilizing it
  • ✓ Lightweight: Won't interfere with grip or dexterity

Perfect For

  • Weightlifting and powerlifting
  • CrossFit and functional fitness
  • Gym workouts (push-ups, planks)
  • Carpal tunnel syndrome relief
  • Wrist tendonitis and sprains
  • Arthritis pain management
  • Computer work (repetitive strain)
  • Post-injury wrist stabilization

How to Use

  1. Place wrist through opening with palm side down
  2. Position pad over underside of wrist
  3. Wrap main strap around wrist snugly
  4. Secure with hook-and-loop closure
  5. Adjust tightness: firm support without cutting circulation
  6. Check: should feel stable but not numb
  7. For fitness: wear during exercise only
  8. For pain relief: can wear throughout day (remove periodically)

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and cool water. Pat dry with towel, then air dry completely. Do not machine wash or dry. Fasten straps before washing to prevent snagging. Do not bleach or iron.

Specifications

  • Material: Neoprene, nylon, elastic
  • Closure: Adjustable hook-and-loop straps
  • Size: Universal adjustable (fits 5.5"-9.5" wrist circumference)
  • Thickness: 3mm neoprene
  • Fits: Left or right wrist
  • Gender: Unisex
  • Colors: Black, grey

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and compression but not rigid immobilization. For serious wrist fractures or post-surgical needs, use medical-grade rigid splint. If numbness, tingling, or increased pain occurs, remove immediately and consult healthcare provider. Not for 24/7 continuous wear.

products.descriptionHtml:
AOLIKES Ankle Brace Support - Lace-Up Stabilizer

Professional-grade lace-up ankle brace from AOLIKES. Combines traditional lacing system with adjustable stabilizing straps for maximum support during sprain recovery and prevention. Compression sleeve design fits comfortably in shoes for all-day wear.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Support System: Lace-up closure plus figure-8 straps provide medical-grade ankle stabilization
  • ✓ Sprain Recovery: Limits harmful inversion/eversion while allowing safe forward/backward motion for healing
  • ✓ Compression Fit: Sleeve design applies consistent compression to reduce swelling and support healing
  • ✓ Adjustable Tightness: Laces allow precise tension control impossible with simple wrap braces
  • ✓ AOLIKES Quality: Trusted sports medicine brand used by athletes and physical therapists worldwide

Perfect For

  • Ankle sprains (Grade I, II, III)
  • Post-sprain rehabilitation
  • Chronic ankle instability
  • Sports injury prevention (basketball, soccer, volleyball)
  • Weak or rolled ankles
  • Achilles tendonitis support
  • Return to sport after injury

How to Use

  1. Slide foot through top of sleeve-style brace
  2. Position heel in back opening
  3. Pull laces snug from bottom to top (like tying shoes)
  4. Tie laces securely at top
  5. Wrap figure-8 stabilizing strap under foot and around ankle
  6. Secure final strap around ankle for added compression
  7. Ensure snug fit without cutting circulation
  8. Wear with athletic shoes during activities
  9. Can be worn all day during acute recovery phase

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash or dry. Do not bleach. Re-lace if laces become worn.

Specifications

  • Brand: AOLIKES (professional sports medicine brand)
  • Type: Lace-up ankle brace with stabilizing straps
  • Support Level: Moderate to maximum (Level 2-3)
  • Material: Breathable compression fabric, reinforced nylon
  • Closure: Lace-up + adjustable Velcro straps
  • Quantity: 1 piece (specify left or right ankle)
  • Color: Black

Sizing Guide

Measure around ankle at narrowest point:
Small: 7-8.5"
Medium: 8.5-10"
Large: 10-11.5"
X-Large: 11.5-13"

Warranty & Support

90-day AOLIKES manufacturer warranty. Replacement laces available. Contact us for sizing or fit assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: This ankle brace provides support for sprains and instability. For severe injuries, use only as recommended by doctor, podiatrist, or physical therapist. Not a substitute for professional diagnosis or treatment. If pain persists or worsens, consult healthcare provider. Follow medical guidance for when to progress from bracing to unassisted activity.

products.description: Magnetic Therapy Shoulder Orthopedic Posture Corrector Orthopedic posture corrector with integrated magnetic therapy designed to realign shoulders, correct rounded back posture, and provide mild scoliosis support. Medical-grade magnets enhance circulation while adjustable straps gently pull shoulders back into proper alignment. Key Benefits ✓ Posture Correction: Pulls shoulders back to counteract forward head posture and rounded shoulders from desk work ✓ Magnetic Therapy: 12 strategically placed magnets (1500-2000 gauss each) improve local circulation and reduce inflammation ✓ Orthopedic Support: Suitable for mild scoliosis, kyphosis, and clavicle fracture recovery ✓ Muscle Retraining: Trains muscles to maintain proper posture even when brace is not worn ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces upper back, neck, and shoulder pain from poor posture ✓ Discreet Design: Thin profile wears invisibly under clothing for all-day correction Perfect For Forward head posture from computer/phone use (tech neck) Rounded shoulders (upper crossed syndrome) Mild scoliosis and kyphosis (hunchback) Clavicle fracture healing and stabilization Upper back and shoulder blade pain Desk workers with poor sitting posture Post-surgical shoulder or clavicle support Chronic tension headaches from neck strain How to Use Put on like a backpack - slip arms through shoulder loops Pull straps to desired tightness (should feel gentle backward pull on shoulders) Position padding between shoulder blades for comfort Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-4 hours over 2 weeks Do NOT wear during sleep initially (advance to overnight wear after 2-4 weeks if comfortable) Combine with stretching and strengthening exercises for best long-term results Adjust tightness - should feel supportive but not painful or restrict breathing Care Instructions Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or expose magnets to high heat. Clean weekly with regular use. Do not bleach. Magnets are permanently embedded - do not attempt to remove. Replace when straps lose elasticity (typically 6-12 months). Sizing Guide Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line S: 28-32" (71-81cm) M: 32-36" (81-91cm) L: 36-40" (91-102cm) XL: 40-44" (102-112cm) XXL: 44-48" (112-122cm) For maximum correction, choose snug fit without sizing up Specifications Type: Orthopedic posture corrector with magnetic therapy Magnets: 12 neodymium magnets (1500-2000 gauss each) Material: Breathable elastic, neoprene padding, nylon straps Design: Figure-8 clavicle brace style with back support panel Adjustability: Fully adjustable shoulder straps Support Level: Medium (suitable for posture correction and mild scoliosis) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or fit guidance. Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical support and magnetic therapy. Not for severe scoliosis or spinal deformities without medical supervision. Contraindications: pacemakers, insulin pumps, other electronic implants (magnets may interfere). Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. Do not use on open wounds. Not a substitute for physical therapy, exercise, or medical care. Prolonged use without strengthening exercises may weaken postural muscles.
products.descriptionHtml:
Magnetic Therapy Shoulder Orthopedic Posture Corrector

Orthopedic posture corrector with integrated magnetic therapy designed to realign shoulders, correct rounded back posture, and provide mild scoliosis support. Medical-grade magnets enhance circulation while adjustable straps gently pull shoulders back into proper alignment.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Posture Correction: Pulls shoulders back to counteract forward head posture and rounded shoulders from desk work
  • ✓ Magnetic Therapy: 12 strategically placed magnets (1500-2000 gauss each) improve local circulation and reduce inflammation
  • ✓ Orthopedic Support: Suitable for mild scoliosis, kyphosis, and clavicle fracture recovery
  • ✓ Muscle Retraining: Trains muscles to maintain proper posture even when brace is not worn
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces upper back, neck, and shoulder pain from poor posture
  • ✓ Discreet Design: Thin profile wears invisibly under clothing for all-day correction

Perfect For

  • Forward head posture from computer/phone use (tech neck)
  • Rounded shoulders (upper crossed syndrome)
  • Mild scoliosis and kyphosis (hunchback)
  • Clavicle fracture healing and stabilization
  • Upper back and shoulder blade pain
  • Desk workers with poor sitting posture
  • Post-surgical shoulder or clavicle support
  • Chronic tension headaches from neck strain

How to Use

  1. Put on like a backpack - slip arms through shoulder loops
  2. Pull straps to desired tightness (should feel gentle backward pull on shoulders)
  3. Position padding between shoulder blades for comfort
  4. Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-4 hours over 2 weeks
  5. Do NOT wear during sleep initially (advance to overnight wear after 2-4 weeks if comfortable)
  6. Combine with stretching and strengthening exercises for best long-term results
  7. Adjust tightness - should feel supportive but not painful or restrict breathing

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or expose magnets to high heat. Clean weekly with regular use. Do not bleach. Magnets are permanently embedded - do not attempt to remove. Replace when straps lose elasticity (typically 6-12 months).

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line
  • S: 28-32" (71-81cm)
  • M: 32-36" (81-91cm)
  • L: 36-40" (91-102cm)
  • XL: 40-44" (102-112cm)
  • XXL: 44-48" (112-122cm)
  • For maximum correction, choose snug fit without sizing up

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic posture corrector with magnetic therapy
  • Magnets: 12 neodymium magnets (1500-2000 gauss each)
  • Material: Breathable elastic, neoprene padding, nylon straps
  • Design: Figure-8 clavicle brace style with back support panel
  • Adjustability: Fully adjustable shoulder straps
  • Support Level: Medium (suitable for posture correction and mild scoliosis)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or fit guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical support and magnetic therapy. Not for severe scoliosis or spinal deformities without medical supervision. Contraindications: pacemakers, insulin pumps, other electronic implants (magnets may interfere). Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. Do not use on open wounds. Not a substitute for physical therapy, exercise, or medical care. Prolonged use without strengthening exercises may weaken postural muscles.

products.descriptionHtml:
AFO Drop Foot Brace Orthosis

Medical-grade AFO (Ankle-Foot Orthosis) designed to correct drop foot and provide ankle stability. Lightweight aluminum construction with padded straps offers effective support without bulk. Fits in most shoes for discreet all-day wear.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Drop Foot Correction: Maintains foot in neutral position, preventing toe drag and improving walking gait
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Rigid aluminum uprights provide professional-level stabilization prescribed by doctors and podiatrists
  • ✓ Lightweight Design: Aircraft-grade aluminum strong enough for support but light enough for all-day comfort
  • ✓ Fits in Shoes: Low-profile design fits in most athletic shoes and boots, unlike bulky alternatives
  • ✓ Unisex: Adjustable straps accommodate men's and women's foot and calf sizes

Perfect For

  • Drop foot (foot drop) from nerve damage
  • Stroke recovery and rehabilitation
  • Peripheral neuropathy
  • Multiple sclerosis (MS) foot symptoms
  • Peroneal nerve injury
  • Post-surgery ankle support
  • Cerebral palsy mobility assistance

How to Use

  1. Sit down and slide foot into brace
  2. Position heel in back of foot plate
  3. Align aluminum uprights on sides of leg
  4. Secure foot strap across top of foot
  5. Fasten ankle strap for stability
  6. Secure calf strap (snug but not tight)
  7. Ensure foot is at 90-degree angle to leg
  8. Wear with supportive athletic shoes or boots
  9. Use daily as recommended by healthcare provider

Care Instructions

Wipe aluminum frame with damp cloth. Remove and hand wash padded straps weekly. Air dry completely. Check screws and rivets monthly for tightness.

Specifications

  • Type: AFO (Ankle-Foot Orthosis)
  • Material: Aircraft-grade aluminum frame, padded nylon straps
  • Weight: Lightweight (under 1 lb)
  • Side: Universal (specify left or right when ordering)
  • Adjustability: Multiple strap positions
  • Shoe Fit: Fits most athletic shoes, boots
  • Gender: Unisex (men and women)

Sizing Guide

Measure calf circumference at widest point and foot length. Most standard sizes fit shoe sizes 6-12. Contact for sizing assistance if between sizes.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers manufacturing defects. Replacement straps available. Contact us for fit adjustments.

Medical Disclaimer: This AFO brace is a medical orthotic device. Use only as prescribed or recommended by physician, podiatrist, or physical therapist. Not intended for self-diagnosis. Consult healthcare provider to ensure this device is appropriate for your specific condition. Follow professional guidance for wear duration and activity restrictions.

products.descriptionHtml:
Drop Foot Brace AFO with Inflatable Airbag

Advanced AFO (Ankle-Foot Orthosis) with innovative inflatable airbag system for enhanced comfort and adjustability. Designed specifically for drop foot conditions from stroke, hemiplegia, or neurological disorders. Fits in shoes for discreet support during walking.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Inflatable Airbag System: Customizable cushioning adapts to foot shape and swelling changes throughout day
  • ✓ Drop Foot Correction: Maintains foot in neutral position, preventing toe drag and improving gait quality
  • ✓ Stroke Recovery: Essential mobility aid for post-stroke rehabilitation and hemiplegia management
  • ✓ Comfortable Design: Airbag padding reduces pressure points common in traditional rigid AFOs
  • ✓ Fits in Shoes: Low-profile design works with most athletic shoes and walking shoes

Perfect For

  • Drop foot from stroke (CVA)
  • Hemiplegia and hemiparesis
  • Peroneal nerve damage or palsy
  • Multiple sclerosis (MS) foot drop
  • Cerebral palsy mobility assistance
  • Post-surgery foot drop recovery
  • Charcot-Marie-Tooth disease
  • Spinal cord injury effects

How to Use

  1. Sit down and loosen shoe laces completely
  2. Place foot into brace, heel positioned in back cup
  3. Align vertical supports on sides of leg
  4. Secure foot strap across top of foot
  5. Fasten ankle strap snugly
  6. Attach calf strap (firm but not tight)
  7. Use hand pump to inflate airbag to comfortable pressure
  8. Ensure foot is at 90-degree angle to leg
  9. Put on athletic shoe or walking shoe
  10. Adjust airbag pressure as needed throughout day

Airbag Adjustment

Morning: May need less inflation
Afternoon: Increase if swelling develops
After Activity: Adjust for comfort and support needs
Never overinflate: Should feel snug, not painful

Care Instructions

Wipe frame and airbag with damp cloth daily. Remove and hand wash padded straps weekly. Air dry completely. Check airbag pump and valve for leaks regularly. Store in cool, dry place.

Specifications

  • Type: AFO (Ankle-Foot Orthosis) with inflatable airbag
  • Material: Rigid plastic frame, inflatable medical-grade airbag, padded straps
  • Airbag: Hand pump inflation, adjustable pressure
  • Weight: Lightweight design
  • Side: Available for left or right foot (specify when ordering)
  • Shoe Fit: Fits most athletic and walking shoes
  • Sizes: Multiple sizes based on foot length and calf circumference

Sizing Guide

Measure foot length (heel to longest toe) and calf circumference at widest point:
Small: Shoe size 5-7, Calf 10-12"
Medium: Shoe size 7-10, Calf 12-15"
Large: Shoe size 10-13, Calf 15-18"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement airbag pumps available. Contact us for sizing or fit assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: This AFO is a medical orthotic device for drop foot conditions. Use only as prescribed by doctor, podiatrist, physical therapist, or occupational therapist. Not intended for self-diagnosis. Requires professional fitting for optimal results and safety. Do not use for: acute injuries, open wounds, severe circulatory problems, or unhealed fractures. Follow healthcare provider's instructions for wear schedule and activity restrictions. Regular follow-up care essential to monitor condition and brace effectiveness.

Adjustable hinges allow healthcare providers to set specific flexion/extension limits during recovery from elbow fractures, dislocations, or ligament reconstruction. Key Benefits ✓ Controlled ROM Settings: Adjustable hinges limit flexion/extension to prescribed ranges (0°-135°) for safe recovery ✓ Post-Surgical Stabilization: Medical-grade support prevents unwanted movement after elbow surgery ✓ Progressive Rehabilitation: Increase ROM gradually as healing progresses per medical protocol ✓ Bilateral Hinge Design: Dual hinges provide superior joint alignment and rotational control ✓ Comfortable Extended Wear: Breathable, padded design suitable for 24/7 use during early recovery ✓ Secure Fit: Multiple adjustable straps prevent migration during daily activities Perfect For Radial head or olecranon fracture post-op recovery Elbow dislocation immobilization and gradual mobilization UCL reconstruction (Tommy John surgery) recovery Elbow arthroplasty (elbow replacement) rehabilitation Lateral/medial epicondylitis (tennis/golfer's elbow) post-surgical support Controlled elbow ROM during physical therapy sessions How to Use Your healthcare provider will set initial ROM limits on hinges (often locked at specific angle) Position brace with hinges aligned precisely to elbow joint axis Secure upper arm strap snugly, then forearm strap with even compression ROM adjustments should ONLY be made by your doctor/therapist per recovery protocol Wear as prescribed - typically full-time for 4-8 weeks post-op, then activity-specific use Care Instructions Remove foam padding and hand wash separately. Wipe hinges and frame with damp cloth - do not submerge. Air dry completely before reassembly. Inspect hinges weekly for smooth operation. Replace if hinges stick or loosen. Sizing Guide Measure: Upper arm circumference 3" above elbow S: 9-10.5" (23-27cm) M: 10.5-12" (27-30cm) L: 12-13.5" (30-34cm) XL: 13.5-15" (34-38cm) XXL: 15-17" (38-43cm) Size up if significant post-op swelling is present Specifications Type: Medical ROM elbow brace with adjustable hinges ROM Range: 0°-135° adjustable flexion/extension control Material: Medical-grade composite shell, breathable padding, aluminum hinges Straps: 3-4 adjustable compression straps Support Level: Maximum (post-surgical medical grade) Weight: Lightweight design (typically 8-12 oz) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with product registration). Contact us for sizing or technical questions. Not for self-treatment. Always follow your surgeon's recovery protocol.
products.descriptionHtml:
ROM Elbow Brace - Post-Surgery Adjustable Stabilizer Splint

Professional ROM (Range of Motion) elbow brace designed for post-surgical stabilization and controlled elbow rehabilitation. Adjustable hinges allow healthcare providers to set specific flexion/extension limits during recovery from elbow fractures, dislocations, or ligament reconstruction.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Controlled ROM Settings: Adjustable hinges limit flexion/extension to prescribed ranges (0°-135°) for safe recovery
  • ✓ Post-Surgical Stabilization: Medical-grade support prevents unwanted movement after elbow surgery
  • ✓ Progressive Rehabilitation: Increase ROM gradually as healing progresses per medical protocol
  • ✓ Bilateral Hinge Design: Dual hinges provide superior joint alignment and rotational control
  • ✓ Comfortable Extended Wear: Breathable, padded design suitable for 24/7 use during early recovery
  • ✓ Secure Fit: Multiple adjustable straps prevent migration during daily activities

Perfect For

  • Radial head or olecranon fracture post-op recovery
  • Elbow dislocation immobilization and gradual mobilization
  • UCL reconstruction (Tommy John surgery) recovery
  • Elbow arthroplasty (elbow replacement) rehabilitation
  • Lateral/medial epicondylitis (tennis/golfer's elbow) post-surgical support
  • Controlled elbow ROM during physical therapy sessions

How to Use

  1. Your healthcare provider will set initial ROM limits on hinges (often locked at specific angle)
  2. Position brace with hinges aligned precisely to elbow joint axis
  3. Secure upper arm strap snugly, then forearm strap with even compression
  4. ROM adjustments should ONLY be made by your doctor/therapist per recovery protocol
  5. Wear as prescribed - typically full-time for 4-8 weeks post-op, then activity-specific use

Care Instructions

Remove foam padding and hand wash separately. Wipe hinges and frame with damp cloth - do not submerge. Air dry completely before reassembly. Inspect hinges weekly for smooth operation. Replace if hinges stick or loosen.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Upper arm circumference 3" above elbow
  • S: 9-10.5" (23-27cm)
  • M: 10.5-12" (27-30cm)
  • L: 12-13.5" (30-34cm)
  • XL: 13.5-15" (34-38cm)
  • XXL: 15-17" (38-43cm)
  • Size up if significant post-op swelling is present

Specifications

  • Type: Medical ROM elbow brace with adjustable hinges
  • ROM Range: 0°-135° adjustable flexion/extension control
  • Material: Medical-grade composite shell, breathable padding, aluminum hinges
  • Straps: 3-4 adjustable compression straps
  • Support Level: Maximum (post-surgical medical grade)
  • Weight: Lightweight design (typically 8-12 oz)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with product registration). Contact us for sizing or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This ROM elbow brace is a medical device for post-operative use under professional supervision. Do not adjust ROM settings without healthcare provider guidance. Not for self-treatment. Always follow your surgeon's recovery protocol.

Innovative adjustable neck support combining cervical collar support with forward head posture correction. 360-degree rotation design provides decompressed support while correcting forward neck posture for daily life comfort and spinal alignment.

  • ✓ Dual Function: Neck support AND posture correction in one device

How to Use

  1. Adjust collar height to comfortable level
  2. Place collar around neck with chin resting on front support
  3. Fasten back closure snugly but not too tight

Wipe with damp cloth and mild soap. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash. Check adjustment mechanisms regularly. Store flat when not in use.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides support and posture correction but not rigid immobilization. For serious neck injuries, fractures, or post-surgical needs, use medically-prescribed rigid collar. If pain increases, numbness, tingling, or dizziness occurs, remove immediately and consult healthcare provider. Not for 24/7 continuous wear - take breaks every 2 hours.

products.descriptionHtml:
VELPEAU Neck Traction Device - Spine Pressure and Pain Relief

Professional VELPEAU neck traction device designed for cervical spine decompression and pain management. Adjustable traction force relieves pressure on compressed discs and pinched nerves, providing therapeutic relief for chronic neck pain, herniated discs, and cervical conditions.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ VELPEAU Quality: Trusted orthopedic brand known for medical-grade support products
  • ✓ Spine Decompression: Gentle traction separates cervical vertebrae to relieve disc pressure
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces herniated disc pain, pinched nerves, and muscle tension
  • ✓ Adjustable Force: Control traction intensity to match comfort level and therapeutic needs
  • ✓ Professional Design: Clinic-quality traction therapy at home
  • ✓ Easy Operation: Simple inflation system for controlled, safe traction

Perfect For

  • Cervical disc herniation or bulging
  • Pinched nerve (cervical radiculopathy)
  • Chronic neck pain and stiffness
  • Cervical arthritis and degenerative disc disease
  • Forward head posture with pain
  • Spinal stenosis in neck region
  • Headaches from neck tension
  • Post-whiplash recovery

How to Use

  1. Place deflated collar around neck
  2. Secure velcro closure comfortably
  3. Sit upright in supportive chair or recline at 30-45°
  4. Slowly pump hand bulb to inflate
  5. Stop when gentle stretching sensation felt (do not over-inflate)
  6. Maintain traction for 15-30 minutes per session
  7. Deflate slowly using release valve when finished
  8. Use 2-3 times daily for chronic conditions

Care Instructions

Wipe vinyl surfaces with damp cloth. Remove fabric liner (if detachable) and hand wash. Air dry completely. Deflate fully when storing. Inspect air bladder and tube monthly for leaks. Replace if traction force weakens or leaks develop.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable to fit neck circumferences 11-18" (28-46cm)
  • Height Range: Inflates from 1.5" to 4" height (3-10cm traction)
  • Suitable for adults - not recommended for children under 16

Specifications

  • Brand: VELPEAU - Professional orthopedic equipment manufacturer
  • Type: Inflatable cervical traction device
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC air bladder, soft fabric lining
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump with pressure control and release valve
  • Traction Range: 3-10cm adjustable vertical separation
  • Safety: Pressure relief valve prevents over-inflation
  • Features: Adjustable, portable, no electricity needed

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. VELPEAU customer support available. Contact us for usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for home therapy. Contraindications: acute neck injury, spinal instability, rheumatoid arthritis, severe osteoporosis, spinal tumors, infection. Do not use without consulting healthcare provider, especially if you have cervical spine conditions. Discontinue if pain increases. Not for diagnosis or treatment without professional medical guidance.

products.descriptionHtml:
Neck Stretcher - Inflatable Air Cervical Traction (1 Tube)

Simple yet effective inflatable neck stretcher providing gentle cervical traction for at-home neck pain relief. Single-tube design offers easy inflation control for customized vertebral decompression, helping relieve herniated discs, pinched nerves, and chronic neck tension.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Decompression: Inflatable design gently separates cervical vertebrae to relieve disc and nerve pressure
  • ✓ Simple 1-Tube System: Easy-to-use single inflation tube makes operation straightforward for home use
  • ✓ Adjustable Traction: Control inflation level for personalized stretching intensity (2-8cm separation)
  • ✓ Neck Pain Relief: Reduces pain from herniated discs, pinched nerves, arthritis, and muscle tension
  • ✓ Portable & Affordable: Lightweight, compact design allows cervical therapy anywhere without expensive equipment
  • ✓ Posture Restoration: Helps restore natural cervical curve lost from forward head posture

Perfect For

  • Cervical disc herniation or bulging discs
  • Pinched nerve (cervical radiculopathy) with arm symptoms
  • Chronic neck pain and stiffness
  • Forward head posture (tech neck) correction
  • Cervical arthritis and degenerative disc disease
  • Muscle tension headaches
  • Post-whiplash recovery
  • Budget-friendly alternative to professional traction equipment

How to Use

  1. Place deflated neck stretcher around neck with back support at base of skull
  2. Secure velcro closure comfortably (will tighten as inflated)
  3. Sit upright in supportive chair or recline at 30-45° angle (lying flat reduces effectiveness)
  4. Slowly pump hand bulb to inflate stretcher - stop when gentle pulling sensation felt
  5. Do NOT over-inflate - should feel stretch without pain
  6. Maintain traction for 10-30 minutes per session
  7. Deflate slowly using release valve when finished
  8. Use 2-3 times daily for chronic pain, or as needed
  9. Start with shorter durations (10 min) and lower inflation, increase gradually over 1-2 weeks

Care Instructions

Wipe vinyl surfaces with damp cloth and mild soap. Remove velour liner (if detachable) and hand wash separately. Air dry completely before storage. Deflate fully when not in use. Inspect air bladder and tube for leaks monthly. Check valve function regularly. Do not expose to extreme heat. Replace if air leaks develop.

Sizing Guide

  • One Size Fits Most: Adjustable to fit neck circumferences 11-18" (28-46cm)
  • Height Range: Inflates from 1.5" to 4" height (2-8cm traction)
  • Suitable for adults - not recommended for children under 16

Specifications

  • Type: Inflatable air cervical traction device (single tube)
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC air bladder, soft fabric lining
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump with 1 tube and quick-release valve
  • Traction Range: 2-8cm adjustable vertical separation
  • Weight: Lightweight (6-8 oz) for portability
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop velcro (adjustable)
  • Features: Simple operation, portable, affordable, no electricity needed

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on inflation mechanism. Replacement pumps available. Contact us for usage questions or troubleshooting.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for home therapy and pain management. Contraindications: acute neck injury, spinal instability, rheumatoid arthritis, severe osteoporosis, spinal tumors, infection, vascular problems. Do not use if you have severe pain, spinal cord compression symptoms, or recent neck surgery without medical clearance. Consult healthcare provider before use, especially if you have cervical spine conditions. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms develop. Not for diagnosis or treatment without professional medical guidance.

products.descriptionHtml:
Neck Suspension Stretching Device - Cervical Traction Belt for Home Use

Innovative neck suspension system providing cervical traction through horizontal bar hanging method. Household cervical stretching device uses gravity-assisted traction to decompress neck vertebrae, relieve pain, and improve posture from home door frame or bar.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Gravity Traction: Natural weight creates effective cervical decompression
  • ✓ Suspension Method: Hangs from door frame or horizontal bar
  • ✓ Household Use: Easy home setup, no professional equipment needed
  • ✓ Adjustable: Control traction intensity by body position
  • ✓ Cervical Relief: Reduces pressure on compressed neck discs
  • ✓ Portable: Easy to install and remove

Perfect For

  • Cervical spine compression
  • Neck disc herniation
  • Chronic neck pain
  • Text neck and forward head posture
  • Cervical radiculopathy (pinched nerve)
  • Neck muscle tension
  • Spinal decompression therapy at home
  • Physical therapy supplement

How to Use

  1. Installation: Secure strap over sturdy door frame or horizontal bar (must support body weight)
  2. Adjust strap length for desired starting height
  3. Place head harness/sling under chin and back of head
  4. Fasten securely but comfortably
  5. Stand on stool or bench initially
  6. Gradually allow weight to transfer to neck harness
  7. Keep feet lightly touching floor for safety
  8. Start with 5 minutes, increase to 10-15 minutes
  9. Use 1-2 times daily
  10. Never fully hang - always maintain floor contact

Safety Guidelines

  • Always test installation before use
  • Keep feet touching ground for control
  • Start with partial weight bearing
  • Never fall asleep during traction
  • Stop immediately if dizziness, pain increase, or numbness occurs
  • Have someone nearby during first uses

Care Instructions

Check all straps and connections before each use. Hand wash head sling with mild soap. Air dry. Inspect for wear regularly. Replace if fraying or weakening detected. Store hanging or flat (not compressed).

Specifications

  • Type: Cervical suspension traction system
  • Mounting: Over-door or horizontal bar
  • Weight Capacity: Up to 300 lbs
  • Material: Heavy-duty nylon webbing, padded head sling
  • Adjustment: Length-adjustable straps
  • Includes: Suspension strap, head sling, door anchor, instructions
  • Colors: Black, grey

Warranty & Support
