products.descriptionHtml:
NEENCA OA Unloader Knee Brace - Osteoarthritis Pain Relief

Specialized NEENCA OA unloader knee brace designed specifically for medial or lateral compartment osteoarthritis. Advanced 3-point pressure system shifts body weight away from arthritic knee compartment, providing significant pain relief and improved mobility for arthritis sufferers.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Unloader Technology: 3-point pressure system mechanically shifts load from damaged knee compartment to healthy side
  • ✓ Arthritis Pain Relief: Reduces pain by 30-50% in medial/lateral compartment osteoarthritis (clinical studies)
  • ✓ Adjustable Unloading: Customize degree of offloading to match arthritis severity and activity level
  • ✓ Delay Surgery: May postpone or eliminate need for knee replacement surgery in early-moderate OA
  • ✓ Improved Mobility: Enables walking, stairs, and daily activities with significantly less pain
  • ✓ Lightweight Design: Advanced materials provide medical-grade support without bulky, heavy construction

Perfect For

  • Medial compartment osteoarthritis (most common - inner knee)
  • Lateral compartment osteoarthritis (outer knee)
  • Unicompartmental knee arthritis (one-sided cartilage loss)
  • Bone-on-bone knee pain (advanced cartilage degeneration)
  • Candidates considering knee replacement surgery
  • Post-partial knee replacement support
  • Varus or valgus knee alignment issues with arthritis
  • Active individuals with OA wanting to maintain lifestyle

How to Use

  1. Determine affected compartment: Medial (inner knee pain) or Lateral (outer knee pain)
  2. Position brace with hinges at knee joint line, straps at thigh and calf
  3. Adjust unloader mechanism to apply gentle pressure shifting weight away from painful side
  4. Secure all straps - proper fit critical for unloading effectiveness
  5. Start with minimal unloading angle, gradually increase over 1-2 weeks as tolerated
  6. Wear during weight-bearing activities (walking, standing, stairs)
  7. May remove during rest periods - consult healthcare provider for wear schedule

Care Instructions

Hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Air dry flat. Do not expose hinges or adjustment mechanisms to water - wipe with damp cloth instead. Inspect adjustment screws monthly - tighten if loose. Clean weekly with regular use. Replace when padding compresses or straps lose elasticity.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above kneecap center
  • S: 16-18" (41-46cm) Thigh
  • M: 18-20" (46-51cm) Thigh
  • L: 20-22" (51-56cm) Thigh
  • XL: 22-24" (56-61cm) Thigh
  • XXL: 24-26" (61-66cm) Thigh
  • Professional fitting recommended for optimal unloading effect

Specifications

  • Brand: NEENCA - Orthopedic specialist brand
  • Type: OA unloader knee brace with 3-point pressure system
  • Material: Lightweight composite frame, breathable padding, aluminum hinges
  • Unloading: Adjustable varus/valgus correction (typically 2-6° adjustment)
  • Hinges: Polycentric hinges track natural knee motion
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade for arthritis)
  • Weight: Lightweight design (1.5-2 lbs) for all-day wear

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available. Contact us for fitting guidance or adjustment questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This OA unloader brace is designed for osteoarthritis pain management. Requires proper diagnosis and fitting - consult orthopedic specialist or physical therapist before use. Not suitable for bi-compartmental or tri-compartmental arthritis. Does not regenerate cartilage or cure arthritis - provides mechanical pain relief. May not be effective for all users. If pain increases or brace causes new pain, discontinue and consult healthcare provider.

products.descriptionHtml:
Anti-Cellulite Infrared Electric Massager

Advanced 3D roller massager combining infrared heat, mechanical massage, and compression to reduce cellulite appearance and promote body slimming. Professional-grade device for home use targets stubborn fat areas while relaxing muscles and improving skin texture.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 3D Roller Technology: Multi-directional rollers mimic professional lymphatic drainage massage, breaking up fat deposits and cellulite
  • ✓ Infrared Heat: Penetrating warmth increases circulation, enhances fat metabolism, and improves treatment effectiveness
  • ✓ Cellulite Reduction: Regular use visibly reduces orange-peel skin texture on thighs, buttocks, arms, and abdomen
  • ✓ Muscle Relaxation: Deep tissue massage relieves soreness and tension while treating cellulite
  • ✓ Detoxification: Stimulates lymphatic system to remove toxins and reduce water retention

Perfect For

  • Cellulite reduction on thighs, buttocks, arms
  • Body contouring and slimming
  • Post-pregnancy body recovery
  • Muscle soreness and tension relief
  • Improving skin firmness and texture
  • Reducing appearance of stretch marks
  • Complementing diet and exercise programs

How to Use

  1. Apply massage oil or anti-cellulite cream to target area
  2. Turn on device and select desired intensity level
  3. Glide massager slowly over treatment area in circular motions
  4. Use upward strokes toward heart (following lymphatic flow)
  5. Treat each area for 10-15 minutes
  6. Use 3-5 times per week for best results
  7. Clean device with damp cloth after each use

Treatment Areas

  • Thighs: Inner and outer thigh cellulite
  • Buttocks: Firm and lift
  • Abdomen: Reduce belly fat appearance
  • Arms: Tone upper arms
  • Waist: Body contouring
  • Back: Muscle relaxation

Care Instructions

Wipe roller heads and body with soft cloth after each use. Do not immerse in water. Store in protective case. Charge regularly to maintain battery life.

Specifications

  • Technology: 3D mechanical rollers + infrared heat
  • Intensity Levels: Multiple adjustable speeds
  • Power: Rechargeable battery or AC adapter
  • Heat Function: Infrared warming
  • Roller Heads: Replaceable massage rollers
  • Weight: Handheld, ergonomic design

Expected Results

Weeks 1-2: Improved skin texture, reduced water retention
Weeks 3-4: Visible cellulite reduction
Weeks 5-8: Firmer skin, smoother contours
Ongoing: Maintenance with 2-3 sessions weekly

Results vary by individual. Most effective when combined with healthy diet and regular exercise.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement roller heads available. Contact us for questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This device is for cosmetic body contouring and cellulite reduction. Not a weight loss solution or medical treatment. Results vary and require consistent use combined with healthy lifestyle. Do not use if pregnant, have skin conditions, varicose veins, or circulatory problems. Not for use on face or neck. Consult doctor if you have health concerns.

products.descriptionHtml:
Functional Hinged Knee Brace - ROM Orthopedic Support

Medical-grade functional knee brace designed for ACL, MCL, PCL tears and meniscus injuries. Hinged ROM (Range of Motion) orthopedic orthosis provides maximum stability for ligament protection during recovery and return to sport. Professional support for men and women post-injury and post-surgery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Multi-Ligament Protection: Supports ACL, MCL, PCL, and LCL simultaneously - comprehensive knee stabilization
  • ✓ Meniscus Support: Reduces rotation and compression forces that aggravate torn meniscus
  • ✓ ROM Control: Adjustable hinges allow controlled range of motion - lock at specific angles or full movement
  • ✓ Functional Design: Allows return to sports and daily activities with confidence and protection
  • ✓ Orthopedic Grade: Hospital-quality orthosis prescribed by orthopedic surgeons and physical therapists

Perfect For

  • ACL tears (partial or complete)
  • MCL/LCL sprains grades 2-3
  • PCL injuries
  • Meniscus tears (medial or lateral)
  • Post-surgical knee reconstruction
  • Multi-ligament injuries
  • Return to sport after injury
  • Sports injury prevention

How to Use

  1. Position brace with hinges aligned to knee joint axis
  2. Center patella (kneecap) opening over kneecap
  3. Secure upper thigh strap first (snug)
  4. Fasten lower calf strap
  5. Adjust middle straps around knee
  6. Set ROM hinges as prescribed (lock or adjustable)
  7. Ensure 2-finger fit under straps (not too tight)
  8. Wear over thin clothing or directly on skin
  9. Use during activities or as directed by doctor

ROM (Range of Motion) Settings

Post-Surgery Early: Locked at 0° extension (straight leg)
Weeks 2-4: Limited ROM 0-60° or 0-90°
Weeks 4-8: Progressive ROM increase
Return to Sport: Full ROM with maximum support
Always follow surgeon/therapist ROM protocol

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and warm water. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash. Check hinges and screws monthly for tightness. Replace padding if worn.

Specifications

  • Type: Functional hinged knee brace (ROM orthosis)
  • Support Level: Maximum (Level 3 - medical grade)
  • Hinges: Bilateral polycentric hinges with ROM control
  • Ligaments Supported: ACL, MCL, PCL, LCL
  • Material: Aircraft aluminum frame, neoprene padding
  • Straps: 4-6 adjustable compression straps
  • Gender: Unisex (men and women)
  • Sizes: S, M, L, XL based on thigh circumference

Sizing Guide

Measure thigh circumference 6 inches above kneecap:
Small: 14-17"
Medium: 17-20"
Large: 20-23"
X-Large: 23-26"

Recovery Protocol

Phase 1 (Weeks 0-2): Locked brace, limited weight bearing
Phase 2 (Weeks 2-6): Progressive ROM, protected weight bearing
Phase 3 (Weeks 6-12): Functional activities with brace
Phase 4 (3-6 months): Return to sport with brace
Timeline varies by injury severity and surgery type

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on frame and hinges. Contact us for sizing or fit assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: This is a medical orthopedic device. Use only as prescribed by orthopedic surgeon, sports medicine doctor, or physical therapist. Not for self-diagnosis or self-treatment. Proper fitting by medical professional recommended. For ligament tears and meniscus injuries, this brace is part of comprehensive treatment - not standalone solution. Follow all medical guidance for rehabilitation protocol, ROM restrictions, and return to activity timeline. Improper use can cause further injury. If pain worsens or instability increases, seek immediate medical attention.

products.descriptionHtml:
Cervical Neck Traction Hanging Device

Professional hanging-style cervical traction system with soft stretching belt. Medical orthosis designed for serious neck rehabilitation using gravity-assisted decompression. Adjustable traction frame provides clinical-grade neck therapy at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Gravity-Assisted Traction: Hanging mechanism uses body positioning and gravity for consistent, controlled decompression
  • ✓ Clinical-Grade Relief: Professional orthosis-level treatment for severe neck conditions requiring serious intervention
  • ✓ Soft Stretching Belt: Padded contact points prevent discomfort while maintaining therapeutic traction force
  • ✓ Adjustable Frame: Customizable height and angle settings accommodate different body types and treatment needs
  • ✓ Medical Orthosis: Hospital-quality device designed for rehabilitation under medical guidance

Perfect For

  • Severe chronic neck pain
  • Post-surgical neck rehabilitation (with doctor approval)
  • Herniated cervical discs requiring aggressive treatment
  • Nerve compression causing arm numbness/weakness
  • Failed conservative treatment needing advanced therapy
  • Physical therapy-prescribed home traction
  • Degenerative disc disease management

How to Use

  1. Setup: Secure traction frame to door frame or overhead support (follow included instructions)
  2. Verify all connections are tight and secure
  3. Adjust strap length to your height
  4. Sit in chair positioned under traction point
  5. Place soft belt around head/neck in proper position
  6. Slowly lean back to engage traction
  7. Allow legs to partially support weight (not full hanging)
  8. Hold position for prescribed duration (typically 10-20 minutes)
  9. Slowly release traction by sitting upright
  10. Remove belt gently

Safety Protocol

CRITICAL: This is a medical device. Use only under guidance from doctor, chiropractor, or physical therapist. Do not self-prescribe traction therapy.

Never: Use alone when no one else is home. Fall asleep during traction. Apply more weight than prescribed.

Stop immediately if: Pain increases, numbness worsens, dizziness occurs, or breathing difficulty develops.

Care Instructions

Inspect frame and straps before each use for wear or damage. Clean soft belt with damp cloth. Check all connection points monthly. Replace straps if fraying occurs.

Specifications

  • Type: Hanging cervical traction orthosis
  • Traction Method: Gravity-assisted with adjustable resistance
  • Frame: Adjustable height metal frame
  • Belt: Soft padded cervical support strap
  • Adjustability: Multiple height and angle settings
  • Weight Capacity: Supports up to 250 lbs
  • Installation: Door-mounted or ceiling/beam mount (hardware included)

Professional Use Recommendations

This device is most effective when used as part of comprehensive treatment plan including:

  • Physical therapy exercises
  • Posture correction training
  • Ergonomic workplace modifications
  • Regular medical monitoring

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on frame and materials. Contact us for technical support or replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This is a medical orthosis device for cervical traction therapy. Use ONLY under direct supervision of healthcare professional. Not for self-directed treatment. Requires medical prescription or professional recommendation. Do not use if you have: acute injuries, spinal instability, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis, spinal infections, cancer, cardiovascular disease, or recent surgery. Pregnant women should not use without obstetrician approval. Improper use can cause serious injury. Follow all medical guidance exactly.

products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Air Neck Stretcher & Traction Device

Inflatable cervical traction collar for home use. Gently stretches and decompresses neck vertebrae to relieve pain, improve alignment, and reduce pressure on nerves and discs. Adjustable air pump allows customized traction strength.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Decompression: Air inflation creates gentle vertical traction, separating compressed vertebrae and relieving nerve pressure
  • ✓ Adjustable Traction: Hand pump allows precise control - from gentle stretch to deeper therapeutic traction
  • ✓ Spine Alignment: Helps correct forward head posture and restore natural cervical curve
  • ✓ Home Convenience: Professional-quality traction therapy without expensive clinic visits
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces neck pain, headaches, and upper back tension from herniated discs and pinched nerves

Perfect For

  • Cervical herniated discs
  • Pinched nerves in neck (cervical radiculopathy)
  • Chronic neck pain and stiffness
  • Forward head posture ("text neck")
  • Cervical spondylosis (arthritis)
  • Tension headaches and migraines
  • Post-whiplash recovery
  • Computer-related neck strain

How to Use

  1. Place collar around neck with chin resting in front support
  2. Secure Velcro straps comfortably (not too tight)
  3. Sit in upright chair or lie down as preferred
  4. Use hand pump to slowly inflate collar
  5. Inflate until you feel gentle stretching (not pain)
  6. Start with 10-15 minutes per session
  7. Relax and breathe normally during traction
  8. Deflate slowly after session by opening air valve
  9. Use 1-3 times daily or as recommended by healthcare provider

Safety Guidelines

Important: Do NOT overinflate. Stop if you experience increased pain, dizziness, or numbness. Never use while driving or operating machinery.

Care Instructions

Wipe collar with damp cloth. Allow to air dry. Store deflated in cool, dry place. Check pump and valve regularly for leaks.

Specifications

  • Type: Inflatable cervical traction collar
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC, soft fabric lining
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump (included)
  • Adjustability: Variable traction levels
  • Size: Adjustable, fits most neck sizes
  • Weight: Lightweight, portable
  • Session Time: 10-20 minutes recommended

Treatment Protocol

Week 1: 10 minutes, 1x daily (gentle traction)
Week 2: 15 minutes, 1-2x daily
Week 3+: 15-20 minutes, 2-3x daily or as needed

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement pump available if needed. Contact support with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for pain relief and alignment support. Not intended to replace professional medical treatment. Consult doctor, chiropractor, or physical therapist before use, especially if you have: neck injuries, spinal instability, osteoporosis, rheumatoid arthritis, or recent surgery. Do not use if pregnant without medical approval. Discontinue immediately if pain worsens.

Wipe frame and hinges with damp cloth - do not submerge mechanical components. Air dry padding completely. Check adjustment mechanisms monthly for proper function. Inspect straps for wear. Professional re-adjustment may be needed as arthritis progresses or weight changes. Sizing Guide Measure: Thigh circumference 5-6" above kneecap + calf circumference at widest point S: Thigh 15-17", Calf 12-14" M: Thigh 17-19", Calf 14-16" L: Thigh 19-21", Calf 16-18" XL: Thigh 21-23", Calf 18-20" XXL: Thigh 23-25", Calf 20-22" Professional measurement and fitting strongly recommended for OA braces Specifications Brand: NEENCA - Trusted orthopedic brand Type: OA unloader brace with biomechanical offloading system Material: Rigid composite frame, medical-grade padding, polycentric hinges Correction Range: Adjustable 2-8° varus/valgus correction Hinges: Multi-axis polycentric hinges (natural knee tracking) Weight: 1.5-2.2 lbs (lightweight for orthopedic brace) Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade arthritis support) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Professional fitting and adjustment guidance available. Contact us for sizing or technical questions. Medical Disclaimer: This OA unloader brace is for osteoarthritis pain management under medical guidance. Requires proper diagnosis of unicompartmental OA - not effective for pan-articular (whole knee) arthritis. Professional fitting recommended for optimal results. products.descriptionHtml:
OA Unloader Brace - NEENCA Arthritis Pain Support

Advanced NEENCA OA (osteoarthritis) unloader brace utilizing biomechanical offloading technology to reduce knee arthritis pain. Clinically proven 3-point leverage system redistributes weight away from damaged cartilage, allowing arthritis sufferers to walk, exercise, and maintain active lifestyle with reduced pain.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Biomechanical Offloading: Shifts load from worn cartilage to healthier knee area, reducing bone-on-bone contact
  • ✓ Clinically Proven: Studies show 35-50% pain reduction in unicompartmental knee OA users
  • ✓ Adjustable Correction: Fine-tune varus/valgus angle to match your specific arthritis severity
  • ✓ Surgery Alternative: Conservative treatment option that may delay or prevent total knee replacement
  • ✓ Activity Enabler: Return to walking, golf, gardening, travel activities limited by arthritis pain
  • ✓ Comfortable Design: Ergonomic padding and breathable materials suitable for 8-12 hour wear

Perfect For

  • Unicompartmental knee osteoarthritis (medial or lateral)
  • Mild to moderate cartilage degeneration (Kellgren-Lawrence grade 2-3)
  • Candidates delaying knee replacement surgery
  • Post-high tibial osteotomy (HTO) support
  • Varus or valgus malalignment with arthritis pain
  • Active seniors wanting to maintain mobility
  • Athletes with early-stage OA
  • Workers with arthritis needing pain relief during shifts

How to Use

  1. Healthcare provider should assess knee alignment and determine appropriate unloading direction
  2. Position brace with frame aligned to leg, hinges at knee joint
  3. Adjust unloader pads (medial or lateral side) to create gentle corrective force
  4. Secure thigh and calf straps firmly - snug fit essential for offloading effectiveness
  5. Stand and walk to feel pressure shift - should reduce pain in affected compartment
  6. Fine-tune adjustment over first week - gradual increase in correction angle recommended
  7. Wear during weight-bearing activities, may remove during rest
  8. Expect 1-2 week adaptation period before maximum benefit achieved

Care Instructions

Remove padding inserts and hand wash separately with mild soap. Wipe frame and hinges with damp cloth - do not submerge mechanical components. Air dry padding completely. Check adjustment mechanisms monthly for proper function. Inspect straps for wear. Professional re-adjustment may be needed as arthritis progresses or weight changes.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 5-6" above kneecap + calf circumference at widest point
  • S: Thigh 15-17", Calf 12-14"
  • M: Thigh 17-19", Calf 14-16"
  • L: Thigh 19-21", Calf 16-18"
  • XL: Thigh 21-23", Calf 18-20"
  • XXL: Thigh 23-25", Calf 20-22"
  • Professional measurement and fitting strongly recommended for OA braces

Specifications

  • Brand: NEENCA - Trusted orthopedic brand
  • Type: OA unloader brace with biomechanical offloading system
  • Material: Rigid composite frame, medical-grade padding, polycentric hinges
  • Correction Range: Adjustable 2-8° varus/valgus correction
  • Hinges: Multi-axis polycentric hinges (natural knee tracking)
  • Weight: 1.5-2.2 lbs (lightweight for orthopedic brace)
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade arthritis support)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Professional fitting and adjustment guidance available. Contact us for sizing or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This OA unloader brace is for osteoarthritis pain management under medical guidance. Requires proper diagnosis of unicompartmental OA - not effective for pan-articular (whole knee) arthritis. Professional fitting recommended for optimal results. Does not cure arthritis or regenerate cartilage. Effectiveness varies by individual, arthritis severity, and proper adjustment. Consult orthopedic specialist before use. If pain increases, skin irritation occurs, or new symptoms develop, discontinue and seek medical attention.

products.descriptionHtml:
Medical Neck Traction Device - Heating Inflatable Cervical Collar

Medical-grade inflatable neck traction device with integrated heat therapy for cervical spine decompression and pain relief. Provides gentle vertebral traction combined with soothing heat to treat herniated discs, pinched nerves, arthritis, and chronic neck pain at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Cervical Traction: Inflates to gently separate cervical vertebrae, relieving disc and nerve pressure
  • ✓ Integrated Heating: Built-in heating element (95-113°F) relaxes muscles before/during traction for enhanced effectiveness
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Design: Professional cervical traction comparable to physical therapy clinic equipment
  • ✓ Adjustable Traction: Control inflation level for personalized decompression (3-8cm vertebral separation)
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces herniated disc pain, pinched nerves, arthritis, and muscle tension
  • ✓ Posture Restoration: Helps restore natural cervical curve (lordosis) lost from forward head posture

Perfect For

  • Cervical disc herniation or bulging discs
  • Pinched nerve (cervical radiculopathy) with arm pain/numbness
  • Cervical arthritis and degenerative disc disease
  • Forward head posture (tech neck) with pain
  • Chronic neck muscle tension and spasms
  • Post-whiplash injury recovery
  • Cervical headaches and occipital neuralgia
  • Spinal stenosis in neck region

How to Use

  1. Place deflated collar around neck with back support at base of skull
  2. Secure velcro closure comfortably (will tighten when inflated)
  3. Activate heating function and allow 3-5 minutes warm-up (optional but recommended)
  4. Sit upright in chair or recline at 30-45° angle
  5. Slowly inflate using hand pump until gentle stretching sensation felt (do not over-inflate)
  6. Maintain traction for 15-30 minutes per session
  7. Deflate slowly using release valve when finished
  8. Use 2-3 times daily for chronic conditions, or as needed for acute pain

Care Instructions

Wipe vinyl surfaces with damp cloth and mild soap. Remove fabric cover (if detachable) and hand wash separately. Air dry completely before storage. Deflate fully when storing. Inspect air bladder monthly for leaks. Clean heating element contacts with dry cloth. Do not submerge electrical components.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable to fit neck circumferences 12-18" (30-46cm)
  • Height Adjustment: Inflates from 2" to 5" height (3-8cm traction)
  • Suitable for adults - not recommended for children under 16

Specifications

  • Type: Medical inflatable cervical traction device with heating
  • Material: Medical-grade PVC air bladder, soft fabric lining, heating pad
  • Inflation: Manual hand pump with pressure gauge and quick-release valve
  • Traction Range: 3-8cm adjustable vertical separation
  • Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C) adjustable
  • Power: USB powered heating (rechargeable battery or adapter)
  • Timer: 15/30 minute auto shut-off for heat function

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on inflation mechanism and heating element. Replacement pumps available. Contact us for usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This cervical traction device is for home therapy. Contraindications: acute neck injury, spinal instability, rheumatoid arthritis with cervical involvement, osteoporosis, spinal tumors, infection, vascular insufficiency. Do not use if you have: severe pain, myelopathy (spinal cord compression), or recent neck surgery without clearance. Consult healthcare provider before use. Discontinue if symptoms worsen. Not for diagnosis or treatment without professional medical guidance.

products.title: Hinged Knee Support | Locking Stabilizers for ACL/PCL
products.description: Hinged Knee Support with Locking Stabilizers Professional hinged knee support featuring locking side stabilizers for maximum ACL/PCL protection. Advanced brace combines stability with comfort for ligament injuries, meniscus tears, and arthritis management. Adjustable locking mechanism adapts support level to activity and recovery phase. Key Benefits ✓ Locking Mechanism: Stabilizers can be locked in position for post-surgery immobilization or unlocked for dynamic support during sports ✓ ACL/PCL Specific: Design tested and approved for anterior and posterior cruciate ligament protection during rehabilitation ✓ Versatile Support Levels: One brace adapts from maximum (post-surgery) to moderate (return to sport) as recovery progresses ✓ Prevents Re-Injury: Locking feature prevents dangerous movements that could re-tear healing ligaments ✓ Sports-Ready: When unlocked, allows athletic performance while maintaining protective support Perfect For ACL reconstruction post-surgery PCL injury recovery Multi-ligament repairs Return to sport after knee injury Preventing ACL re-tear (90% reduction risk) High-demand athletes (basketball, soccer, football) Meniscus repair protection Chronic instability from old injuries How to Use Unlock stabilizers by turning release knobs Position brace with hinges at knee joint line Secure all straps from proximal to distal For post-surgery: Lock stabilizers at prescribed angle For sports: Leave unlocked but ensure snug fit Check lock engagement before weight-bearing Wear over compression sleeve for comfort Adjust lock settings as recovery progresses Locking Positions Locked Full Extension: Post-surgery weeks 0-2 Locked at 30°: Limited ROM phase Locked at 60-90°: Progressive strengthening Unlocked: Return to activity phase Sports Mode: Unlocked with maximum strap tension Always follow surgeon/PT locking protocol Care Instructions Hand wash with antibacterial soap after each use (sweat degrades neoprene). Dry thoroughly. Lubricate locking mechanisms monthly. Check for wear on high-stress points. Specifications Type: Hinged knee support with locking stabilizers Support Level: Maximum to moderate (adjustable) Locking System: Bilateral mechanical locks Hinges: Polycentric with ROM control Material: Moisture-wicking neoprene Frame: Aircraft-grade aluminum Straps: 6 adjustable with silicone grips Weight: Lightweight despite maximum support Sizing Guide Critical for ACL/PCL protection - measure carefully: Small: 14-17" thigh, 11-13" calf Medium: 17-20" thigh, 13-15" calf Large: 20-23" thigh, 15-17" calf X-Large: 23-26" thigh, 17-19" calf ACL Recovery Timeline Weeks 0-2: Locked, non-weight-bearing Weeks 2-6: Locked ROM, progressive weight-bearing Weeks 6-12: Unlocked, protected activities Months 3-6: Unlocked, gradual return to sport Months 6-12: Competition use recommended Year 1+: Consider continued use for high-risk sports Sports Use Protocol Always wear for jumping/cutting sports (basketball, soccer) Not necessary for cycling or swimming Wear during practice and games Some athletes wear 2+ years post-surgery Reduces ACL re-tear risk significantly Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Locking mechanism lifetime guarantee. Contact us for support. Medical Disclaimer: Medical orthopedic device for ligament protection. Use as prescribed by orthopedic surgeon or sports medicine physician. Not substitute for surgery when indicated - supports post-surgical recovery. For ACL/PCL tears: timing of brace use, locking protocol, and return to sport must be directed by medical team. Improper locking settings or premature return to activity causes re-injury. This brace reduces but does not eliminate re-injury risk. Continue rehabilitation exercises even when wearing brace. If knee gives out, swells significantly, or locks mechanically, seek immediate orthopedic evaluation. Proper fit critical - professional fitting strongly recommended for post-surgical use.
products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Support with Locking Stabilizers

Professional hinged knee support featuring locking side stabilizers for maximum ACL/PCL protection. Advanced brace combines stability with comfort for ligament injuries, meniscus tears, and arthritis management. Adjustable locking mechanism adapts support level to activity and recovery phase.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Locking Mechanism: Stabilizers can be locked in position for post-surgery immobilization or unlocked for dynamic support during sports
  • ✓ ACL/PCL Specific: Design tested and approved for anterior and posterior cruciate ligament protection during rehabilitation
  • ✓ Versatile Support Levels: One brace adapts from maximum (post-surgery) to moderate (return to sport) as recovery progresses
  • ✓ Prevents Re-Injury: Locking feature prevents dangerous movements that could re-tear healing ligaments
  • ✓ Sports-Ready: When unlocked, allows athletic performance while maintaining protective support

Perfect For

  • ACL reconstruction post-surgery
  • PCL injury recovery
  • Multi-ligament repairs
  • Return to sport after knee injury
  • Preventing ACL re-tear (90% reduction risk)
  • High-demand athletes (basketball, soccer, football)
  • Meniscus repair protection
  • Chronic instability from old injuries

How to Use

  1. Unlock stabilizers by turning release knobs
  2. Position brace with hinges at knee joint line
  3. Secure all straps from proximal to distal
  4. For post-surgery: Lock stabilizers at prescribed angle
  5. For sports: Leave unlocked but ensure snug fit
  6. Check lock engagement before weight-bearing
  7. Wear over compression sleeve for comfort
  8. Adjust lock settings as recovery progresses

Locking Positions

Locked Full Extension: Post-surgery weeks 0-2
Locked at 30°: Limited ROM phase
Locked at 60-90°: Progressive strengthening
Unlocked: Return to activity phase
Sports Mode: Unlocked with maximum strap tension
Always follow surgeon/PT locking protocol

Care Instructions

Hand wash with antibacterial soap after each use (sweat degrades neoprene). Dry thoroughly. Lubricate locking mechanisms monthly. Check for wear on high-stress points.

Specifications

  • Type: Hinged knee support with locking stabilizers
  • Support Level: Maximum to moderate (adjustable)
  • Locking System: Bilateral mechanical locks
  • Hinges: Polycentric with ROM control
  • Material: Moisture-wicking neoprene
  • Frame: Aircraft-grade aluminum
  • Straps: 6 adjustable with silicone grips
  • Weight: Lightweight despite maximum support

Sizing Guide

Critical for ACL/PCL protection - measure carefully:
Small: 14-17" thigh, 11-13" calf
Medium: 17-20" thigh, 13-15" calf
Large: 20-23" thigh, 15-17" calf
X-Large: 23-26" thigh, 17-19" calf

ACL Recovery Timeline

Weeks 0-2: Locked, non-weight-bearing
Weeks 2-6: Locked ROM, progressive weight-bearing
Weeks 6-12: Unlocked, protected activities
Months 3-6: Unlocked, gradual return to sport
Months 6-12: Competition use recommended
Year 1+: Consider continued use for high-risk sports

Sports Use Protocol

  • Always wear for jumping/cutting sports (basketball, soccer)
  • Not necessary for cycling or swimming
  • Wear during practice and games
  • Some athletes wear 2+ years post-surgery
  • Reduces ACL re-tear risk significantly

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Locking mechanism lifetime guarantee. Contact us for support.

Medical Disclaimer: Medical orthopedic device for ligament protection. Use as prescribed by orthopedic surgeon or sports medicine physician. Not substitute for surgery when indicated - supports post-surgical recovery. For ACL/PCL tears: timing of brace use, locking protocol, and return to sport must be directed by medical team. Improper locking settings or premature return to activity causes re-injury. This brace reduces but does not eliminate re-injury risk. Continue rehabilitation exercises even when wearing brace. If knee gives out, swells significantly, or locks mechanically, seek immediate orthopedic evaluation. Proper fit critical - professional fitting strongly recommended for post-surgical use.

products.descriptionHtml:
NEENCA Hinged Knee Brace - Professional Support with Side Stabilizers

Premium NEENCA hinged knee brace featuring medical-grade dual side stabilizers for superior knee support and pain relief. Professional design combines adjustable hinges, gel padding, and targeted compression to protect against ACL, MCL, meniscus injuries while maintaining comfort during sports and daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Hinged Stabilizers: Bilateral spring-loaded hinges provide maximum lateral/medial knee stability without restricting natural movement
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Suitable for ACL/MCL/PCL injuries, meniscus tears, arthritis, and post-operative recovery
  • ✓ Gel Pad Cushioning: Patented gel inserts around kneecap provide shock absorption and enhanced comfort
  • ✓ Adjustable Compression: Four independent straps allow customized compression for swelling control and support
  • ✓ Anti-Slip Design: Silicone wave grips prevent brace migration during running, jumping, or pivoting
  • ✓ Breathable Materials: Moisture-wicking fabric keeps knee cool and dry during intense activities

Perfect For

  • ACL, MCL, PCL sprains or tears (conservative treatment or post-surgery)
  • Meniscus injuries and degeneration
  • Moderate to severe knee arthritis
  • Knee instability and ligament laxity
  • Sports activities (basketball, soccer, skiing, running)
  • Post-operative knee surgery stabilization
  • Work-related knee strain prevention
  • Patellar tracking issues with instability

How to Use

  1. Position brace with hinges aligned precisely to knee joint line (medial and lateral sides)
  2. Center open patella cutout over kneecap
  3. Wrap brace around leg and secure straps in sequence: top → upper mid → lower mid → bottom
  4. Adjust compression to firm, supportive level without restricting circulation
  5. Ensure hinges move freely and track with natural knee motion
  6. Verify anti-slip silicone grips contact skin or thin layer for maximum stability
  7. Wear during activities or as prescribed by healthcare provider

Care Instructions

  • Hand wash with cold water and mild detergent
  • Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or expose hinges to high heat
  • Clean gel pads with damp cloth - do not remove from brace
  • Inspect hinges weekly for smooth operation
  • Replace when compression straps lose elasticity (typically 8-12 months with regular use)

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-14" (30-36cm)
  • M: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • L: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • XL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • For between sizes, size up for comfort during extended wear

Specifications

  • Brand: NEENCA - Trusted orthopedic support brand
  • Type: Hinged knee brace with dual side stabilizers
  • Material: Breathable neoprene composite, gel padding, aluminum hinges
  • Hinges: Bilateral spring-loaded hinges (prevents hyperextension)
  • Straps: 4 adjustable hook-and-loop compression straps
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade)
  • Features: Open patella, gel pads, anti-slip silicone, breathable design

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for sizing guidance or product questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee brace provides mechanical support and compression. Not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment. Consult healthcare provider for proper knee injury assessment before use. Discontinue if pain worsens, numbness, or circulation issues occur. Not for complete ligament ruptures or severe instability without medical supervision.

products.descriptionHtml:
Sports Compression Knee Pads - High-Performance Gym & Volleyball Support

Professional-grade compression knee pads designed for intense gym workouts, volleyball, and high-impact sports. Pressurized elastic construction provides superior support while maintaining full mobility during athletic activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Compression Support: Graduated compression reduces swelling and enhances blood circulation
  • ✓ Impact Protection: Thick padding cushions knees during jumps, dives, and floor contact
  • ✓ Breathable Fabric: Moisture-wicking material keeps knees cool and dry during workouts
  • ✓ Non-Slip Design: Silicone grip strips prevent sliding during intense movement
  • ✓ Full Mobility: Ergonomic design allows complete range of motion without restriction
  • ✓ Dual Protection: Supports tendons, ligaments, and patella simultaneously

Perfect For

  • Volleyball players (dives, jumps)
  • Gym workouts (squats, lunges, leg press)
  • Basketball and handball
  • Running and jogging
  • Cycling and spin classes
  • Cross-training and HIIT workouts
  • Injury prevention during sports
  • Post-injury recovery support

How to Use

  1. Slide pad up over foot to knee
  2. Position thick padding over kneecap
  3. Adjust for snug, comfortable compression fit
  4. Ensure silicone strips contact skin (not over clothing)
  5. Check fit: should be tight but not restrict circulation
  6. Wear during warm-up and entire activity
  7. Can be worn under or over athletic clothing
  8. Use pair for balanced bilateral support

Care Instructions

Hand wash in cold water with mild detergent. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or iron. Avoid fabric softeners which reduce elasticity. Store flat in cool, dry place. Replace every 6-9 months with regular use or when compression weakens.

Specifications

  • Material: Nylon, spandex, EVA foam padding
  • Compression Level: 15-20 mmHg (moderate)
  • Padding Thickness: 12mm EVA foam
  • Sizes: S/M/L/XL (measure thigh circumference 4" above knee)
  • Colors: Black, grey, navy
  • Sold: Single or pair
  • Gender: Unisex design

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers manufacturing defects. Contact us for fit questions or product support.

Medical Disclaimer: Not a substitute for medical knee braces. For athletic support only. If you have diagnosed knee conditions (ACL tear, meniscus damage, arthritis), consult your doctor before use. Not suitable for post-surgical immobilization. Discontinue if pain, numbness, or discoloration occurs.

products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Brace - Professional Meniscus & Arthritis Support

Medical-grade hinged knee brace providing comprehensive support for meniscus injuries, arthritis, and ligament protection. Professional patella stabilizer with dual hinges delivers pain relief while maintaining natural knee mobility for sports and daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Professional rehabilitation quality
  • ✓ Dual Hinges: Bilateral stabilizers prevent dangerous lateral movement
  • ✓ Meniscus Protection: Reduces stress on torn or damaged cartilage
  • ✓ Arthritis Relief: Compression alleviates joint pain and inflammation
  • ✓ Patella Stabilization: Open-patella design with side protection
  • ✓ Sports Ready: Suitable for athletic activities with clearance

Perfect For

  • Meniscus tears (medial or lateral)
  • Knee arthritis pain
  • ACL/MCL strain and sprains
  • Patella tracking disorders
  • Joint pain and instability
  • Sports injury recovery
  • Post-surgery protection
  • Daily activity support

How to Use

  1. Slide brace over foot up to knee
  2. Align open patella ring with kneecap
  3. Position hinges on inner and outer sides of knee
  4. Secure upper thigh strap first
  5. Fasten lower calf strap
  6. Adjust middle strap for comfortable compression
  7. Check alignment: hinges should not press on bones
  8. Test mobility: should allow comfortable bending
  9. Wear during activities or as directed by doctor

Care Instructions

Hand wash with cold water and mild soap. Air dry flat - do not hang. Keep hinges dry and clean. Check screws and rivets periodically. Tighten if loose. Replace when compression or hinges show significant wear.

Specifications

  • Design: Hinged knee brace with open patella
  • Stabilizers: Dual polycentric hinges (medial + lateral)
  • Compression: Moderate to firm support
  • Adjustability: 3 independent strap system
  • Material: Neoprene blend, metal hinges, nylon straps
  • Sizes: S, M, L, XL, XXL
  • Side: Universal (fits left or right)
  • Colors: Black, grey

Sizing Chart

  • S: Thigh 13"-15", Calf 11"-13"
  • M: Thigh 15"-18", Calf 13"-15"
  • L: Thigh 18"-21", Calf 15"-17"
  • XL: Thigh 21"-24", Calf 17"-19"
  • XXL: Thigh 24"-27", Calf 19"-21"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on hinges and construction. Contact us for sizing or fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides orthopedic support but not medical treatment. For severe injuries (complete ligament tears, fractures, dislocations), use doctor-prescribed medical brace and follow professional rehabilitation. This brace is for mild to moderate instability and pain management. If symptoms worsen, swelling increases, or numbness/tingling occurs, discontinue use and seek medical evaluation. Not intended for immediate post-operative use without medical clearance.

products.descriptionHtml:
Orthopedic Knee Brace - Adjustable Open Patella Support

Professional orthopedic knee brace with open patella design and adjustable compression for comprehensive knee support. Provides stabilization for ligament injuries, meniscus tears, arthritis, and patellar tracking issues while reducing pressure on the kneecap for all-day comfort.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Orthopedic-Grade Support: Medical-level stabilization for ACL, MCL, meniscus injuries and knee arthritis
  • ✓ Open Patella Design: Reduces kneecap pressure while maintaining surrounding knee stabilization
  • ✓ Fully Adjustable: 4 independent straps allow customized compression around entire knee joint
  • ✓ Patellar Stabilization: Buttress pad prevents lateral patellar tracking (kneecap misalignment)
  • ✓ Breathable Construction: Moisture-wicking fabric suitable for sports, work, and daily activities
  • ✓ Non-Slip Design: Silicone wave pattern prevents brace migration during movement

Perfect For

  • ACL, MCL, PCL sprains and partial tears
  • Meniscus tears and degeneration
  • Knee osteoarthritis or rheumatoid arthritis
  • Patellar tracking disorder (kneecap instability)
  • Chondromalacia patella (runner's knee)
  • Post-operative knee surgery support
  • Sports activities (running, basketball, soccer, skiing)
  • Work-related knee strain

How to Use

  1. Open all 4 straps completely
  2. Position brace with open patella cutout centered over kneecap
  3. Wrap brace around knee and secure straps in order: top → upper middle → lower middle → bottom
  4. Adjust compression to firm but comfortable level - should not restrict circulation or cause numbness
  5. Ensure silicone grips contact skin for anti-slip function (wear over thin layer if allergic)
  6. Wear during activities or as prescribed by healthcare provider
  7. For patellar tracking issues: Position buttress pad on lateral (outer) side of kneecap

Care Instructions

Hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Air dry flat away from direct sunlight. Clean after each use if sweating heavily. Inspect straps and stitching weekly for wear. Replace when compression or straps lose effectiveness. Do not bleach, iron, or dry clean.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Circumference around center of kneecap (knee slightly bent)
  • S: 12-14" (30-36cm)
  • M: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • L: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • XL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • If between sizes, size up for comfort during extended wear

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic knee brace with open patella design
  • Material: Breathable neoprene composite, nylon, spandex
  • Straps: 4 adjustable hook-and-loop straps (criss-cross design)
  • Features: Open patella, patellar buttress pad, anti-slip silicone, spring stabilizers
  • Support Level: Medium (suitable for moderate instability and arthritis)
  • Thickness: 3-5mm (comfortable under clothing)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on materials and workmanship. Contact us for sizing guidance or product questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This orthopedic knee brace provides mechanical support and compression. Not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment. Consult healthcare provider before use for proper assessment of knee condition. Discontinue if pain worsens or circulation is compromised. Not for complete ligament ruptures or severe instability without medical supervision.

products.descriptionHtml:
Sports Knee Pads - Pressurized Elastic Support for Gym & Athletics

High-performance pressurized elastic knee pads designed for intense gym workouts and athletic activities. Advanced compression fabric provides targeted support during squats, lunges, weightlifting, and high-impact sports while enhancing proprioception and reducing injury risk for both men and women athletes.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Pressurized Compression: Graduated pressure supports knee joint during heavy lifting and explosive movements
  • ✓ Gym Performance: Enhances stability during squats, deadlifts, leg press, and Olympic lifts
  • ✓ Injury Prevention: Reduces strain on ligaments, tendons, and cartilage during high-intensity training
  • ✓ Enhanced Proprioception: Improves joint awareness for better form and movement control
  • ✓ Elastic Flexibility: Maintains full range of motion while providing support
  • ✓ Unisex Design: Suitable for men and women across various sports and fitness activities

Perfect For

  • Weightlifting and powerlifting (squats, deadlifts)
  • CrossFit and functional fitness training
  • Basketball, volleyball, and jumping sports
  • Running and cardio workouts
  • Gym leg day exercises
  • Preventing knee strain during training
  • Mild knee pain requiring support during activity
  • Post-injury return to sports

How to Use

  1. Roll sleeve up leg before wearing
  2. Position with center over kneecap
  3. Unroll to extend coverage above and below knee
  4. Adjust for even compression - snug but not restrictive
  5. Wear during warm-up and throughout workout
  6. Remove after training session
  7. Wash regularly to maintain compression
  8. Replace when elasticity decreases (typically 6-12 months)

Care Instructions

Hand wash or machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or wring. Wash after each sweaty use to prevent odor and bacteria. Do not bleach or iron. Replace when compression weakens or fabric develops holes.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-13.5" (30-34cm)
  • M: 13.5-15" (34-38cm)
  • L: 15-16.5" (38-42cm)
  • XL: 16.5-18" (42-46cm)
  • XXL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • For maximum support, choose snug fit without sizing up
  • Unisex sizing works for both men and women

Specifications

  • Type: Sports compression knee sleeve with pressurized support
  • Material: High-elasticity nylon/spandex blend, breathable knit
  • Compression: Graduated 20-30mmHg pressure
  • Thickness: 5-7mm (optimal support without bulk)
  • Support Level: Medium (suitable for sports and gym training)
  • Features: Breathable, anti-slip, moisture-wicking, unisex

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges.

Medical Disclaimer: This sports knee pad provides mechanical support and compression during athletics. Not for severe knee injuries, ligament tears, or instability without medical clearance. If knee locks, gives way, or severe pain occurs, discontinue and consult healthcare provider. Does not replace proper training technique or medical treatment. Not suitable for circulation disorders. Discontinue if numbness or excessive tightness occurs.

products.descriptionHtml:
Knee Stabilizer Brace - Aluminum Alloy Breathable Support

Medical-grade knee stabilizer featuring lightweight aluminum alloy side stays for superior joint stabilization and pain relief. Breathable design with adjustable compression provides professional-level support for ligament injuries, arthritis, meniscus issues, and post-surgical recovery without overheating.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Aluminum Alloy Stabilizers: Lightweight yet rigid side stays prevent lateral knee movement and hyperextension
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Perforated neoprene and mesh panels prevent moisture buildup during all-day wear
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Support: Suitable for ACL/MCL/PCL sprains, meniscus tears, arthritis, and post-op recovery
  • ✓ Adjustable Compression: 4 straps allow customized compression levels around thigh, knee, and calf
  • ✓ Open Patella Design: Reduces pressure on kneecap while providing stabilization to surrounding structures
  • ✓ All-Day Comfort: Ultra-lightweight aluminum (vs heavy steel) allows extended wear without fatigue

Perfect For

  • ACL, MCL, PCL sprains or partial tears
  • Meniscus injuries (tears, degeneration)
  • Knee arthritis pain and instability
  • Post-operative knee surgery stabilization
  • Sports activities requiring knee protection (soccer, basketball, skiing)
  • Work-related knee strain (standing, kneeling jobs)
  • Patellar tracking issues and instability

How to Use

  1. Position brace with aluminum stays centered on medial and lateral knee sides
  2. Align open patella cutout over kneecap
  3. Secure straps in sequence: upper thigh → lower thigh → upper calf → lower calf
  4. Adjust compression to snug but comfortable level - should not restrict circulation
  5. Ensure stays are straight and parallel to leg - bent stays reduce effectiveness
  6. Wear during activities or as prescribed by healthcare provider
  7. Remove periodically to allow skin to breathe and prevent dependency

Care Instructions

Hand wash with cold water and mild soap. Air dry flat - do not hang (may deform stays). Remove aluminum stays before washing if removable. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect stays monthly for bending - straighten carefully if needed. Replace when straps lose elasticity.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-14" (30-36cm)
  • M: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • L: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • XL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • Measure without flexing knee for accurate size

Specifications

  • Type: Knee stabilizer brace with bilateral aluminum stays
  • Material: Breathable perforated neoprene, mesh panels, aluminum alloy stays
  • Stays: 4 anatomically contoured aluminum stays (2 per side, dual spiral design)
  • Straps: 4 adjustable hook-and-loop straps with elastic inserts
  • Support Level: Medium-high (suitable for moderate instability)
  • Features: Open patella, anti-slip silicone strips, breathable design

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for sizing exchanges or fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee stabilizer provides mechanical support for knee injuries and conditions. Not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment. Consult healthcare provider for proper diagnosis before use. If pain increases or new symptoms develop, discontinue use and seek medical attention. Not for severe instability or complete ligament ruptures without medical supervision.

products.descriptionHtml:
ROM Hinged Knee Immobilizer - Orthopedic Leg Brace

Medical-grade ROM (Range of Motion) hinged knee immobilizer combining rigid stabilization with controlled mobility for post-operative knee recovery. Adjustable hinges allow healthcare providers to set specific motion limits during different healing phases after ACL, meniscus, or knee replacement surgery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ ROM Control: Adjustable hinges lock at specific angles (0°-120°) to protect surgical repair during healing
  • ✓ Post-Surgery Essential: Medical-grade support for ACL reconstruction, meniscus repair, or total knee replacement recovery
  • ✓ Progressive Rehabilitation: Increase ROM gradually as prescribed by surgeon throughout recovery phases
  • ✓ Rigid Immobilization: Full-length design prevents unwanted knee movement when locked at 0°
  • ✓ Bilateral Hinges: Dual stabilizers provide superior alignment and prevent lateral/medial shifting
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Open-back construction allows air circulation during extended post-op wear

Perfect For

  • Post-operative ACL/MCL/PCL reconstruction
  • Meniscus repair or partial meniscectomy recovery
  • Total knee replacement (TKR) rehabilitation
  • Patellar tendon repair post-surgical support
  • Ligament reconstruction with ROM restrictions
  • Knee fracture healing requiring controlled motion
  • Post-arthroscopy protection during physical therapy

How to Use

  1. Healthcare provider will set initial ROM limits (often locked at 0° initially)
  2. Position immobilizer with hinges aligned precisely to knee joint
  3. Secure all straps from thigh to ankle in sequence (top to bottom)
  4. Ensure even compression without restricting circulation
  5. DO NOT adjust ROM settings yourself - only as directed by surgeon
  6. Wear schedule: Typically 24/7 for first weeks post-op, then activity-specific
  7. ROM progression: Usually increased every 1-2 weeks per medical protocol

Care Instructions

Remove washable foam liner and hand wash separately. Wipe frame and hinges with damp cloth - do not submerge metal components. Air dry liner completely before reassembly. Inspect hinge screws weekly - tighten if loose. Replace if hinges stick or ROM mechanism fails.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above kneecap + total leg length (hip to ankle)
  • S: Thigh 14-16", Length 18-20"
  • M: Thigh 16-18", Length 20-22"
  • L: Thigh 18-20", Length 22-24"
  • XL: Thigh 20-22", Length 24-26"
  • XXL: Thigh 22-24", Length 26-28"
  • Professional fitting by healthcare provider recommended

Specifications

  • Type: ROM hinged knee immobilizer (full-length leg brace)
  • Material: Rigid aluminum frame, foam padding, breathable straps
  • Hinges: Bilateral ROM hinges with 0°-120° adjustment range
  • Length: Full leg coverage (thigh to ankle)
  • Straps: 4-6 adjustable straps for secure immobilization
  • Support Level: Maximum (post-surgical medical grade)
  • Features: Adjustable ROM, removable padding, open-back design

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on frame and hinges. Contact us for sizing or ROM adjustment guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This ROM knee immobilizer is a medical device requiring professional fitting and ROM setting. Do not self-adjust ROM settings - follow surgeon's prescribed protocol exactly. Not for use without medical clearance after knee surgery. Improper ROM settings may compromise healing or cause reinjury. This device does not replace medical care - follow all post-operative instructions.

products.descriptionHtml:
Lower Back Support Belt - Work Pain Relief Lumbar Brace

Professional-grade lower back support belt designed for work-related back pain relief and lumbar stabilization. Dual-compression system provides targeted support during lifting, bending, and extended standing or sitting, helping prevent injury and reduce chronic lower back pain.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Work Pain Relief: Reduces lower back strain during physical labor, lifting, warehouse work, or desk jobs
  • ✓ Lumbar Stabilization: Rigid posterior support panel maintains proper spine alignment and reduces disc pressure
  • ✓ Dual Compression System: Primary belt + secondary straps provide adjustable compression for custom support
  • ✓ Posture Correction: Gentle reminder to maintain proper posture during work activities
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Moisture-wicking fabric prevents overheating during 8-12 hour work shifts
  • ✓ Unisex Fit: Adjustable sizing works for men and women across wide range of waist sizes

Perfect For

  • Physical labor and heavy lifting jobs (warehouse, construction, delivery)
  • Desk workers with lower back pain from prolonged sitting
  • Retail and service workers standing 8+ hours daily
  • Chronic lower back pain sufferers needing daily support
  • Post-injury return to work transition
  • Sciatica pain management during activities
  • Preventing back strain during household chores or gardening

How to Use

  1. Position belt around lower back with rigid panel centered over lumbar spine (L3-L5 region)
  2. Wrap primary belt around waist and secure hook-and-loop closure with comfortable compression
  3. Pull secondary compression straps outward and downward for additional support (optional)
  4. Adjust tightness - should feel snug and supportive without restricting breathing
  5. Wear during work activities or as needed - remove periodically to avoid muscle dependency
  6. Recommended use: during activity, not continuously 24/7

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent in cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or iron. Remove rigid stays before washing if removable. Clean weekly with regular use. Replace when elastic loses compression (typically 6-12 months).

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Natural waist circumference at belly button level
  • S: 28-32" (71-81cm)
  • M: 32-36" (81-91cm)
  • L: 36-40" (91-102cm)
  • XL: 40-44" (102-112cm)
  • XXL: 44-48" (112-122cm)
  • 3XL: 48-52" (122-132cm)

Specifications

  • Type: Lumbar support belt with dual compression system
  • Material: Breathable mesh, neoprene blend, elastic compression straps
  • Support: Rigid plastic or metal stays (4-6 vertical stays)
  • Width: 8-10" (covers L1-S1 lumbar/sacral region)
  • Closure: Hook-and-loop with secondary pull straps
  • Features: Adjustable compression, breathable, unisex, removable stays

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on materials and workmanship. Contact us for sizing exchanges or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This lumbar support belt provides mechanical back support and is not a medical treatment. If you have severe back pain, disc herniation, or spinal conditions, consult a healthcare provider before use. Not intended to replace proper lifting technique, exercise, or medical care. Prolonged continuous use may weaken back muscles - use during activities, not 24/7.

products.descriptionHtml:
Rehabilitation Robot Gloves - Stroke Hemiplegia Intelligent Massage

Intelligent rehabilitation robot gloves combining pneumatic therapy, massage, and heat for comprehensive hand function recovery. Advanced sensor technology adapts to user's hand movement attempts, providing appropriate assistance to maximize neuroplasticity and motor learning in stroke and neurological condition recovery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Intelligent Adaptation: Sensors detect movement attempts and adjust assistance level for optimal rehabilitation
  • ✓ Massage Function: Rhythmic compression massage improves circulation and reduces hand stiffness
  • ✓ Heat Therapy: Integrated warming function relaxes spastic muscles before exercise
  • ✓ Neuroplasticity Training: Repetitive assisted movement rewires brain pathways for recovery
  • ✓ Spasticity Reduction: Regular use reduces hand spasticity and prevents contractures
  • ✓ Progress Tracking: Some models include app connectivity to monitor recovery progress

Perfect For

  • Stroke survivors in subacute to chronic recovery phase
  • Hemiplegia (paralysis) or hemiparesis (weakness) affecting hand
  • Hand spasticity requiring relaxation and stretching
  • Cerebral palsy hand function improvement
  • Traumatic brain injury hand rehabilitation
  • Multiple sclerosis (MS) hand weakness
  • Peripheral nerve injury recovery
  • Maintaining hand function between therapy appointments

How to Use

  1. Pre-treatment: Consider activating heat function for 3-5 minutes to relax muscles
  2. Insert hand into glove, ensuring fingers align with individual chambers
  3. Secure wrist and forearm straps for stable positioning
  4. Select mode: Passive (full assistance), Active-assist (partial assistance), or Massage
  5. Set intensity level based on hand sensitivity and recovery stage
  6. Run therapy session 20-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily for best results
  7. After session: Attempt voluntary hand movements to reinforce motor learning
  8. Track progress - many users see improvement in 4-8 weeks with consistent daily use

Care Instructions

Remove fabric glove liner and hand wash separately. Wipe pneumatic system and sensors with disinfectant wipe - do not submerge electronics. Air dry all components completely. Inspect air tubes and connections weekly. Clean after each use if sweating heavily. Replace glove liners when excessive wear occurs. Contact support if sensors or pneumatic system malfunction.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Hand length (wrist crease to middle finger tip) + hand width at knuckles
  • S: Length 6-7", Width 2.75-3.25" (children, petite hands)
  • M: Length 7-8", Width 3.25-3.75" (women's average, men's small)
  • L: Length 8-9", Width 3.75-4.25" (men's medium/large)
  • XL: Length 9-10", Width 4.25-4.75" (men's XL)
  • Specify left or right hand when ordering
  • For bilateral stroke: Purchase separate gloves for each hand

Specifications

  • Technology: Intelligent pneumatic + massage + heat + sensor feedback
  • Modes: Passive assistance, Active-assist, Massage, Heat therapy
  • Intensity: 10 adjustable levels for each function
  • Heat Range: 95-104°F (35-40°C)
  • Sensors: Pressure/movement sensors detect user effort
  • Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery (3-4 hour runtime)
  • Timer: 20/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Smart Features: Optional app connectivity for progress tracking (model dependent)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electronics and pneumatic system. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement glove liners available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is for home therapy under medical supervision. Follow your occupational therapist or physician's rehabilitation protocol. Not for: acute stroke (first 2-4 weeks), unstable medical conditions, severe hand edema, open wounds, fractures. Consult healthcare provider before use. Results vary by stroke severity, time since stroke, age, and therapy consistency. Does not replace professional therapy - use as supplement to clinic-based rehabilitation. Most effective when started early and used consistently.

products.descriptionHtml:
Double Strap Knee Brace - Patella Tendon Support

Lightweight yet durable double-strap knee brace designed for patellar tendon support and pain relief. Dual stabilizer straps provide superior hold compared to single-strap alternatives. Professional-grade protective equipment for sports and daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Double Strap System: Two adjustable straps provide 2x the stability and support of single-strap braces
  • ✓ Patella Protection: Targeted compression and support for kneecap stabilization and tendon relief
  • ✓ Lightweight Design: Durable construction that won't weigh you down during sports or daily activities
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces stress on patellar tendon to alleviate jumper's knee and runner's knee pain
  • ✓ Safety Equipment: Professional-grade protection prevents injury during high-impact activities

Perfect For

  • Patellar tendonitis (jumper's knee)
  • Runner's knee (patellofemoral pain)
  • Osgood-Schlatter disease
  • Knee instability during sports
  • Basketball, volleyball, running, jumping activities
  • Post-injury return to sport
  • Daily wear for chronic knee pain

How to Use

  1. Identify which knee needs support
  2. Slide knee sleeve up leg, positioning below kneecap
  3. Align padding directly below patella (kneecap)
  4. Wrap first strap around knee and secure with Velcro
  5. Wrap second strap for double reinforcement
  6. Ensure snug fit without cutting circulation
  7. Adjust tightness based on activity intensity
  8. Wear during sports or activities causing pain

Activity Guide

High Impact (basketball, running): Tighter support, both straps secured firmly
Moderate Activity (walking, gym): Medium support, comfortable snugness
Daily Wear: Lighter support for all-day comfort

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent in cold water. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash, bleach, or iron. Store flat to prevent strap deformation.

Specifications

  • Type: Double-strap knee brace with sleeve
  • Support Level: Moderate (Level 2)
  • Straps: 2 adjustable Velcro stabilizer straps
  • Material: Lightweight breathable neoprene, nylon
  • Padding: Gel or foam patellar pad
  • Weight: Ultra-lightweight design
  • Sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large
  • Color: Black

Sizing Guide

Measure knee circumference at center of kneecap:
Small: 12-14"
Medium: 14-16"
Large: 16-18"
X-Large: 18-20"

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing or fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee brace provides support and pain relief for minor to moderate conditions. Not intended for severe injuries requiring surgical intervention. Consult doctor or physical therapist for: severe pain, swelling that doesn't improve, instability, or suspected ligament tears. Use as part of comprehensive treatment including rest, ice, and appropriate rehabilitation exercises.

products.description: Electric Heating Knee Pads - Pain Relief Support Brace Innovative electric heating knee pads combining therapeutic heat with compression support for comprehensive knee pain relief. Rechargeable heating elements deliver consistent warmth to reduce arthritis pain, stiffness, and muscle tension while adjustable straps provide customized stabilization. Key Benefits ✓ Electric Heat Therapy: Built-in heating pads (95-122°F) penetrate deep into joint and muscles for lasting pain relief ✓ Arthritis Pain Relief: Heat increases circulation, reduces stiffness, and alleviates chronic arthritis discomfort ✓ Adjustable Temperature: 3 heat settings (low/medium/high) for personalized comfort and therapeutic intensity ✓ Compression Support: Neoprene construction provides knee stabilization while retaining heat ✓ Rechargeable Design: USB-powered heating eliminates cord hassle - use anywhere (home, office, outdoors) ✓ Cold Weather Protection: Ideal for outdoor activities, winter sports, or cold climates Perfect For Knee arthritis pain and morning stiffness Chronic knee pain requiring heat therapy Cold-weather outdoor activities (skiing, hiking, winter sports) Muscle spasms and tension around knee Poor circulation causing cold, achy knees Post-workout recovery and soreness Elderly users with joint pain sensitive to cold Raynaud's phenomenon affecting knees How to Use Fully charge heating pads via USB cable before first use (2-3 hours) Position knee pad with heating element centered over painful knee area Secure straps above and below knee with comfortable compression Press power button to activate heat function Select temperature: Level 1 (95-104°F), Level 2 (104-113°F), Level 3 (113-122°F) Use for 20-30 minutes per session, 2-3 times daily Auto shut-off after 30 minutes prevents overheating Can be worn with or without heat function for compression-only support Care Instructions Remove heating pad unit before washing (detachable via zipper or velcro pocket). Hand wash knee sleeve with mild detergent, air dry flat. Wipe heating pad exterior with damp cloth - do not submerge electronics. Recharge after 2-3 uses or when battery indicator shows low. Store in cool, dry place. Replace if heating elements malfunction or battery won't hold charge. Sizing Guide Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap S: 12-14" (30-36cm) M: 14-16" (36-41cm) L: 16-18" (41-46cm) XL: 18-20" (46-51cm) XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm) Snug fit recommended for optimal heat transfer and compression Specifications Technology: Electric infrared heating + neoprene compression Heat Range: 95-122°F (35-50°C) in 3 adjustable levels Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (USB-C charging, 2000mAh per pad) Runtime: 2-4 hours per charge (varies by heat setting) Material: Neoprene knee sleeve, carbon fiber heating elements Safety: Auto shut-off after 30 minutes, overheat protection Features: Wireless operation, adjustable straps, machine-washable sleeve (heating pads removed) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on heating elements and battery. Replacement heating pads available separately. Contact us for troubleshooting or product questions. Medical Disclaimer: This heated knee pad is for pain relief and thermal therapy. Do not use if you have: acute injury with swelling (ice appropriate in first 48-72 hours), poor sensation/numbness, diabetes with neuropathy, circulation disorders, or skin conditions. Do not use while sleeping. Pregnant women should consult doctor before heat therapy. Not for children. Discontinue if skin irritation or burns occur. Not a substitute for medical treatment - consult healthcare provider for persistent knee pain.
products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Heating Knee Pads - Pain Relief Support Brace

Innovative electric heating knee pads combining therapeutic heat with compression support for comprehensive knee pain relief. Rechargeable heating elements deliver consistent warmth to reduce arthritis pain, stiffness, and muscle tension while adjustable straps provide customized stabilization.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Electric Heat Therapy: Built-in heating pads (95-122°F) penetrate deep into joint and muscles for lasting pain relief
  • ✓ Arthritis Pain Relief: Heat increases circulation, reduces stiffness, and alleviates chronic arthritis discomfort
  • ✓ Adjustable Temperature: 3 heat settings (low/medium/high) for personalized comfort and therapeutic intensity
  • ✓ Compression Support: Neoprene construction provides knee stabilization while retaining heat
  • ✓ Rechargeable Design: USB-powered heating eliminates cord hassle - use anywhere (home, office, outdoors)
  • ✓ Cold Weather Protection: Ideal for outdoor activities, winter sports, or cold climates

Perfect For

  • Knee arthritis pain and morning stiffness
  • Chronic knee pain requiring heat therapy
  • Cold-weather outdoor activities (skiing, hiking, winter sports)
  • Muscle spasms and tension around knee
  • Poor circulation causing cold, achy knees
  • Post-workout recovery and soreness
  • Elderly users with joint pain sensitive to cold
  • Raynaud's phenomenon affecting knees

How to Use

  1. Fully charge heating pads via USB cable before first use (2-3 hours)
  2. Position knee pad with heating element centered over painful knee area
  3. Secure straps above and below knee with comfortable compression
  4. Press power button to activate heat function
  5. Select temperature: Level 1 (95-104°F), Level 2 (104-113°F), Level 3 (113-122°F)
  6. Use for 20-30 minutes per session, 2-3 times daily
  7. Auto shut-off after 30 minutes prevents overheating
  8. Can be worn with or without heat function for compression-only support

Care Instructions

Remove heating pad unit before washing (detachable via zipper or velcro pocket). Hand wash knee sleeve with mild detergent, air dry flat. Wipe heating pad exterior with damp cloth - do not submerge electronics. Recharge after 2-3 uses or when battery indicator shows low. Store in cool, dry place. Replace if heating elements malfunction or battery won't hold charge.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Knee circumference around center of kneecap
  • S: 12-14" (30-36cm)
  • M: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • L: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • XL: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XXL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • Snug fit recommended for optimal heat transfer and compression

Specifications

  • Technology: Electric infrared heating + neoprene compression
  • Heat Range: 95-122°F (35-50°C) in 3 adjustable levels
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (USB-C charging, 2000mAh per pad)
  • Runtime: 2-4 hours per charge (varies by heat setting)
  • Material: Neoprene knee sleeve, carbon fiber heating elements
  • Safety: Auto shut-off after 30 minutes, overheat protection
  • Features: Wireless operation, adjustable straps, machine-washable sleeve (heating pads removed)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on heating elements and battery. Replacement heating pads available separately. Contact us for troubleshooting or product questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This heated knee pad is for pain relief and thermal therapy. Do not use if you have: acute injury with swelling (ice appropriate in first 48-72 hours), poor sensation/numbness, diabetes with neuropathy, circulation disorders, or skin conditions. Do not use while sleeping. Pregnant women should consult doctor before heat therapy. Not for children. Discontinue if skin irritation or burns occur. Not a substitute for medical treatment - consult healthcare provider for persistent knee pain.
