products.title: Hinged Knee Brace | Adjustable with Side Stabilizers
products.description: Adjustable Hinged Knee Brace with Side Stabilizers Versatile hinged knee brace with fully adjustable side stabilizers. Provides customizable support for various knee conditions including arthritis, ACL injuries, and meniscus tears. Medical-grade adjustability ensures proper fit and effective pain relief for all users. Key Benefits ✓ Full Adjustability: Every component adjusts - straps, hinges, stabilizers, compression - perfect custom fit for any knee ✓ Progressive Support: Adjust support level as condition improves or worsens - one brace for entire recovery journey ✓ Universal Fit: Extensive adjustment range accommodates wide variety of leg sizes and shapes ✓ Multi-Condition Use: Effective for arthritis, ligament injuries, meniscus problems, and general instability ✓ Cost-Effective: Adjustable design eliminates need for multiple braces as needs change Perfect For Progressive arthritis (adjust as degeneration advances) Fluctuating knee pain (tighten/loosen as needed) Recovering ligament injuries (adjust through phases) Variable activity levels (different settings for different days) Uncertain sizing (adjustable forgives measurement errors) Multiple family members sharing brace Trying brace before surgery decision How to Use Loosen all adjustment points fully Position brace around leg and knee Start with upper thigh - adjust strap snugness Adjust hinge position to align with joint Set side stabilizer tension (turn adjustment screws) Secure middle and lower straps Walk and assess - readjust as needed Mark optimal settings for quick daily application Adjustment Guide Bad Pain Day: Maximum stabilizer tension, tight straps Good Day: Moderate support, comfortable fit Sports: Firm stabilizers, athletic compression Recovery: Looser after activity Swelling: Loosen straps, maintain stabilizer support Care Instructions Hand wash regularly to prevent odor buildup. Check all adjustment mechanisms monthly - tighten any loosened screws. Lubricate moving parts every 3 months. Specifications Type: Fully adjustable hinged knee brace Support Level: Moderate to maximum (user-adjustable) Stabilizers: Adjustable tension side stays Hinges: Position-adjustable bilateral hinges Material: Breathable neoprene Straps: Multiple adjustment points Fit Range: Accommodates wide size range Sizing Guide Adjustable design forgiving of sizing errors: Small/Medium: 14-20" thigh Large/X-Large: 20-26" thigh Most users fit one of two sizes due to adjustment range When to Adjust Morning: May need tighter after overnight rest stiffness Afternoon: May need looser if swelling develops Exercise: Tighten before, loosen after Weather changes: Barometric pressure affects arthritis Flare-ups: Increase support temporarily Improvement: Gradually reduce support to rebuild strength Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Adjustment mechanism 1-year guarantee. Contact us for fit help. Medical Disclaimer: Adjustable medical orthopedic device. Consult healthcare provider for appropriate support level settings. Too much support weakens muscles over time - use minimum effective support. Too little support risks re-injury. For arthritis: adjust support but continue medical treatment and exercise. For ligament injuries: follow medical team's guidance on appropriate support level for each recovery phase. If uncertain about adjustments, consult physical therapist or orthotist. Improper adjustment can cause harm - when in doubt, err on side of less support and gradually increase.
products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Hinged Knee Brace with Side Stabilizers

Versatile hinged knee brace with fully adjustable side stabilizers. Provides customizable support for various knee conditions including arthritis, ACL injuries, and meniscus tears. Medical-grade adjustability ensures proper fit and effective pain relief for all users.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Full Adjustability: Every component adjusts - straps, hinges, stabilizers, compression - perfect custom fit for any knee
  • ✓ Progressive Support: Adjust support level as condition improves or worsens - one brace for entire recovery journey
  • ✓ Universal Fit: Extensive adjustment range accommodates wide variety of leg sizes and shapes
  • ✓ Multi-Condition Use: Effective for arthritis, ligament injuries, meniscus problems, and general instability
  • ✓ Cost-Effective: Adjustable design eliminates need for multiple braces as needs change

Perfect For

  • Progressive arthritis (adjust as degeneration advances)
  • Fluctuating knee pain (tighten/loosen as needed)
  • Recovering ligament injuries (adjust through phases)
  • Variable activity levels (different settings for different days)
  • Uncertain sizing (adjustable forgives measurement errors)
  • Multiple family members sharing brace
  • Trying brace before surgery decision

How to Use

  1. Loosen all adjustment points fully
  2. Position brace around leg and knee
  3. Start with upper thigh - adjust strap snugness
  4. Adjust hinge position to align with joint
  5. Set side stabilizer tension (turn adjustment screws)
  6. Secure middle and lower straps
  7. Walk and assess - readjust as needed
  8. Mark optimal settings for quick daily application

Adjustment Guide

Bad Pain Day: Maximum stabilizer tension, tight straps
Good Day: Moderate support, comfortable fit
Sports: Firm stabilizers, athletic compression
Recovery: Looser after activity
Swelling: Loosen straps, maintain stabilizer support

Care Instructions

Hand wash regularly to prevent odor buildup. Check all adjustment mechanisms monthly - tighten any loosened screws. Lubricate moving parts every 3 months.

Specifications

  • Type: Fully adjustable hinged knee brace
  • Support Level: Moderate to maximum (user-adjustable)
  • Stabilizers: Adjustable tension side stays
  • Hinges: Position-adjustable bilateral hinges
  • Material: Breathable neoprene
  • Straps: Multiple adjustment points
  • Fit Range: Accommodates wide size range

Sizing Guide

Adjustable design forgiving of sizing errors:
Small/Medium: 14-20" thigh
Large/X-Large: 20-26" thigh
Most users fit one of two sizes due to adjustment range

When to Adjust

  • Morning: May need tighter after overnight rest stiffness
  • Afternoon: May need looser if swelling develops
  • Exercise: Tighten before, loosen after
  • Weather changes: Barometric pressure affects arthritis
  • Flare-ups: Increase support temporarily
  • Improvement: Gradually reduce support to rebuild strength

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Adjustment mechanism 1-year guarantee. Contact us for fit help.

Medical Disclaimer: Adjustable medical orthopedic device. Consult healthcare provider for appropriate support level settings. Too much support weakens muscles over time - use minimum effective support. Too little support risks re-injury. For arthritis: adjust support but continue medical treatment and exercise. For ligament injuries: follow medical team's guidance on appropriate support level for each recovery phase. If uncertain about adjustments, consult physical therapist or orthotist. Improper adjustment can cause harm - when in doubt, err on side of less support and gradually increase.

products.descriptionHtml:
Shoulder and Back Posture Corrector - Adult Camel Strap Design

Professional posture correction brace featuring innovative camel strap design for enhanced shoulder retraction and upper back support. Ergonomic multi-strap system provides superior correction force compared to traditional figure-8 braces, effectively combating forward slouch posture from desk work and daily activities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Camel Strap Design: Unique multi-point strap configuration provides stronger, more evenly distributed correction force
  • ✓ Superior Shoulder Retraction: Pulls shoulders back more effectively than standard figure-8 designs
  • ✓ Upper Back Support: Wider back panel supports thoracic spine and reduces upper back fatigue
  • ✓ Posture Retraining: Consistent wear retrains muscles to maintain proper alignment independently
  • ✓ Comfortable Extended Wear: Padded straps and breathable materials allow all-day correction
  • ✓ Adult-Sized: Designed specifically for adult body proportions and correction needs

Perfect For

  • Severe forward slouch posture (pronounced upper crossed syndrome)
  • Desk workers with chronic poor posture
  • Tech neck and forward head posture correction
  • Upper back pain from postural strain
  • Shoulder rounding and protraction
  • Post-pregnancy posture restoration
  • Adults needing stronger correction than standard braces
  • Preventing progression of kyphosis (hunchback)

How to Use

  1. Position back panel centered between shoulder blades
  2. Thread arms through shoulder loops
  3. Cross camel straps in back and bring forward
  4. Secure all straps with firm tension - should feel strong backward pull
  5. Adjust each strap point individually for optimal correction
  6. Start with 30-60 minutes daily, gradually increase to 3-4 hours over 2-3 weeks
  7. Wear during activities when you tend to slouch most
  8. Combine with thoracic extension stretches and upper back strengthening

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect all strap connection points monthly for wear. Replace when straps lose elasticity or cannot maintain correction (typically 8-12 months with daily use). Do not bleach.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line + shoulder width
  • M: Chest 32-36", Shoulders 14-16"
  • L: Chest 36-40", Shoulders 16-18"
  • XL: Chest 40-44", Shoulders 18-20"
  • XXL: Chest 44-48", Shoulders 20-22"
  • 3XL: Chest 48-52", Shoulders 22-24"
  • For maximum correction, choose snug fit without sizing up

Specifications

  • Type: Camel strap posture corrector with upper back support
  • Material: High-strength elastic straps, breathable neoprene padding, nylon backing
  • Design: Multi-point camel strap system with wide back panel
  • Adjustability: 6-8 adjustment points for customized correction
  • Support Level: High (suitable for moderate to severe postural issues)
  • Features: Reinforced straps, padded back panel, breathable design

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical postural support. Not for severe spinal deformities or recent shoulder/back surgery without medical clearance. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing or causes pain. Not a substitute for strengthening exercises. Prolonged use without muscle strengthening may cause dependency. Consult healthcare provider if you have spinal conditions. Discontinue if pain increases.

products.descriptionHtml:
Girls Summer Orthopedic Sandals with Ankle Support

Specialized orthopedic sandals for girls with ankle support and corrective features. Designed for toe walking, club feet correction, and proper foot development. Princess-style summer footwear that combines medical functionality with attractive design children actually want to wear.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Ankle Support: Built-in stabilization prevents ankle rolling and provides stability for weak or unstable ankles
  • ✓ Toe Walking Correction: Heel cup and footbed design encourages heel-first gait pattern
  • ✓ Club Feet Support: Accommodates post-casting/surgery feet, maintains correction achieved through treatment
  • ✓ Attractive Design: Flower princess styling ensures girls actually wear them (compliance is key!)
  • ✓ Summer Appropriate: Open design prevents overheating while maintaining orthopedic benefits

Perfect For

  • Toe walking (idiopathic toe walking)
  • Club feet (talipes equinovarus) post-treatment
  • Weak or unstable ankles
  • Flat feet (pes planus) requiring arch support
  • Ankle pronation (rolling inward)
  • Cerebral palsy foot positioning
  • Post-casting maintenance phase
  • General foot development concerns

How to Use

  1. Ensure proper size - measure child's foot length and width
  2. Place foot in sandal with heel fully back in heel cup
  3. Secure ankle strap snugly but not too tight
  4. Fasten toe/midfoot straps
  5. Check that arch support aligns with child's arch
  6. Observe walking pattern - heel should strike first
  7. Start with 1-2 hours daily, gradually increase wear time
  8. Use daily during treatment phase as prescribed
  9. Transition to regular shoes only when cleared by doctor

Orthopedic Features

  • Firm Heel Counter: Stabilizes heel and prevents excessive motion
  • Arch Support: Built-in arch maintains proper foot alignment
  • Ankle Strap: Additional stabilization for weak ankles
  • Rigid Sole: Prevents excessive foot flexibility during correction
  • Toe Box: Adequate room for toe spread and growth
  • Adjustable Closures: Accommodates swelling and growing feet

Care Instructions

Wipe with damp cloth. Air dry away from direct heat. Do not machine wash. Check straps and closures regularly for wear. Replace when outgrown or worn.

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic corrective sandals
  • Age Range: Toddler through pre-teen (sizes vary)
  • Gender: Girls (princess/flower styling)
  • Season: Spring/summer warm weather
  • Material: Leather or synthetic upper, rubber sole
  • Closure: Velcro or buckle adjustable straps
  • Support Features: Heel counter, arch support, ankle strap
  • Colors: Child-friendly options (pink, purple, white with flowers)

Sizing Guide

Measure foot length from heel to longest toe. Add 0.5" for growth room:
Toddler: Sizes 5-9
Little Kid: Sizes 10-13
Big Kid: Sizes 1-5
Consult size chart - orthopedic shoes must fit properly to be effective

Parent Tips

  • Allow break-in period - shoes may feel stiff initially
  • Monitor for red marks or blisters (sign of poor fit)
  • Make wearing fun - praise compliance, use sticker charts
  • Have child wear with socks initially if rubbing occurs
  • Expect adjustment period - child may resist at first
  • Consistency is key - results require daily wear

Warranty & Support

30-day return for sizing issues. Contact us for sizing assistance or concerns.

Medical Disclaimer: These orthopedic sandals are corrective medical footwear. Use only as recommended by pediatric orthopedist, podiatrist, or physical therapist. Not for self-diagnosis of foot conditions. For club feet, toe walking, or other diagnosed conditions, this footwear is part of comprehensive treatment plan - not standalone solution. Proper fit is critical - professional fitting recommended. Monitor child's feet regularly for pressure points or discomfort. Follow medical provider's wear schedule and follow-up appointments. Results vary by condition severity and treatment compliance. If condition worsens or new concerns arise, consult medical provider immediately.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Hip Trainer - 3 Types Buttock Lifting & Muscle Stimulation

Advanced EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) hip trainer with 3 specialized training modes for buttock lifting, toning, and shaping. Professional muscle stimulation technology contracts and relaxes hip muscles for effective lifting and firming without exercise.

  • Peach buttocks sculpting
  • Post-pregnancy hip restoration
  • Sedentary lifestyle muscle activation
  • Complementing gym workouts

How to Use

  1. Cleanse hip area and ensure skin is dry
  2. Peel backing from gel pads
  3. Position trainer on center of buttocks

Clean gel pads with damp cloth after each use. Store on protective film. Replace gel pads when adhesion weakens. Clean control unit with slightly damp cloth (not waterproof). Store in cool, dry place.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Heating Leg Massager - Wireless & Rechargeable

Professional air compression leg and calf massager with heating function. Wireless rechargeable design provides therapeutic massage for tired legs, improving circulation and relieving muscle tension. Hospital-quality relaxation therapy for home use.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Air Compression Technology: Sequential pneumatic compression mimics professional lymphatic drainage massage
  • ✓ Heating Function: Therapeutic warmth penetrates deep to relax muscles and improve blood flow
  • ✓ Wireless Operation: Rechargeable battery allows use anywhere without cords or outlet restrictions
  • ✓ Circulation Boost: Improves venous return, reduces swelling, prevents varicose vein progression
  • ✓ Muscle Relief: Alleviates soreness, cramping, and restless leg symptoms

Perfect For

  • Tired, aching legs after standing/walking
  • Poor circulation in lower legs
  • Leg swelling and edema
  • Restless leg syndrome symptoms
  • Calf muscle cramping
  • Post-workout muscle recovery
  • Varicose vein management (not treatment)

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use (3-4 hours)
  2. Wrap leg massager wraps around calves or thighs
  3. Secure with Velcro straps (snug but comfortable)
  4. Turn on device using control panel
  5. Select compression intensity level
  6. Activate heating function if desired

  9. Device auto-shuts off after session

Constant Mode: Steady pressure for deep tissue
Lymphatic Mode: Specialized drainage pattern

Care Instructions

Remove controller unit before cleaning. Hand wash leg wraps with mild soap. Air dry completely. Recharge battery after each 2-3 uses. Store in protective bag.

Specifications

  • Technology: Pneumatic air compression + infrared heat
  • Coverage: Calves, lower legs (some models include thighs)
  • Compression Levels: 3-5 adjustable intensities
  • Heat Settings: Low, medium, high (104-113°F)
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery
  • Battery Life: 2-4 sessions per charge
  • Charge Time: 3-4 hours
  • Design: Wireless, portable
  • Size: Adjustable wraps fit most leg sizes

Health Benefits

  • Improves venous blood flow
  • Reduces leg swelling and fluid retention
  • Prevents blood pooling in lower extremities
  • Accelerates muscle recovery after exercise
  • Relieves restless leg sensations
  • May reduce varicose vein discomfort

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on device and battery. Contact us for support or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for circulation improvement and relaxation. Not medical equipment. Do not use if you have: deep vein thrombosis (DVT), blood clots, severe varicose veins, phlebitis, acute leg injuries, or circulatory disorders. Pregnant women should consult obstetrician before use. Diabetics with neuropathy: use only with doctor approval and avoid heat function. Not for use on swollen, inflamed, or infected areas. If leg pain persists or worsens, consult healthcare provider immediately.

products.descriptionHtml:
39 Gears EMS Hip Muscle Stimulator - Professional Buttock Training

Professional-grade EMS hip trainer with 39 intensity levels for precise muscle stimulation control. Electric hip trainer targets gluteal muscles for lifting, firming, and shaping peach buttocks with customizable training intensity.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 39 Intensity Levels: Precise control from gentle toning to intense muscle building
  • ✓ Professional Strength: High-power EMS for effective muscle stimulation
  • ✓ Targeted Training: Focuses specifically on gluteus muscles
  • ✓ Progressive Training: Gradually increase intensity as muscles strengthen
  • ✓ Visible Results: Lifting and shaping effects with consistent use
  • ✓ Convenient: Wear while doing other activities

Perfect For

  • Serious buttock lifting and shaping
  • Building gluteal muscle definition
  • Complementing squat and lunge workouts
  • Post-pregnancy body restoration
  • Sedentary lifestyle compensation
  • Professional body sculpting
  • Muscle maintenance during injury
  • Achieving peach buttocks shape

How to Use

  1. Clean and dry hip area thoroughly
  2. Remove gel pad protective film
  3. Position unit on center of each buttock
  4. Press firmly to ensure full contact
  5. Start at level 1-5 (beginners)
  6. Gradually increase intensity over weeks
  7. 20-30 minute sessions, 5 times weekly
  8. Advanced users: levels 20-39 for maximum results
  9. Replace gel pads every 20-30 uses

Training Protocol

  • Week 1-2: Levels 1-10 (adaptation phase)
  • Week 3-4: Levels 10-20 (building phase)
  • Week 5-8: Levels 20-30 (toning phase)
  • Week 9+: Levels 30-39 (maintenance/max results)

Care Instructions

Wipe gel pads with damp cloth after each use. Store on protective film when not in use. Clean control unit surface with slightly damp cloth. Do not submerge in water. Store in included case.

Specifications

  • Intensity Levels: 39 adjustable gears
  • Technology: EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation)
  • Training Modes: Multiple pre-programmed patterns
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery
  • Battery Life: 10-15 sessions per charge
  • Timer: 20/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Includes: Main unit, gel pads (2 sets), USB charger, manual

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Gel pads sold separately. Contact us for replacement pads or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: Tones muscles but does not burn fat or cause weight loss. Contraindications: pacemaker, pregnancy, epilepsy, metal hip implants, recent surgery. Do not use on broken or irritated skin. Start with low intensity to avoid muscle soreness. Results vary based on consistency, diet, and exercise. Not FDA-approved for medical treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Abdominal Toning Belt - Muscle Stimulator

Advanced EMS muscle stimulation belt for abs, arms, waist, and legs. USB rechargeable fitness device delivers targeted electrical pulses to tone muscles, improve definition, and support weight loss goals. Perfect supplement to diet and exercise for body shaping.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Multi-Area Training: Works on abs, waist, arms, and legs - complete body toning system
  • ✓ EMS Technology: Electrical muscle stimulation contracts muscles up to 150 times per session, equivalent to intensive workout
  • ✓ Complements Exercise: Enhances muscle definition when combined with regular fitness routine and healthy diet
  • ✓ USB Rechargeable: No disposable batteries needed, eco-friendly and cost-effective
  • ✓ Convenient Home Use: Tone muscles while watching TV, working, or doing household tasks

Perfect For

  • Muscle toning and strengthening
  • Post-pregnancy abdominal recovery
  • Sedentary lifestyle muscle maintenance
  • Complementing gym workouts
  • Improving muscle definition
  • Supporting weight loss programs

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully via USB (2 hours)
  2. Clean and dry target area
  3. Apply conductive gel pads to device electrodes
  4. Position belt on desired area (abs, waist, arms, or legs)
  5. Secure with adjustable straps
  6. Select intensity level (start low, increase gradually)
  7. Use for 20-30 minutes per session
  8. Use 2-3 times daily on each target area
  9. Clean gel pads and device after use

Care Instructions

Replace gel pads every 30-40 uses or when adhesion weakens. Clean electrodes with soft cloth. Do not immerse controller in water. Store in cool, dry place.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation)
  • Target Areas: Abdomen, waist, arms, legs
  • Modes: Multiple training programs
  • Intensity Levels: Adjustable (10+ levels)
  • Power: USB rechargeable battery
  • Session Time: 20-30 minutes
  • Belt Size: Adjustable, fits most body types
  • Package: Main unit, gel pads, USB cable, manual

Important Usage Notes

Best Results: EMS is most effective when combined with regular exercise and balanced diet. It supplements, not replaces, active lifestyle.

Realistic Expectations: Results vary by individual. Consistent use over 6-8 weeks recommended for visible improvement.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty included. Replacement gel pads available. Contact us for questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This is a fitness device for muscle toning. Not a weight loss solution. Not intended to treat medical conditions. Do not use if pregnant, have pacemaker, heart conditions, or epilepsy. Consult doctor before starting any fitness program.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Smart Hip Trainer - Vibration Muscle Stimulator

Advanced EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) smart hip trainer combining muscle stimulation with vibration massage for buttocks shaping, hip firming, and glute muscle toning. Intelligent programs target hip flexors, glutes, and surrounding muscles for comprehensive lower body conditioning.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Technology: EMS muscle stimulation + vibration massage for maximum muscle engagement
  • ✓ Smart Programs: 6 auto modes specifically designed for hip/buttocks shaping and toning
  • ✓ Buttocks Lifting: Targets gluteus maximus, medius, minimus for natural peach shape enhancement
  • ✓ Hip Firming: Strengthens hip flexors and surrounding muscles for improved definition
  • ✓ Vibration Massage: Promotes blood circulation and reduces muscle tension in hip region
  • ✓ Convenient Home Use: Wireless, rechargeable design allows workout while working, relaxing, or sleeping

Perfect For

  • Buttocks shaping and lifting goals
  • Hip firming and toning
  • Post-pregnancy glute muscle recovery
  • Sedentary lifestyle muscle activation
  • Complementing gym workouts for glute development
  • Improving hip muscle strength and endurance
  • Reducing hip and lower back tension

How to Use

  1. Clean and dry hip/buttock area before application
  2. Apply hydrogel pads to device and position on target area (lower buttocks/upper thigh)
  3. Select program mode (1-6) and intensity level (1-15) on controller
  4. Use for 20-30 minutes per session, 2-3 times daily for best results
  5. Remove device and clean gel pads after each use
  6. Results typically visible after 4-8 weeks of consistent use

Care Instructions

Wipe controller with dry cloth only - not waterproof. Replace gel pads every 30-40 uses or when adhesion weakens. Recharge via USB cable after every 5-6 sessions. Store in cool, dry place. Do not bend or fold device.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS muscle stimulation + vibration massage
  • Programs: 6 smart modes (shaping, toning, massage, firming, relaxation, comprehensive)
  • Intensity Levels: 15 adjustable levels
  • Battery: Rechargeable lithium (USB-C charging, 500mAh)
  • Runtime: 60-90 minutes per charge
  • Pads: Medical-grade hydrogel adhesive pads (replaceable)
  • Frequency: EMS: 1-50Hz, Vibration: 5000-8000 pulses/min

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement gel pads available separately. Contact us for troubleshooting or purchasing replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This EMS hip trainer is for fitness and wellness purposes. Not for medical treatment. Do not use if pregnant, with pacemaker, heart conditions, or on broken skin. Consult doctor before use if you have medical conditions. Results vary by individual. Not a substitute for exercise and healthy diet.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Electric Hip Trainer - Peach Buttocks Shaping

Advanced EMS hip trainer specifically designed for buttocks shaping, lifting, and firming. Electric massage machine targets gluteal muscles for enhanced definition and "peach butt" appearance. Professional muscle enlargement stimulator for comprehensive hip and glute development.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Peach Buttocks Shaping: Specialized program creates rounded, lifted "peach" shape through targeted muscle activation
  • ✓ Muscle Lifting & Firming: EMS contracts glutes repeatedly to strengthen, tone, and lift sagging areas
  • ✓ Hip Enhancement: Works on entire hip region including gluteus maximus, medius, and minimus for complete development
  • ✓ Massage Function: Dual benefit - muscle building plus relaxing massage for recovery
  • ✓ Enlargement Stimulation: When combined with proper nutrition, supports muscle hypertrophy for fuller appearance

Perfect For

  • Buttocks lifting and shaping goals
  • Hip muscle strengthening
  • Post-pregnancy glute recovery
  • Supplementing squat/lunge workouts
  • Individuals unable to do traditional glute exercises
  • Maintaining muscle tone with busy schedule
  • Creating more defined, lifted appearance

How to Use

  1. Clean hip/buttock area and ensure dry skin
  2. Apply conductive gel pads to device electrodes
  3. Position pads on both buttock cheeks (center of each glute)
  4. Secure with adjustable belt or adhesive
  5. Turn on device and select shaping program
  6. Start at low intensity, gradually increase
  7. Use for 25-30 minutes per session
  8. Train 2-3 times daily for optimal results
  9. Can wear discreetly under clothing
  10. Combine with protein intake for muscle building

Training Programs

Most devices include specialized modes:
Lifting Mode: Focuses on upward muscle contraction
Firming Mode: Targets muscle density and tone
Shaping Mode: Comprehensive program for overall development
Massage Mode: Recovery and relaxation
Intensive Mode: Maximum stimulation for experienced users

Care Instructions

  • Replace gel pads every 30-40 uses
  • Clean electrode contacts with soft cloth
  • Store in protective case when not in use
  • Recharge after 2-3 uses to maintain battery

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS muscle stimulation + massage
  • Target Areas: Buttocks, hips, gluteal muscles
  • Power: USB rechargeable
  • Programs: Multiple shaping modes (5-8 programs)
  • Intensity: Adjustable levels (10-20 settings)
  • Session Time: 25-30 minutes
  • Design: Slim, discreet, wearable under clothes
  • Package: Trainer unit, gel pads, USB cable, belt, manual

Best Results Protocol

Weeks 1-2: 20 min, 2x daily, low intensity (adaptation)
Weeks 3-4: 25 min, 2x daily, medium intensity (building)
Weeks 5-8: 30 min, 2-3x daily, high intensity (development)
Maintenance: 25 min, 2x daily to preserve results

Combine with:

  • Squats, lunges, hip thrusts 3-4x weekly
  • High-protein diet (1g per lb body weight)
  • Progressive resistance training
  • Adequate rest for muscle recovery

Realistic Expectations

What to Expect: Firmer, more toned glutes; improved muscle strength; enhanced shape
Timeline: Visible changes in 4-8 weeks with consistent use and exercise
Important: EMS enhances but doesn't replace proper strength training and nutrition

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement gel pads available. Contact us with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This EMS trainer is for muscle toning and fitness. Not medical equipment or dramatic body transformation device. Do not use if pregnant or have: pacemaker, heart conditions, epilepsy, or electronic implants. Not for use on: chest, abdomen during pregnancy, head, or neck. Results vary significantly by individual and require: consistent use (2-3x daily), proper strength training, adequate protein intake, and caloric surplus for muscle growth. EMS alone does not create significant muscle enlargement - it supplements exercise and nutrition. Consult doctor before use if you have health concerns.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Scraping Gua Sha Massage Board

Modern electric gua sha tool combining traditional Chinese scraping therapy with vibration massage and hot compress technology. Meridian dredging device relieves muscle tension, improves lymphatic drainage, and soothes tense muscles with therapeutic heat.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Electric Gua Sha: Modernizes ancient Chinese scraping technique for easier, more effective treatment
  • ✓ Vibration Massage: High-frequency vibration enhances traditional gua sha benefits without excessive manual force
  • ✓ Hot Compress: Therapeutic heat (104-113°F) opens pores, relaxes muscles, improves oil/cream absorption
  • ✓ Meridian Dredging: Unblocks energy pathways (qi) according to Traditional Chinese Medicine principles
  • ✓ Lymphatic Drainage: Gentle scraping stimulates lymph flow, reduces puffiness, removes metabolic waste

Perfect For

  • Muscle knots and trigger points
  • Chronic muscle tension and stiffness
  • Lymphatic congestion and swelling
  • Neck and shoulder tightness
  • Back pain from muscle tension
  • Facial lymphatic drainage (with appropriate head)
  • Traditional Chinese medicine therapy at home

How to Use

  1. Apply massage oil or gua sha balm to treatment area
  2. Turn on device and allow to warm up (if using heat)
  3. Select vibration intensity level
  4. Hold board at 15-30 degree angle to skin
  5. Use gentle to moderate pressure
  6. Move in long, smooth strokes following muscle fibers
  7. For meridians: follow traditional pathway maps
  8. For lymph: move toward nearest lymph nodes
  9. Treat each area for 3-5 minutes
  10. Some redness (sha) is normal - not bruising

Treatment Areas

Back: Para-spinal muscles, upper trapezius
Neck: Gentle scraping for tension relief
Shoulders: Release knots and adhesions
Legs: Calves, thighs for circulation
Arms: Forearms for computer-related tension
Face: Lymphatic drainage (gentle pressure only)

Traditional vs. Electric Gua Sha

Traditional: Requires significant manual force, can be painful
Electric: Vibration does the work, gentler, easier to use on yourself
Results: Comparable therapeutic benefits with less effort

Care Instructions

Clean massage surface with alcohol wipe after each use. Do not submerge in water. Store in protective case. Recharge regularly via USB.

Specifications

  • Functions: Gua sha scraping + vibration + heat
  • Vibration Levels: 3-5 adjustable intensities
  • Heat Settings: Low, medium, high (104-113°F)
  • Power: USB rechargeable
  • Battery Life: 2-4 hours per charge
  • Material: Medical-grade stainless steel or ceramic
  • Design: Ergonomic handle, angled scraping edge
  • Weight: Lightweight for extended use

Safety Guidelines

Normal: Mild redness (sha) that fades in 2-3 days
Too much pressure: Bruising (reduce pressure)
Frequency: Wait 3-5 days between treatments on same area
Contraindications: See medical disclaimer below

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for technique questions or support.

Medical Disclaimer: This gua sha device is for Traditional Chinese Medicine therapy and muscle relief. Not medical equipment. Do not use if: pregnant, have blood clotting disorders, taking blood thinners, have skin conditions, varicose veins, or open wounds. Not for use on: inflamed areas, recent injuries, face (without proper training), or areas with neuropathy. Some redness (petechiae/sha) is normal response - not bruising. If excessive bruising occurs, reduce pressure. Do not use on children. Consult acupuncturist or TCM practitioner for guidance on meridian pathways. If pain worsens or new symptoms develop, discontinue use and consult healthcare provider.

products.descriptionHtml:
Wireless EMS Body Sculptor - Rechargeable Butt Trainer 29 Levels

Advanced wireless EMS body sculpting system with 29 intensity levels for comprehensive muscle toning and strengthening. Rechargeable design targets glutes, abs, arms, and legs for convenient at-home body contouring and fitness enhancement without gym equipment.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 29 Intensity Levels: Extensive range accommodates beginners to advanced users for progressive training

  • ✓ Butt Trainer Focus: Specialized programs target glute muscle development

Perfect For

  • Body contouring goals
  • Maintaining fitness while traveling

How to Use

  1. Charge all pads fully before first use
  2. Apply gel pads to clean, dry skin on target area
  3. Start at low intensity (levels 1-5) for first sessions

  5. Use 20-30 minutes per area, 2-3 times daily
  6. Can use during other activities (reading, working, TV)
  7. Progress to higher levels (20-29) as muscles adapt
  8. Results typically visible after 6-8 weeks consistent use

Care Instructions

Remove gel pads and store in protective sheet after each use. Replace gel pads every 30-40 uses or when adhesion weakens. Wipe controller with dry cloth - not waterproof. Recharge via USB after every 3-4 uses. Store in cool, dry place.

Specifications

  • Technology: Wireless EMS muscle stimulation
  • Intensity: 29 adjustable levels (most in category)
  • Programs: 6 training modes (toning, strengthening, massage, etc.)
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C charging)

  • Pads: Hydrogel electrode pads (replaceable)
  • Timer: Auto shut-off after 23 minutes
  • Set Contents: Controller + gel pads for multiple body areas

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement gel pads available separately. Contact us for usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This EMS device is for fitness and body toning. Contraindications: pacemakers, pregnancy, epilepsy, cancer, heart conditions, open wounds. Consult physician before use if you have medical conditions. Results vary by individual. Not a substitute for exercise and healthy diet. Not for medical treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
Leg Air Compression Massager with Heat - 3 Modes & 3 Intensities

Professional-grade leg and foot air compression massager with integrated heat therapy. Features 3 massage modes and 3 intensity levels for customizable treatment of leg fatigue, poor circulation, swelling, and muscle recovery. Ideal for athletes, travelers, desk workers, and those with circulation issues.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Air Compression Therapy: Sequential inflation massage from foot to thigh improves blood flow and reduces swelling
  • ✓ Heat Function: Integrated heating (95-104°F) relaxes muscles and enhances circulation before compression
  • ✓ 3 Massage Modes: Sequential (circulation), wave (lymphatic), pulse (muscle recovery) for different therapeutic needs
  • ✓ 3 Intensity Levels: Gentle, moderate, strong pressure (20-60mmHg) for personalized comfort
  • ✓ Full Leg Coverage: Wraps extend from foot to upper thigh for comprehensive leg treatment
  • ✓ Recovery & Wellness: Reduces muscle soreness, leg fatigue, restless legs, and edema

Perfect For

  • Post-workout muscle recovery (runners, cyclists, athletes)
  • Poor leg circulation and chronic swelling (edema)
  • Varicose veins symptom management
  • Desk workers with leg fatigue from prolonged sitting
  • Frequent travelers with leg swelling after flights
  • Lymphatic drainage and detoxification therapy
  • Restless leg syndrome symptom relief
  • Neuropathy pain and numbness management

How to Use

  1. Wrap leg sleeves around both legs, securing velcro closures (ensure air tubes not twisted)
  2. Connect air tubes to main control unit
  3. Select massage mode (1: Sequential, 2: Wave, 3: Pulse)
  4. Choose intensity level (1: Gentle, 2: Moderate, 3: Strong)
  5. Activate heat function if desired (optional, can use massage alone)
  6. Relax for 15-30 minute session (auto shut-off after preset time)
  7. Use 1-3 times daily for best results - post-workout, evening, or as needed

Care Instructions

Unplug before cleaning. Wipe leg wraps with damp cloth and mild soap - do not submerge or machine wash. Clean control unit housing with dry cloth only. Air dry wraps completely before storage. Store with tubes loosely coiled to prevent kinks. Replace if air leaks develop.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable wraps fit calf circumference 10-20" (25-51cm)
  • Leg Coverage: Foot to upper thigh (adjustable length via velcro)
  • Suitable for most adults - adjustable design accommodates wide range of leg sizes

Specifications

  • Technology: Sequential air compression + infrared heat therapy
  • Massage Modes: 3 (Sequential circulation, Wave lymphatic, Pulse recovery)
  • Intensity Levels: 3 (20mmHg gentle, 40mmHg moderate, 60mmHg strong)
  • Heat Range: 95-104°F (35-40°C) adjustable
  • Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off settings
  • Power: AC adapter 110-240V (includes power cord)
  • Air Chambers: 6 chambers per leg (foot, ankle, calf, lower thigh, upper thigh)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on compressor and electronics. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for troubleshooting or replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This compression massager is for wellness and recovery purposes. Contraindications: DVT (blood clots), acute leg injury, severe varicose veins, pregnancy (without medical approval), peripheral artery disease. Consult physician before use if you have circulation disorders or medical conditions. Not for diagnosis or treatment of medical conditions.

Adjustable straps provide customized correction while breathable design ensures all-day comfort for both women and men. Key Benefits ✓ Shoulder Realignment: Pulls shoulders back to counteract rounded shoulders and forward head posture ✓ Upper Back Support: Reinforced back panel provides support between shoulder blades ✓ Muscle Retraining: Trains postural muscles to maintain proper alignment even when brace is removed ✓ Pain Reduction: Alleviates upper back, neck, and shoulder pain caused by poor posture ✓ Unisex Design: Adjustable fit works for both women and men across wide size range ✓ Discreet Wear: Slim profile fits under clothing for correction at work or social settings Perfect For Forward head posture (tech neck) Rounded shoulders (upper crossed syndrome) Slouching and hunched upper back Desk workers with poor sitting posture Upper back pain from postural strain Shoulder blade pain and tension Post-pregnancy posture correction Maintaining proper posture during daily activities How to Use Put on like a backpack - slide arms through shoulder loops Position back pad between shoulder blades Pull adjustment straps to desired tension (should feel gentle backward pull) Straps should be snug but not painful or restrict breathing Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-4 hours over 2-3 weeks Wear during activities most associated with poor posture (computer work, studying) Combine with posture strengthening exercises for lasting results Advanced users may progress to wearing during sleep (6-8 weeks after starting) Care Instructions Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect straps and stitching monthly for wear. Replace when straps lose elasticity or no longer provide adequate correction (typically 6-12 months with regular use). Do not bleach. Not for severe spinal deformities, scoliosis, or kyphosis without medical supervision. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing or circulation. Not a substitute for postural strengthening exercises or physical therapy. Prolonged use without muscle strengthening may cause dependency. Consult healthcare provider if you have spinal conditions. products.descriptionHtml:
Posture Corrector Back Brace - Adjustable Support for Women & Men

Universal posture corrector designed to gently realign shoulders and upper back, combating forward slouch posture from desk work and daily activities. Adjustable straps provide customized correction while breathable design ensures all-day comfort for both women and men.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Shoulder Realignment: Pulls shoulders back to counteract rounded shoulders and forward head posture
  • ✓ Upper Back Support: Reinforced back panel provides support between shoulder blades
  • ✓ Muscle Retraining: Trains postural muscles to maintain proper alignment even when brace is removed
  • ✓ Pain Reduction: Alleviates upper back, neck, and shoulder pain caused by poor posture
  • ✓ Unisex Design: Adjustable fit works for both women and men across wide size range
  • ✓ Discreet Wear: Slim profile fits under clothing for correction at work or social settings

Perfect For

  • Forward head posture (tech neck)
  • Rounded shoulders (upper crossed syndrome)
  • Slouching and hunched upper back
  • Desk workers with poor sitting posture
  • Upper back pain from postural strain
  • Shoulder blade pain and tension
  • Post-pregnancy posture correction
  • Maintaining proper posture during daily activities

How to Use

  1. Put on like a backpack - slide arms through shoulder loops
  2. Position back pad between shoulder blades
  3. Pull adjustment straps to desired tension (should feel gentle backward pull)
  4. Straps should be snug but not painful or restrict breathing
  5. Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-4 hours over 2-3 weeks
  6. Wear during activities most associated with poor posture (computer work, studying)
  7. Combine with posture strengthening exercises for lasting results
  8. Advanced users may progress to wearing during sleep (6-8 weeks after starting)

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect straps and stitching monthly for wear. Replace when straps lose elasticity or no longer provide adequate correction (typically 6-12 months with regular use). Do not bleach.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line
  • S: 28-32" (71-81cm)
  • M: 32-36" (81-91cm)
  • L: 36-40" (91-102cm)
  • XL: 40-44" (102-112cm)
  • XXL: 44-48" (112-122cm)
  • For maximum correction, choose snug fit without sizing up
  • Unisex sizing accommodates both women and men

Specifications

  • Type: Upper back and shoulder posture corrector
  • Material: Breathable elastic, neoprene padding, nylon straps
  • Design: Figure-8 shoulder loops with back support panel
  • Adjustability: Fully adjustable straps for customized correction
  • Support Level: Medium (suitable for posture correction and mild slouching)
  • Features: Breathable, discreet under clothing, unisex fit

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing exchanges or usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This posture corrector provides mechanical support. Not for severe spinal deformities, scoliosis, or kyphosis without medical supervision. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing or circulation. Not a substitute for postural strengthening exercises or physical therapy. Prolonged use without muscle strengthening may cause dependency. Consult healthcare provider if you have spinal conditions. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms develop.

  • ✓ Pain Relief: Alleviates tension, stiffness, and chronic neck pain

Perfect For

  • Cervical spine pain and stiffness
  • Neck muscle tension and knots
  • Tech neck from computer/phone use
  • Lymphatic congestion in neck area
  • Acupoint therapy for neck health
  • Chronic neck pain management
  • Stress-related neck tension
  • Office worker neck fatigue

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use
  2. Position massager on back of neck (cervical spine area)
  3. Curved arms should rest on sides of neck
  4. Adjust for comfortable contact with acupoints
  5. Select mode (EMS, acupoint, lymphatic, or combination)
  6. Start at lowest intensity, increase gradually
  7. Session duration: 15-20 minutes
  8. Use 1-2 times daily
  9. Can use while sitting, lying down, or working

Mode Guide

  • EMS Mode: Electrical muscle stimulation for tension relief
  • Acupoint Mode: Targeted pressure point therapy
  • Lymphatic Mode: Drainage and detoxification
  • Combined Mode: All therapies simultaneously

Care Instructions

Wipe contact points with alcohol wipe after each use. Clean device body with slightly damp cloth. Do not submerge in water. Recharge when battery indicator shows low. Store in protective case.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS, acupoint stimulation, lymphatic drainage
  • Modes: 4-6 treatment programs
  • Intensity Levels: 10-15 adjustable settings
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C)
  • Runtime: 10-15 sessions per charge
  • Material: ABS plastic, silicone contact pads
  • Size: Adjustable (fits most neck sizes)
  • Weight: Lightweight (~200g)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for usage protocols.

Medical Disclaimer: For therapeutic neck massage and pain relief, not medical treatment. Contraindications: pacemaker, ICD, pregnancy, epilepsy, metal neck implants, recent neck surgery, skin infections, open wounds, thyroid disorders. Do not use on throat or front of neck. If pain worsens, dizziness, numbness, or tingling in arms occurs, discontinue and consult healthcare provider. Not a substitute for professional medical care for serious neck conditions.

products.descriptionHtml:
Knee Joint Booster - Mountaineering Sports Elderly Support

Innovative knee joint booster with integrated spring-powered rebound technology designed for mountaineering, hiking, and daily mobility assistance. Provides power-assisted knee extension to reduce strain during uphill climbing, stair navigation, and standing from seated positions - ideal for outdoor enthusiasts and elderly users.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Power-Assisted Movement: Built-in springs reduce knee load by 40% during extension movements (standing, climbing)
  • ✓ Mountaineering Support: Reduces quad fatigue on steep ascents and provides stability on descents
  • ✓ Elderly Mobility Aid: Assists with sit-to-stand transitions, stair climbing, and walking with reduced joint stress
  • ✓ Sports Protection: Stabilizes knee during hiking, trail running, skiing, and outdoor activities
  • ✓ Adjustable Spring Tension: Customize rebound strength for different activities or physical capabilities
  • ✓ Breathable & Durable: Moisture-wicking materials suitable for long hikes and all-day wear

Perfect For

  • Mountaineering, hiking, and trail activities
  • Elderly users needing assistance with stairs and standing
  • Ski touring and backcountry skiing
  • People with weak quadriceps or knee arthritis
  • Post-knee surgery users returning to outdoor activities
  • Construction workers climbing ladders or scaffolding
  • Long-distance hikers reducing knee fatigue

How to Use

  1. Adjust spring tension to desired level (start with lightest setting for first use)
  2. Position brace with hinges aligned to knee joint, springs on lateral sides
  3. Secure thigh strap first, then calf strap - ensure snug fit without restricting circulation
  4. Test range of motion - springs should engage smoothly during extension, compress during flexion
  5. For mountaineering: Increase spring tension for steep climbs, reduce for descents
  6. Break in gradually - use for 1-2 hours initially, increase duration over 1 week

Care Instructions

Hand wash straps and padding with mild soap. Wipe springs and hinges with damp cloth - do not submerge metal components. Lubricate spring joints monthly with silicone spray. Inspect springs for rust or damage before each use. Store in dry environment.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 5" above kneecap
  • S: 14-16" (36-41cm)
  • M: 16-18" (41-46cm)
  • L: 18-20" (46-51cm)
  • XL: 20-22" (51-56cm)
  • XXL: 22-24" (56-61cm)
  • For elderly users with muscle atrophy, measure carefully and consider sizing down

Specifications

  • Type: Spring-powered knee joint booster brace
  • Spring System: Bilateral coil springs with adjustable tension (3 settings)
  • Material: Aluminum alloy frame, breathable neoprene, stainless steel springs
  • Weight: 1.5-2 lbs per pair (lightweight for hiking)
  • Support Level: Medium with power-assist functionality
  • Load Reduction: Up to 40% knee strain reduction during extension

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on springs and hinges. Spring replacement available. Contact us for sizing or adjustment guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee booster is designed for mobility assistance and sports support, not medical treatment. Consult physician before use if you have knee instability, recent surgery, or severe arthritis. Springs provide mechanical assistance but do not replace proper physical conditioning. Adjust spring tension carefully to avoid over-extension injury.

Hand wash glove fabric with mild soap. Air dry completely. Wipe control unit with damp cloth. Check all connections before each use. Store in protective case when not in use. Specifications Technology: Robotic finger assistance with mirror training Modes: 5-7 rehabilitation programs Difficulty Levels: Adjustable resistance and assistance Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C) Runtime: 8-12 sessions per charge Sizes: S/M/L (measure hand circumference) Includes: Glove(s), control unit, charger, instruction manual Certification: Medical device registration (check locally) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on electronic components. products.descriptionHtml:
Rehabilitation Robot Gloves - Mirror Training for Stroke & Hemiplegia Recovery

Advanced robot rehabilitation gloves featuring mirror training technology for stroke recovery and hemiplegia rehabilitation. Intelligent finger training system assists hand function recovery through automated movement assistance and mirror therapy for neurological rehabilitation.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Robot-Assisted Therapy: Automated finger movement assistance
  • ✓ Mirror Training: Healthy hand guides affected hand movement
  • ✓ Stroke Recovery: Specifically designed for post-stroke rehabilitation
  • ✓ Hemiplegia Support: Helps paralyzed or weakened hand regain function
  • ✓ Finger Training: Individual finger movement training
  • ✓ Home Rehabilitation: Professional therapy at home

Perfect For

  • Post-stroke hand paralysis
  • Hemiplegia rehabilitation
  • Finger flexion/extension training
  • Hand function recovery
  • Fine motor skill restoration
  • Neurological rehabilitation
  • Post-injury hand therapy
  • Long-term rehabilitation programs

How to Use

  1. Charge gloves fully before first use
  2. Place affected hand into glove, secure wrist strap
  3. Optional: wear healthy hand glove for mirror training mode
  4. Select training mode on control unit
  5. Choose difficulty level (beginner to advanced)
  6. In mirror mode: healthy hand movement triggers affected hand assistance
  7. In passive mode: glove moves fingers automatically
  8. Session duration: 20-30 minutes
  9. Use 2-3 times daily consistently
  10. Gradually increase difficulty as function improves

Training Modes

  • Mirror Training: Healthy hand controls affected hand movements
  • Passive Training: Automatic finger flexion/extension
  • Active-Assisted: Patient initiates, device assists
  • Resistance Training: Builds strength as function returns
  • Task-Oriented: Functional movement patterns

Care Instructions

Remove electronic components before cleaning. Hand wash glove fabric with mild soap. Air dry completely. Wipe control unit with damp cloth. Check all connections before each use. Store in protective case when not in use.

Specifications

  • Technology: Robotic finger assistance with mirror training
  • Modes: 5-7 rehabilitation programs
  • Difficulty Levels: Adjustable resistance and assistance
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C)
  • Runtime: 8-12 sessions per charge
  • Sizes: S/M/L (measure hand circumference)
  • Includes: Glove(s), control unit, charger, instruction manual
  • Certification: Medical device registration (check locally)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electronic components. Contact us for rehabilitation protocols.

Medical Disclaimer: Rehabilitation device to be used under healthcare provider guidance or prescription. Not a standalone treatment - should be part of comprehensive stroke rehabilitation program supervised by occupational therapist or physical therapist. Contraindications: hand fractures, joint instability, severe spasticity, open wounds, infections, skin conditions. If pain, increased spasticity, or skin irritation occurs, discontinue and consult therapist. Results vary based on stroke severity, time since stroke, and consistency of use. Regular use over months required for functional improvement.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Neck Shoulder Vibration Massager - Cervical Vertebra Relief

Advanced electric neck and shoulder massager with multi-mode vibration, heat therapy, and pulse stimulation for comprehensive cervical care. Ergonomic U-shaped design contours to neck and shoulder anatomy, delivering targeted relief for muscle tension, stiffness, and chronic pain.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Multi-Mode Therapy: Combines vibration, pulse stimulation, and heat for comprehensive neck/shoulder treatment
  • ✓ Cervical Vertebra Relief: Targets cervical spine area to relieve pressure on discs and nerve roots
  • ✓ Ergonomic U-Design: Anatomically shaped to fit neck curve and shoulder muscles perfectly
  • ✓ Pulse Stimulation: EMS pulses penetrate deep into muscles to release tension and knots
  • ✓ Integrated Heating: Infrared heat (95-113°F) relaxes muscles and enhances massage effectiveness
  • ✓ Portable & Wireless: Rechargeable design allows use anywhere - office, home, car, travel

Perfect For

  • Chronic neck pain and stiffness (tech neck)
  • Shoulder muscle tension and knots (upper trapezius)
  • Cervical arthritis and disc pain
  • Tension headaches from neck strain
  • Desk workers with forward head posture
  • Post-workout neck and shoulder recovery
  • Stress-related muscle tension
  • Poor circulation causing neck stiffness

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully via USB-C cable (2-3 hours for full charge)
  2. Place U-shaped massager around neck with arms resting on shoulders
  3. Adjust position until massage nodes contact tense neck/shoulder areas
  4. Select mode: Mode 1 (Vibration), Mode 2 (Pulse), Mode 3 (Heat+Vibration), Mode 4 (Combined)
  5. Choose intensity level (1-15 adjustable strength)
  6. Relax for 10-20 minute session
  7. Device auto shuts off after 15 minutes for safety
  8. Use 2-3 times daily as needed for pain/tension relief

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior with soft, slightly damp cloth. Do not submerge in water - not waterproof. Clean contact electrodes with dry cloth. Store in protective case. Recharge when battery indicator shows low (flashing red). Avoid dropping or exposing to extreme temperatures. Replace if massage nodes lose intensity or battery won't hold charge.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable arms fit neck circumferences 11-18" (28-46cm)
  • Weight: Lightweight (12-14 oz) for comfortable extended wear
  • Suitable for adults - ergonomic design fits most body types

Specifications

  • Technology: Vibration massage + EMS pulse + infrared heat therapy
  • Massage Modes: 4 programs (vibration, pulse, heat+vibration, combination)
  • Intensity: 15 adjustable levels
  • Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C)
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (2200mAh, USB-C charging)
  • Runtime: 3-5 sessions per charge (varies by mode/intensity)
  • Timer: 15-minute auto shut-off
  • Material: Medical-grade ABS plastic, soft silicone contact pads

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electronics and battery. Contact us for troubleshooting or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This electric massager is for wellness and muscle relaxation. Contraindications: pacemakers, defibrillators, pregnancy, epilepsy, acute injury, skin conditions, open wounds. Do not use if you have cervical spine instability or recent surgery. Not for children. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have medical conditions. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms occur. Not a substitute for medical treatment.

Key Benefits ✓ Lymphatic Drainage: Stimulates lymphatic system to remove toxins, reduce water retention, improve immune function ✓ EMS Technology: Electrical muscle stimulation increases metabolism and breaks up fatty deposits ✓ Anti-Cellulite Action: Multi-directional massage breaks up cellulite dimples and improves skin texture ✓ Meridian Therapy: Traditional Chinese medicine energy pathways stimulation for holistic wellness ✓ Gua Sha Function: Scraping technique improves circulation and releases muscle tension Perfect For Cellulite reduction on thighs, buttocks, arms Lymphatic system detoxification Water retention and bloating Body contouring and slimming Post-surgical lymphedema management (with doctor approval) Improving skin firmness and texture Complementing weight loss programs How to Use Apply massage oil or anti-cellulite cream to treatment area Turn on device and select mode (EMS, vibration, or combination) Select brush head appropriate for body area Move device in slow, circular motions over target area Use upward strokes following lymphatic flow (toward heart) Apply gentle to moderate pressure - avoid excessive force Treat each area for 5-10 minutes Use 3-5 times per week for best results Drink water after treatment to flush released toxins Treatment Protocol Cellulite Reduction: Circular motions, 10 minutes per area, 5x weekly Lymphatic Drainage: Light pressure, upward strokes, 3x weekly Body Contouring: Combination mode, firm pressure, 4x weekly Maintenance: 2-3x weekly after achieving results Care Instructions Clean brush heads with warm water and soap after each use. Wipe device body with damp cloth. Do not immerse in water. Store in protective case. Replace brush heads every 3-6 months. products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Lymphatic Drainage Machine with EMS

Professional lymphatic drainage system combining EMS muscle stimulation, massage brush, and gua sha physiotherapy techniques. Meridian body massage apparatus targets cellulite reduction, fluid retention, and body contouring through multiple therapeutic modalities.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Lymphatic Drainage: Stimulates lymphatic system to remove toxins, reduce water retention, improve immune function
  • ✓ EMS Technology: Electrical muscle stimulation increases metabolism and breaks up fatty deposits
  • ✓ Anti-Cellulite Action: Multi-directional massage breaks up cellulite dimples and improves skin texture
  • ✓ Meridian Therapy: Traditional Chinese medicine energy pathways stimulation for holistic wellness
  • ✓ Gua Sha Function: Scraping technique improves circulation and releases muscle tension

Perfect For

  • Cellulite reduction on thighs, buttocks, arms
  • Lymphatic system detoxification
  • Water retention and bloating
  • Body contouring and slimming
  • Post-surgical lymphedema management (with doctor approval)
  • Improving skin firmness and texture
  • Complementing weight loss programs

How to Use

  1. Apply massage oil or anti-cellulite cream to treatment area
  2. Turn on device and select mode (EMS, vibration, or combination)
  3. Select brush head appropriate for body area
  4. Move device in slow, circular motions over target area
  5. Use upward strokes following lymphatic flow (toward heart)
  6. Apply gentle to moderate pressure - avoid excessive force
  7. Treat each area for 5-10 minutes
  8. Use 3-5 times per week for best results
  9. Drink water after treatment to flush released toxins

Treatment Protocol

Cellulite Reduction: Circular motions, 10 minutes per area, 5x weekly
Lymphatic Drainage: Light pressure, upward strokes, 3x weekly
Body Contouring: Combination mode, firm pressure, 4x weekly
Maintenance: 2-3x weekly after achieving results

Care Instructions

Clean brush heads with warm water and soap after each use. Wipe device body with damp cloth. Do not immerse in water. Store in protective case. Replace brush heads every 3-6 months.

Specifications

  • Technologies: EMS + mechanical massage + vibration + gua sha
  • Modes: Multiple treatment programs
  • Intensity Levels: Adjustable (3-5 levels)
  • Brush Heads: Multiple attachments for different body areas
  • Power: Rechargeable or AC adapter
  • Treatment Areas: Thighs, buttocks, abdomen, arms, back
  • Weight: Handheld, ergonomic design

Expected Results

Week 1-2: Improved circulation, reduced bloating
Week 3-4: Noticeable cellulite smoothing
Week 5-8: Visible body contouring, firmer skin
Maintenance: Continued improvement with regular use
Results vary - most effective with exercise and healthy eating.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement brush heads available. Contact us with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This device is for cosmetic body contouring and wellness. Not medical equipment or weight loss solution. Do not use if: pregnant, have cancer, blood clots, skin infections, varicose veins, or circulatory disorders. Not for use on: face, neck, chest, genitals, or broken skin. For post-surgical lymphedema: use only with doctor or therapist approval. This device does not cure medical conditions. Results require consistent use with healthy lifestyle. Consult healthcare provider if you have health concerns.

products.descriptionHtml:
Relaxing Eye Massager with Heat & Music - Ease Migraines, Eye Strain

Advanced relaxation eye massager combining heat therapy, air pressure massage, vibration, and music therapy for comprehensive eye fatigue relief. Specially designed to alleviate migraines, eye strain from screens, dry eyes, and stress-related tension while providing spa-quality relaxation at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Migraine Relief: Gentle pressure and heat on acupoints around eyes help reduce migraine frequency and intensity
  • ✓ Eye Strain Relief: Relieves digital eye strain from computer, phone, and screen use
  • ✓ Multi-Mode Massage: Air pressure, vibration, and heat work together to relax eye muscles and improve circulation
  • ✓ Music Therapy: Built-in Bluetooth speaker plays relaxing music or nature sounds to enhance stress relief
  • ✓ Heat Therapy: Warm compression (95-107°F) helps meibomian gland function and dry eye relief
  • ✓ Acupoint Stimulation: Targets key pressure points (Jingming, Cuanzhu, Taiyang) for holistic eye care

Perfect For

  • Chronic migraines and tension headaches
  • Digital eye strain and computer vision syndrome
  • Dry eye syndrome and meibomian gland dysfunction
  • Eye fatigue from reading or detailed work
  • Dark circles and puffy eyes
  • Sinus pressure and congestion
  • Stress-related tension around eyes
  • Insomnia and difficulty relaxing before sleep

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully via USB before first use
  2. Optional: Connect smartphone via Bluetooth to play preferred music/sounds
  3. Adjust head strap for comfortable fit
  4. Select mode: Massage, Heat+Massage, Vibration+Massage, or Auto
  5. Adjust air pressure intensity (typically 3 levels available)
  6. Recline or lie down for 10-15 minute session
  7. Device auto shuts off after preset time
  8. Use 1-2 times daily for chronic conditions, or as needed for relief
  9. For migraines: Use at onset of symptoms for best results

Care Instructions

Wipe interior and exterior with soft, slightly damp cloth. Do not submerge - not waterproof. Clean after each use if multiple users. Store in protective case. Recharge when battery indicator shows low. Inspect air pump function and speaker quality periodically. Replace if air pressure weakens or battery won't hold charge.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable head strap fits all adults (head circumference 20-24")
  • Eye Cups: Designed to fit average adult eye spacing (55-70mm IPD)
  • Suitable for users 16+ years old
  • Foldable design for easy storage and travel

Specifications

  • Technology: Air pressure massage + vibration + heat therapy + music
  • Massage Modes: 4-5 programs (gentle, moderate, strong, comprehensive, migraine mode)
  • Heat Range: 95-107°F (35-42°C) adjustable
  • Music: Built-in Bluetooth speaker + 3-5 pre-loaded nature sounds
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (1200mAh, USB charging)
  • Runtime: 5-8 sessions per charge
  • Timer: 10/15 minute auto shut-off
  • Features: Bluetooth connectivity, 180° foldable, adjustable fit

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available. Contact us for usage guidance or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This eye massager is for relaxation and symptom relief. Not for treating eye diseases or medical conditions. Do not use if you have: glaucoma, retinal detachment, eye surgery (recent), cataracts, eye infection, or injury. If you have eye conditions, consult ophthalmologist before use. For migraines: Use as supplement to medical treatment, not replacement. If vision changes or eye pain worsens, discontinue and seek medical attention. Not suitable for children under 16.

Perfect For

  • Side sleepers who find traditional earbuds uncomfortable
  • Frequent travelers (planes, hotels, time zone changes)

  • Improving sleep quality with white noise or nature sounds

How to Use

  1. Charge mask via USB-C cable (2-3 hours for full charge)
  2. Long-press power button to turn on Bluetooth

  6. Play sleep audio (meditation app, white noise, audiobooks, etc.)

Remove Bluetooth speaker module before washing (detaches via zipper or velcro). Hand wash fabric mask with mild soap, air dry completely. Wipe speaker module with dry cloth - do not submerge. Recharge via USB-C cable as needed. Store in protective case when traveling. Replace if speakers malfunction or battery won't hold charge.

Sizing Guide

  • Contoured design fits most face shapes

  • Battery: Rechargeable 200mAh lithium (USB-C charging)

  • Charge Time: 2-3 hours for full charge
  • Bluetooth Range: 33 feet (10 meters)
  • Material: Soft breathable fabric, memory foam padding, washable
  • Features: Side sleeper compatible, 100% blackout, removable electronics

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on Bluetooth electronics. Contact us for pairing assistance or troubleshooting.

Medical Disclaimer: This sleep mask is a sleep aid device for insomnia, travel, and relaxation. Not for treating diagnosed sleep disorders (apnea, narcolepsy) without medical consultation. Do not use while driving or operating machinery. Volume should be kept low to prevent hearing damage. If sleep problems persist, consult healthcare provider. Provides gentle mechanical traction to decompress lumbar discs while massaging surrounding muscles - bringing professional spinal therapy to your home. Key Benefits ✓ Lumbar Traction: Gently stretches lumbar spine to relieve pressure on compressed discs and pinched nerves ✓ Electric Massage: Vibration massage relaxes tight back muscles and improves local circulation ✓ Heat Therapy: Infrared heating (95-113°F) penetrates deep into muscles to reduce stiffness and pain ✓ Disc Decompression: Reduces pressure on herniated or bulging discs, alleviating sciatic nerve irritation ✓ Adjustable Traction: Control traction intensity to match your comfort level and treatment needs ✓ Convenient Home Use: Professional spinal therapy without expensive clinic visits Perfect For Herniated or bulging lumbar discs (L4-L5, L5-S1) Sciatica pain and nerve compression Chronic lower back pain and muscle tension Degenerative disc disease Spinal stenosis symptom management Desk workers with lower back strain from prolonged sitting Post-work back fatigue relief Lumbar muscle spasms How to Use Secure device around waist with center positioned over lumbar spine (L3-L5 level) Fasten all straps to ensure device won't shift during traction Select traction intensity level (start with lowest for first use) Activate heat function (optional but recommended for muscle relaxation) Turn on vibration massage mode Recline or lie down for 15-30 minute session (sitting reduces traction effectiveness) Device will gently inflate to apply traction force, deflate periodically for comfort Use 2-3 times daily for chronic pain, or as needed for acute strain Care Instructions Unplug before cleaning. products.descriptionHtml:
Lumbar Traction Massager - Electric Waist Protection Device

Innovative electric lumbar traction massager combining spinal decompression, heat therapy, and vibration massage for comprehensive lower back pain relief. Provides gentle mechanical traction to decompress lumbar discs while massaging surrounding muscles - bringing professional spinal therapy to your home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Lumbar Traction: Gently stretches lumbar spine to relieve pressure on compressed discs and pinched nerves
  • ✓ Electric Massage: Vibration massage relaxes tight back muscles and improves local circulation
  • ✓ Heat Therapy: Infrared heating (95-113°F) penetrates deep into muscles to reduce stiffness and pain
  • ✓ Disc Decompression: Reduces pressure on herniated or bulging discs, alleviating sciatic nerve irritation
  • ✓ Adjustable Traction: Control traction intensity to match your comfort level and treatment needs
  • ✓ Convenient Home Use: Professional spinal therapy without expensive clinic visits

Perfect For

  • Herniated or bulging lumbar discs (L4-L5, L5-S1)
  • Sciatica pain and nerve compression
  • Chronic lower back pain and muscle tension
  • Degenerative disc disease
  • Spinal stenosis symptom management
  • Desk workers with lower back strain from prolonged sitting
  • Post-work back fatigue relief
  • Lumbar muscle spasms

How to Use

  1. Secure device around waist with center positioned over lumbar spine (L3-L5 level)
  2. Fasten all straps to ensure device won't shift during traction
  3. Select traction intensity level (start with lowest for first use)
  4. Activate heat function (optional but recommended for muscle relaxation)
  5. Turn on vibration massage mode
  6. Recline or lie down for 15-30 minute session (sitting reduces traction effectiveness)
  7. Device will gently inflate to apply traction force, deflate periodically for comfort
  8. Use 2-3 times daily for chronic pain, or as needed for acute strain

Care Instructions

Unplug before cleaning. Wipe exterior with damp cloth and mild soap - do not submerge electrical components. Air dry completely. Store in cool, dry place. Check air pump function monthly. Replace if air leaks develop or traction force weakens.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal (Adjustable): Fits waist circumference 26-48" (66-122cm)
  • Height: Suitable for users 5'0" to 6'4" (152-193cm)
  • Adjustable straps accommodate wide range of body types

Specifications

  • Technology: Pneumatic traction + vibration massage + infrared heat
  • Traction Levels: 3 adjustable intensities (gentle to strong decompression)
  • Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C)
  • Vibration: 3000-5000 pulses per minute
  • Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Power: AC adapter 110-240V or rechargeable battery option
  • Traction Force: Up to 50 lbs (23 kg) decompression force

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electronics and air pump. Contact us for troubleshooting or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This lumbar traction device is for home therapy and pain management. Contraindications: acute spinal injury, fractures, spinal tumors, severe osteoporosis, aortic aneurysm, pregnancy. Do not use if you have spinal instability or cauda equina syndrome. Consult healthcare provider before use, especially if you have herniated discs or spinal conditions. Discontinue if pain increases. Not a substitute for professional medical care.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Ankle Brace with Heat & Vibration

Innovative electric ankle support combining hot compress therapy and vibration massage with traditional bracing. Adjustable ankle guard band provides compression support while built-in heating and massage functions accelerate healing and pain relief. Multi-functional foot protection tool.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 3-in-1 Treatment: Compression support + therapeutic heat + vibration massage in single device
  • ✓ Hot Compress Therapy: Adjustable heating (104-113°F) increases blood flow, reduces stiffness, accelerates healing
  • ✓ Vibration Massage: Gentle mechanical massage relieves muscle tension and improves circulation
  • ✓ Adjustable Support: Compression band provides ankle stabilization like traditional brace
  • ✓ Accelerated Recovery: Combination therapy treats pain while supporting injured ankle

Perfect For

  • Ankle sprains during recovery phase
  • Chronic ankle pain and stiffness
  • Arthritis in ankle joint
  • Achilles tendonitis
  • Poor circulation in feet/ankles
  • Post-injury rehabilitation
  • Plantar fasciitis (when heat is beneficial)
  • Tarsal tunnel syndrome

How to Use

  1. Ensure device is charged (USB rechargeable)
  2. Position brace around ankle with heating pad on painful area
  3. Secure with adjustable Velcro straps (snug but comfortable)
  4. Turn on device using control button
  5. Select heat level (low, medium, high or off)
  6. Activate vibration massage if desired
  7. Use for 15-30 minutes per session
  8. Can be used while sitting, lying down, or watching TV
  9. Use 2-3 times daily or as needed

Treatment Modes

Heat Only: For stiffness and chronic pain
Vibration Only: For muscle tension without inflammation
Heat + Vibration: Maximum therapeutic benefit for recovery
Compression Only: Traditional support during activities (power off)

When to Use Heat vs. Ice

Use Heat (this device): Chronic pain, stiffness, arthritis, after initial swelling subsides (72+ hours post-injury)
Do NOT use heat: Acute injuries (first 48-72 hours), active swelling, acute inflammation

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior with damp cloth. Do not submerge in water. Remove heating unit before washing fabric portion (if removable). Charge regularly via USB. Store in cool, dry place.

Specifications

  • Functions: Compression + heat therapy + vibration massage
  • Heat Settings: 3 adjustable levels (104-113°F / 40-45°C)
  • Vibration: Multiple intensity levels
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (USB charging)
  • Battery Life: 2-3 hours per charge
  • Adjustability: Velcro straps fit most ankle sizes
  • Material: Breathable neoprene, heating pads, vibration motors
  • Auto Shut-off: 30 minutes for safety

Sizing Guide

Measure ankle circumference at narrowest point:
Universal: Adjustable straps fit 8-13" ankle circumference
Most adults fit standard size.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electrical components. Contact us for troubleshooting.

Medical Disclaimer: This electric ankle brace provides heat therapy and support but is not a medical treatment. Do not use heat on: acute injuries (first 48-72 hours), active swelling, open wounds, or areas with poor sensation. Not for use by: people with diabetes and neuropathy, pregnant women (without doctor approval), or anyone with circulatory disorders. Do not use if you have pacemaker or electronic implants. Not suitable for children. Consult doctor before use if you have chronic conditions. If pain worsens, discontinue use and seek medical attention.
