products.descriptionHtml:
Nano Steam Eye Massager - Warm Spa Acupressure Mask

Advanced nano-steam eye massager combining ultrasonic steam generation, warm compression, acupressure massage, and aromatherapy for comprehensive eye care. Relieves dry eyes, eye fatigue, dark circles, and tension while providing spa-quality relaxation at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Nano Steam Technology: Ultrasonic humidification generates ultra-fine steam particles (40-60°C) that penetrate deeply to hydrate eyes
  • ✓ Dry Eye Relief: Steam hydration relieves symptoms of dry eye syndrome, meibomian gland dysfunction, and screen fatigue
  • ✓ Warm Compression: Gentle heat (95-107°F) improves meibomian gland secretion and eyelid circulation
  • ✓ Acupressure Massage: Inflatable air chambers apply rhythmic pressure to acupressure points around eyes
  • ✓ Multi-Function: Reduces dark circles, puffiness, eye strain, tension headaches, and sinus pressure
  • ✓ Aromatherapy Compatible: Add essential oils to steam for enhanced relaxation experience

Perfect For

  • Chronic dry eye syndrome and meibomian gland dysfunction
  • Computer vision syndrome from screen time
  • Eye fatigue and strain from reading or detailed work
  • Dark circles and under-eye puffiness
  • Tension headaches and sinus pressure
  • Contact lens wearers with dry eyes
  • Post-LASIK or eye surgery recovery (with doctor approval)
  • Insomnia and stress relief

How to Use

  1. Add water to reservoir (5-10ml distilled water recommended)
  2. Optional: Add 1-2 drops of essential oil for aromatherapy
  3. Adjust head strap for comfortable fit
  4. Select mode: Mode 1 (steam + heat), Mode 2 (steam + heat + massage), Mode 3 (massage + heat only)
  5. Recline or lie down for 10-15 minute session
  6. Relax and enjoy - device will auto shut-off when complete
  7. Use 1-2 times daily for dry eyes, or as needed for relaxation
  8. Clean after each use and refill water reservoir

Care Instructions

Empty water reservoir after each use. Wipe interior with soft dry cloth. Clean ultrasonic humidifier plate weekly with cotton swab and distilled water. Wipe exterior with damp cloth. Do not submerge main unit. Replace sponge filters monthly with regular use. Store in cool, dry place.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal Size: Adjustable head strap fits all adults
  • Eye Cups: Designed to fit average adult eye spacing (55-65mm interpupillary distance)
  • Suitable for users 16+ years old

Specifications

  • Technology: Ultrasonic nano-steam + warm compression + air pressure massage
  • Steam Generation: 40-60°C (104-140°F) ultrasonic humidification
  • Heat Range: 95-107°F (35-42°C) warm compression
  • Massage Modes: 3 programs (steam+heat, steam+heat+massage, massage+heat)
  • Water Capacity: 5-10ml reservoir
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C charging, 1000mAh)
  • Runtime: 3-5 sessions per charge
  • Timer: 10/15 minute auto shut-off

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement filters available. Contact us for troubleshooting or replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This eye massager is for wellness and dry eye symptom relief. Do not use if you have: active eye infection, glaucoma, retinal detachment, recent eye surgery (without doctor approval), or eye injury. If you have eye conditions, consult ophthalmologist before use. Discontinue if pain or vision changes occur. Not for diagnosis or treatment of eye diseases. Not suitable for children under 16.

products.descriptionHtml:
4-in-1 Cavitation Body Slimming Machine - 40K Ultrasound Beauty Device

Professional 4-in-1 body slimming system combining 40K cavitation ultrasound, vacuum suction, RF skin tightening, and face lifting technologies. Comprehensive beauty machine delivers salon-quality body contouring, cellulite reduction, and facial treatments at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 4 Technologies in 1: 40K cavitation, vacuum, RF, face lifting
  • ✓ Body Slimming: Ultrasound cavitation breaks down fat cells
  • ✓ Cellulite Reduction: Vacuum massage improves skin texture
  • ✓ Skin Tightening: RF (radio frequency) firms loose skin
  • ✓ Face Lifting: Specialized head for facial contouring
  • ✓ Professional Grade: Salon-quality results at home

Perfect For

  • Body contouring and slimming
  • Cellulite appearance reduction
  • Post-pregnancy body restoration
  • Stubborn fat area targeting
  • Loose skin tightening
  • Facial lifting and firming
  • Double chin reduction
  • Overall body shaping goals

How to Use

  1. Select appropriate head for treatment area
  2. Apply conductive gel generously
  3. Body Treatment: Use 40K cavitation head, circular motions (15-20 min/area)
  4. Cellulite: Use vacuum head, slow upward strokes (10-15 min)
  5. Skin Tightening: Use RF head after cavitation (10 min)
  6. Face: Use face lifting head with gentle motions (10 min)
  7. Frequency: 2-3 times weekly (allow 2-3 days between sessions)
  8. Drink plenty of water after treatment
  9. Clean heads thoroughly after use

Treatment Protocol

  • Phase 1 (Weeks 1-4): 3x weekly, focus on target areas
  • Phase 2 (Weeks 5-8): 2x weekly, maintenance and toning
  • Phase 3 (Week 9+): 1-2x weekly, maintain results

Care Instructions

Clean all heads with damp cloth and mild disinfectant after each use. Wipe device body with soft cloth. Do not submerge in water. Store heads in protective caps. Keep away from extreme temperatures.

Specifications

  • Technologies: 40K ultrasound cavitation, vacuum suction, RF, microcurrent
  • Cavitation Frequency: 40KHz
  • RF Frequency: 1MHz
  • Heads Included: 4-5 treatment heads
  • Power: AC adapter (110-240V)
  • Display: LCD screen
  • Shipping: Overseas warehouse shipment

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended warranty available. Contact us for usage protocols.

Medical Disclaimer: For cosmetic use only. Not for medical weight loss or fat removal. Does not replace diet and exercise. Contraindications: pregnancy, pacemaker, metal implants in treatment area, cancer, liver/kidney disease, blood clotting disorders, infections. Do not use on head, neck (throat), chest, or genital areas. Not for use on individuals under 18. Results vary based on individual factors, consistency, and lifestyle. Not FDA-cleared for medical treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Orthopedic Knee Brace

Medical-grade orthopedic knee brace providing comprehensive support for knee, ankle, and leg injuries. Adjustable design with joint fixation technology stabilizes ligaments and bones while allowing controlled movement. Professional-quality pain relief and protection.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Orthopedic Grade: Hospital-quality construction meets medical standards for injury recovery and joint protection
  • ✓ Joint Fixation System: Rigid side supports prevent harmful lateral movement while allowing safe flexion
  • ✓ Fully Adjustable: Multiple straps customize compression and fit for different leg sizes and injury types
  • ✓ Ligament Protection: Stabilizes ACL, MCL, LCL, and PCL during recovery from tears or sprains
  • ✓ Bone Support: Provides stabilization for fractures, post-surgical recovery, and osteoarthritis management

Perfect For

  • ACL, MCL, LCL, PCL tears or strains
  • Post-surgical knee recovery
  • Meniscus injuries
  • Osteoarthritis and joint instability
  • Patellar dislocation prevention
  • Sports injury rehabilitation
  • Chronic knee pain from overuse

How to Use

  1. Consult healthcare provider to confirm brace is appropriate for your condition
  2. Position brace with hinges aligned to your knee joint
  3. Secure upper thigh strap first (snug but not too tight)
  4. Fasten lower calf strap
  5. Adjust middle knee straps for proper patellar positioning
  6. Ensure you can fit 1-2 fingers under straps (not cutting circulation)
  7. Wear during activities or as directed by doctor
  8. Remove at night unless instructed otherwise

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap and warm water. Air dry completely before reuse. Do not machine wash or dry. Check metal hinges and fasteners regularly for wear.

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic hinged knee brace
  • Support Level: Maximum (Level 3)
  • Hinges: Bilateral aluminum alloy stays
  • Material: Medical-grade neoprene, breathable mesh
  • Straps: 4-6 adjustable compression straps
  • Sizes: Adjustable to fit most leg circumferences
  • Color: Black

Sizing Guide

Measure thigh circumference 6 inches above kneecap. Adjustable design accommodates most sizes. Contact us for sizing assistance.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty against defects. Extended warranty available. Contact support for fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This orthopedic brace is designed to support injured or unstable joints. Always consult with doctor, physical therapist, or orthopedic specialist before use. Not intended to replace professional medical treatment. Follow healthcare provider's instructions for wear duration and activity restrictions.

products.title: O/X-Type Leg Corrector | Adjustable Leg Straightener
products.description: O/X-Type Leg Corrector Strap - Elastic Leg Straightener Orthopedic leg corrector designed to address O-type legs (bow legs) and X-type legs (knock knees) through gentle, progressive alignment therapy. Adjustable elastic straps apply corrective pressure to guide legs toward proper alignment, improving posture, gait, and reducing joint stress. Key Benefits ✓ Dual Function: Corrects both O-type (bow legs/genu varum) and X-type (knock knees/genu valgum) leg alignment ✓ Progressive Correction: Adjustable tension allows gradual realignment over weeks/months for lasting results ✓ Elastic Design: Comfortable elastic bands provide consistent corrective force without rigid discomfort ✓ Posture Improvement: Proper leg alignment enhances overall posture and reduces back/hip strain ✓ Joint Protection: Reduces uneven knee/ankle joint wear caused by malalignment ✓ Discreet Wear: Thin design wears under clothing for all-day correction Perfect For Mild to moderate O-type legs (bow legs) in adolescents/adults X-type legs (knock knees) causing gait issues Leg alignment issues affecting posture and appearance Uneven joint wear from leg malalignment Knee pain from abnormal leg alignment patterns Post-growth spurt alignment correction (teens) Complementing physical therapy for leg alignment Preventing progression of mild leg deformities How to Use Determine leg type: O-type (bow legs - gap between knees when standing) or X-type (knock knees - knees touch, ankles separate) For O-type: Position straps to pull knees inward toward midline For X-type: Configure straps to separate knees and align legs Adjust elastic tension - start with minimal correction, increase gradually over weeks Wear 2-4 hours daily initially, increase to 6-8 hours as tolerated Use during standing/walking activities for active correction Combine with strengthening exercises (hip abductors/adductors) for best results Results typically require 3-6 months of consistent use Care Instructions Hand wash elastic straps with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or expose to heat. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect elastic for wear or loss of tension monthly. Replace when straps no longer provide firm support (typically 6-12 months). Store flat to prevent creasing. Sizing Guide Measure: Thigh circumference at mid-thigh + leg length (hip to ankle) S: Thigh 16-18", Leg length <30" (youth/petite) M: Thigh 18-20", Leg length 30-34" (average adults) L: Thigh 20-22", Leg length 34-38" (tall/larger builds) XL: Thigh 22-24", Leg length 38-42" (XL builds) Adjustable design accommodates range within each size category Specifications Type: Orthopedic leg alignment corrector (O-type/X-type) Material: High-elasticity fabric, adjustable velcro straps, breathable mesh Adjustment: Multi-point adjustment for customized correction angle Support Level: Light to medium corrective force (progressive) Design: Dual-function (converts between O-type and X-type correction) Features: Breathable, discreet under clothing, washable Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on materials. Contact us for sizing or usage guidance. Medical Disclaimer: This leg corrector is designed for mild to moderate leg alignment issues in growing adolescents and adults with flexible deformities. Not effective for severe, rigid, or congenital leg deformities. Not suitable for: skeletal dysplasias, Blount's disease (severe), rickets, or post-traumatic deformities without medical clearance. Consult orthopedic specialist before use for proper diagnosis and treatment plan. Most effective when used before skeletal maturity (growth plate closure). Results vary by severity, age, and consistency of use. May not achieve complete correction in all cases. Does not replace surgical correction when medically indicated.
products.descriptionHtml:
O/X-Type Leg Corrector Strap - Elastic Leg Straightener

Orthopedic leg corrector designed to address O-type legs (bow legs) and X-type legs (knock knees) through gentle, progressive alignment therapy. Adjustable elastic straps apply corrective pressure to guide legs toward proper alignment, improving posture, gait, and reducing joint stress.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Function: Corrects both O-type (bow legs/genu varum) and X-type (knock knees/genu valgum) leg alignment
  • ✓ Progressive Correction: Adjustable tension allows gradual realignment over weeks/months for lasting results
  • ✓ Elastic Design: Comfortable elastic bands provide consistent corrective force without rigid discomfort
  • ✓ Posture Improvement: Proper leg alignment enhances overall posture and reduces back/hip strain
  • ✓ Joint Protection: Reduces uneven knee/ankle joint wear caused by malalignment
  • ✓ Discreet Wear: Thin design wears under clothing for all-day correction

Perfect For

  • Mild to moderate O-type legs (bow legs) in adolescents/adults
  • X-type legs (knock knees) causing gait issues
  • Leg alignment issues affecting posture and appearance
  • Uneven joint wear from leg malalignment
  • Knee pain from abnormal leg alignment patterns
  • Post-growth spurt alignment correction (teens)
  • Complementing physical therapy for leg alignment
  • Preventing progression of mild leg deformities

How to Use

  1. Determine leg type: O-type (bow legs - gap between knees when standing) or X-type (knock knees - knees touch, ankles separate)
  2. For O-type: Position straps to pull knees inward toward midline
  3. For X-type: Configure straps to separate knees and align legs
  4. Adjust elastic tension - start with minimal correction, increase gradually over weeks
  5. Wear 2-4 hours daily initially, increase to 6-8 hours as tolerated
  6. Use during standing/walking activities for active correction
  7. Combine with strengthening exercises (hip abductors/adductors) for best results
  8. Results typically require 3-6 months of consistent use

Care Instructions

Hand wash elastic straps with mild soap and cold water. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or expose to heat. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect elastic for wear or loss of tension monthly. Replace when straps no longer provide firm support (typically 6-12 months). Store flat to prevent creasing.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference at mid-thigh + leg length (hip to ankle)
  • S: Thigh 16-18", Leg length <30" (youth/petite)
  • M: Thigh 18-20", Leg length 30-34" (average adults)
  • L: Thigh 20-22", Leg length 34-38" (tall/larger builds)
  • XL: Thigh 22-24", Leg length 38-42" (XL builds)
  • Adjustable design accommodates range within each size category

Specifications

  • Type: Orthopedic leg alignment corrector (O-type/X-type)
  • Material: High-elasticity fabric, adjustable velcro straps, breathable mesh
  • Adjustment: Multi-point adjustment for customized correction angle
  • Support Level: Light to medium corrective force (progressive)
  • Design: Dual-function (converts between O-type and X-type correction)
  • Features: Breathable, discreet under clothing, washable

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on materials. Contact us for sizing or usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This leg corrector is designed for mild to moderate leg alignment issues in growing adolescents and adults with flexible deformities. Not effective for severe, rigid, or congenital leg deformities. Not suitable for: skeletal dysplasias, Blount's disease (severe), rickets, or post-traumatic deformities without medical clearance. Consult orthopedic specialist before use for proper diagnosis and treatment plan. Most effective when used before skeletal maturity (growth plate closure). Results vary by severity, age, and consistency of use. May not achieve complete correction in all cases. Does not replace surgical correction when medically indicated.

products.description: Hinged Knee Brace - Post-Op ROM Adjustable Recovery Support Professional-grade hinged knee brace with adjustable ROM (Range of Motion) designed specifically for post-operative recovery. Adjustable hinges allow controlled movement progression during rehabilitation after ACL, MCL, meniscus surgery, or knee replacement. Key Benefits ✓ ROM Adjustable Hinges: Control flexion/extension range during recovery phases (0°-120° adjustment) ✓ Post-Surgery Support: Medical-grade stabilization for ACL, MCL, meniscus, or total knee replacement recovery ✓ Progressive Rehabilitation: Gradually increase ROM as healing progresses per doctor's protocol ✓ Bilateral Hinges: Dual side stabilizers provide superior knee alignment and prevent lateral movement ✓ Breathable Design: Moisture-wicking fabric prevents skin irritation during extended post-op wear ✓ Adjustable Compression: Multiple straps allow customized compression levels throughout recovery Perfect For Post-operative ACL/MCL/PCL reconstruction recovery Meniscus surgery rehabilitation Total knee replacement (TKR) recovery Post-arthroscopy stabilization Ligament repair recovery with controlled ROM progression Post-surgical protection during physical therapy How to Use Set ROM hinges to initial degree specified by your surgeon (typically locked at 0° initially) Open all straps and position brace centered on knee with hinges aligned to knee joint Secure straps from bottom to top (ankle → calf → thigh) with comfortable compression Adjust ROM settings only as directed by your healthcare provider during recovery phases Wear during all activities in early recovery, reduce wear time as healing progresses per medical advice Care Instructions Hand wash with mild soap, air dry completely. Do not machine wash hinges. Clean daily during post-op recovery. Replace padding if excessive wear occurs. Hinges should move smoothly - contact support if sticky or loose. products.descriptionHtml:
Hinged Knee Brace - Post-Op ROM Adjustable Recovery Support

Professional-grade hinged knee brace with adjustable ROM (Range of Motion) designed specifically for post-operative recovery. Adjustable hinges allow controlled movement progression during rehabilitation after ACL, MCL, meniscus surgery, or knee replacement.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ ROM Adjustable Hinges: Control flexion/extension range during recovery phases (0°-120° adjustment)
  • ✓ Post-Surgery Support: Medical-grade stabilization for ACL, MCL, meniscus, or total knee replacement recovery
  • ✓ Progressive Rehabilitation: Gradually increase ROM as healing progresses per doctor's protocol
  • ✓ Bilateral Hinges: Dual side stabilizers provide superior knee alignment and prevent lateral movement
  • ✓ Breathable Design: Moisture-wicking fabric prevents skin irritation during extended post-op wear
  • ✓ Adjustable Compression: Multiple straps allow customized compression levels throughout recovery

Perfect For

  • Post-operative ACL/MCL/PCL reconstruction recovery
  • Meniscus surgery rehabilitation
  • Total knee replacement (TKR) recovery
  • Post-arthroscopy stabilization
  • Ligament repair recovery with controlled ROM progression
  • Post-surgical protection during physical therapy

How to Use

  1. Set ROM hinges to initial degree specified by your surgeon (typically locked at 0° initially)
  2. Open all straps and position brace centered on knee with hinges aligned to knee joint
  3. Secure straps from bottom to top (ankle → calf → thigh) with comfortable compression
  4. Adjust ROM settings only as directed by your healthcare provider during recovery phases
  5. Wear during all activities in early recovery, reduce wear time as healing progresses per medical advice

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild soap, air dry completely. Do not machine wash hinges. Clean daily during post-op recovery. Replace padding if excessive wear occurs. Hinges should move smoothly - contact support if sticky or loose.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above kneecap
  • S: 14-16" (36-41cm) - Thigh circumference
  • M: 16-18" (41-46cm) - Thigh circumference
  • L: 18-20" (46-51cm) - Thigh circumference
  • XL: 20-22" (51-56cm) - Thigh circumference
  • XXL: 22-24" (56-61cm) - Thigh circumference
  • If between sizes after surgery due to swelling, size up for comfort

Specifications

  • Type: Post-operative hinged knee brace with ROM adjustment
  • Hinges: Bilateral adjustable ROM hinges (0°-120° range)
  • Material: Medical-grade neoprene/breathable composite, aluminum hinges
  • Straps: 4-6 adjustable hook-and-loop straps
  • Support Level: Maximum (medical-grade post-op support)
  • Features: ROM adjustment, bilateral hinges, open patella, anti-slip silicone

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on manufacturing defects. 1-year extended warranty available at checkout (+30 days free with product registration). Contact us for sizing or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This post-operative knee brace is designed for use under medical supervision. Always follow your surgeon or physical therapist's instructions regarding ROM settings, wear schedule, and rehabilitation progression. Not intended for diagnosis or treatment without professional medical guidance. Consult your healthcare provider before use.

Hand wash brace with mild detergent. Air dry completely. Wipe massage/heating elements with damp cloth only. Check air pump regularly for blockages. Store flat when not in use. products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Waist Massager - Heated Vibration Back Brace with Air Pressure Traction

Advanced electric lumbar support system combining heated massage, vibration therapy, and air pressure lumbar traction. Multi-function back brace delivers comprehensive lower back treatment for pain relief, muscle relaxation, and spinal decompression in one convenient device.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 4-in-1 Therapy: Heat, vibration, air pressure traction, support
  • ✓ Heated Massage: Penetrating warmth soothes muscle tension
  • ✓ Vibration Therapy: Relieves tight lower back muscles
  • ✓ Air Pressure Traction: Gently decompresses lumbar spine
  • ✓ Back Support: Stabilizes lower back during treatment and daily wear
  • ✓ Portable: Use at home, office, or while traveling

Perfect For

  • Chronic lower back pain
  • Lumbar disc herniation
  • Muscle spasms and tension
  • Sciatica nerve pain
  • Lumbar spine compression
  • Long-sitting back pain
  • Post-workout back soreness
  • Daily back support and maintenance

How to Use

  1. Wrap brace around lower back/waist area
  2. Fasten straps snugly but comfortably
  3. Connect to power source or use battery
  4. Select treatment mode (heat, vibration, or air pressure)
  5. Adjust intensity for each function
  6. Sit or lie down for maximum comfort
  7. Treatment duration: 15-20 minutes per session
  8. Use 1-2 times daily as needed
  9. Can also wear as support brace without power

Treatment Modes

  • Heat Only: Muscle relaxation (40-50℃)
  • Vibration Only: Massage therapy
  • Air Pressure Only: Lumbar traction and decompression
  • Combined: All therapies simultaneously

Care Instructions

Remove electrical components before cleaning. Hand wash brace with mild detergent. Air dry completely. Wipe massage/heating elements with damp cloth only. Check air pump regularly for blockages. Store flat when not in use.

Specifications

  • Functions: Heating, vibration, air pressure traction, support
  • Heating Range: 40-50℃ adjustable
  • Vibration Levels: 3-5 intensity settings
  • Air Pressure: Adjustable inflation levels
  • Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery
  • Timer: 15/20 minute auto shut-off
  • Size: Adjustable (fits waist 28"-48")
  • Material: Breathable neoprene, mesh panels

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers electrical components. Contact us for usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: Provides therapeutic massage and support but not medical treatment. For serious spinal conditions (fractures, tumors, severe disc herniation), consult doctor before use. Contraindications: pregnancy, pacemaker, recent back surgery, skin infections, open wounds. Do not use if numbness, tingling in legs, or loss of bowel/bladder control occurs (seek immediate medical attention). Temporary relief - not cure for underlying conditions. If pain persists or worsens, consult healthcare provider.

Microcurrent technology firms facial contours, lifts sagging skin, removes double chin appearance, and provides comprehensive facial skin care for defined V-line jawline. Key Benefits ✓ V-Line Sculpting: Defines jawline and creates V-shaped face contour ✓ 6 Treatment Modes: Lift, tone, firm, contour, massage, rejuvenate ✓ 8 Intensity Levels: Customizable from gentle to intense ✓ Microcurrent Technology: Stimulates facial muscles like facial exercise ✓ Double Chin Reduction: Targets submental fat appearance ✓ Portable: Compact design for travel and convenience Perfect For Jawline definition and contouring Double chin reduction Facial sagging and loss of firmness Jowls and lower face laxity Facial puffiness V-line face shaping Facial muscle toning Anti-aging facial maintenance How to Use Charge device fully before first use Cleanse face thoroughly and apply conductive gel Select mode based on target concern Start at level 1, increase gradually Hold device against skin (metal contacts must touch skin) Move slowly along jawline, cheeks, chin Treatment duration: 10-15 minutes per session Use 3-5 times weekly for 8+ weeks Clean device head after each use Mode Guide Mode 1 - Lift: Upward muscle contraction for lifting effect Mode 2 - Tone: Muscle toning and firming Mode 3 - Contour: Jawline definition Mode 4 - Massage: Relaxation and circulation Mode 5 - Firm: Skin tightening Mode 6 - Rejuvenate: Overall anti-aging Care Instructions Clean metal contact points with alcohol wipe after each use. Wipe device body with soft cloth. Do not submerge in water. Recharge regularly. Store in case to protect contacts. Specifications Technology: EMS microcurrent + vibration Modes: 6 treatment programs Intensity: 8 adjustable levels Power: Rechargeable battery (USB) Runtime: 10-15 sessions per charge Material: ABS, medical-grade metal contacts Includes: Device, USB charger, conductive gel sample, manual Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. products.descriptionHtml:
Electric V-Face Lifting Device - 6 Modes EMS Microcurrent Facial Massager

Advanced EMS V-face lifting beauty device featuring 6 specialized modes and 8 adjustable intensity levels. Microcurrent technology firms facial contours, lifts sagging skin, removes double chin appearance, and provides comprehensive facial skin care for defined V-line jawline.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ V-Line Sculpting: Defines jawline and creates V-shaped face contour
  • ✓ 6 Treatment Modes: Lift, tone, firm, contour, massage, rejuvenate
  • ✓ 8 Intensity Levels: Customizable from gentle to intense
  • ✓ Microcurrent Technology: Stimulates facial muscles like facial exercise
  • ✓ Double Chin Reduction: Targets submental fat appearance
  • ✓ Portable: Compact design for travel and convenience

Perfect For

  • Jawline definition and contouring
  • Double chin reduction
  • Facial sagging and loss of firmness
  • Jowls and lower face laxity
  • Facial puffiness
  • V-line face shaping
  • Facial muscle toning
  • Anti-aging facial maintenance

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use
  2. Cleanse face thoroughly and apply conductive gel
  3. Select mode based on target concern
  4. Start at level 1, increase gradually
  5. Hold device against skin (metal contacts must touch skin)
  6. Move slowly along jawline, cheeks, chin
  7. Treatment duration: 10-15 minutes per session
  8. Use 3-5 times weekly for 8+ weeks
  9. Clean device head after each use

Mode Guide

  • Mode 1 - Lift: Upward muscle contraction for lifting effect
  • Mode 2 - Tone: Muscle toning and firming
  • Mode 3 - Contour: Jawline definition
  • Mode 4 - Massage: Relaxation and circulation
  • Mode 5 - Firm: Skin tightening
  • Mode 6 - Rejuvenate: Overall anti-aging

Care Instructions

Clean metal contact points with alcohol wipe after each use. Wipe device body with soft cloth. Do not submerge in water. Recharge regularly. Store in case to protect contacts.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS microcurrent + vibration
  • Modes: 6 treatment programs
  • Intensity: 8 adjustable levels
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB)
  • Runtime: 10-15 sessions per charge
  • Material: ABS, medical-grade metal contacts
  • Includes: Device, USB charger, conductive gel sample, manual

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Conductive gel sold separately. Contact us for treatment protocols.

Medical Disclaimer: Cosmetic device for facial toning, not medical treatment. Does not remove fat or cause weight loss. Contraindications: pacemaker, metal facial implants, pregnancy, epilepsy, recent facial surgery, Botox/fillers (wait 2 weeks), active skin infections. Do not use on eyes, throat, or broken skin. Temporary muscle tingling is normal. If pain or skin irritation occurs, reduce intensity or discontinue. Results vary by individual. Consistent use over 8-12 weeks recommended for visible V-line results.

Professional LED photon therapy mask for home use. Seven scientifically calibrated wavelengths target multiple skin concerns from acne to anti-aging. Clinical-grade LED technology delivers salon results in the comfort of your home.

products.descriptionHtml:
Red Light Face Lifting & V-Face Massager

Professional face lifting device with red light skin rejuvenation technology and remote control. Creates V-shaped facial contour while treating double chin, sagging skin, and aging concerns. Comprehensive facial beauty instrument for at-home professional treatments.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Face Lifting: Micro-current technology stimulates facial muscles to lift and tighten sagging skin
  • ✓ V-Face Contouring: Targets jawline and chin area to create defined, slimmer V-shaped face appearance
  • ✓ Red Light Rejuvenation: 630nm wavelength stimulates collagen, reduces wrinkles, improves skin texture
  • ✓ Double Chin Reduction: Focused treatment on submental area to lift and firm chin/neck junction
  • ✓ Remote Control: Convenient hands-free operation allows you to relax during treatment

Perfect For

  • Loss of facial definition and sagging
  • Double chin and neck sagging
  • Desire for V-shaped jawline
  • Jowls and lower face drooping
  • Wrinkles and fine lines
  • Dull, aging skin tone
  • Post-weight loss skin laxity

How to Use

  1. Cleanse face thoroughly and pat dry
  2. Apply conductive gel or facial serum
  3. Position device on face/neck area
  4. Secure with adjustable straps (if applicable)
  5. Use remote to turn on device
  6. Select treatment mode and intensity
  7. Relax for 15-20 minutes during treatment
  8. Use 3-5 times per week for best results
  9. Follow with moisturizer after treatment
  10. Clean device and store in protective case

Treatment Zones

Jawline: Lift and define for V-face contour
Double Chin: Firm submental area, reduce fat appearance
Cheeks: Lift and plump for youthful fullness
Forehead: Smooth lines and wrinkles
Neck: Tighten crepey skin, reduce sagging
Nasolabial Folds: Soften smile lines

Care Instructions

Wipe device surfaces with soft, damp cloth after each use. Do not submerge in water. Remove controller unit before cleaning fabric parts. Store in protective case. Recharge battery regularly.

Specifications

  • Technologies: Red light (630nm) + micro-current + massage
  • Treatment Modes: Multiple programs (lifting, firming, rejuvenation)
  • Intensity Levels: Adjustable (3-5 settings)
  • Control: Wireless remote control (included)
  • Power: Rechargeable battery
  • Session Time: 15-20 minutes
  • Design: Ergonomic, adjustable fit
  • LED Lifespan: 50,000+ hours

Results Timeline

Immediate: Slight skin tightening, glow, circulation boost
Week 2-3: Improved skin texture, reduced puffiness
Week 4-6: Noticeable lifting, jawline definition
Week 8-12: Significant V-face contouring, wrinkle reduction
3+ months: Maintained lifting with continued use

Usage Protocol

Intensive Phase (Weeks 1-8):
- 5 sessions per week
- 20 minutes per session
- Maximum intensity tolerable

Maintenance Phase (Week 9+):
- 3 sessions per week
- 15-20 minutes per session
- Continue indefinitely to preserve results

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement parts available. Contact us for support or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This beauty device is for cosmetic skin improvement. Not medical equipment. Do not use if: pregnant, have pacemaker, metal implants in treatment area, skin cancer, or recent facial surgery. Not for use with: Botox/fillers within 2 weeks, active acne, open wounds, or skin infections. Results vary significantly by age, skin condition, and consistency of use. This device does not replace professional medical aesthetic treatments like surgery, injections, or dermatological procedures. Some individuals see significant results; others see modest improvement. For dramatic facial reshaping, consult plastic surgeon. If skin irritation occurs, reduce intensity or discontinue use.

Innovative 2-in-1 beauty device combining LED light therapy with soothing vibration massage. Designed for both neck and facial use, this portable device targets signs of aging while providing relaxing massage therapy. Perfect beauty gift for skincare enthusiasts.

  • ✓ Portable & USB Rechargeable: Take anywhere, no batteries needed, eco-friendly charging

Perfect For

  • Neck wrinkles and sagging ("tech neck")
  • Facial fine lines and loss of firmness
  • Muscle tension in jaw and neck
  • Poor circulation causing dull complexion
  • Gift for mothers, girlfriends, wives, beauty lovers
  • Travel-friendly beauty routine

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully via USB before first use
  2. Cleanse skin on face or neck area
  3. Apply serum or facial oil for smooth gliding
  4. Select LED color mode
  5. Turn on vibration function

Wipe clean with soft, slightly damp cloth after each use. Avoid getting water in charging port. Store in protective pouch. Charge when LED indicator shows low battery.

products.descriptionHtml:

Advanced 4-head neck massage machine with integrated heating for comprehensive cervical care and pain relief. Four independent massage heads target neck, shoulders, and upper back simultaneously, while heat therapy penetrates deep to relax tight muscles and improve circulation.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 4-Head Massage System: Quad massage nodes target both sides of neck plus shoulder/trapezius muscles simultaneously
  • ✓ Deep Tissue Massage: Kneading, shiatsu, and percussion modes penetrate deep into cervical muscles
  • ✓ Integrated Heating: Infrared heat (95-113°F) enhances muscle relaxation and pain relief effectiveness
  • ✓ Neck Pain Relief: Reduces tension headaches, tech neck, stiff neck, and shoulder tightness
  • ✓ Adjustable Intensity: 3 speed levels accommodate sensitivity and therapeutic needs
  • ✓ Portable Design: Use at home, office, car, or while traveling - cordless operation available

Perfect For

  • Chronic neck pain and muscle tension
  • Tension headaches originating from neck strain
  • Tech neck from computer/phone use
  • Upper trapezius trigger points and knots
  • Desk workers with shoulder and neck tightness
  • Cervical arthritis pain management
  • Post-workout neck and shoulder recovery
  • Stress-related muscle tension

How to Use

  1. Place device around neck with 4 massage heads contacting cervical and shoulder muscles
  2. Adjust position so massage heads align with tense areas
  3. Select massage mode: Kneading, Shiatsu, Percussion, or Auto-cycle
  4. Choose intensity level (1: Gentle, 2: Moderate, 3: Strong)
  5. Activate heat function for enhanced relief (optional)
  6. Relax for 10-20 minute session - device auto shuts off after preset time
  7. Use 1-3 times daily as needed for pain/tension
  8. Can be used while sitting, reclining, or lying down

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior with slightly damp cloth and mild soap. Do not submerge - not waterproof. Clean after each use if sweating. Store in cool, dry place. Charge via USB or AC adapter as needed. If corded version: inspect cord for damage regularly. Do not use while sleeping (safety).

Specifications

  • Technology: 4-head massage system (kneading, shiatsu, percussion) + infrared heat
  • Massage Heads: 4 independent 3D rotating massage nodes
  • Massage Modes: 3-4 programs (kneading, shiatsu, percussion, combination)
  • Speed Levels: 3 adjustable intensities
  • Heat Range: 95-113°F (35-45°C)
  • Timer: 15/20 minute auto shut-off for safety
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (2000mAh, USB-C) or AC adapter
  • Runtime: 2-3 hours per charge (cordless models)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on motor and electronics. Contact us for troubleshooting or replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This massage device is for wellness and muscle relaxation. Do not use if you have: acute neck injury, cervical spine instability, osteoporosis, skin conditions, or open wounds. Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. Not for children. If you have chronic neck conditions or recent surgery, consult healthcare provider before use. Discontinue if pain increases. Not a substitute for medical treatment.

Perfect For

  • Full face and neck anti-aging
  • Neck wrinkles and creases
  • Facial fine lines and wrinkles

  • Sagging facial skin

  1. Charge mask fully before first use (2-3 hours)
  2. Cleanse face and neck thoroughly
  3. Optional: apply serum for enhanced absorption

Wipe interior LED surface with soft, slightly damp cloth after each use. Do not spray or submerge mask in water. Clean straps separately with mild soap. Store in protective case. Recharge when battery indicator shows low. LED lifespan: 50,000+ hours.

How to Use

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Airbag Eye Massager with Heat

Advanced eye care system combining airbag compression massage, heated compress therapy, and acupoint stimulation. Electric eye massage glasses provide comprehensive relief for tired, dry, strained eyes. Professional spa-quality treatment at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Airbag Compression: Gentle rhythmic pressure mimics professional eye massage, improving circulation around eyes
  • ✓ Heated Hot Compress: Therapeutic warmth opens blocked meibomian glands, providing dry eye relief
  • ✓ Acupoint Stimulation: Targets traditional pressure points around eyes to relieve tension and headaches
  • ✓ Tired Eye Relief: Reduces eye strain from screens, reading, and digital device use
  • ✓ Dry Eye Treatment: Heat and massage combination improves tear film quality and reduces dryness symptoms

Perfect For

  • Computer vision syndrome (digital eye strain)
  • Dry eye syndrome
  • Eye fatigue from prolonged screen time
  • Tension headaches behind eyes
  • Insomnia (relaxation before bed)
  • Puffy eyes and dark circles
  • Eye strain from reading or driving
  • Stress-related eye tension

How to Use

  1. Remove contact lenses before use
  2. Clean eye area gently
  3. Put on massager glasses like regular eyewear
  4. Adjust head strap for comfortable, secure fit
  5. Turn on device and select massage mode
  6. Choose heat setting (or no heat if preferred)
  7. Relax for 15 minutes per session
  8. Use 1-2 times daily or as needed
  9. Best timing: during work breaks, before bed, after screen time

Massage Modes

Most devices offer 3-5 automatic programs:
Mode 1: Gentle airbag massage + warmth (relaxation)
Mode 2: Rhythmic compression (circulation boost)
Mode 3: Acupoint focus (tension relief)
Mode 4: Combination therapy (comprehensive treatment)
Mode 5: Cool mode (for puffy eyes, no heat)

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior and eye contact areas with soft, slightly damp cloth after each use. Do not immerse in water. Store in protective case. Charge regularly to maintain battery.

Specifications

  • Technologies: Airbag compression + heat therapy + acupoint massage
  • Massage Modes: Multiple automatic programs
  • Heat Settings: Adjustable temperature (104-113°F / 40-45°C)
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB charging)
  • Session Time: 15 minutes with auto shut-off
  • Design: Adjustable head strap, foldable for travel
  • Weight: Lightweight eye glasses style

Expected Results

Immediate: Relaxation, warmth, reduced eye strain
1-2 weeks: Improved dry eye symptoms, less tension
1 month+: Better sleep, reduced dark circles, fewer headaches
Results vary by individual and consistency of use.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for troubleshooting or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This eye massager is for relaxation and comfort, not medical treatment. Do not use if you have: recent eye surgery, retinal detachment, glaucoma, cataracts, or eye infections. Not suitable for children under 10. Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. If you experience increased pain, vision changes, or eye irritation, discontinue use immediately and consult eye doctor. Not a replacement for medical treatment of eye conditions.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 3D Flexible Design: Conforms to unique facial structure for better LED-to-skin contact than rigid masks
  • ✓ Medical-Grade Silicone: Hypoallergenic, comfortable material won't irritate sensitive skin during extended wear
  • ✓ Full Coverage: Face and neck treatment addresses aging comprehensively, prevents "mask line" between treated/untreated areas
  • ✓ 7 Color Photon Therapy: Clinically-proven wavelengths target multiple skin concerns in single device
  • ✓ Skin Brightening Focus: Specialized programs reduce dullness, fade hyperpigmentation, create radiant glow

Perfect For

  • All skin types including sensitive
  • Anti-aging for face and neck
  • Skin brightening and whitening goals
  • Uneven skin tone and texture
  • Acne and post-acne marks
  • Dull, tired-looking complexion
  • Preventative anti-aging maintenance

How to Use

  1. Start with clean, dry face and neck
  2. Optional: Apply water-based serum (not oil-based)
  3. Put on mask like wearing helmet - face first, then adjust neck section
  4. 3D flexible design should conform comfortably to face
  5. Secure with head straps (adjust for snug but comfortable fit)
  6. Connect power cable
  7. Select LED color based on treatment goal
  8. Relax for 15-20 minutes (can read, watch TV)
  9. Use 3-5 times per week
  10. Clean silicone surface after use

Photon Therapy Colors

Red (630nm): Boosts collagen, anti-wrinkle, improves elasticity
Blue (470nm): Antibacterial, acne treatment, oil control
Green (520nm): Brightening, pigmentation fading, calming
Yellow (590nm): Lymphatic flow, skin brightening, immune boost
Purple: Dual red+blue benefits
Cyan: Anti-inflammatory, soothing
White: Comprehensive deep treatment

3D Flexible Advantages

vs. Rigid Masks:

  • Better conformity to nose, chin, forehead curves
  • No gaps between mask and skin (more effective light delivery)
  • More comfortable for extended wear
  • One size truly fits all face shapes
  • Easier to store (folds flat)

Care Instructions

Wipe silicone with damp cloth after each use. Air dry completely. Do not use harsh chemicals. Store flat or in provided case. Keep away from extreme heat.

Specifications

  • Brand: Foreverlily
  • Material: Medical-grade silicone (flexible, hypoallergenic)
  • Design: 3D flexible, conforms to face contours
  • Coverage: Face + neck/décolletage
  • LED Colors: 7 scientifically-calibrated wavelengths
  • LED Count: 150+ high-quality bulbs
  • Power: USB or AC adapter
  • Session: 15-20 minutes, auto shut-off
  • Lifespan: 50,000+ hours

Skin Brightening Protocol

For maximum brightening and whitening results:

  • Week 1-4: Green light, 20 min, 5x weekly
  • Week 5-8: Alternate green and yellow, 4-5x weekly
  • Week 9+: Maintenance - yellow light, 3x weekly
  • Combine with: Vitamin C serum, sunscreen daily

Warranty & Support

90-day manufacturer warranty. Foreverlily customer service available. Contact us for support.

Medical Disclaimer: Cosmetic LED device for skin beautification. Not medical equipment. Do not use if you have: photosensitivity disorders, lupus, epilepsy, skin cancer, or take photosensitizing drugs (certain antibiotics, retinoids). Not for use during pregnancy without doctor clearance. Keep eyes closed during use - LED light is bright. If using prescription retinoids, consult dermatologist before adding LED therapy. For melasma or severe pigmentation, professional dermatological treatment may be more appropriate. Results vary significantly by individual - some see dramatic improvement, others modest. Consistency required - results take 8-12 weeks of regular use.

Provides rigid support to immobilize the hip joint and femoral region during healing after surgery or acute injury. Key Benefits ✓ Femoral Fixation: Rigid stabilization of femoral head, neck, and greater trochanter during fracture healing ✓ Hip Joint Immobilization: Prevents hip flexion/abduction/rotation to protect surgical repair or fracture site ✓ Post-Surgical Support: Essential for hip replacement, hip pinning, or femoral osteotomy recovery ✓ Adjustable Positioning: Set hip angle per surgeon's protocol (typically 0-30° abduction) ✓ Dislocation Prevention: Maintains proper hip positioning to prevent post-op dislocation ✓ Comfortable Long-Term Wear: Padded design suitable for 24/7 use during 6-12 week recovery period Perfect For Femoral neck fracture post-operative stabilization Hip replacement (total hip arthroplasty) recovery Hip dislocation immobilization and prevention Greater trochanter fracture healing support Hip pinning (internal fixation) post-surgical protection Femoral head avascular necrosis treatment Hip arthroscopy recovery with movement restrictions How to Use Your healthcare provider will fit and adjust the brace initially - do not self-fit Position waist belt securely around pelvis with padding over iliac crest Adjust thigh cuff to secure femur in prescribed position (typically neutral or slight abduction) Lock all adjustment mechanisms as set by medical professional Do NOT adjust hip angle or remove brace without medical authorization Wear continuously as prescribed - typically 6-12 weeks post-op Care Instructions Remove washable padding and hand wash separately with mild soap. Wipe metal/plastic components with disinfectant wipe. Air dry padding completely before reassembly. Inspect locking mechanisms weekly. Contact provider immediately if any component loosens or breaks. Sizing Guide Measure: Waist circumference at iliac crest + thigh circumference mid-femur S: Waist 26-32", Thigh 16-20" M: Waist 32-38", Thigh 20-24" L: Waist 38-44", Thigh 24-28" XL: Waist 44-50", Thigh 28-32" XXL: Waist 50-56", Thigh 32-36" Professional fitting by healthcare provider strongly recommended Specifications Type: Medical hip abduction/fixation brace (HKAFO style) Materials: Aluminum frame, rigid plastic shells, medical-grade padding Adjustability: Hip abduction angle 0-45°, thigh length adjustable Support Level: Maximum (rigid immobilization) Weight: 2-3 lbs (varies by size) Features: Locking hip joint, adjustable abduction, removable padding Warranty & Support 90-day warranty on structural components. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Do not use without explicit instructions from your orthopedic surgeon or physical therapist. Improper use may cause injury or compromise healing. This device does not replace medical treatment - follow all post-operative protocols.
products.descriptionHtml:
Hip Joint Femoral Fixation Brace - Thigh Fracture Recovery Support

Medical-grade hip fixation brace designed for femoral head/neck fractures, hip dislocations, and post-operative hip stabilization. Provides rigid support to immobilize the hip joint and femoral region during healing after surgery or acute injury.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Femoral Fixation: Rigid stabilization of femoral head, neck, and greater trochanter during fracture healing
  • ✓ Hip Joint Immobilization: Prevents hip flexion/abduction/rotation to protect surgical repair or fracture site
  • ✓ Post-Surgical Support: Essential for hip replacement, hip pinning, or femoral osteotomy recovery
  • ✓ Adjustable Positioning: Set hip angle per surgeon's protocol (typically 0-30° abduction)
  • ✓ Dislocation Prevention: Maintains proper hip positioning to prevent post-op dislocation
  • ✓ Comfortable Long-Term Wear: Padded design suitable for 24/7 use during 6-12 week recovery period

Perfect For

  • Femoral neck fracture post-operative stabilization
  • Hip replacement (total hip arthroplasty) recovery
  • Hip dislocation immobilization and prevention
  • Greater trochanter fracture healing support
  • Hip pinning (internal fixation) post-surgical protection
  • Femoral head avascular necrosis treatment
  • Hip arthroscopy recovery with movement restrictions

How to Use

  1. Your healthcare provider will fit and adjust the brace initially - do not self-fit
  2. Position waist belt securely around pelvis with padding over iliac crest
  3. Adjust thigh cuff to secure femur in prescribed position (typically neutral or slight abduction)
  4. Lock all adjustment mechanisms as set by medical professional
  5. Do NOT adjust hip angle or remove brace without medical authorization
  6. Wear continuously as prescribed - typically 6-12 weeks post-op

Care Instructions

Remove washable padding and hand wash separately with mild soap. Wipe metal/plastic components with disinfectant wipe. Air dry padding completely before reassembly. Inspect locking mechanisms weekly. Contact provider immediately if any component loosens or breaks.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Waist circumference at iliac crest + thigh circumference mid-femur
  • S: Waist 26-32", Thigh 16-20"
  • M: Waist 32-38", Thigh 20-24"
  • L: Waist 38-44", Thigh 24-28"
  • XL: Waist 44-50", Thigh 28-32"
  • XXL: Waist 50-56", Thigh 32-36"
  • Professional fitting by healthcare provider strongly recommended

Specifications

  • Type: Medical hip abduction/fixation brace (HKAFO style)
  • Materials: Aluminum frame, rigid plastic shells, medical-grade padding
  • Adjustability: Hip abduction angle 0-45°, thigh length adjustable
  • Support Level: Maximum (rigid immobilization)
  • Weight: 2-3 lbs (varies by size)
  • Features: Locking hip joint, adjustable abduction, removable padding

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on structural components. 1-year extended warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for replacement parts or fitting questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This hip fixation brace is a medical device requiring professional fitting and supervision. Do not use without explicit instructions from your orthopedic surgeon or physical therapist. Improper use may cause injury or compromise healing. This device does not replace medical treatment - follow all post-operative protocols.

products.descriptionHtml:
Automatic Abdominal Massager Machine

Electric multi-use massager designed for abdomen, waist, back, neck, and legs. Automatic massage programs combine kneading, vibration, and heat to relieve muscle tension, improve circulation, and support digestive wellness. Hands-free operation for ultimate relaxation.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Automatic Programs: Pre-set massage sequences target different needs - no manual operation required
  • ✓ Multi-Area Use: Versatile design treats stomach, waist, lower back, neck, and legs with single device
  • ✓ Digestive Support: Gentle abdominal massage aids digestion, relieves bloating, and promotes gut motility
  • ✓ Heat Function: Soothing warmth enhances muscle relaxation and therapeutic benefits
  • ✓ Hands-Free: Adjustable belt secures device while you relax, read, or watch TV

Perfect For

  • Abdominal bloating and discomfort
  • Digestive sluggishness or constipation
  • Lower back pain and tension
  • Menstrual cramps and discomfort
  • Post-meal digestive support
  • Stress-related stomach tension
  • Muscle soreness from exercise
  • Relaxation and wellness routines

How to Use

  1. Place massager on desired area (abdomen, back, legs, etc.)
  2. Secure with adjustable elastic belt
  3. Plug in device or ensure battery is charged
  4. Select massage mode and intensity level
  5. Turn on heat function if desired
  6. Relax for 15-30 minutes (automatic shut-off included)
  7. Use 1-2 times daily or as needed

Massage Areas & Benefits

  • Abdomen: Digestive support, bloating relief, core muscle relaxation
  • Waist: Side muscle tension, love handle massage
  • Lower Back: Lumbar pain relief, muscle knot release
  • Neck: Tension headache relief, stress reduction
  • Legs: Thigh and calf muscle recovery, circulation boost

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior with soft, damp cloth. Do not immerse in water or machine wash. Store in cool, dry place. Check power cord for damage before each use.

Specifications

  • Type: Automatic electric massager
  • Functions: Kneading, vibration, heat therapy
  • Massage Modes: Multiple automatic programs
  • Heat Settings: Adjustable temperature
  • Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery
  • Belt: Adjustable elastic strap, fits most body sizes
  • Auto Shut-off: Safety timer (15-30 minutes)

Safety Features

  • Automatic shut-off timer prevents overuse
  • Overheat protection on heating element
  • Soft massage nodes prevent excessive pressure
  • UL-certified electrical components

Warranty & Support

90-day manufacturer warranty. Contact us for troubleshooting or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for relaxation, muscle relief, and wellness. Not a medical device or weight loss solution. Do not use if pregnant without doctor approval. Avoid use with: abdominal hernias, recent surgery, active infections, or undiagnosed abdominal pain. Not for use on face, chest over heart, or throat. Consult healthcare provider if you have chronic digestive conditions or health concerns.

products.title: Adjustable Back Brace Posture Corrector | Spine Support
products.description: Adjustable Back Brace & Posture Corrector Medical-grade back brace and posture trainer for men and women. Provides full spine support while correcting slouching, hunchback, and mild scoliosis. Adjustable design works as both therapeutic back brace and preventative posture correction tool. Key Benefits ✓ Dual Function: Supports injured backs while training proper posture habits for long-term spinal health ✓ Scoliosis Support: Helps stabilize spine and slow mild to moderate curvature progression (use under medical supervision) ✓ Hunchback Correction: Gently pulls shoulders back to reverse rounded upper back (kyphosis) ✓ Full Spine Support: Lumbar, thoracic, and shoulder support in one comprehensive device ✓ Unisex & Adjustable: Fits men and women, multiple sizing straps accommodate different body types Perfect For Poor posture from desk work or phone use Upper back pain (thoracic strain) Lower back pain (lumbar support) Mild scoliosis management Kyphosis (hunchback) correction Post-injury back rehabilitation Posture training and habit formation How to Use Wear over thin shirt for comfort (or directly on skin) Slide arms through shoulder loops like putting on backpack Position back panel centered on spine Secure waist strap first (snug but comfortable) Fasten chest strap, adjusting shoulder straps to pull shoulders back gently Important: Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-3 hours Do not wear 24/7 - muscles need time without support to strengthen Use during activities that promote slouching (computer work, driving) Care Instructions Hand wash with mild detergent. Air dry flat. Do not bleach or iron. Store flat or hang to maintain shape. Specifications Type: Full back brace with posture correction Support Areas: Lumbar, thoracic, shoulders Material: Breathable elastic fabric, padded straps Closure: Adjustable hook-and-loop (Velcro) straps Gender: Unisex (men and women) Color: Black or beige Sizes: Adjustable - measure chest circumference for sizing Sizing Guide Measure chest circumference under arms. Small/Medium: 28-38", Large/XL: 38-48". Adjustable straps provide 4-6" flexibility. Training Program Week 1-2: 20-30 minutes daily Week 3-4: 45-60 minutes daily Week 5+: 2-3 hours or as needed Combine with posture-strengthening exercises for best results. Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for fit advice or support questions. Medical Disclaimer: This device supports posture correction and back pain relief. For scoliosis, use only under medical supervision - not a replacement for prescribed bracing or treatment. Consult doctor before use if you have spinal conditions, recent surgery, or chronic back problems. Discontinue if pain increases.
products.descriptionHtml:
Adjustable Back Brace & Posture Corrector

Medical-grade back brace and posture trainer for men and women. Provides full spine support while correcting slouching, hunchback, and mild scoliosis. Adjustable design works as both therapeutic back brace and preventative posture correction tool.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual Function: Supports injured backs while training proper posture habits for long-term spinal health
  • ✓ Scoliosis Support: Helps stabilize spine and slow mild to moderate curvature progression (use under medical supervision)
  • ✓ Hunchback Correction: Gently pulls shoulders back to reverse rounded upper back (kyphosis)
  • ✓ Full Spine Support: Lumbar, thoracic, and shoulder support in one comprehensive device
  • ✓ Unisex & Adjustable: Fits men and women, multiple sizing straps accommodate different body types

Perfect For

  • Poor posture from desk work or phone use
  • Upper back pain (thoracic strain)
  • Lower back pain (lumbar support)
  • Mild scoliosis management
  • Kyphosis (hunchback) correction
  • Post-injury back rehabilitation
  • Posture training and habit formation

How to Use

  1. Wear over thin shirt for comfort (or directly on skin)
  2. Slide arms through shoulder loops like putting on backpack
  3. Position back panel centered on spine
  4. Secure waist strap first (snug but comfortable)
  5. Fasten chest strap, adjusting shoulder straps to pull shoulders back gently
  6. Important: Start with 20-30 minutes daily, gradually increase to 2-3 hours
  7. Do not wear 24/7 - muscles need time without support to strengthen
  8. Use during activities that promote slouching (computer work, driving)

Care Instructions

Hand wash with mild detergent. Air dry flat. Do not bleach or iron. Store flat or hang to maintain shape.

Specifications

  • Type: Full back brace with posture correction
  • Support Areas: Lumbar, thoracic, shoulders
  • Material: Breathable elastic fabric, padded straps
  • Closure: Adjustable hook-and-loop (Velcro) straps
  • Gender: Unisex (men and women)
  • Color: Black or beige
  • Sizes: Adjustable - measure chest circumference for sizing

Sizing Guide

Measure chest circumference under arms. Small/Medium: 28-38", Large/XL: 38-48". Adjustable straps provide 4-6" flexibility.

Training Program

Week 1-2: 20-30 minutes daily
Week 3-4: 45-60 minutes daily
Week 5+: 2-3 hours or as needed

Combine with posture-strengthening exercises for best results.

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for fit advice or support questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This device supports posture correction and back pain relief. For scoliosis, use only under medical supervision - not a replacement for prescribed bracing or treatment. Consult doctor before use if you have spinal conditions, recent surgery, or chronic back problems. Discontinue if pain increases.

products.descriptionHtml:
7 Color LED Mask - PDT Photodynamic Therapy

Advanced PDT (Photodynamic Therapy) LED mask combining red and blue light wavelengths for comprehensive skin treatment. Professional-grade photon therapy lamp designed for home spa use, delivering clinical results without expensive salon visits.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ PDT Technology: Photodynamic therapy penetrates deep into skin layers for enhanced cellular regeneration
  • ✓ Red Light (630nm): Boosts collagen, reduces wrinkles, improves elasticity and firmness
  • ✓ Blue Light (470nm): Kills acne bacteria, reduces inflammation, prevents breakouts
  • ✓ 7 Treatment Modes: Customizable color combinations target multiple skin concerns simultaneously
  • ✓ Home Spa Convenience: Professional treatments at home save time and thousands in salon costs

Perfect For

  • Acne-prone skin and active breakouts
  • Aging skin with fine lines and wrinkles
  • Dull, uneven skin tone
  • Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation
  • Sensitive skin needing gentle treatment
  • Preventative anti-aging care

How to Use

  1. Remove makeup and cleanse face with gentle cleanser
  2. Pat skin completely dry
  3. Select LED mode based on skin concern (red for aging, blue for acne)
  4. Position mask on face, ensuring good contact
  5. Relax for 15-20 minutes during treatment
  6. Use 3-4 times per week for optimal results
  7. Follow with serum or moisturizer

Care Instructions

Clean with soft microfiber cloth after each use. Do not immerse in water. Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. Avoid dropping or impact.

Specifications

  • Technology: PDT (Photodynamic Therapy)
  • LED Colors: 7 modes (Red, Blue, Green, Yellow, Purple, Cyan, White)
  • Primary Wavelengths: Red 630nm, Blue 470nm
  • Session Duration: 15-20 minutes
  • Power: USB rechargeable
  • Material: Hypoallergenic silicone

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty included. 1-year extended warranty available. Contact support for questions.

Medical Disclaimer: For cosmetic use only. Not a medical device. Not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Consult healthcare provider if pregnant or have photosensitivity.

Key Benefits ✓ Complete Coverage: Face, neck, and jawline in one treatment ✓ Dual Action: Anti-aging AND anti-acne in same device ✓ 7 Light Colors: Different wavelengths target specific skin concerns ✓ Professional Technology: Medical-grade LED intensity ✓ Massage Function: Optional vibration for enhanced absorption ✓ Visible Results: Skin improvement within 4-8 weeks Perfect For Aging skin and wrinkles (face + neck) Acne breakouts and scarring Facial sagging and loss of firmness Neck lines and tech neck Uneven skin tone and texture Large pores and oiliness Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation Overall skin rejuvenation How to Use Cleanse face and neck thoroughly, pat dry Optional: apply serum or treatment product Position mask on face, ensure neck coverage Adjust elastic straps for comfortable fit Select appropriate color for skin concern Optional: activate massage vibration mode Relax for 10-20 minutes (auto shut-off) Use 3-5 times weekly consistently For acne: use blue light daily until clear Color Selection Guide Red (630nm): Best for anti-aging, fine lines, collagen production Blue (465nm): Best for active acne, oily skin, bacteria reduction Yellow (590nm): Best for brightening, redness, sensitive skin Green (520nm): Best for hyperpigmentation, dark spots, calming Purple: Combination therapy for acne + aging concerns Cyan: Post-treatment healing, inflammation, irritation White: Complete spectrum for overall rejuvenation Care Instructions Wipe LED panel interior with slightly damp, soft cloth after use. Specifications LED Colors: 7 therapeutic wavelengths LED Count: 180-220 LEDs (face + neck) Wavelengths: Red 630nm, Blue 465nm, Yellow 590nm, Green 520nm Intensity: 25-35 mW/cm² professional-grade Massage: Optional vibration function Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery Timer: 10/15/20 minute settings Certification: CE/FDA-cleared Warranty & Support 90-day warranty covers device and LEDs. products.descriptionHtml:
7 Colors LED Facial Mask with Neck - Anti-Acne Anti-Aging Beauty Device

Professional LED facial and neck mask featuring 7-color photon light therapy for comprehensive anti-aging and anti-acne treatment. Advanced beauty device combines skin rejuvenation, face lifting, and firming massage technology for complete upper-body skincare solution.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Complete Coverage: Face, neck, and jawline in one treatment
  • ✓ Dual Action: Anti-aging AND anti-acne in same device
  • ✓ 7 Light Colors: Different wavelengths target specific skin concerns
  • ✓ Professional Technology: Medical-grade LED intensity
  • ✓ Massage Function: Optional vibration for enhanced absorption
  • ✓ Visible Results: Skin improvement within 4-8 weeks

Perfect For

  • Aging skin and wrinkles (face + neck)
  • Acne breakouts and scarring
  • Facial sagging and loss of firmness
  • Neck lines and tech neck
  • Uneven skin tone and texture
  • Large pores and oiliness
  • Post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation
  • Overall skin rejuvenation

How to Use

  1. Cleanse face and neck thoroughly, pat dry
  2. Optional: apply serum or treatment product
  3. Position mask on face, ensure neck coverage
  4. Adjust elastic straps for comfortable fit
  5. Select appropriate color for skin concern
  6. Optional: activate massage vibration mode
  7. Relax for 10-20 minutes (auto shut-off)
  8. Use 3-5 times weekly consistently
  9. For acne: use blue light daily until clear

Color Selection Guide

  • Red (630nm): Best for anti-aging, fine lines, collagen production
  • Blue (465nm): Best for active acne, oily skin, bacteria reduction
  • Yellow (590nm): Best for brightening, redness, sensitive skin
  • Green (520nm): Best for hyperpigmentation, dark spots, calming
  • Purple: Combination therapy for acne + aging concerns
  • Cyan: Post-treatment healing, inflammation, irritation
  • White: Complete spectrum for overall rejuvenation

Care Instructions

Wipe LED panel interior with slightly damp, soft cloth after use. Do not use alcohol or harsh chemicals. Clean straps with mild soap solution separately. Do not submerge mask in water. Store in included protective bag. LED bulbs are maintenance-free (50,000+ hour lifespan).

Specifications

  • LED Colors: 7 therapeutic wavelengths
  • LED Count: 180-220 LEDs (face + neck)
  • Wavelengths: Red 630nm, Blue 465nm, Yellow 590nm, Green 520nm
  • Intensity: 25-35 mW/cm² professional-grade
  • Massage: Optional vibration function
  • Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery
  • Timer: 10/15/20 minute settings
  • Certification: CE/FDA-cleared

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers device and LEDs. Extended warranty available. Contact us for skin treatment protocols.

Medical Disclaimer: Cosmetic device for skin improvement, not medical treatment. Not for severe cystic acne or skin diseases - consult dermatologist. Contraindications: photosensitivity, medications causing light sensitivity, epilepsy, pregnancy, skin cancer, lupus. Keep eyes closed during use. Do not use on broken or infected skin. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Results vary by individual skin type, age, and consistency of use. 8-12 weeks of regular use recommended for visible results.

products.title: Foreverlily Smart Knee Massager | Vibration & Air Pressure
products.description: Foreverlily Smart Knee Massager - Multi-Joint Support Intelligent electric knee massager from Foreverlily combining vibration, air pressure compression, and heat therapy. Versatile design works on knees, elbows, and shoulders. Smart massage machine provides professional-grade pain relief and muscle relaxation at home. Key Benefits ✓ Smart Technology: Intelligent programs automatically adjust pressure and vibration based on treatment area and intensity selected ✓ Vibration + Air Pressure: Dual therapy improves circulation, reduces swelling, relieves arthritis pain more effectively than single-mode devices ✓ Multi-Joint Use: Works on knees, elbows, shoulders - one device treats multiple problem areas ✓ Adjustable Fit: Velcro straps accommodate various joint sizes and body types ✓ Pain Relief Focus: Specifically designed for arthritis, joint pain, sports injuries, post-workout recovery Perfect For Knee arthritis and joint pain Post-knee surgery recovery Runner's knee and sports injuries Elbow tendonitis (tennis/golfer's elbow) Shoulder pain and stiffness Poor circulation in joints Post-workout muscle soreness Chronic joint inflammation How to Use Select treatment area (knee, elbow, or shoulder) Wrap massager around joint Secure with adjustable Velcro straps (snug but not tight) Turn on device using control panel Select massage mode (vibration, air pressure, or both) Choose intensity level (low, medium, high) Activate heat function if desired Relax for 15-20 minutes Device auto-shuts off after session Use 1-2 times daily per joint Massage Modes Mode 1: Vibration only (muscle relaxation) Mode 2: Air pressure only (circulation boost) Mode 3: Vibration + air pressure (comprehensive) Mode 4: Sequential pressure (mimics massage therapist) Mode 5: Pulsing program (tension release) Heat: Optional warming function for all modes Treatment by Joint Knee: Full wrap coverage, use after walking/standing Elbow: Position over painful area, ideal for tendonitis Shoulder: Wrap around shoulder/upper arm junction Intensity: Start low, increase gradually as tolerated Care Instructions Wipe exterior with damp cloth. Remove controller unit before cleaning fabric wrap. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash. Store in protective bag. Specifications Brand: Foreverlily (trusted health equipment manufacturer) Technologies: Vibration + pneumatic air pressure + optional heat Treatment Areas: Knees, elbows, shoulders Modes: 5 massage programs Intensity: 3 adjustable levels per mode Heat: Optional (104-113°F) Power: Rechargeable battery or AC adapter Session: 15-20 minutes with auto shut-off Size: Adjustable straps fit most body types Smart Features Automatic pressure adjustment based on mode Memory function (remembers last used setting) Safety auto shut-off (prevents overheating) Battery indicator (recharge reminder) Portable design for use anywhere Usage Schedule Acute Pain: 2x daily, 20 minutes, medium intensity Chronic Pain: 1-2x daily, 15 minutes, low-medium intensity Post-Workout: Within 1 hour after exercise, 15 minutes Maintenance: 3-5x weekly, 15 minutes as prevention Warranty & Support 90-day Foreverlily warranty. Replacement parts available. Contact us for support. Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for pain relief and relaxation. Not medical equipment or treatment. Do not use if you have: blood clots, DVT, pacemaker, or circulatory disorders. Not for use on: swollen/inflamed areas, open wounds, recent fractures, or post-surgery (until healed). For knee replacement patients: get surgeon clearance before use. Pregnant women: avoid use without doctor approval. If you have arthritis, this device provides symptomatic relief but does not treat underlying condition. If pain worsens or new symptoms develop, consult orthopedic specialist. Not a substitute for physical therapy or medical treatment. Use as complementary therapy only.

  • ✓ Adjustable Fit: Velcro straps accommodate various joint sizes and body types
  • ✓ Pain Relief Focus: Specifically designed for arthritis, joint pain, sports injuries, post-workout recovery

Perfect For

  • Knee arthritis and joint pain
  • Post-knee surgery recovery
  • Runner's knee and sports injuries
  • Elbow tendonitis (tennis/golfer's elbow)
  • Shoulder pain and stiffness
  • Poor circulation in joints
  • Post-workout muscle soreness
  • Chronic joint inflammation

How to Use

  1. Select treatment area (knee, elbow, or shoulder)
  2. Wrap massager around joint
  3. Secure with adjustable Velcro straps (snug but not tight)
  4. Turn on device using control panel
  5. Select massage mode (vibration, air pressure, or both)
  6. Choose intensity level (low, medium, high)
  7. Activate heat function if desired
  8. Relax for 15-20 minutes
  9. Device auto-shuts off after session
  10. Use 1-2 times daily per joint

Massage Modes

Mode 1: Vibration only (muscle relaxation)
Mode 2: Air pressure only (circulation boost)
Mode 3: Vibration + air pressure (comprehensive)
Mode 4: Sequential pressure (mimics massage therapist)
Mode 5: Pulsing program (tension release)
Heat: Optional warming function for all modes

Treatment by Joint

Knee: Full wrap coverage, use after walking/standing
Elbow: Position over painful area, ideal for tendonitis
Shoulder: Wrap around shoulder/upper arm junction
Intensity: Start low, increase gradually as tolerated

Care Instructions

Wipe exterior with damp cloth. Remove controller unit before cleaning fabric wrap. Air dry completely. Do not machine wash. Store in protective bag.

Specifications

  • Brand: Foreverlily (trusted health equipment manufacturer)
  • Technologies: Vibration + pneumatic air pressure + optional heat
  • Treatment Areas: Knees, elbows, shoulders
  • Modes: 5 massage programs
  • Intensity: 3 adjustable levels per mode
  • Heat: Optional (104-113°F)
  • Power: Rechargeable battery or AC adapter
  • Session: 15-20 minutes with auto shut-off
  • Size: Adjustable straps fit most body types

Smart Features

  • Automatic pressure adjustment based on mode
  • Memory function (remembers last used setting)
  • Safety auto shut-off (prevents overheating)
  • Battery indicator (recharge reminder)
  • Portable design for use anywhere

Usage Schedule

Acute Pain: 2x daily, 20 minutes, medium intensity
Chronic Pain: 1-2x daily, 15 minutes, low-medium intensity
Post-Workout: Within 1 hour after exercise, 15 minutes
Maintenance: 3-5x weekly, 15 minutes as prevention

Warranty & Support

90-day Foreverlily warranty. Replacement parts available. Contact us for support.

Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for pain relief and relaxation. Not medical equipment or treatment. Do not use if you have: blood clots, DVT, pacemaker, or circulatory disorders. Not for use on: swollen/inflamed areas, open wounds, recent fractures, or post-surgery (until healed). For knee replacement patients: get surgeon clearance before use. Pregnant women: avoid use without doctor approval. If you have arthritis, this device provides symptomatic relief but does not treat underlying condition. If pain worsens or new symptoms develop, consult orthopedic specialist. Not a substitute for physical therapy or medical treatment. Use as complementary therapy only.

products.descriptionHtml:
Hello Face Rechargeable Red Light Therapy Mask

Professional red light and infrared LED therapy mask from Hello Face. Treats face and neck simultaneously with clinically-proven wavelengths for glowing, rejuvenated skin. Rechargeable skincare device delivers salon-quality phototherapy at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Red Light (630nm): Stimulates collagen production, reduces wrinkles, improves skin elasticity and firmness
  • ✓ Infrared (850nm): Deeper penetration than visible light, accelerates healing, reduces inflammation
  • ✓ Face + Neck Coverage: Treats décolletage area often showing early aging signs
  • ✓ Glowing Skin Effect: Improves circulation, oxygen delivery, and cellular energy for radiant appearance
  • ✓ Rechargeable Design: No cords during use, convenient portability, eco-friendly battery system

Perfect For

  • Anti-aging and wrinkle reduction
  • Collagen production boost

  1. Charge device fully via USB before first use
  2. Cleanse face and neck thoroughly
  3. Remove all jewelry and metal accessories
  4. Optional: Apply water-based serum (not oil-based)
  5. Position mask on face and neck
  6. Secure with adjustable head strap
  7. Turn on device - red/infrared LEDs activate
  8. Close eyes and relax for 10-20 minutes
  9. Use 3-5 times per week
  10. Follow with moisturizer and sunscreen (daytime)

Light Therapy Science

Red Light (630nm):

  • Penetrates 1-2mm into skin
  • Targets fibroblasts (collagen-producing cells)
  • Increases ATP (cellular energy)
  • Reduces oxidative stress

Infrared (850nm):

  • Penetrates 3-4mm (deeper layers)
  • Reduces inflammation
  • Accelerates wound healing
  • Improves lymphatic drainage

Care Instructions

Wipe mask interior with soft, dry cloth after use. Do not use water or cleaning products on LED panel. Store in protective case. Recharge after every 2-3 uses.

Specifications

  • Brand: Hello Face (specialized LED therapy brand)
  • Wavelengths: Red 630nm + Infrared 850nm
  • Coverage: Full face + neck/décolletage
  • LED Count: High-density array (100+ LEDs)
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery
  • Charging: USB cable (included)
  • Battery Life: 5-7 sessions per charge
  • Session Time: 10-20 minutes
  • LED Lifespan: 50,000+ hours
  • Design: Lightweight, adjustable fit

Results Timeline

Week 1-2: Improved skin texture, subtle glow
Week 3-4: Reduction in redness, more even tone
Week 5-8: Fine lines softening, firmness improving
Week 9-12: Visible wrinkle reduction, enhanced elasticity
3+ months: Continued collagen building, maintained with 3x weekly use

Treatment Protocol

Intensive Phase (Weeks 1-8):
- 5 sessions per week
- 20 minutes per session
- Consistency is critical

Maintenance Phase (Week 9+):
- 3 sessions per week
- 15-20 minutes per session
- Continue indefinitely

Warranty & Support

90-day Hello Face warranty. Contact us for support or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This LED therapy mask is for cosmetic skin improvement. Not medical device. Do not use if you have: photosensitivity, lupus, epilepsy, skin cancer, or take photosensitizing medications (certain antibiotics, retinoids). Not for use during pregnancy without doctor approval. Keep eyes closed during treatment - LED light is bright. Infrared is invisible but effective. Results vary significantly by individual - some see dramatic improvement in 8 weeks, others need 3-6 months of consistent use. This device does not replace professional dermatological treatments like laser, chemical peels, or injectables. For severe wrinkles or skin laxity, consult dermatologist or plastic surgeon. Always wear sunscreen daily - LED therapy makes skin more photosensitive temporarily.
