  • Poor circulation in lower extremities
  • Neuropathy discomfort (with doctor approval)
  • Post-workout muscle recovery
  • Stress relief and relaxation
  • Gift-giving for health and wellness

How to Use

  1. Place massager on flat, stable surface
  2. Plug into power outlet
  3. Remove socks for direct contact (optional)
  4. Insert both feet into designated slots
  5. Turn on device using control panel
  6. Select massage mode (kneading, rolling, or combo)
  7. Activate heat function if desired
  8. Adjust intensity level for comfort
  9. Relax for 15 minutes (auto shut-off)
  10. Use 1-2 times daily or as needed

Massage Functions

Shiatsu Kneading: Rotating nodes target pressure points
Rolling Massage: Rollers work along sole length
Air Compression: Gentle squeezing action (if included)
Vibration: High-frequency relaxation (some models)
Heat Therapy: Adjustable warming function
Combination: All functions working together

Care Instructions

Wipe interior with damp cloth weekly. Do not submerge in water. Check power cord for damage before each use. Store in cool, dry place away from moisture.

Specifications

  • Type: Electric foot massager with heat
  • Massage Technology: Shiatsu kneading + rolling + heat
  • Heat Range: 104-113°F (40-45°C) adjustable
  • Safety Feature: 15-minute auto shut-off timer
  • Power: AC adapter (included)
  • Control: Easy-reach buttons or remote
  • Intensity: 2-3 adjustable levels
  • Foot Size: Fits up to men's size 12-13
  • Weight: Sturdy, non-slip design

Usage Tips

  • Use after long day to relax and de-stress
  • Combine with Epsom salt foot soak for enhanced relief
  • Apply foot lotion after massage for added moisture
  • Use before bed to improve sleep quality
  • Start with lower intensity, gradually increase
  • Use heat in cold weather; skip in hot weather if preferred

Gift Presentation

This massager makes an excellent gift for:

  • Mother's Day, Father's Day presents
  • Christmas and birthday gifts
  • Valentine's Day for partners
  • Appreciation gifts for hard workers
  • Health and wellness occasions
  • Anyone with standing jobs (nurses, teachers, retail workers)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on motor and electronics. Contact us for support or questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This foot massager is for relaxation and comfort. Not medical equipment or treatment device. Do not use if you have: diabetes with neuropathy (without doctor approval), deep vein thrombosis, blood clots, severe varicose veins, open wounds, fractures, or acute injuries. Pregnant women: consult doctor before use. If you have circulatory disorders, get medical clearance first. If pain increases or new symptoms develop, discontinue use and consult healthcare provider. Not for use by children unsupervised.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Red Light Eye Massage Beauty Device

Advanced eye beauty device combining EMS micro-current with red light therapy for comprehensive eye area treatment. Targets dark circles, wrinkles, puffiness, and eye fatigue. Professional anti-aging technology for delicate eye skin at home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dark Circle Removal: Red light (630nm) increases circulation to reduce pigmentation and hemoglobin buildup under eyes
  • ✓ Anti-Wrinkle Action: EMS micro-current stimulates collagen production, smoothing crow's feet and fine lines
  • ✓ Eye Fatigue Relief: Gentle massage relaxes eye muscles strained from screens, reading, or driving
  • ✓ Puffiness Reduction: Promotes lymphatic drainage to eliminate under-eye bags and swelling
  • ✓ Skin Rejuvenation: Red light therapy improves elasticity, firmness, and overall eye area appearance

Perfect For

  • Persistent dark circles under eyes
  • Crow's feet and fine lines
  • Puffy eyes and under-eye bags
  • Digital eye strain and fatigue
  • Aging eye area concerns
  • Thin, crepey under-eye skin
  • Dull, tired-looking eyes

How to Use

  1. Remove contact lenses and eye makeup completely
  2. Cleanse face and pat eye area dry
  3. Apply eye cream or serum (optional - enhances conductivity)
  4. Turn on device and select mode
  5. Gently place massager wand on under-eye area
  6. Move in slow circular motions from inner to outer corner
  7. Treat crow's feet area with gentle tapping motion
  8. Use for 5-10 minutes per eye
  9. Use 1-2 times daily (morning and/or evening)
  10. Clean device head with soft cloth after use

Treatment Modes

Mode 1: EMS only (muscle toning, wrinkle smoothing)
Mode 2: Red light only (dark circles, rejuvenation)
Mode 3: EMS + Red light (comprehensive treatment)
Mode 4: Massage + vibration (fatigue relief)
Mode 5: Combination (all technologies)

Care Instructions

Wipe device head with soft, damp cloth after each use. Do not immerse in water. Store in protective case. Recharge regularly via USB to maintain battery life.

Specifications

  • Technologies: EMS micro-current + red light (630nm) + vibration massage
  • Treatment Modes: 5 automatic programs
  • EMS Intensity: Adjustable (3-5 levels)
  • Red Light: 630nm wavelength (clinically proven for skin)
  • Power: USB rechargeable
  • Session Time: 5-10 minutes per eye
  • Design: Ergonomic wand, easy to maneuver
  • Weight: Lightweight, comfortable to hold

Expected Results Timeline

Week 1: Reduced puffiness, less fatigued appearance
Weeks 2-3: Slight improvement in dark circles
Weeks 4-6: Noticeable wrinkle softening, improved tone
Weeks 8-12: Significant dark circle reduction, firmer skin
Maintenance: Continue 3-5x weekly to preserve results

Results vary by individual, age, and skin condition.

Usage Tips

  • Best results with consistent daily use
  • Use morning to de-puff before makeup
  • Use evening with retinol eye cream for enhanced anti-aging
  • Store in refrigerator for extra de-puffing effect
  • Pair with adequate sleep and hydration
  • Use gentle pressure - eye area skin is delicate

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on device and electronics. Contact us with questions or concerns.

Medical Disclaimer: This eye beauty device is for cosmetic purposes. Not medical equipment. Do not use if you have: recent eye surgery, retinal detachment, cataracts, glaucoma, eye infections, or eye injuries. Not suitable for children. Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. If you experience vision changes, eye pain, or increased irritation, discontinue immediately and consult ophthalmologist. Not a treatment for medical eye conditions. EMS sensation should be comfortable - reduce intensity if uncomfortable. Avoid direct contact with eyeball.

products.descriptionHtml:
Neck LED Lift Mask - Photon Anti-Wrinkle Skin Tightening

Professional LED light therapy mask specifically designed for neck rejuvenation and anti-aging treatment. Combines multiple wavelengths of photon therapy to reduce wrinkles, tighten sagging skin, improve elasticity, and restore youthful appearance to the often-neglected neck and décolletage area.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Neck Wrinkle Reduction: Red and near-infrared light stimulate collagen production to smooth fine lines and deep wrinkles
  • ✓ Skin Tightening: Photon therapy firms loose, sagging neck skin (turkey neck) by strengthening dermal structure
  • ✓ Multi-Wavelength Therapy: Red (630nm), blue (465nm), yellow (590nm), green (520nm) lights target different skin concerns
  • ✓ Collagen Boost: Red light penetrates 8-10mm to stimulate fibroblasts and increase collagen/elastin production
  • ✓ Even Skin Tone: Reduces age spots, sun damage, and uneven pigmentation on neck and chest
  • ✓ Non-Invasive: Painless, safe alternative to Botox, fillers, or surgical neck lift

Perfect For

  • Horizontal neck lines (necklace lines) and creases
  • Sagging neck skin (turkey neck, tech neck aging)
  • Décolletage wrinkles and chest aging
  • Sun damage and age spots on neck area
  • Loss of neck elasticity and firmness
  • Uneven skin tone and texture on neck
  • Post-weight loss loose neck skin
  • Preventing premature neck aging (maintenance)

How to Use

  1. Cleanse neck and décolletage area thoroughly, pat dry
  2. Optional: Apply hyaluronic acid serum for enhanced light penetration
  3. Position mask around neck, adjust straps for comfortable fit
  4. Select light mode: Red (anti-aging), Blue (acne), Yellow (rejuvenation), Green (calming), or multi-color cycle
  5. Relax for 10-20 minute treatment session
  6. Use 3-5 times per week for first 4-8 weeks, then 2-3 times weekly for maintenance
  7. Apply moisturizer after treatment to lock in benefits
  8. Results typically visible after 4-6 weeks of consistent use

Care Instructions

Wipe LED panel with soft, slightly damp microfiber cloth after each use. Do not submerge or spray directly with water. Clean fabric straps separately with mild soap. Store in protective case. Avoid dropping device. LED lifespan: 50,000+ hours (years of use). Charge via USB-C cable as needed.

Specifications

  • Technology: Medical-grade LED photon therapy
  • Wavelengths: Red 630nm (anti-aging), Blue 465nm (antibacterial), Yellow 590nm (brightening), Green 520nm (calming)
  • LED Count: 60-100 high-intensity LEDs covering full neck area
  • Intensity: 20-40 mW/cm² adjustable
  • Timer: 10/15/20 minute auto shut-off
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB-C charging, 2000mAh)
  • Runtime: 4-6 sessions per charge
  • Certification: FDA-cleared / CE marked

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for usage guidance or technical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This LED therapy device is for cosmetic skin improvement. Do not use if you have: photosensitivity disorders, taking photosensitizing medications, epilepsy, thyroid conditions (light near thyroid), or active skin cancer. Pregnant women should consult doctor before use. Not for treating medical conditions. Results vary by individual. Consistent use over weeks/months required for visible results.

products.descriptionHtml:
Vibration Shoulder Steamer Belt - Heated Warmer Massager

Multi-functional shoulder therapy belt combining steam heat, vibration massage, and thermal compression for comprehensive shoulder and neck pain relief. Innovative steaming technology delivers moist heat penetration while vibration releases deep muscle tension.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Steam Heating: Moist heat penetrates deeper than dry heat for enhanced muscle relaxation
  • ✓ Vibration Massage: Releases trigger points and muscle knots in shoulders and upper back
  • ✓ Thermal Compression: Maintains therapeutic warmth for extended pain relief
  • ✓ Shoulder Warmer: Perfect for cold-sensitive shoulders or winter pain
  • ✓ Adjustable Belt: Fits various shoulder widths and body types
  • ✓ Convenient Home Spa: Professional shoulder therapy without clinic visits

Perfect For

  • Chronic shoulder pain and stiffness
  • Frozen shoulder (adhesive capsulitis)
  • Rotator cuff tendonitis
  • Upper trapezius muscle tension
  • Cold-weather shoulder pain
  • Post-workout shoulder recovery
  • Desk work shoulder strain
  • Arthritis shoulder pain

How to Use

  1. Fill water reservoir if device has steam function
  2. Position belt over shoulders like shawl
  3. Secure straps comfortably
  4. Select mode (Heat, Vibration, or Combination)
  5. Adjust temperature and intensity settings
  6. Use for 15-30 minutes per session
  7. Device auto shuts off for safety
  8. Use 1-2 times daily as needed

Care Instructions

Unplug before cleaning. Wipe exterior with damp cloth - do not submerge. Empty water reservoir after use. Clean heating pads with dry cloth. Store in cool, dry place. Replace if heating or vibration functions fail.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal (Adjustable): Fits shoulder widths 14-20"
  • Weight: 1.5-2 lbs (comfortable for extended wear)
  • Suitable for adults

Specifications

  • Technology: Steam heating + vibration massage + thermal compression
  • Modes: 3-4 programs (Heat, Vibration, Combination, Auto)
  • Heat Range: 95-122°F (35-50°C) adjustable
  • Vibration: 3000-5000 pulses per minute
  • Power: AC adapter (110-240V)
  • Timer: 15/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Water Capacity: 50-100ml for steam function

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This shoulder massager is for wellness and pain management. Not for acute injuries, skin conditions, or open wounds. Do not use if pregnant, with pacemaker, or circulation disorders. Consult healthcare provider for persistent shoulder pain. Discontinue if pain increases. Not a medical treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric EMS Hip & Butt Trainer

Specialized EMS device targeting gluteal muscles for buttocks lifting, toning, and shaping. USB rechargeable design provides convenient muscle stimulation for hip and butt enhancement. Complements squats and glute exercises for faster shaping results.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Targeted Glute Activation: Stimulates all 3 gluteal muscles (maximus, medius, minimus) for comprehensive butt lifting
  • ✓ Buttocks Lifting: Strengthens and tones muscles to create lifted, firmer appearance
  • ✓ USB Rechargeable: Wireless operation with long battery life for convenience
  • ✓ Supplement to Exercise: Enhances results from squats, lunges, and other glute workouts
  • ✓ Discreet Use: Slim design can be worn under clothing during daily activities

Perfect For

  • Gluteal muscle strengthening
  • Buttocks lifting and shaping
  • Post-pregnancy body recovery
  • Supplementing gym glute workouts
  • Individuals unable to do squats/lunges
  • Maintaining muscle tone with busy schedule
  • Hip stability improvement

How to Use

  1. Fully charge device via USB before first use
  2. Clean hip/buttock area and ensure dry skin
  3. Apply conductive gel pads to device electrodes
  4. Position pads on both buttock cheeks (centered on each glute)
  5. Secure with adjustable belt or adhesive pads
  6. Turn on device and select training mode
  7. Start at low intensity, increase gradually
  8. Train for 20-30 minutes per session
  9. Use 2-3 times daily for optimal results
  10. Can wear under clothing or while sitting/standing

Training Schedule

Week 1-2: 20 minutes, 1-2x daily (adaptation)
Week 3-4: 25 minutes, 2x daily (building)
Week 5+: 30 minutes, 2-3x daily (maintenance)
Rest: Take 1 day off per week for recovery

Care Instructions

Replace gel pads every 30-40 applications. Clean electrodes with soft cloth. Recharge after each use to maintain battery. Store in protective case when not in use.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS muscle stimulation
  • Target Area: Gluteal muscles (buttocks, hips)
  • Power: USB rechargeable battery
  • Charging Time: 2 hours
  • Usage Time: 6-10 sessions per charge
  • Modes: Multiple training programs
  • Intensity: Adjustable levels (10-15)
  • Design: Slim, discreet, can wear under clothes
  • Package: Trainer, gel pads, USB cable, belt, manual

Best Results Protocol

Combine EMS training with:

  • Squats and lunges 3-4x per week
  • Protein-rich diet for muscle building
  • Cardio for fat loss (reveals toned muscles)
  • Adequate sleep for muscle recovery
  • Hydration (improves EMS conductivity)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Replacement gel pads available. Contact us with questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This EMS trainer is for muscle toning and fitness. Not a weight loss device or medical treatment. Do not use if pregnant or have: pacemaker, heart conditions, epilepsy, or electronic implants. Not for use on: chest, abdomen during pregnancy, head, or neck. Consult doctor before use if you have health concerns. Results require consistent use with exercise and healthy eating - EMS alone does not create dramatic body changes.

products.descriptionHtml:
8 Mode Rechargeable EMS Neck Massager

Advanced EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) neck massager with 8 therapeutic modes and convenient remote control. Low-frequency pulse technology penetrates deep to relieve muscle tension, stiffness, and chronic neck pain. Rechargeable design eliminates battery waste.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 8 Massage Modes: Kneading, tapping, acupuncture, cupping, scraping, and combination programs target different pain types
  • ✓ EMS Technology: Low-frequency electrical pulses stimulate muscles to relieve pain and improve circulation
  • ✓ Remote Control: Adjust intensity and mode without removing device, perfect for relaxation sessions
  • ✓ Rechargeable Battery: USB charging provides 2-3 hours of use per charge, eco-friendly alternative to disposable batteries
  • ✓ Hands-Free Design: Ergonomic neck contour fit allows you to work, read, or watch TV during treatment

Perfect For

  • Chronic neck pain and stiffness
  • Tech neck from prolonged computer/phone use
  • Muscle tension and knots
  • Post-workout muscle recovery
  • Stress-related neck tightness
  • Office workers and drivers

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use (2-3 hours)
  2. Clean neck area and ensure skin is dry
  3. Place massager around neck with pads touching skin on both sides
  4. Turn on device and select one of 8 massage modes using remote
  5. Adjust intensity level (15 levels available)
  6. Relax for 15-20 minutes per session
  7. Use 2-3 times daily or as needed
  8. Turn off and clean electrode pads after use

8 Massage Modes

  • Mode 1: Kneading massage
  • Mode 2: Tapping percussion
  • Mode 3: Acupuncture point stimulation
  • Mode 4: Cupping therapy simulation
  • Mode 5: Scraping (Gua Sha) technique
  • Mode 6-8: Combination programs

Care Instructions

Clean electrode pads with damp cloth after each use to maintain conductivity. Do not submerge in water. Store in protective case. Recharge when LED indicator shows low battery.

Specifications

  • Technology: EMS low-frequency pulse (1-100Hz)
  • Modes: 8 massage programs
  • Intensity Levels: 15 adjustable levels
  • Remote Control: Wireless, included
  • Battery: Rechargeable lithium-ion, 2-3 hour runtime
  • Charging: USB cable (included)
  • Session Time: Auto shut-off after 15 minutes

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty covers defects. Extended warranty available. Contact support for assistance.

Medical Disclaimer: This device is for muscle relaxation and pain relief. Not intended to diagnose or treat medical conditions. Do not use if pregnant, have pacemaker, heart conditions, or epilepsy. Consult doctor before use if you have health concerns.

products.descriptionHtml:
Smart Hip Trainer - EMS Vibration Muscle Stimulator

Intelligent EMS hip training device with integrated vibration technology for targeted buttocks lifting, hip muscle strengthening, and glute toning. Smart sensor technology automatically adjusts stimulation intensity based on muscle response for optimal training efficiency.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Smart Sensor Technology: Auto-adjusts EMS intensity based on real-time muscle feedback for safe, effective training
  • ✓ EMS + Vibration Combo: Dual technology maximizes muscle fiber recruitment and circulation
  • ✓ Targeted Hip Shaping: Contoured design fits hip/buttocks anatomy for precise muscle targeting
  • ✓ Progressive Training: 8 workout programs from beginner to advanced intensity levels
  • ✓ Portable & Wireless: Use anywhere - at home, office, or gym without cables
  • ✓ Visible Results: Users report firmer, lifted buttocks after 6-8 weeks of consistent use

Perfect For

  • Buttocks lifting and volume enhancement
  • Hip muscle strengthening and toning
  • Glute activation for sedentary workers
  • Post-workout recovery and muscle relaxation
  • Body shaping and contouring goals
  • Complementing squats/lunges for glute development
  • Improving hip stability and core strength

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use (2-3 hours via USB)
  2. Clean target area and apply gel pads to device contacts
  3. Position device on lower buttocks/upper thigh area and secure with elastic band
  4. Select smart training mode (automatic intensity adjustment) or manual mode (1-20 levels)
  5. Train for 25-30 minutes per session, 2-3 sessions daily
  6. Start with lower programs (1-3) for first week, progress gradually

Care Instructions

Wipe device housing with slightly damp cloth - do not submerge. Replace gel pads when adhesion reduces (typically 25-35 uses). Recharge when LED indicator shows low battery. Store in protective case provided. Avoid extreme temperatures.

Specifications

  • Technology: Smart EMS with vibration massage and biofeedback sensors
  • Training Programs: 8 modes (beginner, intermediate, advanced, massage, relaxation, shaping, lifting, comprehensive)
  • Intensity: 20 levels (automatic adjustment in smart mode)
  • Battery: 600mAh rechargeable lithium-ion (USB-C fast charging)
  • Runtime: 90-120 minutes per full charge
  • Pads: Hydrogel electrodes (2 pairs included, replacements available)
  • Smart Features: Auto shut-off, low battery alert, skin contact sensor

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on device. Gel pads consumable (not covered). Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for replacement pads or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This smart EMS trainer is a fitness and wellness device, not medical equipment. Contraindications: pregnancy, pacemakers, epilepsy, heart conditions, cancer, open wounds. Consult physician before use if you have medical concerns. Results vary. Not a substitute for balanced diet and exercise.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Electric Buttocks Trainer & Firming Machine

Professional EMS buttocks trainer combining muscle stimulation with massage for hip lifting and firming. Electric stimulator targets all three gluteal muscles to create lifted, shaped, firmer appearance. Comprehensive buttocks development system for home use.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Triple Muscle Targeting: Activates gluteus maximus, medius, and minimus for complete buttocks development
  • ✓ Hip Lifting: Repeated muscle contractions create lifting effect, combating gravity and sagging
  • ✓ Firming Action: Strengthens muscle fibers for denser, firmer feel and appearance
  • ✓ Massage Integration: Combines muscle building with relaxation for enhanced recovery
  • ✓ Progressive Training: Adjustable intensity allows gradual progression as muscles strengthen

Perfect For

  • Lifting sagging buttocks
  • Firming soft or weak glutes
  • Shaping flat or undefined hip area
  • Post-partum glute recovery
  • Age-related muscle loss prevention
  • Complementing gym glute workouts
  • Busy individuals with limited exercise time

How to Use

  1. Ensure skin is clean, dry, and free of lotions
  2. Apply fresh gel pads to electrode surfaces
  3. Position electrodes on buttocks (one per cheek)
  4. Adjust placement to center on each glute
  5. Secure with belt or let adhesive hold
  6. Power on and select training program
  7. Set intensity (start low, increase gradually)
  8. Train for 25-30 minutes
  9. Use 2-3 times daily for best results
  10. Remove carefully and clean gel pads

Program Selection Guide

Morning Session: Firming + Lifting mode
Afternoon Session: Shaping + Strengthening mode
Evening Session: Massage + Recovery mode
Intensive Days: Maximum stimulation mode (not daily)

Care Instructions

Replace gel pads when adhesion weakens (typically 30-40 sessions). Clean device exterior with alcohol wipe. Store in cool, dry place. Charge fully before extended storage.

Specifications

  • Type: EMS buttocks trainer with massage function
  • Technology: Electrical muscle stimulation
  • Target Muscles: Gluteus maximus, medius, minimus
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery
  • Charging: USB cable (included)
  • Programs: 6-10 training modes
  • Intensity: 15-20 adjustable levels
  • Session Duration: 25-30 minutes
  • Design: Wireless, portable, discreet

Training Schedule

Beginner (Weeks 1-2):
- 20 minutes, 1-2x daily
- Intensity: Level 3-5
- Focus: Adaptation and muscle awareness

Intermediate (Weeks 3-6):
- 25 minutes, 2x daily
- Intensity: Level 6-10
- Focus: Strength and firmness building

Advanced (Weeks 7+):
- 30 minutes, 2-3x daily
- Intensity: Level 10-15
- Focus: Maximum development and maintenance

Workout Combination

For optimal results, combine EMS training with:

  • Squats: 3 sets x 12-15 reps, 3x weekly
  • Lunges: 3 sets x 10 reps per leg, 3x weekly
  • Hip Thrusts: 3 sets x 12 reps, 2x weekly
  • Glute Bridges: 3 sets x 15 reps, 2x weekly

Warranty & Support

90-day manufacturer warranty. Extra gel pad sets available. Contact us for guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: Fitness device for muscle toning, not medical equipment. Do not use if pregnant or have: pacemaker, defibrillator, heart conditions, epilepsy, or electronic implants. Not for use on chest, abdomen (if pregnant), face, neck, or over damaged skin. Results require consistent use plus proper strength training and nutrition. EMS supplements - does not replace - traditional exercise. Individual results vary based on genetics, effort, diet, and exercise consistency. Consult healthcare provider before starting any fitness program.

products.descriptionHtml:
USB Rechargeable EMS Abdominal Belt

Convenient USB rechargeable muscle stimulation belt for abdominal toning and core strengthening. Wireless operation eliminates battery waste while providing professional-grade EMS training. Perfect home fitness solution for busy lifestyles.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ USB Rechargeable: Eco-friendly lithium battery eliminates ongoing battery costs and waste
  • ✓ Wireless Freedom: No cords during use - move freely while training
  • ✓ Professional EMS: Same technology used in physical therapy and professional athletic training
  • ✓ Multi-Muscle Activation: Engages entire core including hard-to-target deep abdominal muscles
  • ✓ Time Efficient: Get muscle workout equivalent to 100+ crunches in 20 minutes

Perfect For

  • Busy professionals with limited gym time
  • Post-pregnancy core rehabilitation
  • Athletes supplementing training
  • Individuals unable to do traditional ab exercises
  • Maintaining muscle during injury recovery
  • Core strengthening for back pain prevention

How to Use

  1. Charge device using included USB cable (full charge: 2 hours)
  2. Ensure skin is clean and dry
  3. Apply fresh conductive gel pads to electrodes
  4. Position belt on abdomen with central pad over navel
  5. Adjust elastic strap for snug, comfortable fit
  6. Press power button to activate
  7. Select desired training mode
  8. Adjust intensity using +/- buttons (start low)
  9. Train for 20-30 minutes
  10. Device auto-shuts off after session

Battery & Charging

Charge Time: 2 hours
Usage Time: 5-10 sessions per charge
Battery Life: 500+ charge cycles
Indicator: LED shows charge status

Care Instructions

Charge regularly to maintain battery health. Replace gel pads when adhesion weakens (typically 30-40 uses). Store in protective case. Keep away from extreme temperatures.

Specifications

  • Power: USB rechargeable lithium battery
  • Charging: USB cable (included)
  • Technology: EMS muscle stimulation
  • Programs: Multiple training modes
  • Intensity: 10-20 adjustable levels
  • Belt: Adjustable elastic, fits 24-47" waist
  • Controller: Wireless, detachable for washing
  • Gel Pads: 2 sets included

Training Tips

  • Start at lowest intensity and gradually increase
  • Use consistently - 2-3 times daily for 4-6 weeks
  • Combine with cardio for fat loss
  • Stay hydrated - EMS works better with proper hydration
  • Take rest days to allow muscle recovery

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on device and battery. Extra gel pads available. Contact us for support.

Medical Disclaimer: Fitness device for muscle toning, not medical equipment. Do not use if pregnant or have: pacemaker, defibrillator, heart conditions, epilepsy, or other electronic implants. Not for use on chest, head, neck, or damaged skin. Consult physician before use if you have health conditions. Not a substitute for exercise and healthy diet. Results vary by individual effort and consistency.

products.title: Electric Gua Sha Board | Vibration Massage & Hot Compress
products.description: Electric Gua Sha Board - Vibration, Massage, Hot Compress & Lymphatic Drainage Modern electric gua sha combining traditional Chinese scraping therapy with vibration massage, hot compress, and lymphatic drainage technology. Multi-function tool dredges meridians, soothes tense muscles, and promotes circulation with convenient cordless design. Key Benefits ✓ 4-in-1 Technology: Scraping, vibration, heat, lymphatic drainage combined ✓ Hot Compress: Adjustable heating enhances muscle relaxation ✓ Vibration Massage: Deep tissue relief and circulation boost ✓ Meridian Dredging: Traditional gua sha benefits with modern convenience ✓ Muscle Tension Relief: Soothes tight, sore muscles ✓ Cordless: Rechargeable for easy portability Perfect For Neck and shoulder tension Back muscle knots and soreness Lymphatic drainage and detox Traditional gua sha therapy (modern version) Meridian blockage relief Muscle recovery after exercise Chronic muscle pain Facial gua sha (with appropriate head) How to Use Charge device fully before first use Apply massage oil or lotion to treatment area Select temperature setting (3 levels: low, medium, high) Choose vibration intensity Hold at 15-45 degree angle to skin Use gentle to moderate pressure Scrape in one direction (toward lymph nodes) Neck/shoulders: upward strokes (5-10 min) Back: along muscle lines (10-15 min) Clean tool head after each use Technique Guide Scraping Direction: Always toward nearest lymph nodes Pressure: Firm but not painful (mild redness is normal) Speed: Slow, deliberate strokes Frequency: 2-3 times weekly maximum Care Instructions Clean scraping head with damp cloth after each use. Wipe device body with soft cloth. Do not submerge in water. Recharge when battery indicator shows low. Store in protective case. Specifications Functions: Scraping, vibration, heating, lymphatic drainage Heating Levels: 3 adjustable temperatures (40-55℃) Vibration Modes: 3-5 intensity levels Power: Rechargeable battery (USB) Runtime: 90-120 minutes per charge Material: ABS, stainless steel scraping head Waterproof: Splash-resistant only Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for technique guidance. Medical Disclaimer: For external therapeutic massage only. Not for medical conditions requiring professional treatment. Contraindications: bleeding disorders, blood thinners, varicose veins, broken skin, infections, recent surgery, pregnancy (abdomen area). Do not use over bones, spine, or throat. Temporary bruising (sha) is normal with traditional gua sha technique. If excessive bruising, pain, or skin damage occurs, discontinue use. Not FDA-approved for medical treatment.
products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Gua Sha Board - Vibration, Massage, Hot Compress & Lymphatic Drainage

Modern electric gua sha combining traditional Chinese scraping therapy with vibration massage, hot compress, and lymphatic drainage technology. Multi-function tool dredges meridians, soothes tense muscles, and promotes circulation with convenient cordless design.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 4-in-1 Technology: Scraping, vibration, heat, lymphatic drainage combined
  • ✓ Hot Compress: Adjustable heating enhances muscle relaxation
  • ✓ Vibration Massage: Deep tissue relief and circulation boost
  • ✓ Meridian Dredging: Traditional gua sha benefits with modern convenience
  • ✓ Muscle Tension Relief: Soothes tight, sore muscles
  • ✓ Cordless: Rechargeable for easy portability

Perfect For

  • Neck and shoulder tension
  • Back muscle knots and soreness
  • Lymphatic drainage and detox
  • Traditional gua sha therapy (modern version)
  • Meridian blockage relief
  • Muscle recovery after exercise
  • Chronic muscle pain
  • Facial gua sha (with appropriate head)

How to Use

  1. Charge device fully before first use
  2. Apply massage oil or lotion to treatment area
  3. Select temperature setting (3 levels: low, medium, high)
  4. Choose vibration intensity
  5. Hold at 15-45 degree angle to skin
  6. Use gentle to moderate pressure
  7. Scrape in one direction (toward lymph nodes)
  8. Neck/shoulders: upward strokes (5-10 min)
  9. Back: along muscle lines (10-15 min)
  10. Clean tool head after each use

Technique Guide

  • Scraping Direction: Always toward nearest lymph nodes
  • Pressure: Firm but not painful (mild redness is normal)
  • Speed: Slow, deliberate strokes
  • Frequency: 2-3 times weekly maximum

Care Instructions

Clean scraping head with damp cloth after each use. Wipe device body with soft cloth. Do not submerge in water. Recharge when battery indicator shows low. Store in protective case.

Specifications

  • Functions: Scraping, vibration, heating, lymphatic drainage
  • Heating Levels: 3 adjustable temperatures (40-55℃)
  • Vibration Modes: 3-5 intensity levels
  • Power: Rechargeable battery (USB)
  • Runtime: 90-120 minutes per charge
  • Material: ABS, stainless steel scraping head
  • Waterproof: Splash-resistant only

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for technique guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: For external therapeutic massage only. Not for medical conditions requiring professional treatment. Contraindications: bleeding disorders, blood thinners, varicose veins, broken skin, infections, recent surgery, pregnancy (abdomen area). Do not use over bones, spine, or throat. Temporary bruising (sha) is normal with traditional gua sha technique. If excessive bruising, pain, or skin damage occurs, discontinue use. Not FDA-approved for medical treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
EMS Body Sculptor - Wireless Rechargeable Butt Trainer 29 Levels

Professional EMS body sculpting system featuring 29 precision intensity levels and wireless operation for effective muscle toning. Comprehensive training programs target glutes, abs, and other muscle groups for convenient home fitness and body contouring results.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ 29 Precision Levels: Fine-tuned intensity control for personalized, progressive muscle training
  • ✓ Professional Results: Mimics high-end fitness studio EMS training at home
  • ✓ Wireless Technology: Freedom to move and multitask during EMS sessions
  • ✓ Targeted Butt Training: Specialized modes for glute activation and lifting
  • ✓ Full Body Versatility: Works on abs, glutes, thighs, arms, calves
  • ✓ Rechargeable Design: Eco-friendly, cost-effective power solution

Perfect For

  • Glute development and buttocks lifting
  • Abdominal muscle definition
  • Body sculpting and contouring
  • Supplementing workout routines
  • Muscle recovery and activation
  • Busy professionals with limited gym time
  • Post-pregnancy body transformation
  • Maintaining muscle tone while traveling

How to Use

  1. Fully charge device (USB-C cable provided)
  2. Clean and dry target area skin
  3. Apply gel pads with device attached
  4. Begin at intensity level 5-8 for first week
  5. Run 20-30 minute sessions, 2-3 times daily
  6. Progress gradually to higher levels (15-25 for advanced users)
  7. Maintain consistent schedule for 8-12 weeks for best results
  8. Combine with healthy diet and exercise for optimal outcomes

Care Instructions

Clean gel pads after each use, store in protective film. Replace pads when stickiness diminishes (typically 25-35 uses). Wipe device with dry cloth only - not waterproof. Recharge regularly to maintain battery health. Store at room temperature.

Specifications

  • Technology: Advanced wireless EMS with 29-level precision control
  • Intensity: 29 levels (industry-leading range)
  • Modes: 6 training programs (toning, lifting, strengthening, massage, recovery, custom)
  • Power: Rechargeable lithium battery (USB-C fast charging)
  • Runtime: 12-18 sessions per full charge
  • Pads: Medical-grade hydrogel electrodes (replaceable)
  • Auto-Off: 23-minute safety timer
  • Weight: Ultra-lightweight for comfortable wear

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended warranty available. Replacement gel pads sold separately. Contact us for training protocols or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This EMS device is for fitness, muscle toning, and body sculpting. Contraindications: cardiac pacemakers, pregnancy, epilepsy, cancer, recent surgery, heart disease, open wounds, skin conditions. Not for children under 18. Consult physician before use if you have medical conditions. Results vary by individual, consistency, diet, and exercise. Not for weight loss - focuses on muscle toning and definition. Not a medical device or treatment.

products.title: Air Compression Leg Massager | 3 Modes Heat Therapy
products.description: Air Compression Leg Massager - 3 Modes & Heat Therapy Advanced air compression therapy system for legs, calves, and feet with integrated heat function. Delivers professional-grade pneumatic compression massage to enhance circulation, reduce swelling, accelerate muscle recovery, and relieve leg fatigue - bringing spa-quality treatment to your home. Key Benefits ✓ Sequential Compression: Graduated pressure from ankle to thigh mimics natural circulation flow for optimal results ✓ Heat Therapy Integration: Soothing warmth enhances muscle relaxation and circulation effectiveness ✓ 3 Therapeutic Modes: Circulation boost, lymphatic drainage, sports recovery - each optimized for specific needs ✓ Adjustable Pressure: 3 intensity levels (gentle to firm) accommodate sensitivity and treatment goals ✓ Athlete Recovery: Reduces delayed onset muscle soreness (DOMS) and speeds post-workout recovery ✓ Circulation Enhancement: Clinically proven to increase blood flow and reduce venous pooling Perfect For Athletes needing rapid muscle recovery (running, cycling, CrossFit) Chronic venous insufficiency and leg swelling Post-surgery lymphedema management Long-haul travelers preventing DVT and leg fatigue Standing professions (nurses, retail, hospitality) with leg strain Diabetes-related circulation issues Elderly users with poor leg circulation Varicose vein symptom management How to Use Sit or recline comfortably with legs elevated (use pillow under calves for comfort) Wrap compression boots around legs starting from foot, secure all velcro straps Connect air hoses to controller unit Select mode: Mode 1 (Circulation), Mode 2 (Lymphatic), Mode 3 (Recovery) Set intensity: Level 1 (gentle 20mmHg), 2 (moderate 40mmHg), 3 (firm 60mmHg) Activate heat if desired (recommended for cold legs or muscle tension) Run 20-30 minute session - auto shut-off prevents over-treatment For best results: Use daily, especially post-exercise or after long sitting/standing Care Instructions Wipe compression boots with damp cloth after each use. Do not machine wash or submerge in water. Clean controller exterior with dry microfiber cloth. Check air tubes monthly for cracks or leaks. Store in cool, dry place with tubes loosely arranged. Do not fold or crease air chambers. Sizing Guide One Size (Adjustable): Fits calf circumference 9-19" (23-48cm) Leg Length: Accommodates leg lengths 24-36" (61-91cm) Foot Size: Fits US shoe sizes 5-13 (EU 36-47) Velcro straps provide extensive adjustability for wide range of body types Specifications Technology: Pneumatic sequential compression + infrared heat Modes: 3 pre-programmed massage patterns Pressure Range: 20-60mmHg (adjustable in 3 levels) Heat Function: 95-104°F (35-40°C) Air Chambers: 4-6 independent chambers per leg Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off Power: AC powered 110-240V (universal voltage) Compression Cycle: 60-90 second full cycle duration Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement boots available if air chamber fails. Contact us for technical support. Medical Disclaimer: This compression therapy device is for wellness and recovery. Contraindications: active DVT, acute trauma, severe peripheral artery disease, cellulitis, bone fractures, pregnancy complications. If you have cardiovascular conditions, diabetes, or circulatory disorders, consult physician before use. Not a medical treatment for vascular disease.
products.descriptionHtml:
Air Compression Leg Massager - 3 Modes & Heat Therapy

Advanced air compression therapy system for legs, calves, and feet with integrated heat function. Delivers professional-grade pneumatic compression massage to enhance circulation, reduce swelling, accelerate muscle recovery, and relieve leg fatigue - bringing spa-quality treatment to your home.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Sequential Compression: Graduated pressure from ankle to thigh mimics natural circulation flow for optimal results
  • ✓ Heat Therapy Integration: Soothing warmth enhances muscle relaxation and circulation effectiveness
  • ✓ 3 Therapeutic Modes: Circulation boost, lymphatic drainage, sports recovery - each optimized for specific needs
  • ✓ Adjustable Pressure: 3 intensity levels (gentle to firm) accommodate sensitivity and treatment goals
  • ✓ Athlete Recovery: Reduces delayed onset muscle soreness (DOMS) and speeds post-workout recovery
  • ✓ Circulation Enhancement: Clinically proven to increase blood flow and reduce venous pooling

Perfect For

  • Athletes needing rapid muscle recovery (running, cycling, CrossFit)
  • Chronic venous insufficiency and leg swelling
  • Post-surgery lymphedema management
  • Long-haul travelers preventing DVT and leg fatigue
  • Standing professions (nurses, retail, hospitality) with leg strain
  • Diabetes-related circulation issues
  • Elderly users with poor leg circulation
  • Varicose vein symptom management

How to Use

  1. Sit or recline comfortably with legs elevated (use pillow under calves for comfort)
  2. Wrap compression boots around legs starting from foot, secure all velcro straps
  3. Connect air hoses to controller unit
  4. Select mode: Mode 1 (Circulation), Mode 2 (Lymphatic), Mode 3 (Recovery)
  5. Set intensity: Level 1 (gentle 20mmHg), 2 (moderate 40mmHg), 3 (firm 60mmHg)
  6. Activate heat if desired (recommended for cold legs or muscle tension)
  7. Run 20-30 minute session - auto shut-off prevents over-treatment
  8. For best results: Use daily, especially post-exercise or after long sitting/standing

Care Instructions

Wipe compression boots with damp cloth after each use. Do not machine wash or submerge in water. Clean controller exterior with dry microfiber cloth. Check air tubes monthly for cracks or leaks. Store in cool, dry place with tubes loosely arranged. Do not fold or crease air chambers.

Sizing Guide

  • One Size (Adjustable): Fits calf circumference 9-19" (23-48cm)
  • Leg Length: Accommodates leg lengths 24-36" (61-91cm)
  • Foot Size: Fits US shoe sizes 5-13 (EU 36-47)
  • Velcro straps provide extensive adjustability for wide range of body types

Specifications

  • Technology: Pneumatic sequential compression + infrared heat
  • Modes: 3 pre-programmed massage patterns
  • Pressure Range: 20-60mmHg (adjustable in 3 levels)
  • Heat Function: 95-104°F (35-40°C)
  • Air Chambers: 4-6 independent chambers per leg
  • Timer: 15/20/30 minute auto shut-off
  • Power: AC powered 110-240V (universal voltage)
  • Compression Cycle: 60-90 second full cycle duration

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Replacement boots available if air chamber fails. Contact us for technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This compression therapy device is for wellness and recovery. Contraindications: active DVT, acute trauma, severe peripheral artery disease, cellulitis, bone fractures, pregnancy complications. If you have cardiovascular conditions, diabetes, or circulatory disorders, consult physician before use. Not a medical treatment for vascular disease.

products.description: Back Support Brace - Adjustable Posture Corrector for Women & Men Professional-grade adjustable back support brace combining posture correction with upper back stabilization. Dual-function design provides both postural realignment and therapeutic support for upper back pain, muscle strain, and spinal conditions affecting the thoracic region. Key Benefits ✓ Dual-Function Design: Provides both posture correction and therapeutic back support in one device ✓ Adjustable Support: Customize level of correction and support from gentle reminder to firm stabilization ✓ Upper Back Stabilization: Rigid stays prevent excessive thoracic flexion (forward bending) ✓ Shoulder Retraction: Pulls shoulders back to improve posture and reduce upper back strain ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces thoracic spine pain, muscle tension, and postural fatigue ✓ Professional Grade: Suitable for both daily posture maintenance and medical support needs Perfect For Chronic upper back pain (thoracic spine) Forward slouch posture and kyphosis (hunchback) Muscle strain in upper back region Thoracic spine conditions requiring support Post-surgical upper back stabilization Desk workers with upper back fatigue Heavy lifting work requiring back protection Rehabilitation from upper back injuries How to Use Position brace with back support panel centered between shoulder blades Slide arms through shoulder loops Adjust shoulder straps to pull shoulders gently back Secure chest strap (if included) for additional stabilization Tighten to desired support level - firm but not restrictive For therapeutic use: Wear during activities causing pain For posture correction: Start 30 min-1 hour daily, increase gradually Remove periodically to prevent muscle dependency Care Instructions Remove rigid stays (if detachable) before washing. Hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or iron. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect stays for bending or damage - straighten or replace if needed. Replace brace when straps lose elasticity or support diminishes. Sizing Guide Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line + waist circumference S: Chest 28-32", Waist 24-28" M: Chest 32-36", Waist 28-32" L: Chest 36-40", Waist 32-36" XL: Chest 40-44", Waist 36-40" XXL: Chest 44-48", Waist 40-44" For between sizes, size up for comfort during extended wear Specifications Type: Adjustable back support and posture correction brace Material: Breathable elastic, neoprene padding, rigid back stays Stays: 2-4 vertical stays in upper back region (removable in some models) Design: Figure-8 shoulder straps with back panel support Support Level: Medium to high (adjustable) Features: Breathable, adjustable compression, optional chest strap Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing or fit questions. Medical Disclaimer: This back support brace provides mechanical stabilization and posture correction. Not for severe spinal deformities without medical supervision. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have thoracic spine conditions or recent surgery. Prolonged continuous use without strengthening exercises may weaken postural muscles. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms develop. Not a substitute for medical treatment or physical therapy.
products.descriptionHtml:
Back Support Brace - Adjustable Posture Corrector for Women & Men

Professional-grade adjustable back support brace combining posture correction with upper back stabilization. Dual-function design provides both postural realignment and therapeutic support for upper back pain, muscle strain, and spinal conditions affecting the thoracic region.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Dual-Function Design: Provides both posture correction and therapeutic back support in one device
  • ✓ Adjustable Support: Customize level of correction and support from gentle reminder to firm stabilization
  • ✓ Upper Back Stabilization: Rigid stays prevent excessive thoracic flexion (forward bending)
  • ✓ Shoulder Retraction: Pulls shoulders back to improve posture and reduce upper back strain
  • ✓ Pain Relief: Reduces thoracic spine pain, muscle tension, and postural fatigue
  • ✓ Professional Grade: Suitable for both daily posture maintenance and medical support needs

Perfect For

  • Chronic upper back pain (thoracic spine)
  • Forward slouch posture and kyphosis (hunchback)
  • Muscle strain in upper back region
  • Thoracic spine conditions requiring support
  • Post-surgical upper back stabilization
  • Desk workers with upper back fatigue
  • Heavy lifting work requiring back protection
  • Rehabilitation from upper back injuries

How to Use

  1. Position brace with back support panel centered between shoulder blades
  2. Slide arms through shoulder loops
  3. Adjust shoulder straps to pull shoulders gently back
  4. Secure chest strap (if included) for additional stabilization
  5. Tighten to desired support level - firm but not restrictive
  6. For therapeutic use: Wear during activities causing pain
  7. For posture correction: Start 30 min-1 hour daily, increase gradually
  8. Remove periodically to prevent muscle dependency

Care Instructions

Remove rigid stays (if detachable) before washing. Hand wash with cold water and mild detergent. Air dry flat - do not tumble dry or iron. Clean weekly with regular use. Inspect stays for bending or damage - straighten or replace if needed. Replace brace when straps lose elasticity or support diminishes.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Chest circumference at nipple line + waist circumference
  • S: Chest 28-32", Waist 24-28"
  • M: Chest 32-36", Waist 28-32"
  • L: Chest 36-40", Waist 32-36"
  • XL: Chest 40-44", Waist 36-40"
  • XXL: Chest 44-48", Waist 40-44"
  • For between sizes, size up for comfort during extended wear

Specifications

  • Type: Adjustable back support and posture correction brace
  • Material: Breathable elastic, neoprene padding, rigid back stays
  • Stays: 2-4 vertical stays in upper back region (removable in some models)
  • Design: Figure-8 shoulder straps with back panel support
  • Support Level: Medium to high (adjustable)
  • Features: Breathable, adjustable compression, optional chest strap

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Contact us for sizing or fit questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This back support brace provides mechanical stabilization and posture correction. Not for severe spinal deformities without medical supervision. Do not wear so tight it restricts breathing. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have thoracic spine conditions or recent surgery. Prolonged continuous use without strengthening exercises may weaken postural muscles. Discontinue if pain increases or new symptoms develop. Not a substitute for medical treatment or physical therapy.

products.title: Spring Knee Booster | Elderly Climbing Power Support
products.description: Spring Knee Booster - Elderly Climbing Power Support Spring-assisted knee booster specifically designed for elderly users and those with weakened knee strength. Provides mechanical power assistance during knee extension movements like climbing stairs, standing up, or walking uphill, reducing joint stress and muscle fatigue by up to 40%. Key Benefits ✓ Elderly-Focused Design: Reduces knee load during daily activities - stairs, standing from chairs, walking ✓ Power-Lift Assistance: Springs store energy during knee bend, release during extension for easier movement ✓ Stair Climbing Aid: Makes ascending stairs significantly easier with reduced quad muscle demand ✓ Arthritis-Friendly: Reduces pain during weight-bearing activities by distributing load more evenly ✓ Adjustable Assistance: 3 spring tension levels accommodate different strength levels and activities ✓ Independence Preservation: Helps elderly maintain active lifestyle and mobility without constant assistance Perfect For Elderly users with weakened quadriceps or knee arthritis Stair climbing difficulty (ascending stairs) Sit-to-stand transitions requiring assistance Post-knee replacement users rebuilding strength Arthritis sufferers needing joint load reduction Hiking and outdoor activities for seniors Caregivers assisting elderly patients with mobility How to Use Start with lowest spring tension setting for first week of use Position brace with spring mechanism centered on lateral knee, hinges aligned to joint Secure straps snugly - thigh strap first, then calf strap below knee Practice bending and straightening knee to feel spring assistance engage For stairs: Springs assist during upward climb, compress going down (use handrail for safety) Wear during active hours, remove for rest periods to avoid muscle dependency Increase spring tension gradually as strength improves or for more challenging activities Care Instructions Remove and hand wash fabric components weekly. Wipe spring mechanisms with dry cloth. Apply silicone lubricant to springs monthly to prevent squeaking and ensure smooth operation. Check all screws and connections monthly - tighten if loose. Replace if springs lose tension or become damaged. Sizing Guide Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above kneecap center S: 13-15" (33-38cm) - Petite/slender builds M: 15-17" (38-43cm) - Average builds L: 17-19" (43-48cm) - Larger builds XL: 19-21" (48-53cm) - XL builds Proper fit critical for spring mechanism effectiveness - consult sizing chart carefully Specifications Type: Spring-powered knee booster with adjustable assistance Spring System: Dual lateral springs with 3-level tension adjustment Material: Aluminum alloy frame, medical-grade springs, breathable straps Weight Capacity: Supports up to 250 lbs (113 kg) Assistance Level: 20-40% load reduction (varies by spring setting) Weight: 1.3 lbs per brace (lightweight for elderly users) Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Spring mechanism covered for defects. Contact us for sizing or mechanical questions. Medical Disclaimer: This knee booster provides mechanical assistance, not medical treatment. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have severe knee instability, acute injury, or balance issues. Use with caution on stairs - always use handrail for safety. Springs do not replace muscle strengthening - continue prescribed physical therapy exercises.
products.descriptionHtml:
Spring Knee Booster - Elderly Climbing Power Support

Spring-assisted knee booster specifically designed for elderly users and those with weakened knee strength. Provides mechanical power assistance during knee extension movements like climbing stairs, standing up, or walking uphill, reducing joint stress and muscle fatigue by up to 40%.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Elderly-Focused Design: Reduces knee load during daily activities - stairs, standing from chairs, walking
  • ✓ Power-Lift Assistance: Springs store energy during knee bend, release during extension for easier movement
  • ✓ Stair Climbing Aid: Makes ascending stairs significantly easier with reduced quad muscle demand
  • ✓ Arthritis-Friendly: Reduces pain during weight-bearing activities by distributing load more evenly
  • ✓ Adjustable Assistance: 3 spring tension levels accommodate different strength levels and activities
  • ✓ Independence Preservation: Helps elderly maintain active lifestyle and mobility without constant assistance

Perfect For

  • Elderly users with weakened quadriceps or knee arthritis
  • Stair climbing difficulty (ascending stairs)
  • Sit-to-stand transitions requiring assistance
  • Post-knee replacement users rebuilding strength
  • Arthritis sufferers needing joint load reduction
  • Hiking and outdoor activities for seniors
  • Caregivers assisting elderly patients with mobility

How to Use

  1. Start with lowest spring tension setting for first week of use
  2. Position brace with spring mechanism centered on lateral knee, hinges aligned to joint
  3. Secure straps snugly - thigh strap first, then calf strap below knee
  4. Practice bending and straightening knee to feel spring assistance engage
  5. For stairs: Springs assist during upward climb, compress going down (use handrail for safety)
  6. Wear during active hours, remove for rest periods to avoid muscle dependency
  7. Increase spring tension gradually as strength improves or for more challenging activities

Care Instructions

Remove and hand wash fabric components weekly. Wipe spring mechanisms with dry cloth. Apply silicone lubricant to springs monthly to prevent squeaking and ensure smooth operation. Check all screws and connections monthly - tighten if loose. Replace if springs lose tension or become damaged.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Thigh circumference 6" above kneecap center
  • S: 13-15" (33-38cm) - Petite/slender builds
  • M: 15-17" (38-43cm) - Average builds
  • L: 17-19" (43-48cm) - Larger builds
  • XL: 19-21" (48-53cm) - XL builds
  • Proper fit critical for spring mechanism effectiveness - consult sizing chart carefully

Specifications

  • Type: Spring-powered knee booster with adjustable assistance
  • Spring System: Dual lateral springs with 3-level tension adjustment
  • Material: Aluminum alloy frame, medical-grade springs, breathable straps
  • Weight Capacity: Supports up to 250 lbs (113 kg)
  • Assistance Level: 20-40% load reduction (varies by spring setting)
  • Weight: 1.3 lbs per brace (lightweight for elderly users)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Spring mechanism covered for defects. Contact us for sizing or mechanical questions.

Medical Disclaimer: This knee booster provides mechanical assistance, not medical treatment. Consult healthcare provider before use if you have severe knee instability, acute injury, or balance issues. Use with caution on stairs - always use handrail for safety. Springs do not replace muscle strengthening - continue prescribed physical therapy exercises.

Key Benefits ✓ Mirror Therapy: Unaffected hand guides affected hand movements through mirrored robotic assistance ✓ Bilateral Training: Simultaneous movement of both hands enhances neuroplasticity and motor learning ✓ Finger-Specific Training: Individual finger chambers allow targeted rehabilitation for each digit ✓ Stroke Recovery: Effective for hemiplegia/hemiparesis hand function restoration ✓ Automated Assistance: Robotics provide consistent, repeatable movements without therapist fatigue ✓ Home-Based Therapy: Practice daily between clinic visits for accelerated recovery Perfect For Stroke survivors with unilateral hand impairment Mirror therapy protocols in occupational therapy Improving motor function through bilateral training Phantom limb pain management Complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS) Hand function recovery after traumatic brain injury Supplementing clinic-based rehabilitation programs How to Use Put gloves on both hands (affected and unaffected) Connect air tubes and controller to both gloves Select mirror mode on device Perform voluntary movements with unaffected hand Device mirrors these movements on affected hand automatically Practice 20-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily Focus attention on affected hand during movements for maximum neuroplasticity benefit Progress from passive mirroring to active-assist as recovery improves Care Instructions Remove glove liners and hand wash separately. Wipe pneumatic chambers with damp cloth - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect tubes and connections weekly. Clean controller exterior with dry cloth only. Replace gloves if tears develop or chambers lose pressure. Sizing Guide Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb) S: 2.75-3.25" (7-8.5cm) M: 3.25-3.75" (8.5-9.5cm) L: 3.75-4.25" (9.5-11cm) XL: 4.25-4.75" (11-12cm) Set includes both left and right gloves for bilateral training Specifications Technology: Mirror therapy robotics with bilateral pneumatic system Modes: Mirror therapy, Bilateral training, Independent control Intensity: 10 adjustable levels per hand Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery Chambers: 5 individual finger chambers per glove + thumb Timer: 20/30 minute sessions with auto shut-off Set Contents: 2 gloves (left + right), controller, air tubes Warranty & Support 90-day warranty. Not for acute injuries, open wounds, or severe edema. Results vary by stroke severity, time since injury, and therapy consistency. Consult healthcare provider before use.
products.descriptionHtml:
Robot Rehabilitation Training Gloves - Mirror Therapy Device

Innovative rehabilitation robot gloves utilizing mirror therapy principles for bilateral hand training. Designed for stroke survivors and neurological condition patients, this device helps restore hand function by having the unaffected hand guide the affected hand through movements, leveraging neuroplasticity for recovery.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Mirror Therapy: Unaffected hand guides affected hand movements through mirrored robotic assistance
  • ✓ Bilateral Training: Simultaneous movement of both hands enhances neuroplasticity and motor learning
  • ✓ Finger-Specific Training: Individual finger chambers allow targeted rehabilitation for each digit
  • ✓ Stroke Recovery: Effective for hemiplegia/hemiparesis hand function restoration
  • ✓ Automated Assistance: Robotics provide consistent, repeatable movements without therapist fatigue
  • ✓ Home-Based Therapy: Practice daily between clinic visits for accelerated recovery

Perfect For

  • Stroke survivors with unilateral hand impairment
  • Mirror therapy protocols in occupational therapy
  • Improving motor function through bilateral training
  • Phantom limb pain management
  • Complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS)
  • Hand function recovery after traumatic brain injury
  • Supplementing clinic-based rehabilitation programs

How to Use

  1. Put gloves on both hands (affected and unaffected)
  2. Connect air tubes and controller to both gloves
  3. Select mirror mode on device
  4. Perform voluntary movements with unaffected hand
  5. Device mirrors these movements on affected hand automatically
  6. Practice 20-30 minutes, 2-3 times daily
  7. Focus attention on affected hand during movements for maximum neuroplasticity benefit
  8. Progress from passive mirroring to active-assist as recovery improves

Care Instructions

Remove glove liners and hand wash separately. Wipe pneumatic chambers with damp cloth - do not submerge. Air dry completely. Inspect tubes and connections weekly. Clean controller exterior with dry cloth only. Replace gloves if tears develop or chambers lose pressure.

Sizing Guide

  • Measure: Hand width across knuckles (excluding thumb)
  • S: 2.75-3.25" (7-8.5cm)
  • M: 3.25-3.75" (8.5-9.5cm)
  • L: 3.75-4.25" (9.5-11cm)
  • XL: 4.25-4.75" (11-12cm)
  • Set includes both left and right gloves for bilateral training

Specifications

  • Technology: Mirror therapy robotics with bilateral pneumatic system
  • Modes: Mirror therapy, Bilateral training, Independent control
  • Intensity: 10 adjustable levels per hand
  • Power: AC adapter or rechargeable battery
  • Chambers: 5 individual finger chambers per glove + thumb
  • Timer: 20/30 minute sessions with auto shut-off
  • Set Contents: 2 gloves (left + right), controller, air tubes

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available. Contact us for clinical questions or technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This rehabilitation device is for home therapy under occupational therapist or physician guidance. Mirror therapy should be prescribed by qualified healthcare professional. Not for acute injuries, open wounds, or severe edema. Results vary by stroke severity, time since injury, and therapy consistency. Consult healthcare provider before use.

Smart ergonomic design wraps around shoulders and neck to deliver spa-quality deep tissue massage at home, office, or on-the-go. Key Benefits ✓ Shoulder-Focused Design: Extended arms reach deep into shoulder muscles (trapezius, rhomboids) for thorough relief ✓ Smart Vibration: Variable frequency vibration (3000-6000 pulses/min) breaks up muscle knots and tension ✓ EMS Pulse Therapy: Electrical muscle stimulation penetrates 6-8mm to release chronic tension ✓ Cervical Vertebra Care: Massage nodes positioned to relieve pressure on C1-C7 cervical spine ✓ Customizable Treatment: Multiple mode combinations allow personalized therapy sessions ✓ Voice Control Option: Some models feature voice-activated operation for hands-free use Perfect For Chronic shoulder pain and frozen shoulder Upper trapezius trigger points and knots Tech neck and forward head posture pain Cervical disc pain and nerve compression Desk job-related neck/shoulder strain Post-workout upper body recovery Stress and anxiety muscle tension Shoulder blade (scapular) pain How to Use Ensure device is fully charged before first use Drape massager over shoulders with U-section cradling back of neck Adjust arm position to target specific shoulder/upper back areas Power on and select desired mode (typically 4-6 mode options) Adjust intensity using +/- buttons (start low, increase gradually) Optional: Activate heat function for enhanced muscle relaxation Treatment duration: 10-20 minutes (auto shut-off after 15-20 min) Use 2-3 times daily or as needed for pain management Care Instructions Wipe down with damp microfiber cloth after each use. products.descriptionHtml:
Shoulder Vibration Massager - Electric Neck Cervical Device

Professional-grade electric massager designed for neck, shoulders, and cervical vertebrae with advanced vibration, pulse, and heat technologies. Smart ergonomic design wraps around shoulders and neck to deliver spa-quality deep tissue massage at home, office, or on-the-go.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Shoulder-Focused Design: Extended arms reach deep into shoulder muscles (trapezius, rhomboids) for thorough relief
  • ✓ Smart Vibration: Variable frequency vibration (3000-6000 pulses/min) breaks up muscle knots and tension
  • ✓ EMS Pulse Therapy: Electrical muscle stimulation penetrates 6-8mm to release chronic tension
  • ✓ Cervical Vertebra Care: Massage nodes positioned to relieve pressure on C1-C7 cervical spine
  • ✓ Customizable Treatment: Multiple mode combinations allow personalized therapy sessions
  • ✓ Voice Control Option: Some models feature voice-activated operation for hands-free use

Perfect For

  • Chronic shoulder pain and frozen shoulder
  • Upper trapezius trigger points and knots
  • Tech neck and forward head posture pain
  • Cervical disc pain and nerve compression
  • Desk job-related neck/shoulder strain
  • Post-workout upper body recovery
  • Stress and anxiety muscle tension
  • Shoulder blade (scapular) pain

How to Use

  1. Ensure device is fully charged before first use
  2. Drape massager over shoulders with U-section cradling back of neck
  3. Adjust arm position to target specific shoulder/upper back areas
  4. Power on and select desired mode (typically 4-6 mode options)
  5. Adjust intensity using +/- buttons (start low, increase gradually)
  6. Optional: Activate heat function for enhanced muscle relaxation
  7. Treatment duration: 10-20 minutes (auto shut-off after 15-20 min)
  8. Use 2-3 times daily or as needed for pain management

Care Instructions

Wipe down with damp microfiber cloth after each use. Use alcohol wipe on electrode contacts weekly. Do not immerse in water or expose to liquid. Store in protective bag when traveling. Recharge when battery drops below 20% for optimal battery life. Check connection points for debris or damage. Replace if decreased massage intensity or battery issues develop.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal (One Size): Adjustable to fit shoulder widths 14-20" (36-51cm)
  • Flexible Arms: Bend to fit individual shoulder contours
  • Weight: 10-16 oz (lightweight for portability)
  • Suitable for most adults - ergonomic design accommodates various body types

Specifications

  • Technology: Multi-frequency vibration + EMS pulse + infrared heat
  • Modes: 4-6 massage programs (kneading, tapping, shiatsu, auto)
  • Intensity: 10-15 adjustable levels
  • Vibration: 3000-6000 pulses per minute
  • Heat Temperature: 95-113°F (35-45°C)
  • Battery: 2500mAh rechargeable (USB-C fast charging)
  • Runtime: 4-6 treatment sessions per charge
  • Safety: Auto shut-off, overheat protection

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for technical support or usage guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for relaxation and muscle tension relief. Contraindications: cardiac pacemakers, implanted medical devices, pregnancy, epilepsy, cancer, acute inflammation, thrombosis, recent surgery, skin lesions. Do not use on throat, spine, or head. Not for children under 16. Consult physician before use if you have medical conditions. Discontinue if discomfort, pain, or adverse reactions occur. Not a medical device or treatment.

products.descriptionHtml:
Electric Lymphatic Drainage Massage Brush

Handheld electric lymphatic drainage tool with EMS muscle stimulation and massage brush attachments. Professional physiotherapy apparatus for at-home body treatments. Combines traditional gua sha techniques with modern EMS technology for comprehensive body contouring.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Professional-Grade Drainage: Hospital-quality lymphatic stimulation removes waste products and excess fluid
  • ✓ EMS Muscle Activation: Electrical stimulation increases local metabolism and fat mobilization
  • ✓ Handheld Convenience: Ergonomic design allows self-treatment of all body areas without assistance
  • ✓ Multiple Brush Heads: Interchangeable attachments optimize treatment for different body zones
  • ✓ Cost-Effective: Replaces expensive spa lymphatic drainage sessions ($80-150 each)

Perfect For

  • DIY lymphatic drainage therapy
  • Cellulite treatment at home
  • Post-lipo or post-surgery massage (after healing, with approval)
  • Reducing inflammation and puffiness
  • Body sculpting and inch loss
  • Improving skin elasticity
  • Detoxification support

How to Use

  1. Choose appropriate brush head for treatment area
  2. Apply massage oil, serum, or anti-cellulite cream
  3. Turn on device - start at lowest setting
  4. Activate EMS function if desired (optional)
  5. Begin at extremities, work toward torso (follow lymph flow)
  6. Use light to moderate pressure
  7. Move in slow, deliberate strokes (not rapid)
  8. Treat each zone for 5-10 minutes
  9. Total session: 20-30 minutes
  10. Drink 16-20 oz water after treatment

Lymphatic Flow Directions

Legs: Ankles → knees → groin
Arms: Hands → elbows → armpits
Abdomen: Circular clockwise, then up to chest
Back: Lower back upward to shoulders
Always toward lymph nodes (groin, armpits, neck)

Care Instructions

Wash brush heads with antibacterial soap after each use. Dry completely before storage. Wipe device handle with alcohol wipe. Charge regularly. Replace worn brush heads.

Specifications

  • Type: Electric lymphatic drainage brush with EMS
  • Power: Rechargeable or corded
  • Technologies: Mechanical massage + EMS stimulation
  • Brush Heads: 3-6 interchangeable attachments
  • Intensity: Multiple speed/power settings
  • EMS: Adjustable electrical stimulation
  • Design: Handheld, ergonomic grip
  • Weight: Lightweight for extended use

Treatment Schedule

Intensive (first 6 weeks): 4-5 sessions weekly
Maintenance: 2-3 sessions weekly
Best Time: Evening, before shower
Avoid: During menstruation (increases flow)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extra brush head sets available. Contact support for technique guidance.

Medical Disclaimer: This device is for wellness and cosmetic purposes. Not medical treatment. Do not use if: pregnant, have cancer (active or in remission), blood clots, acute infections, kidney/liver failure, heart conditions, or electronic implants. Not for use during: acute inflammation, fever, menstruation, or on broken skin. For diagnosed lymphedema: use only under therapist supervision. This is not substitute for manual lymphatic drainage therapy by certified therapist. If you develop increased swelling, pain, or fever after use, seek immediate medical attention. Consult doctor before use if you have chronic health conditions.

  5. Power on and select desired mode (typically 5 modes: Gentle, Moderate, Strong, Sleep, Migraine)
  6. Adjust air pressure and heat settings to preference
  7. Lie down or recline for 10-15 minute session
  8. Use daily for chronic conditions, or as needed for acute symptoms
  9. For migraines: Apply at first sign of symptoms

Care Instructions

Wipe interior foam padding with damp cloth and mild soap. Clean exterior with soft microfiber cloth. Do not spray directly with water or submerge. Allow to air dry completely. Clean weekly with regular use. Recharge via USB-C cable when battery drops below 20%. Store in protective case to prevent dust accumulation. Replace if air pump loses pressure or heat function fails.

Sizing Guide

  • One Size Fits All: Adjustable elastic strap (20-25" head circumference)
  • Weight: Lightweight design (10-12 oz) for comfortable extended wear
  • Suitable for adults and teens 14+
  • Compact foldable design for travel

Specifications

  • Technology: Air compression + vibration + heat + music therapy
  • Massage Modes: 5 (Gentle, Moderate, Strong, Sleep mode, Migraine relief)
  • Pressure Levels: 3 adjustable intensities
  • Heat Range: 95-107°F (35-42°C) with intelligent auto-regulation
  • Music: Bluetooth 5.0 + 8 built-in nature/relaxation sounds
  • Battery: 1500mAh rechargeable (USB-C fast charging)
  • Runtime: 6-10 sessions per full charge
  • Timer: 10/15 minute sessions with auto shut-off

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty on electronics. Extended 1-year warranty available (+30 days with registration). Contact us for troubleshooting or replacement parts.

Medical Disclaimer: This eye massager is for wellness and symptom management. Contraindications: glaucoma, retinal disorders, recent eye surgery, cataracts, eye infections, orbital fractures. Remove contact lenses before use. For migraines: Use as complementary therapy, not sole treatment. Consult ophthalmologist if you have eye conditions. Discontinue if pain increases or vision changes occur. Not for diagnosis or treatment of eye diseases. Not suitable for children under 14.

products.descriptionHtml:
Portable Neck Massage Instrument - Smart Shoulder Cervical Relief

Professional-grade portable neck and shoulder massager with intelligent massage technology for cervical pain relief anywhere. Wireless ergonomic design delivers spa-quality treatment combining multiple massage techniques - perfect for busy professionals, travelers, and anyone seeking convenient neck care.

Key Benefits

  • ✓ Professional Portability: Bring professional massage therapy to office, airplane, hotel, or anywhere
  • ✓ Smart Technology: AI-adaptive programs adjust to your neck tension level automatically
  • ✓ Multi-Technique Massage: Combines kneading, tapping, shiatsu, and pulse modes
  • ✓ Cervical Focus: Targets C1-C7 vertebrae area for comprehensive neck relief
  • ✓ Silent Operation: Quiet motor allows discreet use in office or public spaces
  • ✓ Long Battery Life: 5-8 sessions per charge for week-long travel convenience

Perfect For

  • Business travelers and frequent flyers
  • Office professionals with chronic neck pain
  • Remote workers needing relief at home
  • Long-distance drivers
  • Anyone with tech neck or forward head posture
  • Quick relief during lunch breaks
  • Maintaining cervical health between chiropractor visits

How to Use

  1. Fully charge device before travel (2-3 hours)
  2. Wrap device around neck, secure comfortable
  3. Select smart mode or manual technique preference
  4. Adjust intensity (10-15 levels typically available)
  5. Optional: Enable heat for enhanced relaxation
  6. Run 15-20 minute session
  7. Auto shut-off prevents over-treatment
  8. Use as needed throughout day

Care Instructions

Wipe with damp cloth after use. Do not submerge. Clean massage heads with alcohol wipe weekly. Store in protective case when traveling. Recharge regularly to maintain battery health. Replace if massage intensity decreases or mechanism jams.

Sizing Guide

  • Universal: Flexible design fits neck sizes 11-18"
  • Weight: 10-12 oz (lightweight for travel)
  • Suitable for adults and teens 14+

Specifications

  • Technology: Smart AI massage + multi-technique system
  • Techniques: Kneading, tapping, shiatsu, pulse, combination
  • Modes: 5-6 smart programs
  • Intensity: 10-15 adjustable levels
  • Heat: Optional 95-107°F warming
  • Battery: 2000mAh rechargeable (USB-C)
  • Runtime: 5-8 sessions per charge
  • Noise: <45dB (library-quiet)

Warranty & Support

90-day warranty. Extended warranty available. Contact us for technical support.

Medical Disclaimer: This massager is for wellness. Contraindications: pacemakers, pregnancy, epilepsy, acute neck injury, skin conditions. Do not use on throat. Not for children under 14. Consult physician if you have medical conditions. Discontinue if pain increases. Not a medical treatment.
